32a1(mdo sde): pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ dran pa med cing yid la byed pa med par 'gyur ro// yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni chos snang ba'i blo sde/ sems mi 'khrugs pa'i ting nge 'dzin pa
32a2(mdo sde): par 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi sems ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs rgyun mi 'chad par 'gyur ro// bsam pa'i ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ theg pa dman pa la 'dod pa med
32a3(mdo sde): par 'gyur ro// lhag pa'i bsam pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rgya chen po la lhag par dmigs par 'gyur ro// sbyor ba ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ dge ba'i chos thams cad
32a4(mdo sde): yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ mtshan dang / dpe byad bzang po dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par 'gyur zhing / ser sna can
32a5(mdo sde): gyi sems can yongs su smin par byed par 'gyur ro// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ mi khom pa dang / ngan gro thams cad las yang dag par 'da' zhing tshul khrims
32a6(mdo sde): 'tshal sems can yongs su smin par byed par 'gyur ro// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ gnod sems dang / tha ba dang / zhe sdang dang nga rgyal dang dregs pa dang /
32a7(mdo sde): rgyags pa spong bar 'gyur zhing / gdon sems can gyi sems can yongs su smin par byed par 'gyur ro// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ dge ba'i chos brtsams pa thams
32b1(mdo sde): cad dmas su len par 'gyur nang yemathun gyi sems can yongs su sbyin par byed par 'gyur ro// bsam gtan gyi pha rol ta phyin pa ni chos snang bsas/ bsam gtan dang mngan pa shes pa
32b2(mdo sde): thams cad byed cing / sems g.yengs pa can gyi sems can yongs su smin par byed par 'gyur ro// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni chos snang ba'i blo / ma rig pa dang / gti mug gi sun btsun
32b3(mdo sde): nag dang dmigs pa'i lnga baspong zhing shes rab 'chal pa'i sems can yongs su smin par byed par 'gyur ro// thabs mkhas pa ni chos snang ba'i ga ste/ sems can ji skar mos pa bzhin du spyod
32b4(mdo sde): lam ston cing sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad sgrub par 'gyur ro// bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ sems can thams cad sdud cing byang chub brnyes pa las chos nod par 'gyur ro//
32b5(mdo sde): sems can yongs su sbyin par bya ba ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ bdag gi bdi ba la mi chags shing yongs su skyo ba med par 'gyur ro// dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ sems can tham
32b6(mdo sde): tshad kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa spong bar 'gyur ro// bsod nams kyi tshogs ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ sems can thams cad nye bar 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// ye shes kyi tshogs ni chos snang ba'i rno ste
32b7(mdo sde): stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// zhi gnas kyi tshogs ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ro// lhag mthong gi tshogs ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ shes
33a1(mdo sde): rab kyi mig thob par 'gyur ro// so so yang dag par rigs pa la 'jug pa ni chos snang ba'i blo ste/ chos kyi mig thob par 'gyur ro// rton pa la 'jug pa ni chos snang /
33a2(mdo sde): ste/ sangs rgyas kyi spyan yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// gzungs thob pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ sangs rgyas kyi gsungs pa thams cad 'dzin par 'gyur ro// thobs pa thob pa ni chos dang /
33a3(mdo sde): ba'i sgo ste/ sems can thams cad legs par bshad pas tshim par byed par 'gyur ro// rjes su mthun pa'i chos kyi bzong ba ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dang 'thun par
33a4(mdo sde): 'gyur ro// mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ lung bstan pa thob par 'gyur ro// phyir mi ldog pa'i sa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par/
33a5(mdo sde): 'gyur ro// sa nas sar 'phar ba'i ye shes ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro// dbang bskur ba'i sa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ mngal du 'jug
33a6(mdo sde): ba dang / bcas pa dang / mngon par 'byung ba dang / dka' ba sdud pa dang / byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba dang / bdud 'dul ba dang / byang chub mngon par 'tshang rgya ba dang /
33a7(mdo sde): 'khor lo bskor ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po ston par 'gyur ro// grogs po dag/ 'di dag ni chos snang ba'i sgo brgya rtsa brgyad ces bya ba ste/ byang chub sems dpas 'chi 'pho
33b1(mdo sde): ba'idus kyim lha'i 'khor du gden mi za bar gang bstan par bya'o// dge slong dag byang chub sems dpas chos spang ba' mal le'u bstan pa'i rgyu lha'i 'khor de dag las lha'i bu brgyad khrings
33b2(mdo sde): stong bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur to// lha'i bu sngon yongs su blangs pa sum khri nyis song ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par 'gyur to// rtswa'i bu
33b3(mdo sde): ba sum cu rtsa drug ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go// dga' ldan gyi gnas thams cad kyang lha'i me tog gis pus mo nub tsam du logs par gyur to// dge slong dag
33b4(mdo sde): de ltar byang chub sems dpas lha'i 'khor de dag rngu cher dga' bar bya ba'i phyir/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// gang gi tshen dga' ldan gnas mchog nas/ 'dren pa skyes bu seng ge
33b5(mdo sde): 'chi 'di'i tshe lha rnams dag la tshig tu smra ba ni/ bag med mtha' dag rnam par spong shes smra// lha yi dga' ba rnam mang ji snyed pa yid kyi bsams pas 'byung ba dang ldan pa/ thams cad
33b6(mdo sde): las dge'i rgyu las byung ba ste/ de ni dge ba'i las kyi 'bras bu yin// de lta bas na byas pa gzo bar gyis/ sngon gyi dge bsags 'di ni zad gyur te/ gang du mi bde sdug bsngal myong 'gyur ba/
33b7(mdo sde): ngan song dag tu song bar gyur ta re/ ngal gus par bya ba bskyed nas ni chos gang thos par gyur pa de dag la// nan tan gyis ni rab tu sgrubs shig dang / bde ba mtha' yas nges par thob par 'jur
34a1(mdo sde): 'dod pa thams cad mi rtag brtan pa min/ ther zugs ma yin rmi lam 'dra ba ste/ smig rgyu dang ni sgyu ma rnams dang 'dra// glog dang dbu ba 'dra zhing 'gyur ba yin/
34a2(mdo sde): 'dod pa'i yon tan dag ni dga' bas ni// lan tshwa'i chu 'thungs bzhin du ngoms mi 'gyur// gang dag rdul med 'jig rten 'das pa yi// shes rab ldan pa de dag ngoms par 'gyur// lha mo dag
34a3(mdo sde): dang 'grogs dang glu dbyangs ni// gar gyi ltad mo pa dang mtshungs shing 'dra/ dper na 'dus pa dag ni khri las su// phan tshun 'gro bar sbyor ba byed dang mtshungs// dge ba'i las byas rjes su
34a4(mdo sde): 'brang byed cing // phyir bzhin 'gro bar byed pa ma gtogs par// 'dus byas dag la grogs yod ma yin te// mdza' bshes nye du med cing 'khor kyang med// de lta bas ni lhan cig mthun byos
34a5(mdo sde): la phan tshun byams sems phan pa'i sems byos te// chos kyi spyad pa dag ni spyad par gyis// spyad pa legs par spyad la gdung ba med// thos dang tshul khrims sbyin la dga' gyur cing //
34a6(mdo sde): bzod dang nges pa phun sum tshogs kyis te// sangs rgyas dang ni chos dang dge 'dun dang // de bzhin bag yod pa dag dran par gyis// rten pa med cing sdug bsngal bdag med la// rgyu dang
34a7(mdo sde): rkyen rnams dag ni ldan gyur cing // bdag po med la bems por gyur pa yi// chos 'di dag la tshul bzhin brtag par gyis// nga la rdzu 'phrul dag ni gang yod dang // spobs pa ye shes
34b1(mdo sde): dang rnams gang thob pa// kun kyang las dge'i rgyu las byung ba ste// thos pa tshul khrims pag yod rnams las byung / sems can don dang pan dang byams don du/ nga la tshul khrims/
34b2(mdo sde): dang ni zlos pa dang // bag yod pa dang sprin dang dul ba dang // yang dag sdom pa'i rjes su brlab par gyis// ngag dung sang drung sgra rnams tsam gyis ni// dge ba'i chos rnams sgrub par mi
34b3(mdo sde): nus kyis// nan tan snying por bya bas sgrub bos sgrub byos la// ji skad smras pa de bzhin bya bar byos// gzhan gyi gleng ba'i skabs ni mang bye bar// bdag gis rtag tu sgrims pas 'bad
34b4(mdo sde): par gyis// la las byas shing sbyin pa yod ma yin// ma byas par yang 'grub par 'gyur ba med// sngon chad 'khor bar 'khor tshe sdug bsngal dag/ myong bar gang gyur de ni dran par
34b5(mdo sde): gyis khyed cag log pa nyid du nges pas na// mya ngan las 'das 'dod chags bral ma thob// de lta bas na ngal dang bshes gnyen dang // tshul dang mthun pa'i yul du gnas pa dang /
34b6(mdo sde): chos mnyam dam pa thob par byas nas ni// 'dod chags la sogs nyon mongs zhi bar gyis// ngargyal dang ni rgyags dang dregs mthong la// rtag tu mnyen zhing dran lagayo med cing /
34b7(mdo sde): ngan 'das par 'gro la gzhol byos te// lam rtogs bya ba'i phyir na sbyor bar gyis// gti mug rnyog pa'i mun pa thams cad kyang // shes rab sgron mas rnam par bsal bar gyis/
35a1(mdo sde): bag la nyal bcas skyon gyi dra ba rnams// ye shes rdo rje yis ni rnam par grol// shin tu mang por sgrub ci dgos te// don dang yang dag ldan pa'i chos de la/
35a2(mdo sde): khyed cag gnas pa byas par mgyur na// de la chos kyis ldan pa ma yin no// gang tshengs ni byang chub thob gyur te// 'tsho med 'gro ba'i chos char 'bebs pa'i tshe// rnam par dag pa'i
35a3(mdo sde): sems dang ldan pa khyed// chos kyi dam pa mnyan pa'i phyir shes shig/ chos snang ba'i sgo'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpas lnga'i
35a4(mdo sde): 'khor chen po de dag la chos kyi gtam 'di yang dag par bstan// yang dag par 'dzin du bcug/ yang dag par gzengs bstod// yang dag par dga' bar byas// bzod par byas nas/
35a5(mdo sde): lnga'i 'khor bkra shis dang ldan pa rnams la smras pa// grogs po dag kho bo ni 'dzam bu'i gling du 'gro'o// kho bo sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshesems can rnams bsdu ba
35a6(mdo sde): dngos po sbyin pa dang / spen par smras pa dang / don spyad pa dang / don mthun par bya ba pa ni las mgron du bos la/ grogs po dgad kho bo bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
35a7(mdo sde): tu mngon por rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya bar 'dug pa de ni/ khe bas byas pa ma shes shing rigs pa ma yin par 'gyur ro// de nas dga' ldan gyi rig kyi lha'i bu de dag ngu zhing byang chub sems dpa'
35b1(mdo sde): dang bganyis la 'jus te 'di skad ces 'dor to// skyes bu ngas pa khyod mi bcugs na/ dka' ldan gyi gnas 'di mangs par mi 'gyur ro// de nas byung chub sems dpas pa'i 'bor rjen
35b2(mdo sde): po de dag la 'di skad du/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pa 'dis khyed la chos ston par 'gyur ro zhes de skad smras te/ de nas byang chub sems dpas rang gi mgo las thod dang cod pan pog tu/
35b3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' byams pa'i mgol banag nas 'di skad du/ skyes budam pa khyod na de'i 'og tu blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ronas
35b4(mdo sde): de skad smras te/ de nas byang chub sems dpasabyang chub sems dpa' byams pa dga' ldan gyi gnas dam par dbang bskur nas/ yang lha'i 'khor chen po de dag la smras pa/ grogs
35b5(mdo sde): bdag/ kho bas ji lta bu'i gzugs kyis ma'i mngal du 'gro bar bya/ de la kha cig na re bram ze'i khye'u'i gzugs su gshegs par rigs so zhes zer ro// la lan rab rgya byin gyi gzugs su/
35b6(mdo sde): la la na re tshangs pa'i gzugs su la la na re rgyal po chen po'i gzugs su la la na re rnam thos kyi bu'i gzugs su la lan re sgra can gyi gzugs su la la na re dri za'i gzugs
35b7(mdo sde): su la la na re mi 'am ci'i gzugs su la la na re lto 'phye chen po'i gzugs su/ la la na re dbang phyug chen po'i gzugs su la lan re zla ba'i gzugs su la la na ra
36a1(mdo sde): nyi ma'i gzugs su la la na re nam mkha' lding gi dbang po'i gzugs su bzhud pa'i rigs so zhes zer ro// de nas tshangs rigs kyi lha'i bu gzi brjid dam pa zhes
36a2(mdo sde): bya ba sngon drang srong las shi 'phos pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa zhig 'dug pa des 'di skad ces smras so// bram ze rnams kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig rig
36a3(mdo sde): byed kyi bstan bcos las ji skad du 'byung ba de lta bu'i gzugs su byang chub sems dpa' yum gyi lhums su bzhud pa ni rigs so// de'ang ci 'dra zhe na/ glang po dam pa lus chen mchog gyur pa/
36a4(mdo sde): mche ba drug can gser gyi dra bas g.yogs// mgo bo rab tu dmar zhing shin tu mdzes// 'gram nas zag cing gzugs ldan dpal ldan pa'o// rig byed bstan bcos yang dag mkhas pa yi//
36a5(mdo sde): bram zes rnam pa de 'dra de shes nas// sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan dang ldan 'gyur zhes// yang dag nyid du lung ni ston par 'gyur// dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpas skye ba'i dus
36a6(mdo sde): la bstas nas/ dga' ldan gyi gnas dam pa na gnas bzhin du/ rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i khyim dam pa der snga ltas brgyad bstan to// brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ khyim de zla dang //
36a7(mdo sde): sdong dum dang / tsher ma dang / gseg ma dang / gyo mo med cing / dri ma med la/ chag chag legs par btab pa dang / phyag dar legs par byas shing / chung rdul can dang / mun pa
36b1(mdo sde): dang rdul dang bral ba dang / thang ma dang / shasgang dang / sbrang bu dang / phye ma leb dang / sdig sbrul med cing / me tog gi kun tu gang ba lag mthil lngar mnyam par
36b2(mdo sde): gnas par gyur te/ 'di ni snga lhas byung ba dang po'o// ri'i rgyal po gang ril bya 'dab sngon dang / ne tse dang / ri glegs dang / khwa byug dang ngang pa dang / rma bya dang / drarab
36b3(mdo sde): dang kun la dang / ka la bing+ga dang shang shang ti'u la sogs pa/ sgo shog sna tshogs mdzes pa/ yid du 'ong zhing snyan pa'i sgra 'byin pa'i bya'i tshogs gang dag gnas pa de dag dar
36b4(mdo sde): 'ongs nas/ rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i khyim dam pa de'i stegs bu dang bug ma dang / rta babs dang / skar khrung dang / bsil khang dang / khang pa brtsegs pa dang / khang bzangs
36b5(mdo sde): kyi steng dag tu gnas shing dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas/ rang rang gi sgra skad dag 'byin te/ 'di ni snga ltas byung ba gnyis pa'o// gang yang rgyal po zas
36b6(mdo sde): gtsang mdo'i kun dga' ra ba nyams dga' ba dang / nags tshal nyams dga' ba dang / skyed mos tshal nyams dga' ba dag na/ me tog dang / 'bras bu'i shing ljon pa sna tshogs dus thang
36b7(mdo sde): bar 'byung ba de thams cad kyang kha 'bus shing me tog rgyas par gyur te/ 'di ni snga ltas byung ba gsum pa'o// rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i chu'i longs spyod kyi rkyen rdzing la sogs pa gang dag yod/
37a1(mdo sde): pa de dag thams cad kyang / pad+ma 'dab ma byed pa khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang ldan pa/ tshad shing rta'i 'phang lo tsam dag gis khebs par gyur te/ 'di ni snga ltas/
37a2(mdo sde): byung ba bzhi pa'o// rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i khyim dam pa de na mar dang / 'bru mar dang / sbrang rtsi dang / bu ram gyi dbu ba dang / sha kha ra la sogs pa bza' ba'i rnam pa gang dag yod pa
37a3(mdo sde): de dag kyang / yongs su spyad pas zad par mi 'gyur zhing yongs su gang bar snang ste/ 'di ni snga ltas byung ba lnga pa'o// rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i khyim mchog dam pa dang / btsun mo'i 'khor/
37a4(mdo sde): chen po dag na/ rnga bo che dang / rdza rnga dang / khar rnga dang / rgyud gcig pa dang / pi wang dang / gling bu dang / rgyud gsum pa dang / khar ba sol khri dang / pheg la sogs pa rol
37a5(mdo sde): mo'i cha spyad gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad kyang ma blangs ma dkrol bar yid du 'ong ba'i sgra rang sgrog par gyur te/ 'di ni snga ltas byung ba drug pa'o// rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i khyim
37a6(mdo sde): mchog dam pa na gser dang / dngul dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byi ru la sogs pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi snod gang dag yod pa
37a7(mdo sde): de dag thams cad kyang 'bye zhing dri ma med la rnam par dag cing rab tu gang bar snang ste/ 'di ni snga ltas byung ba bdun pa'o// nyi zla'i 'od zil gyis rlag par byed cing / lus dang sems dga'
37b1(mdo sde): bskyed pa'i 'od dag cing dri ma med pas snang bar gyur te/ 'di ni lnga las byung ba brgyad pa'o// 'phags pargya cher rol pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i ma/
37b2(mdo sde): bam po gsum pa/ lha mo sgyu 'phrul yang khrus byas/ lus byug pas byugs/ rgyan sna tshogs kyis lag pa shin tu brgyan te/ gos shin tu 'jam pa mchog bgos shing
37b3(mdo sde): btsun spu dang bcas la/ dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba dang / rangs pa thob nas/ bud med stong phrag bcus bskor cing mdun du bdar te lhan cig/ rgyal po bas gtsang ma rol mo bya ba'i
37b4(mdo sde): khang bzangs na/ bde bar gnas pa'i drung du phyin te/ g.yas rol na khri bzang po rin po che'i dra bas brgyan pa la 'dug nas/ 'dzum pa'i bzhin khro gnyer med cing / rab tu dang ba'i mdog
37b5(mdo sde): gis rgyal po zas gtsang ma la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// rgyal pos bdag legs par bdag la gsam du gsol// rgyal po khyod la gsol gyis bdag la de gnod shig/ bdag
37b6(mdo sde): gi bsam pa yid la ci mchis cir dga' ba de dag bdag la gsan cing thugs dgyes rangs par mdzod// lha bdag nyer gnas tshul khrims brtul zhugs len par gsol// bdag ni 'grol
37b7(mdo sde): byams pas yan lag brgyad len te// srog chags gnod pa spangs shing bsam pa rtag dag pas// ji ltar bdag la byams pa de ltar gzhan la bgyi// du sems rnam par spangs te 'dod
38a1(mdo sde): dang dregs pa spangs// rgyal po 'dod pa rnams la log par g.yem mi bgyid// bden la gnas shing bra ma mchis zhe gcod spangs// mi dge kyal ba'i tshig kyang /
38a2(mdo sde): yongs su mi spyod do// gnod sems zhe sdang tha ba gti mug rgyags pa dang // brnab sems kun spangs rang gi nor gyis 'tshal bar bgyi// yang dag sbyor bas kha gsag tshul 'chos phrag dog
38a3(mdo sde): spangs// dge bcu'i las lam 'di dag bdag gis spyad par bgyi// bdag ni tshul khrims brtul zhugs mngon dga' rab bsdams kyis// mi yi dbang po bdag la bzhed pas sred ma mdzad//
38a4(mdo sde): rgyal po khyod la yun rings mi dger gyur tu mchi// bdag gi tshul khrims brtul zhugs nyer gnas dgyes par mdzod// rgyal po bdag gi 'tshal ba 'di lags de myur stsol// khang bzangs
38a5(mdo sde): bsil khang ldan pa dang sna ldan pa'i nang // me tog bkram pa'i mchis mal 'jam zhing dri bda' bar// grogs mos rtag tu bskor cing bde dgar gnas snyam bgyi// skyes pa nyung rum rnams
38a6(mdo sde): dang de bzhin khye'u dag dang // bud med phal ba rnams kyang mdun na mchis mi 'tshal// snyan cing yid mchi sgra snyan nyan pa ma gtogs par// gzugs dang sgra gsung yid du mi mchi bdag
38a7(mdo sde): mi 'tshal// bcings dang btson rar stsal pa thams cad dgye bar gsol// nor gyis brel ba'i rnams nor dang ldan par mdzod// zas skom rang pa shing rta khyogs dang bzhen pa rta// 'gro
38b1(mdo sde): babade ba'i rmad du dgung bdun stsal ba mdzod// po zang 'din skyes pa khye'u dang bud med dag/ ji skad mchis pa 'thab zong khro ba'i tshig bral zhing // ban tshun byams pa'i ming ldan pan
38b2(mdo sde): dang des sems kyis// dga' tshal gnas pa'i lha ltar mthun zhing bde spyod mdzod// rgyal po'i chang pa che phra gnyer gyis bda' ba dang // gnod par bgyi dang brdeg btsog sdig ru mi mdzad pa
38b3(mdo sde): kun la'ang dang ba'i thugs kyis byams dang phan dgongs te// lha yis skye bo rnams la sras gcig bzhin du gzigs// rgyal pos de skad tshig thos rab tu dgra 'gyur nas// smras pa khyod na
38b4(mdo sde): 'dod de kun de bzhin bye// khyod kyis bsam pa yid kyis gang rnams rjes bsam shing // khyod kyis mchog blangs gang yin de ni ngas sbyin no// rgyal po'i dam pas rang gi 'khor la bsgo ba ni/
38b5(mdo sde): khang bzangs dam pa'i steng du phun sum tshogs pa shoms// me tog mdzes pa khrom la bdug spos mchog gis bdugs// bdugs drang ba ngan ta la'i phreng ba'i rgyan kyang gyis// zab pod stong drag
38b6(mdo sde): nyi shu sna tshogs go cha can// mda' mdung lugs mda' mdung thung ral gri thogs pa dag/ yid 'ong sgra gcan dang rtswa ldan pa skor gyis te// lha mo 'jigs pa med par bya phyir srung zhing gnas/
38b7(mdo sde): khrus byas spos byug gos mchog dag gis yan lag brgyan// bud med rnams kyis de bskor lha yi bu mo 'ang // yid du 'ong ba'i sgra ldan sil snyan stong blangs te// lha mo der zhugs lha yi bu
39a1(mdo sde): mo bzhin du gnas// lha yi rin chen rin thang chen pos rtsi spras pa// khri la gos mchog mang pos yid 'ongs mal bshams te// mal phyin gtsug gi nor bu rin/
39a2(mdo sde): chen klong byas nas// 'dres pa'i nags tshal lha yi bu mo bzhin du gnas/ dge slong dag de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi dang // lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / lha'i bu rab 'thab bral
39a3(mdo sde): dang / yongs su dga' ldan dang / rab 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / bdud kyi bu ded dpon dang / mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / mdun na 'don tshangs/
39a4(mdo sde): mchog dang / mdun na 'don tshangs bzangs dang / 'od bkod pa dang / 'od gsal dang / gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi dbang phyug chen po dang / mthar thug dang / 'og min pa
39a5(mdo sde): de dag la sogs pa dang / gzhan yang lha brgya stong mang po 'dus te/ gcig la gcig 'di skad ces smras so// grogs po dag bdag cag gis byang chub sems dpa' gcig tu
39a6(mdo sde): gnyis su med par gshegs su gsol na/ bdag cag gis byas pa ma shes par 'gyur te/ bdag cag la mi chas/ grogs po dag khyed kyi nang nas/ byang chub sems dpa' thog
39a7(mdo sde): ma yum gyi lhums su gshegs pa dang / lhums su bzhugs pa dang / bltams pa dang zor bu dang / byis pa'i nang na rol pa dang / btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang na bzhugs pa dag
39b1(mdo sde): rol mo gzigs pa dang / mngon par 'byung ba dang / dka' ba rjod pa dang / byang chub kyi snying por gshegs pa dang / bdung 'dul ba dang / byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'dzang
39b2(mdo sde): ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa chen po bstan gyi bar du/ phan pa'i sems dang / dga' ba'i sems dang / phangs pa'i sems dang / byams pa
39b3(mdo sde): sems dang / gnyen pa'i sems kyis rtag par rgyun tu byang chub sems dpa'i zham 'bring na 'khod par su dag s+ho// de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang smras so// khyed las
39b4(mdo sde): su zhig rtag tu dga' yid kyis// gzugs mchog mnga' ba'i zham ring byed par spro// su dag rang gi bsod nams gzi brjid dang / stobs dang grags pa rnam par spel bar 'dod// ga
39b5(mdo sde): nig lnga yi pho brang 'di dag na// lha mo dag dang 'dod pa'i yon tan gyi// lha yi bde bas dga' bar 'dod pa dag/ dri med zla ba'i zhal gyi zham ring gyis// de bzhin 'dres pa'i nags tshal mdzes
39b6(mdo sde): ba mchog/ lha yi 'byung gnas lha yi pho brang na// gser mdog me tog rgyas par dga' 'dod na// dri med gzi brjid mnga' ba'i zham ring gyis// gang gis sna tshogs shing rta de bzhin du/
39b7(mdo sde): dga' tshal me tog man der 'dab rgyas su// lha mo lhan cig rtse bar 'dod pa dag/ skyes bu chen po 'di yi nam ring gyis// 'thab bral bdag po'am dga' ldan padag po'am// mngon
40a1(mdo sde): dbang phyug 'gyur bar 'dod pa dang // 'gro ba kun gyi mchod 'od 'dod pa dag/ grags pa mtha' yas 'di yi zhum ring gyis// gang zhig 'phrul dga'i khang pa
40a2(mdo sde): mdzes pa dang // dbang sgyur lha yi gnas su rtse 'dod ci// yid kyi 'phrul gyis thams cad spyod 'dod pa// yon tan mchog mnga' 'di yi zham ring gyis// bdud kyi dbang po zhe sdang yid
40a3(mdo sde): med pa// rdzu 'phrul dbang phyug kun gyi mthar phyin pa'i// 'dod pa'i dbang phyug dbang mthar phyin 'dod na// phan pa dzad pa 'di dang lhan cig dang // de bzhin 'dod pa'i khams las
40a4(mdo sde): 'da' byas te// tshangs pa'i gnas su gnas par su 'dod pa// de ni tshad med bzhi yi gzi mnga' ba// skyes bu chen po'i zham ring deng nas gyis// 'on tam gang zhig mi yi nang drag tu// /
40a5(mdo sde): 'khor los sgyur yul yangs par skye 'dod na// rin chen 'byung gnas mi 'jigs bde sbyin pa// bsod nams yangs pa mnga' ba'i zham ring gyis// gang zhig sa bdag de bzhin
40a6(mdo sde): tshong dpon bu// phyug cing skyed la nor mang tshogs chen dang // dgra yi dpung bcom 'khor dang ldan 'dod pa// de ni phan mdzad 'di dang lhan cig deng // gzugs dang longs spyod
40a7(mdo sde): de bzhin dbang phyug dang // ldan pa grags dang spobs dang yon tan dang // gzung 'os tshig dang mnyam pa'i tshig 'dod pa// de ni tshangs dbyangs mkhas pa'i gan du song // lha dang mi
40b1(mdo sde): ma dang ba gang yin dang / srid pa gsum mi bde ba thams cad dang / bsam gtan pade dang dben pa'i dpe 'dod ba// dan rgyas kyi dbang blagasas rnying cis 'dod nags dang ni ni dang /
40b2(mdo sde): spang ba dang / nyon mongs sun pa sel bar su 'dod cing // zhi ba rab zhi zer ni yid ldan pa// de ni thugs dul nam ring myur du song // gang zhig slo ba dang mi slob rang rgyal dang / thams
40b3(mdo sde): cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob 'dod dang // stobs bcus seng ge'i sgra sgyogs su 'dod pa// de ni yon tan rgya mtsho ma khas drung song // gang zhig ngan song rnams kyi lam gcod cing /
40b4(mdo sde): bzang 'gro 'chi ba med pa'i lam dbye dang // yan lag brgyad lam 'gro bas 'gro 'dod ni// 'gro lam mthar byin 'di yi zham ring gyis/ gang zhig bde gshegs yongs su mchod pa
40b5(mdo sde): dang thugs rje mnga' ba de las chos nyan dang // dge 'dun yon tan thob par 'dod pa ni// yon tan rgya mtsho 'di yi zhum ring gyis// skye na na 'chi'i sdug bsngal zad pa dang /
40b6(mdo sde): 'khor ba'i bcings pa rnam par grol ba dang // nam mkha'i mtha' mnyam rnam dag spyod 'dod pa// de ni sems can dag pa'i nA ma ring gyis// 'gro ba kun na yid 'ong sdug mdzes shing /
40b7(mdo sde): gzugs mchog mtshan dang yon tan rgyas pa dang / bdag dang de bzhin gzhan yang 'grol 'dod pa// de ni blta sdug ma bas pa'i gan du song // tshul khrims ting 'dzin de bzhin shes rab
41a1(mdo sde): dang / zab cing blta dka' gting dpag dka' ba yi// rnam grol thob 'dod mkhas pa gang yin de// sman pa'i rgyal po'i gan du myur du song // yon tan 'di dang /
41a2(mdo sde): gzhan yang rnam mang dang // srid pa'i bde dang de bzhin mya ngan 'das// yon tan thams cad rab tu rdzogs 'dod pa// de ni brtul zhugs grub mkhas gan du song // tshig de thos nas rgyal
41a3(mdo sde): chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha 'bum phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi dang // sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha 'bum dang // 'thab bral gyi lha 'bum dang // dga' ldan gyi lha 'bum dang // 'phrul dga'i lha 'bum
41a4(mdo sde): dang bdud kyi ris kyi lha sngon gyi dge ba'i las byung ba drug zi dang // tshangs ris kyi lha drug khrig brgyad stong dang // 'og min gyi bar gyi lnga brgya stong mang po dag 'dus par gyur pa dang /
41a5(mdo sde): gzhan yang shar phyogs dang / lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs nas lha'i bu brgya stong mang po 'dus par gyur pa de dag las gang dag mchog tu bya ba'i lha'i bu dag gis lha'i 'khor chen po
41a6(mdo sde): dag la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// bdag cag rnams kyi bsam pa yang dag ci 'dra yi// tshig 'di lha yi dbang po bdag gis gsun du gsol// 'dod pa'i dag 'byor
41a7(mdo sde): bsam gtan bde ba mchog spangs te// sems can dag pa dam pa 'di yi zham ring bgyi// lhums su gshegs dang lhums na bzhugs dang bltams pa'i tshe// bdag nyid chen po mchod 'os shin
41b1(mdo sde): tu mchod par bgyi// bsod nams dag kyis bsrungs pa'i drang srong yongs bsrungs nas// ne sdang sems kyis sus kyang rmugs rnyed 'gyur ma mchis// gru dbyangs sil snyan ram mam
41b2(mdo sde): dbyangs sgra legs bsgrags pas// yon tan rgyu mtsho mnga' ba'i yon tan bsngags brjod de// gang thos skye bo byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed par// wa dang mi rnams thams cad rab/
41b3(mdo sde): tu dga' bar bgyi// rgyal po'i pho brang me tog bsil mas rgyas par dgang // a ga ru mchog nag pos bdugs te dri zhim bgyi// de yi dri tshor lnga mi rab tu dga' 'gyur zhing // nad med rims
41b4(mdo sde): nang bral zhing bde bar 'gyur bar bgyi// me tog man+da rar+ya dang kun nas 'du ba dang / sim byed rab tu sim byed sbru la rnam snang dang // me tog bzang pos phrin las dag las byung ba de// mchod
41b5(mdo sde): pa'i slad du ser skya'i gling kun dbang bar bgyi// ji srid yum gyi lhums na dri gsum mgos bzhugs// ji srid rga shi mthar byin bltams par gyur gyi bar// de srid dus su dang ba'i yid kyi nam/
41b6(mdo sde): ring brtsi// blo gros che mnga' mchod pa bgyi bar bdag cag sems// bltams nas gom pa bdun gshegs brgya byin tshangs pa yis// lags tu blangs te spos chu dag gis sku bsil ba/
41b7(mdo sde): sems can rnam par dag pa de ni mthong ba yi// lha mi de dag thob pa rgya chen legs par 'thob// ji srid bar du 'jig rten rjes su mthun mdzad cing // 'dod pa'i nyon mongs 'joms
42a1(mdo sde): mdzad btsun mo'i nang bzhugs la// ji srid cig na rgyal srid kun spangs khab nas 'byung // de srid dus su dang ba'i sems kyis zham ring bgyi// ji srid cig
42a2(mdo sde): na ran bsnams byang chub snying por gshegs// ji srid gcig na bdud bcom byang chub reg gyur cing // tshangs pa khrag khrig 'khor lo bskor bar gsol btab pa// de srid bde bar gshegs
42a3(mdo sde): la mchod pa rgya chen bgyi// sems can bye ba khrag khrig 'chi med brtul gyur te// stong gsum khams su sangs rgyas phrin las nam langs nas// zhi zhing bsil ba'i mya ngan 'das par
42a4(mdo sde): gshegs gyur pa// de srid kun gyis drang srong grags chen gtang mi bgyid// dge slong dag de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu mo de dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i lus gzugs phun sum
42a5(mdo sde): tshogs pa mthong nas// 'di snyam du sems te// sems can dag pa mchog dam pa ji lta bu 'dzin par 'gyur ba'i na chung de ni ji lta bu zhig yod snyams nas// de dag ngo mtshur du gyur te/
42a6(mdo sde): me tog dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa mchog tu bya ba dag khyer nas lha'i lus yid las grub pa thob cing / bsod nams kyi rnam par smin pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyis byin gyis brlabs pa
42a7(mdo sde): de dag skang cig de nyid la lha'i pho brang de nas mi snang bar gyur to/ ser skya'i grong khyer chen po das pa bskyed mos tshal brgya stong gis brgyan pa rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i khyim mchog bang bzangs
42b1(mdo sde): rkyen pa dang bla ldan nas byab wA'i dbyung ba bzung // khuder byinanas/ lha'i du tshogs zlag lhag po non pa/ dge ban ma med pa'i bsod nams gsi brji tu nu / lA
42b2(mdo sde): gyis lag pa shin tu brtan pa de dag gis lha mo sgyu 'phrul ma la mchog gi skyeng na 'dug pa mthong nas/ phan tshun mdzub mos ston cing / nam mkha'i dkyil na 'khod de gcig la gcig
42b3(mdo sde): tshigs su bcad du smras pa/ lha gnas 'khod pa'i lha yi bu mo rnams yid 'ong byang chub sems dpa'i sku mthong nas// de tshod dag 'di snyam sems gyur te/ zung
42b4(mdo sde): chub sems dpa'i yum 'gyur ci 'dra snyam// lag na me tog phreng can de dag rnams// the tshom skyes nas rgyal po'i pho brang du// me tog de bzhin byug pa thogs nas su// sor bcu thal
42b5(mdo sde): mi sbyar te 'dud cing lpags// lkug lcug gos gyon 'jobag gzugs 'chung bas// lha mo sgyu 'phrul mal steng gnas mthong nas// lag pa g.yas pa'i sor mos phyag byas te/
42b6(mdo sde): mi yi bud med gzugs la legs ltos 'dzir// bdag cag nga rgyal sems kyis mngon sems pa// lha yi bu mo'i gzugs mchog yid 'ong snyam// rgyal po'i btsun mo 'di yi gzugs
42b7(mdo sde): mthong na// lha yi lus kyang zil gyis non par mthong // 'di ni gang zag mchog gis yum 'gyur du// yon tan ldan pas shin tu gsha' zhing 'os// nor bu rin chen snod bzang
43a1(mdo sde): gnas pa ltar// lha mo 'di ni lha yi lha snod yin// rkang lag mthil dang spyi bo man chad du// yan lag yid 'ong lnga las lhag pa ste// mig gis bldan
43a2(mdo sde): ngoms par 'gyur ma yin// yid dang sems ni phyir zhing dga' bar 'gyur// 'di yi kha bzhin lus mdzes sdug pa na// nam mkha'i dkyil na zla ba mdzes pa 'dra// nyi ltar dri med me
43a3(mdo sde): ltar 'bar ba ste// 'di yi lus las 'od gsal bzang po 'byung // gser sbrum bcom bzang po'i gser bzhin du// lha mo 'di yi kha dog rnam par mdzes// 'di yi sgra ni 'jam
43a4(mdo sde): gtsang dri zhim ste// bung ba mchog gi mdog 'dra lung lor 'khyil// 'di yi mig ni pad+mo'i 'dab ma 'dra// rnam dag so ni nam mkha'i skar ma bzhin// sked pa gzhu lngar bri zhing sta
43a5(mdo sde): zur yangs// phrag pa zlum zhing tshig rnams mngon par med// brla legs glang po mchog gi sde 'dra ste// byin pa shin tu legs pa byin gyis pra// rkang lag mthil mnyam shin tu dmar ba
43a6(mdo sde): ste/ 'di ni gzhan min lha yi bu mor des// de ltar rnams mang du mar blta byas nas// me tog gtor te bskor ba byas nas ni// grags ldan rgyal ba'i yum la bstod byas te/
43a7(mdo sde): skad cig gcig gis phyir yang lha gnas dong // de nas phyogs bani spong ba bzhi po dang // 'thab bral rab dang brgya byin 'phrul ba dang // lha tshogs lha min grul bum srin po dang /
43b1(mdo sde): mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye ches smras pa// skyes bu mchog gi mdun du khyed deng la// skyes bu dam pa de la bsrang dang bskyab pa bgyis// 'gro ba dag la yid kyis snang ma byed// mi rnams
43b2(mdo sde): la yang gtseb ma byed cig/ lha mo sgyu 'phrul khyim mchog gang gnas pa// der ni mthun par 'khor dang lhan cig kun// mda' gzhu ral gri mdung thung mtshon thogs la// nam ma
43b3(mdo sde): dkyil na gnas te blta bar gyis// de ltar shrI 'pho'i dus shes lha bu rnams// me tog de bzhin byug pa thogs nas ni// sor bcu'i thal mo sbyar te 'dud byos la// dga' ba'i sems
43b4(mdo sde): gyis sgyu 'phrul drung du dang // smra ba'i seng ge'i dus ni dang lags kyis// 'jig rten kun la thugs rjes brtse bskyed de// mi dbang sems can dag la 'tsho 'pho ston// mchod sbyin don du
43b5(mdo sde): bdag cag gsol ba 'debs/ dge slong dag de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'chi 'pho ba'i dus kyi tshe// shar phyogs nas byang chub sems dpa' skye ba gcig gis thogs pa/
43b6(mdo sde): dga' ldan gyi gnas dam pa na gnas pa brgya stong phrag mang po dag/ byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' ga la ba der lhags so// de bzhin du phyogs
43b7(mdo sde): bcu'i phyogs re re nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' skye ba gcig gis thogs pa/ dga' ldan gyi gnas dam pa na gnas pa brgya stong phrag mang po dag/ byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa bya ba'i/
44a1(mdo sde): phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' ga la ba der lpags so// rgyal chen bzhi'i rigs kyi lha rnams kyi nang na/ lha'i bu mo 'bum phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi sil snyan dang /
44a2(mdo sde): glu dbyangs sna tshogs len cing / byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' ga la bder lhags so// de bzhin du sum cu rtsa gsum pa dang / 'thab bral
44a3(mdo sde): dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi nang nas lha'i bu mo 'bum phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi sil snyan dang / glu dbyangs sna tshogs len cing byang
44a4(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' ga la ba der lhags so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' khang pa rtsegs pa chen po bsod nams thams cad kyis yang dag
44a5(mdo sde): par byung ba dpal gyi snying po lha rnams kyis kun nas blta ba'i nang du 'dug ste/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gis yongs su bskor cing mdun du
44a6(mdo sde): bdar nas dga' ldan gyi gnas dam pa nas bskyod par brtsams so// dge slong dag de ltar bskyod par brtsams pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpas 'od gang gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
44a7(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams 'di ltar rgya che zhing yangs la/ zag gru che ba 'dir sngan chad ma byung ba'i 'od snang lha'i 'od las shin tu 'das pas yongs su gsal zhing snang bar gyur to// 'jig rten gyi bar
44b1(mdo sde): gang sdig pa sdig pas khebs nas/ mun pa mun nag sdug tu gyur pa/ snang ba med pa/ gang du nyi ma dang zla ba 'di dag 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing 'di ltar mthu chel/ 'di ltar dbang che bar
44b2(mdo sde): grags pas kyang / 'od dang / kha dog dang / gzi brjid kyi lam mer mgyur/ thal ler ma gyur/ wang nger ma gyur pa der sems can gang dag gyes pa de dag rang rang gi lag pa bcang
44b3(mdo sde): ba'ang mi mthong ba de dag tu'ang de'i tshe/ snang ba chen pos rgyas par khyab par gyur cing / der gyes pa'i sems can de dag snang ba des khyab par gyur nas/ gcig gis gcig mthong zhing /
44b4(mdo sde): gcig gis gcig shes te/ 'di skad du kye bregs po dag sems can gzhan dag kyang 'dir skyes so// kye grogs po dag sems can gzhan dag kyang 'dir skyes so zhes zer bar gyur pa de lta bu'i /
44b5(mdo sde): lus las bkye'o// stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'ang rnam pa drug dang / lhas chen po bcwo brgyad du g.yos/ rab tu g.yos kun tu rab tu g.yos so// 'gul rab tu 'gul
44b6(mdo sde): kun tu rab tu 'gul lo// ldeg rab tu ldeg/ kun tu rab tu ldeg go// 'khrugs/ rab tu 'khrugs/ kun tu rab tu 'khrugs so// 'ur 'ur/ rab tu 'ur 'ur/ kun tu rab tu 'ur 'ur ro//
44b7(mdo sde): chemachem/ rab tu chem chem/ kun tu rab tu chemachem mo// mtha' dma' na dbus mtho bar gyur to// dbus dma' na mtha' mtho bar gyur to// shar phyogs dma'an nub phyogs mtsha
45a1(mdo sde): bar gyur to// nub phyogs dma' na shar phyogs mtho bar gyur to// lho phyogs dma' na byang phyogs mtho bar gyur to// byang phyogs dma' na lho phyogs mtho bar
45a2(mdo sde): gyur to// de'i tshe sgra dga' bar 'gyur ba tshim par 'gyur ba/ mgu bar 'gyur ba/ drang bar 'gyur ba/ sim par 'gyur ba/ mnyan par 'gyur ba bsngags par 'os pa/ mtshungs
45a3(mdo sde): pa med pa/ mnyan na gtang mi bra ba/ mi mthun pa med pa/ dngang bar 'gyur ba med pa dag kyang grags par gyur to// skad cig de las sems can gang la yang gnod pa 'am
45a4(mdo sde): 'jigs pa 'am/ dngang ba 'am/ bag non par med par gyur to// skad cig de la nyi zla dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dag gi 'od kyang mi snang bar gyur
45a5(mdo sde): sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skyes pa'i sems can thams cad kyang skad cig de la sdug bsngal dang bral zhing bde ba thams cad dang
45a6(mdo sde): ldan par gyur te/ sems can gang la yang 'dod chags kyis gnod par mi 'gyur/ ni sdang gis gnod par mi 'gyur/ gti mug gis gnod par mi 'gyur zhing / phrag dog gam
45a7(mdo sde): ser sna'am/ nga rgyal 'am/ 'chab pa dang / rgyags pa 'am/ khro ba 'am/ gnod sems sam/ yongs su gdung bas gnod par 'gyur ba med par gyur te/ sems can tham
45b1(mdo sde): ba kyang gang g+sa de la phan tshun pa mtham du sems pa'i 'du shes su gyur nas/ byams pa'i sems dang / blun pa'i sems dang ldan par gyur to// lha dang mi'i rnamam ma
45b2(mdo sde): spyan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dag kyang ma dkrol ma blangs par yid du 'ong ba'i sgra 'byin par gyur to// lnga bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dag kyang lag pa dang / phrag pa dang / spyi bos gan
45b3(mdo sde): med khang chen po de dag 'dags cing khyer bar gyur to// lha'i bu mo brgya stong dag gis kyang rang rang gi klu dbyangs blangs te/ mdun dang rgyab dang / galas g.yon dag nas/ byang chu
45b4(mdo sde): sems dpa' la glu dbyangs kyi sgra skad kyis mngon par bstod pa/ khyod kyis sngan chad dge las bsags pa dang // yun rings dus kyi dge bas byung ba dang / khyod kyis chos rnams kun gyis
45b5(mdo sde): tshul sbyangs pas// de ring mchod pa rgya chen byung bar gyur// bskal pa bye ba mang por khyod kyi sngon// sras mo sras sdug sbyin pa mdzad pas na// lnga yi me tog char du bab pa 'di// sbyin
45b6(mdo sde): pa spyad pa de yi 'bras bu lags// gtso bo khyod kyis rang gi sha bcad de// srang la gcal nas thugs byon bya phyir btang // sbyin pa de spyad pa yi 'bras bu des// yi dgas 'jig rten
45b7(mdo sde): rnams kyang zas skom thob// bskal pa bye ba mang por khyod kyis sngon// tshul khrims ma zhig ma nyams bsrungs pas na// tshul khrims de spyad pa yi 'bras bu des// mi khom ngan song yod/
46a1(mdo sde): su dag par gyur// bskal pa bye ba mang por khyod kyi sngon// byang chub bsgrub pa'i gzhir ni bzod pa bsgoms// bzod pade spyad pa yi 'bras bu des// lha dang /
46a2(mdo sde): mi kun byams pa'i sems su gyur// bsal pabye ba mang por khyod kyi sngon// brtson 'grus mgong dam pa bsgoms pas na// brtson 'grus de spyad pa yi 'bras bu des/ mu ni ri rab bzhin
46a3(mdo sde): du mdzes par grub// bskal pa bye ba mang por khyod kyi sngon// nyon mongs sbyang slad bsam gtan bsgoms mdzes pas// bsam gtan de spyad pa yi 'bras bu des// 'gro ba kun la
46a4(mdo sde): nyon mongs gnod mi 'gyur// bskal pa bye ba mang por khyod kyi sngon// nyon mongs gcod pa'i shes rab bsgoms mdzad pas// shes rab de spyad pa yi 'bras bu des// 'od gsal dam/
46a5(mdo sde): ba rnam par snang zhing mdzes// byams pa'i go mnabs nyon mongs 'joms mdzad cing // sems can kun la thugs rje che byung ba// dgyes pa mchog brnyes btang snyoms mchog ldan pa/
46a6(mdo sde): bde gshegs tshangs gyur khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// shes rab sgron ma'i 'od dang gzis 'phags shing // gti mug skyon gyi mun pa kun sel ba// 'dren pa stong gsum dag na mig myur ba'i//
46a7(mdo sde): thub pa lam ston khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// rdzu 'phrul rkang pa mngon shes mchog la mkhas// 'den pa gzigs shing dam pa'i don bslabs pa/ brgal nas srog chags gzhan dag sgrol mtha
46b1(mdo sde): ga bad gshegs grol gyur khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// thabs dang mngon shes dam pa kun la mkhas// 'chi bo 'dri 'pho med pa'i 'pho bston// 'jig rten chos kyi rjes su mthun mngang kyang /
46b2(mdo sde): 'jig rten gang du'ang chags pa khyod mi mnga'// gang dag khyod ni nyan tam ltar lhags pa// de dag thob pa dam pa bsam mi khyab// khyod las chos nyid thos te gang dad cing // dga' ba yangs pa
46b3(mdo sde): skyes pa smos ci 'tshal// dga' ldan gnas rnams kun ni mog mog gyur// 'dzam bu'i gling du nyi ma mngon du shar// thog chags bye ba khrag khrig bsam mi khyab// nyon mongs gnyid kyis log
46b4(mdo sde): las sad par mdzad// deng ni pho brang 'byor cing rgyas gyur la// bye ba khrag khrig lha rnams lang long gyur// lha yi bu mos sil snyan sgra zung bas// rgyal po'i khab na sgra sman grags par
46b5(mdo sde): b+har/ bsod nams gzi brjid rdzogs shing las dge ba// bud med gzugs kyi mchog dang ldan gyur pa// de yi sras gyur de ni de ltar 'byor// dpal gyis 'jig rten gsum ni zil gyis
46b6(mdo sde): gnon// mi mchog 'byung ba de yi gzi brjid kyis// deng byi byin chad po zang dam pa 'dir// lus can rnams la 'dod sdang 'thab cod med// kun kyang byams pa'i sems kyis srid zhur bcas//
46b7(mdo sde): 'khor los sgyur ba'i rigs rgyal byung bas na// rgyal po'i rigs ni rab tu 'phel bar gyur// ser skya'i grong 'di shin tu phun sum tshogs// rin chen mdzod kyis rab tu gang bar 'gyur/
47a1(mdo sde): gnod sbyin srin po grul bum gsang ba pa// lha dang lha min tshogs rnams dbang por bcas// mi mchog srung ba gang dag gnas pa rnams// de dag ring por mi thog/
47a2(mdo sde): thar pa 'thob// gus dang sri zhu la ni gnas nas su// 'dren pa khyod bstod bsod nams gang bsags pa// kun kyang byang chub tu ni yongs su bsngo// mi yi dam pa khyod ltar myur du shog
47a3(mdo sde): bskyod par brtsams pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// / dge slong dag de ltar dgun 'das te// dpyid kyi dus la dpyid zla tha chung gi tshe// skar ma sa ga la bab pa'i dus kyi dam
47a4(mdo sde): pa la/ shing rnams kyi lo ma rgyas shing me tog mchog tu rgyas nas/ grang dro dang / mun pa dang / rdul med cing sa'i gzhi sngo gzhon nu skyes pas khebs par gnas pa'i tshe// 'jig rten
47a5(mdo sde): gsum gyi gtso bo 'jig rten gyi mchod pas dus la bab pa'i tshod la rnam par gzigs nas/ tshes bco lnga'i zla ba nyal skar ma rgyal gyi dus su yum gso sbyong blangs pa'i rum du/ byang chub
47a6(mdo sde): sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas dam pa nas 'phos te/ dran zhing shes bzhin du/ glang po'i phru gu thal dkar mche ba drug dang ldan pa/ mgo'i kha dog srin bu ldam bu chu gsher gyi mdog sku
47a7(mdo sde): bu mche ba la gser 'tshig pa/ yan lag dang nying lag thams cad dang ldan pa/ dbang po nyams pa med par byas te/ ma'i glo g.yas pa na bzhugs so// zhugs nas kyang glo g.yas log
47b1(mdo sde): su brtan te gnas kyi/ gro g.yon pa logs su nam yang ma brten to// sgyu mo sgyu 'phrul ma la bde ba na nyal ba des kyang rmi lam 'di la bu mthong ngo // glang po kha bar dngul mdog bache bdun
47b2(mdo sde): rkang lag rab mdzes mgo bo mngar sdug pa// 'gros bzang lus tshigs rdo rje bzhin brtan pa// glang po'i mchog gcig khong du song snyam byed// des ni de 'dra'i bde ba brgya lam na'ang // ma mthong ma
47b3(mdo sde): thos myong bar mgyur te// lus kyang bde zhing sems kyang bder myur nas// bsam gtan mnyam par gnag pa bzhin du gyur/ de nas lha mo sgyu 'phrul rgyun dang gos lkug lcag por
47b4(mdo sde): gyon cing thogs pa las// lus dang sems bde bar gyur te/ dga' ba dang / rangs pa dang / nyams bde ba thob nas/ mal dam pa de las langs te/ bud med kyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor/
47b5(mdo sde): cing mdun du bdar nas/ khang bzangs de'i seng nas babs te/ shing mya ngan mtshung gi nags tshal ga la ba der song nas/ de mya ngan mtshang gi nags tshal du bde bar 'dug ste/ rgyal po bas
47b6(mdo sde): gtsang ma'i drung du po nya btang nas/ rgyal po gshegs su gsol// lha mo de khyod kyi zhal mthong bar bzhed do zhes byas pa dang / rgyal po zas gtsang mas tshig de thos nas rab tu dga' bar gyur te/
47b7(mdo sde): lus g.yos nas khri bzang po las langs te/ blon po dang / grong rdal ba dang / 'khor dang / gnyen pa'i skye bo dag gis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ mya ngan mtshang gi nags tshal/
48a1(mdo sde): gal ba der song ngo // song nas kyang bdag gis lus shin tu lci ba snyam byed nas/ mya ngan mtshang gi nags tshal du 'gro ma nus te/ de mya ngan mtshang gi nags tshal gyi sgor/
48a2(mdo sde): 'dug nas cung zad cig bsams te/ de'i tshe tshogs su bcad pa 'di smras so// bdag ni g.yul du dpa' ba'i phul phyin pa// deng ltar lus lci bdag gis myong mi dran// bdag gi khyim du'ang
48a3(mdo sde): 'gro bar deng ma nus// kye ma 'di ci su la dri bar bya// gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyis lha dag/ nam mkha'i dkyil na 'khod nas lus phyed mngon par sprul te/ rgyal po zas gtsang ma la tshigs su
48a4(mdo sde): bcad de smras pa// dka' thub brtul zhugs yon tan 'jig rten gsum gyis mchod// byams dang snying rje tho bas bsod nams ye shes dbang bskur ba'i// byang chub sems dpa' che ba dga'
48a5(mdo sde): ldan gnas nas 'phos gyur te/ rgyal po khyod kyi sras gyur lha mo sgyu 'phrul mngal du zhugs// de tshe rang gi mgo cog sor bcu thal mo sbyar byas te// rgyal po rim gro bya bar ldan gyur de yi nang du zhugs/
48a6(mdo sde): nga rgyal dregs pa med pas lha mo sgyu 'phrul ngor bltas te// ngas ni khyod la ci bya ci sbyar khyod kyis ngal smras so// lha mos smras pa// kha dngul gyi mdog 'drani zla'i 'od las 'phags pa ste// rkang
48a7(mdo sde): lag legs shing rab 'byes mche ba drug ldan che ba nyid// glang po'i dam pa rdo rje bzhin du tshigs brtan gzugs bzang ba/ bdag gi rum du zhugs kyis de yi lo rgyus gsan par gsol// stong gsum
48b1(mdo sde): khams 'di mdzes par rab rib ma mchis bdag gis mthong // bdag ni cal zhing mchis na lha rnams bye bas rab tu bstod// 'on kyang bdag la 'khro zhing 'tshig dang ni sdang rmongs ma mchis/
48b2(mdo sde): zhi ba'i sems su gyur cing bsam gtan bde dang ldan snyam bgyid// bdag gi rmi lam 'di ni rigs la dge 'am dngos sam ci// bdag gi rmi lam 'di ni yang dag ldan par lung ston pa// rig byed
48b3(mdo sde): lam gzhung la mdzes shing gza' yi chog mkhan// rgyal po myur du bram ze 'dir ni legs par dgug tu gsol// de sad tshig thos rgyal pos de yi dus kyi skad cig la// bram ze rig byed bstan bcom
48b4(mdo sde): gzung la shin tu mkhas pa gnyer// rdzu 'phrul bum pa rnams kyi mdun du 'dug nas 'di skad smras// kho mos rmi lam 'di 'dra mthong na de yi lo rgyus gaston/ bram pa rnams kyis smras pa/
48b5(mdo sde): mos bka' stsal du gsol/ khyod kyis rmi lam ci 'dra ba zhig gzigs// thos nas kyang dpyad par bgyi'o// lha mos smras pa/ khab dngul gyi mdog 'dra nyi zla'i 'od las 'phags pa ste
48b6(mdo sde): rkang lag legs shing rab 'byes mche ba drug ldan che ba nyid/ glang po'i dam pa rdo rje bzhin du tshigs brtan gzugs bzang ba/ bdag gi rum du zhugs pa de yi lo rgyus mnyan par gyis/ de skad kyi
48b7(mdo sde): thos nas ni bram ze rnams kyis 'di skad smras// rigs la dngos pa ma mchis dgyes pa rgya chen brnyes par 'gyur// khyod la sras mnga' mtshan gyis yan lag brgyan pa skye bar 'gyur// rgyal pon
49a1(mdo sde): rigs su rigs ldan 'khor lo sgyur ba che ba nyid// gal te 'dod pa dag dang rgyal srid pho brang spangs gyur te// 'jig rten kun la thugs brtse chags med rab tu byung gyur na/
49a2(mdo sde): de ni 'jig rten gsum na sbyin gnas sangs rgyas 'gyur ba ste// bdud rtsi mchog gi ro yis 'jig rten thams cad tshim mdzad 'gyur// de skad tshig snyan lung bstan te/ rgyal po'i pho brang zan zos nas/
49a3(mdo sde): bya dga' byin pa blangs nas su// bram ze de dag phyir dong ngo // dge slong dag de ltar rgyal po zas gtsang mas bram ze mtshan dang ltas shes shing rnam par 'byed pa dang / rmi lam gyi gzhung shes pa
49a4(mdo sde): dag las de skad kyi tshig de thos nas tshim zhing mgu ste/ yi rangs la/ rab tu dga' zhing / dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas/ bram ze de dag bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / myang ba
49a5(mdo sde): mang po nyams su bsod pas tshim zhing ngoms par byas nas/ bya dga' byin te bkye'o// de nyid kyi tshe grong khyer chen po ser skya'i gnas kyi grong chen po de'i sgo bzhin/ grong khyer gyi bzhi mdo dang sum
49a6(mdo sde): mdo thams cad du sbyin pa byin te/ ji tsam du byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/ zas 'dod pa rnams la ni zas/ skom 'dod pa rnams la ni skom/ gos 'dod pa rnams la ni gos/
49a7(mdo sde): bzhon pa 'dod pa rnams la ni bzhon pa spos 'dong pa rnams la ni spos/ phreng ba 'dod pa rnams la phreng ba/ byug pa 'dod pa rnams la ni byug pa/ mal cha 'dod pa rnams la ni mal cha
49b1(mdo sde): gnas 'dod pa rnams la ni gnas/ 'tshob 'dod pa rnams la ni 'tsheb byin no// dge slong dag de nas rgyal po zas gtsang ma 'disam du sams te/ lha mo sgra 'phrul 'di khyim ga na 'ardzun/
49b2(mdo sde): na ba ning rtson mongs pa med par 'dug par 'gyur snyam pa dang / de nas pang cig de nyid la rgyal po chen po bzhi/ rgyal po zas gsang ma'i drung du 'ongs te/ 'di skad ces smras so//
49b3(mdo sde): thugs las su ma mdzad par btang snyoms su bde bar bzhugs shig/ bdag cag gis byang chub sems dpa'i pho brang ba sham mo// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin rgyal po zas ga cad
49b4(mdo sde): ma'i gan du 'ongs te/ 'di skad ces smras so// skyong ba'i gzhal med khang rnams ngan/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa yi bzang / byang chub sems dpa'i pho brang ni/ rnam par rgyal tsam padag
49b5(mdo sde): gi dbul// de nas lnga'i bu rab 'thab bral rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i gan du 'ongs te/ 'di skad ces smras so// kho bo'i khang khyim mthong gyur nas/ brgya byin bye ba ngo mtshar gyur/ 'thab bral
49b6(mdo sde): rab kyi dpal ldan khang / rgyal ba'i sras la bdag 'bul lo// de nas lha'i bu yongs su dga' ldan rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i gan du 'ongs te/ 'di skad ces smras so// grags
49b7(mdo sde): pa che mnga' sngon chad ni dga' ldan gang du bzhugs gyur pa/ pho brang dam pa 'dzin pa de/ rgyal ba'i sras la bdag 'bul lo// de nas lha'i bu rab 'phrul dga' rgyal po
50a1(mdo sde): zas gtsang ma'i gan du 'ongs te/ 'di skad ces smras so// dpal ldan yid las grub pa'i khang // de ni rin chen rang bzhin te// byang chub sems dpa'
50a2(mdo sde): mchod don du// rgyal po bdag gis dbul bar bgyi/ de nas lha'i bu gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i gan du 'ongs te/ 'di skad ces smras so//
50a3(mdo sde): 'dod pa'i khams gnas ji snyed pa/ gzhal med khang mdzes gang yod pa// bdag gi gzhal med khang rlung na// 'od dang mdog kyang gtor bar snang // de bas dpal ldan bdag gis dbul//
50a4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' mchod pa'i phyir// rin chen rang bzhin po brang bzang // de ni rgyal po blang bar gyis// lnga yi me tog rab bkang ste// lha yi spos kyi ngad ldang ba'i// pho brang
50a5(mdo sde): yangs pa bdag gis dbul// der ni lha mo bzhugs par gyis/ dge slong dag de ltar 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i dbang po thams cad kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa'i
50a6(mdo sde): byir/ ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po dam pa der rang rang gi khyim phul bar gyur to// rgyal po zas gtsang mas kyang mi'i las na 'das kyis/ lha yir ni ma gyur pa bshams par gyur te/
50a7(mdo sde): de la byang chub sems dpa' dkod pa chen po'i ting nge 'dzin gyi mthus/ khyim de dag thams cad du lha mo sgyu 'phrul mngon par ston to// byang chub sems dpa' lha mo sgyu 'phrul gyi rum na 'dug pa'i/
50b1(mdo sde): klog las phyogs logs su skyil mo dang bcas te gnas par gyur to// lha'i dbang po de dag thams cad kyang so so nas bdag nyid kyi khyim na byang chub sems dpa'i ma 'dug gi/ gzhan mayin
50b2(mdo sde): no zhes de ltar shes par gyur to// de la 'di skad ces bya'o// ting nge 'dzin dkod pa che la gnas myur te/ sprul pa bsam gyis mi khyab sprul byas nas// lha rnams thams cad bsam pa rdzogs
50b3(mdo sde): bar byas// rgyal po'ang de ltar yid bzhin bsam pa grub/ de nas lha'i 'khor do'i nang nas/ lha'i bu kha cig 'di snyam du sems te/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lnga gang yin pa de
50b4(mdo sde): dag kyang ma'i lus kyi dri thon stong zhing 'byol na/ de ma yin pa'i lha gzhan sum sus gsum pa 'am/ 'thab bral lam/ dpa' ldan gyi lha'i bu dag lnga spos kyang ci dgos na/ nginy+dza byung chub
50b5(mdo sde): sems dpa' gtsang zhing dring ba dang bral ba/ 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa/ sems can rin po che dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris nas 'phos te/ yum gyi lhums mi'i lus dri masgom
50b6(mdo sde): par bzhugs par gyur snyam pa dang / de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji tsam du bud med
50b7(mdo sde): kyi lus ni smad pa lags pa dang / 'dod chags la spyod ces bgyi ba'i bar du de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa ngo mtshar chen/ bcom ldan 'das de bas kyang 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par
51a1(mdo sde): 'phags pa/ sngon byang chub sems dpa' gyur ba 'di ltar dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris nas 'phos te/ yum gyi lhums ma'i lus su glo g.yas phyogs su brten te bcugs
51a2(mdo sde): so// zhes bgyi ba 'di ni rab tu yang ngo mtshar che ste/ bcom ldan 'das/ sngon bcom ldan 'das kyis de ltar mdzad do zhes de skad du smras pa ni bdag la sngo ba ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis
51a3(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod byang chub sems dpa'i yongs su spyan pa/ rin po che bkod pa zhes bya ba gang byang chub sems dpa' ma'i rum na gnas pa'i yongs su spyad par gyu ra pa mthong bar 'dod
51a4(mdo sde): dam gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de'i dus ni de lags so// bde bar gshegs pa de'i dus ni de lags te/ de bzhin gshegs par byang chub sems dpa'i yongs su spyad pa de bstan te mthong na
51a5(mdo sde): glo ba dga'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam pa de lta bu'i mtshan ma mdzad do// de nas mi mdzod kyi bdag po tshangs pa/ tshangs pa 'bum phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad dang
51a6(mdo sde): lhan cig gi tshangs pa'i 'jig rten nas mi sdang bar gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar phyin nas des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la
51a7(mdo sde): lan gsum banor ba byas nas thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'dud cing phyogs gcig tu 'dugs de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi mkhyen bzhin du mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa
51b1(mdo sde): labaka' phrul pa rlangs pa khyod kyis rdzun byang chub sems dpar gyur ba'i ma'i dum nathab bcur 'dug 'das pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i yongs su spyor bzangs sa ma/ gsol pa /
51b2(mdo sde): ldan 'das ring snga lags so/ bde ba gshegs pa nga ska lags so// bka' bral pa/ tshangs pa de dag la yod ston so// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ni nangs pa
51b3(mdo sde): mchis lags/ bka' stsal pa/ tshangs pa de'i phyir zla ba bcu pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i yongs su spyad pa de 'dir khyod kyis ston cig dang / ji tsam du 'dus byas pa shes par 'gyur ro//
51b4(mdo sde): de nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas/ tshangs pa dag la 'di skad ces smras so// kho bos byang chub sems dpa'i yongs su spyad pa rin po che bkod pa de blang gis de'i bar du khyed 'khod kyi
51b5(mdo sde): de nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mag thos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan thar nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ smad kyig de nyid la tshangs pa'i 'a/
51b6(mdo sde): rten du phyin to// de nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas lha'i bu tshangs pa bzang po la 'di sad ces smras so// thogs pa khyod song la tshangs pa'i 'jig rten 'dri man chad/ sum
51b7(mdo sde): rtsa gsum gyi gnas lan chang du sgra spogs te byang chub sems dpa'i yongs su spyad pa rin po che ni bkod pa bdag cag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar bskur na khyed kyi nang nas mthong bar
52a1(mdo sde): dga' bsgyur du sheg shig ces sbas go bar gyis shog/ de nas mi mdzad kyi bdag po tshang srubs/ bye bakhrag zug bcwa stong zag brgya brartsa bzhi dang ldan cig tuca rdu/
52a2(mdo sde): sems dpa'i yongs su sbyar pa rin po che bkod pa blangs te/ tshangs pa'i gzhal med khang chen po dpag tshad sum brtsa pa'i steng du gnag nas/ lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas kun nas bskor te
52a3(mdo sde): 'dzam bu'i gling du phab po// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi zham ring du 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu 'dus pa chen por gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'i yongs su spyad pa rin po che bkod pa de yang lha'i gos dang /
52a4(mdo sde): lha'i phreng ba dang / lha'i spos dang / lha'i me tog dang / lha'i rol mo'i dbyangs sgra dang / lha'i longs spyod rnams kyis mngon par 'dus byas par gyur cing lha'i dbang che bar grags pa dag gis
52a5(mdo sde): yongs su bskor bar gyur pa ni 'di tsam ste lha'i dbang po rgya mtsho chen po'i dbus su 'dug nas kyang ring po nas gdong thal mos bskyabs te/ mgo byol nas bltas kyang mthong bar mi nus so//
52a6(mdo sde): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha'i nang na tshangs pa dag ni mthuche ba ste/ sum cu rtsa gsum dang / 'thab bral dang / dgra' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lnga dag kyang
52a7(mdo sde): dgagi drangan dma' ba yin na/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin tu smos kyang ci dgos/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i rol mo'i dbyangs sgra'i sgra de dag ni bar mdzang ngo // ci'i phyir
52b1(mdo sde): na de thos pa bam gyis 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams myo mo por 'gyur du'ong ba'i phyir ro// de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi drung du lhags nas 'di ga ces
52b2(mdo sde): smras so// lha'i dbang po byang chub sems dpa'i yongs su spyad pa rin po che bkod pa 'di bdag cag gis mthong bar mi nus na ji ltar bgyi/ des de dag la smras pa grogs po dag kho bos kyang ji/
52b3(mdo sde): skar bu/ kha ba nyid kyis kyang mthong bar mi nus so// gzugs po dag 'on kyang de ni nam bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar phul ba de'i tshe mthong brang ngo // de dag gis sbas pa/ lha'i dbang po ngas
52b4(mdo sde): nase nas kyang myur du mthong bar 'gyur ba de ltar mdzad du gsol/ smras pa/ grogs po dag lha'i bu mngon par 'phags pa mngon par 'phags pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan sngar byin te/
52b5(mdo sde): dga' bar bya ba'i tshig brjod par gyur gyi bar du rjod cig/ de nas de dag phyugs gcig tu 'khor ngamago byol nas/ bcom ldan 'das logs su lta zhing 'khod par gyur to// de nas mi/
52b6(mdo sde): mad kyi bdag po tshangs pa bye bzag khrig patu slong bral brgya su rtsa bzhi po de dag dang lan cig tu byang chub sems dpa'i yangs sa sdud par bya ba rin po che bshad pade byer te/ ra bzhin pa pas/
52b7(mdo sde): mas par phrul lo// byang chubasams dpa'i yongs su sur ba rin po che bkod pa na gzugs pabang pa mdzem pa/ na drug pa/ zlabs pham pa/ pa'i tham pa
53a1(mdo sde): steng khang pa brtsegs pas legs par brgyan pa ste/ de'i tshad ni 'bang du 'di lta ste dper na/ bris pa bcas nas zla ba drug lon pa tsam mo// khang pa brtsegs pa de'i/
53a2(mdo sde): nang du khri bshams pa ni 'di lta ste dper na/ byis pa btsas nas zla ba drug lon pa 'dug pa'i stegs bu tsam mo// byang chub sems dpa'i yongs su spyad par bya ba rin po che bkod pa de'i kha dog dang /
53a3(mdo sde): dbyibs ni 'di lta bu ste/ lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten na de'i dbyibs dang / kha dog 'dra ba gang yang med do// lha mo rnams kyis de mthong na yang mig 'khrugs shing ngo mtshar du 'gyur ro// de de
53a4(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar bzhag na lham me/ ldan ne/ ljang nge ste/ dper na mgar ba mkhas pas gser shin tu bzhu ne/ legs par blangs nas dri ma'i skyon med par byas pa'i
53a5(mdo sde): gsar bzhin du khang pa brtsegs pa de rnam par mdzes so// byang chub sems dpa'i yongs su spyad pa de'i nang du khri ba shams pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i drung mkhren ma gtogs par lda nas/
53a6(mdo sde): pa'i 'jig canan de'i dbyibs dang / bdag 'dra ba bgrang yang med do// tshangs pa chen pos gos bgos pa de yang byang chub sems dpa'i khye 'i drung na mdzes par mi snang ba/ 'dis ste/ dper
53a7(mdo sde): na rlung rang mar gyis bajam pa'i la ba nag po bzhin no// khang pa brdegs pa don can ngan sbal gyi snying po las byas pa ste/ de'i rtse man gcig la'ang thong mi 'jig rten gyi 'ams kyis rig du mi
53b1(mdo sde): chog go yang pa brtsegs pa den can dang sbrul gyis ting po des bus kun nas bsor ba ste/ khang pa bcugs pa de dang 'drab gnyis pa gcig cang bang pa bcags pa dang po dang nang nam chag sa
53b2(mdo sde): ma rig par 'dug go// khang pa brtsegs pa khon dang 'dra ba gsum pa gcig sa / khang pa brtsegs pa gnyis pa de'i nang na ma reg sa chags par 'dug go// thos kyi bad pa brtsegs pa gsus
53b3(mdo sde): pa de'i nang du khri bzhag ste/ gdan bting ngo // tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po de kha dog ni rnam pa 'di lta ste/ dper na bai DUR+Ya sngon po rig dam pa dang ldan pa bzhin no// spos kyi khang pa brtsegs pa
53b4(mdo sde): de'i 'khor na/ mchog lnga'i las 'das pa gang ji skad cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang ma bskyed par/ byang chub sems dpa'i sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsub rnam par smin pas byung ba brtsegs pa der
53b5(mdo sde): rtse'o// byang chub sems dpa' sa su snad pa rin pa che bshang par ni ra rnga'i rang bzhin te/ masong ba nam mi gags pa/ tsa gas ltar man pang bal/ 'ang ngan
53b6(mdo sde): rnarnams kyi gnas bkad pa gangang spyad med par dag thams cad cang byang chub sems dpa yongs su sdud pa rin po chabasad pa kun blang // rang ginubam byang chub sems dpa'i tshe
53b7(mdo sde): drim du 'jug pa 'i'anub mo 'og gi nu'i phung ba nas bzung ba sa chen po'i rnams dpag chad 'bum thagardug tu rtsa brgyad brgyar btam te/ rang byung bas tshangs pa'i 'jis tan gyi bar du ma
54a1(mdo sde): par 'phags so// pad+ma de ni kha lo gyur ba skyes bu dam pa dang / tshangs pa chen po brgya phrag bcu'i spong la dbang bas mthong du zad kyi/ gzhan sus kyang mthong ba med /
54a2(mdo sde): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na snying khu dang / snying po dang / bcud ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad pad+ma chen po de la zil mngar gyi thigs pa chags te 'dug nas/ de tshangs
54a3(mdo sde): pa chen pos bai DUR+Ya'i snod bzang pos blangs shing / byang chub sems dpa' la phul nas/ byang chub sems dpas kyang de blangs te tshangs pa chen po la snying brtse ba'i phyir 'thungs par gyur to//
54a4(mdo sde): snying khwa'i thigs pa de 'thungs na byang byang chub sems dpa' srid pa tha ma pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa ma gtogs par de yang dag par bde bar nu bar nus pa
54a5(mdo sde): sems can gyi khams na sems can de lta bu gang yang med do// las gang gi rnam par smin pas snying khu'i thigs pa de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' la yod par gyur cen/ byang chub sems dpas/
54a6(mdo sde): tron yun ring por byang chub sems dpa'i bu ba spyod pa'i cha sems can nadapa dag la mun byin pa dang / sems can bsam pa la ngan pa rnams kyi bsam gyi bsam pa yongs su bskyeng ba dang
54a7(mdo sde): sa tha bu nga/ da zhin pa shegs pa rnams dang / dbas pagasas pa'i
54b1(mdo sde): ma pa ga spyo ga smra
54b2(mdo sde): bags par bya pa mas dpal la #// 'a pa dzums pa las byang pa nga mi dang / rgyu pa na sa
54b3(mdo sde): cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang blang chub sems dang byon gyi las gyi rnam par smin pas der byung bar rung // byang chub sems dnga'i yongs su spyad pa rini po na da pa dang / sa
54b4(mdo sde): zag brgya'i rgyan ces bya ba drug gcig byung ste/ de'i de 'byung ba ni byang chub sems dpa' srid pa zam pa ma gtogs par/ sems can gyi ris na sems can de lta bu dgang yang med do// gzugs
54b5(mdo sde): dang skra dang dri dang / ro dang rig pa mchog tu bya ba dam pa gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang 'ang pa bsregs pa de na med pa gang yang med do// 'babs pa rgya rnyer
54b6(mdo sde): rol pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// bam po bzhi pa/ yongs su spyad par bya ba khang pa brtsegs pa de ni 'di ltar rdzi nang shin tu yongs su grub pa/ 'di ltar shin tu yongs su rdzogs
54b7(mdo sde): ba ste/ 'di lta ste/ dper na yul ka ling ka nas byung ba'i ngar ltar reg na bde ba'o// de yang 'ol byir bstan par zad kyide la dper med do// byang chub sems dpa'i sngon gyi smon lam gyis 'di
55a1(mdo sde): bsam par 'a / ga ba shA nab sem sa dpa' sems dpa'ad mam lag na du hU~M bdad/ da sa rgyun du
55a2(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / ma gang gi rum du rtse bar 'gyur ba de'i ru ma g.yas par khang pa brtsegs pa rin po che bkod pa dam pa snga
55a3(mdo sde): mngon par 'grub cing phyis byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas nas 'phos te/ khang pa brtsegs pa der skyil mo krung bcas nas 'dug par 'byung ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'
55a4(mdo sde): srid pa tha ma pa'i lus nur nur po dang / mer mer po dang / lngar lngar po dang / reng ring por 'gyur ba med cing / yan lag dang / nying lag dang / mtshan thams cad phun sum tshogs par
55a5(mdo sde): 'dug bzhin du 'byung la lha mo sgyu 'phrul gyi rmi lam du glang po che chen po 'ongs par mthong ba 'di ni chos nyid do// de de ltar 'dug la/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi
55a6(mdo sde): dang gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen ponyi shu rtsa brgyad dang / gang las lag na rdo rje skyes pa'i gnod sbyin gyi rigs gsang ba pa zhes bya ba de dag byang chub sems dpa' ma'i rum du zhugs par shes
55a7(mdo sde): nasartag tu rgyun mi 'chad par phyi bzhin 'brang bar gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' la rim gro byed pa'i lha mo bzhi yod de/ u khu li zhes bya ba dang mu khu li zhes bya ba dang / rgyal/
55b1(mdo sde): / na sa sa /
55b2(mdo sde): yang brgya byin yang snga du lnga brdzu sam dang ldanas// byang chub sems dpa' ma'i rnam du zhugs par shes nas/ rgyun mi par dzin 'bang bathung/
55b3(mdo sde): dpa' ma'i rum du zhugs pa'i lus ni rnam pa 'di lta bur gyur ti/ dperang/ mtshan mamun bzhin tu banag pa'i nang na/ ri'i bral mo'i zung po chen po 'dug pa ni dngag nad ga na
55b4(mdo sde): kyang sdang dngag tshad lnga'i bar nas kyang snang ngo // de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' ma'i rum du zhugs pa'i lus mngon par grub pa yang de lta bur m+bA ra t+ne/ 'od gsal ning gzugs
55b5(mdo sde): bzang la mdzes shing blta na sdug par gyur pa de/ khang pa brtsegs pa de'i nang du skyil mo krung du 'dug na/ gser gyi sa le sbram rigs dang ldan pa rin po che bai DUR+Yas brgyan pa ltar shin tu
55b6(mdo sde): mdzes par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa'i mas cang byang chub sems dpa' rumi na 'dug pa mthong bar gyur to// 'di lnga ste dper na/ sbyin gyi tshogs chen po'i nang nas glog byung ba ni snang ba
55b7(mdo sde): chen po bsrung ngo // de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' ma'i rum na 'dug pa yang dpal dang / dmi brjod dang / kha deg gis che bar rin po tsha'i khang pa brtsegs pa dang po de blang bar byed pa/
56a1(mdo sde): snang bar byas nas thos kyi 'ang pa brtsegs pa gnyis pa snang bar byed do// chos kyi khang pa brtsegs pa gnyis pa snang bar byas nus
56a2(mdo sde): thos kyi khang pa brtsegs pa gsum/
56a3(mdo sde): bzung bar byed do// rdzas kyi 'ang pa brtsegs pa gsum pa spang bar byas nas/ ma'i lus thams car snang bar byed do// de snang bar byas nas/ de ldan gapar 'dus bya drang bar byed
56a4(mdo sde): de snang bar byas nas/ khyim thams cad snang bar byed do// khyim thams cad snang bar byas nas/ 'od 'bri ba rlom gyi steng du bung ste/ shar phyogs snang bar byed do// de bzhin
56a5(mdo sde): phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / 'og dang / steng dang / phyogs bcu kun tu rgyang grags tsam du phyogs re rer yang byang chub sems dpa' ma'i rum na 'dug pa'i dpal dang
56a6(mdo sde): gzi brjid dang / kha dog gis snang ba byas par gyur to// dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' de blta ba dang / de la phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bskur bya ba dang / chos mnyan pa'i phyir rgyal
56a7(mdo sde): po chen po bzhi dang gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad gnod sbyin lnga brgya tsam dag dang lhan cig tu snga dro'i dus kyi tshe 'ongs te/ de'i tshe byang chub sems dpas de dag 'ongs par rigs nas las
56a8(mdo sde): ba brkyang ste/ mdzub mo bsgreng nas stan ston no// 'jig rten skyong ba la sogs pa de dag kyang ji ltar bting ba'i stan la 'khod par gyur te/ de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' ma'i rum na 'dug bzhin
56b1(mdo sde): du gras yin pa'i gzugs dang 'dra bar lag pa bslod bang 'das la/ rnam par stod bang gnas pa mthong nas/ deng gdapa' mthuni rnams pa bathong pa za na pasam pa dbya /
56b2(mdo sde): gyur / nga chung ma sna bas pang da ga lta bya'ang pa ma nga na cigatam ces yang dag par rlon yang das par 'an nga sa dag pa sa rjod
56b3(mdo sde): yang dag par dga' bar byung // gang gi cing dag 'dang bar 'dod par gyur ba de'i tshe'ang byang chub sems dpas dengs gi sems sems kyis rnam par shes nas lag pa g.yas pa bcang
56b4(mdo sde): dag dang ba'i bar ston to// desnga lag pa bcang sa 'dong ba'i brdabs na nas/ phyir snyam par byed de/ mal da pa med// de'i na rgyal po chen pa bani dbacang 'di gamadu 'dag sna
56b5(mdo sde): nga chuchus ma da nga ba na du rnam dang rgyang chub sems nga nga napa semam ma sum sa
56b6(mdo sde): ma pa sa ga pa rnams pa nga num pa / mamam
56b7(mdo sde): nga rnam pa 'am nga ngas/ / ma sa byang rgya ma pa ya gyi ma pa #
57a1(mdo sde): sems dpa' dga' bar byabs 'o// de'i 'og tu byang chub sems dpa'i mdaga' bar bya ba smra'o// dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sa duman 'dru pa/
57a2(mdo sde): sngar dga' bar ba bsdu pa la mkhas par gyur to// wa'am klu'am/ bzod sbyin nam/ ma 'am/ me mayin pa sa srung rung byang chub sems dpa' la sngon du
57a3(mdo sde): bar bya ba'i tshig smra bar nus pa med do// byang chub sems dpa' nyid thog mar dga' bar bya ba smra zhing de'i 'og tu byang chub sems dpa'i ma dga' bar bya ba sla'o// de nas snga dro
57a4(mdo sde): dus zad de/ nyi ma gung la bab nas/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i bu mngon par 'phags pa mngon par 'phags pa dag byang chub sems dpa' blta ba dang /
57a5(mdo sde): de la bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'ong ba dang / byang chub sems dpas de dag rgyang ring po nas 'ong bar mthong nas/ gser gyi mdog tu 'dug pa'i lag pa g.yas pa brkyang
57a6(mdo sde): ste lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha dag dga' bar byed cing / 'dzub mo brkyang ste stan ston to// dge slong dag de'i tshe'ang lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ blang
57a7(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' la phyir ba zlog ma nus ji ltar bting ba'i stan de dag la lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / de ma yin pa'i lha'i bu gzhan dag kyang 'khod par gyur to// byang chub sems dpas de
57b1(mdo sde): lngar 'khod par rig nas chos kyi gtam gyis yang dag par rton yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug/ yang dag par gzengs stod yang dag par dga' bar byed do// byang chub sams ngan
57b2(mdo sde): 'ag pa gang du babyung ba de lags su byang chub sems dpa'i ma yang lta bar myur to// de nas kyang sna de dag cang 'di snyam du bdag dag ni byang chub sems dpa' dang dga' bar bya ba d+ma rnam
57b3(mdo sde): mo de dag re re zhing yang 'di sam du byang chub sems dpa' ni bdag 'ba' shig la zla ste/ bdag 'ba' shig la dga' bar bya bsgra'o snyam mo// khang pa brtsegs pa der lha'i dbang po
57b4(mdo sde): byin dang sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha de dag gi gzugs brnyan snang bar gyur to// ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' ma'i rum na gnas pa'i longs spyod yongs su dag par gyur pa de lta bu ni gan/
57b5(mdo sde): dag na med do/ dge slong dag gang gi ni lha'i dbang babargya byin dang / rim lon pa'i lha'i bu gzhan dge 'dong bar 'dod par gyur ba de'i tshe'adi bying chub sems dpas
57b6(mdo sde): de dag gi sems kyi rtog pa sems kyis yongs su shes na/ lag pa g.yas pa bcang \u0f7f/ de dag 'dong ba'i brje ston to// brda bsan nas phyir babum pa byas te dran mi gas bzhin du
57b7(mdo sde): lag pa banag kyang ma la gnod pa med do// de'i tshe lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / de ma yin pa'i lha'i bu sum cu rtsa gsum bdag kyang 'di snyam du/ bdag cag ni byang chub sems dpas
58a1(mdo sde): kyang 'dod par gnang ngo snyam du sems shing de dag kyang byung chub sems dpa' dang byang chub sems dpa'i ma la lan gsum bsor ba byas nas dong bar gyur to/
58a2(mdo sde): dge slong dag ci ma phyed kyi dus 'das nas/ phyi na'i dus la bab pa dang mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa lnga'i bu brgya thong du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun du bad te/ wa yul ba'i
58a3(mdo sde): snying bu'i thigs pa de khyer nas/ byang chub sems dpa' gal ba derabyang chub sems dpa' de blta ba dang de la phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bye ba dang chos mnyan pa
58a4(mdo sde): phyir 'ong bar gyur to// dge slong dag byang chub sems dpas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa 'khor dang bcas te 'ongs par shes nas/ byang chub sems dpas yang gser gyi mdog tu 'dug
58a5(mdo sde): pa'i lag pa g.yas pa brkyang ste/ mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu de dag la dga' bar bya ba smras te/ mdzub mi brkyang nas stan ston to// dge slong dag
58a6(mdo sde): mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa des kyang byang chub sems dpa'i bka' las bzlog pa ma nus nas ji ltar bting ba'i stan de dag la mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang tshangs ris kyi lha'i
58a7(mdo sde): bu gzhan dag kyang 'khod par gyur to// byang chub sems dpas de ltar 'khod par rig nas/ chos kyi gtam gyis yang dag par ston yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug/ yang dag par
58b1(mdo sde): bangs pad / yang dag par dga' bar byed/ byang chub sems dpas las pa gang ducung pa phyogs sas mo sgru bras las gyur myur te/ das du sa de dag kya
58b2(mdo sde): ni byang chub sems dpa' dang dga' bar bya ba'i gtam byed du sgom lha'i bu dag ri shing yang 'di snyam du byang nub sems dpa' ni bdag 'ba' shigs gyu / bdaga'ad
58b3(mdo sde): la dga' ba gtum byed do snyam ma/ dge slong dag gangadag mi mi mad kyi bdag po rmongs pa dang / tshangs ris kyi 'i bu de dag 'dod par 'dod par byur ba d+mo'i mi dang byang chubasams
58b4(mdo sde): dbas de dag gi sems kyi rtog pa sems kyis yongs su shes nas lag pa g.yas pa brkyang ste de dag 'dong ba'i brda ston to// de ltar 'dong ba'i brda bstan nas phyir ba sum pa byas
58b5(mdo sde): tedran zhing shes bzhin du lag pa bzhag kyang ma la gnod pa med do// de'i tshe mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / tshangs ris kyi lha de dag kyang 'di snyam du bdag cag ni byang chub sems dpas
58b6(mdo sde): kyang 'dong bar gnang ngo snyam du sems shing de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ma la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas 'dong bar gyur to// byang chub sems
58b7(mdo sde): dpa' yang dran ning shes bzhin du lag pa 'jog par gyur to// dge slong dag shar phyogs dang / lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / 'og dang / steng dang /
59a1(mdo sde): phyogs bcu kun nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' ba rgya srong mang po byang chub sems dpa' de blta pa dang / de la brag bya ba dang / bsnyen bku rab pa dang / chos mnyan pa
59a2(mdo sde): dang / chos yang dag par brjod par bya ba'i phyir 'ong bar gyur to// de dag de ltar 'ongs pa dang / byang chub sems dpas lus las 'od bkye ste/ 'od kyi bkod pa de dag seng ge'i khrir sprul nas/
59a3(mdo sde): de ltar sprul pa'i khri de dag la byang chub sems dpa' de dag 'khod du bcug ste/ de dag de ltar 'khod par shes nas 'di lta ste/ theg pa chen po 'di nyid rgya cher rnam par dbye ba'i don du dris te/
59a4(mdo sde): brtags kyang / skal ba mnyam pa'i lha rnams ma gtogs par gzhan sus kyang de dag ma mthong ste/ dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpas nub mo mi nyal nas lus las 'od bkye ba'i//
59a5(mdo sde): d+ha ni de yin no// rkyen ni de yin no// dge slong dag lha mo sgyu 'phrul gyis kyang / byang chub sems dpa' ma'i rum na 'dug pa'i tshe/ lus lci bar ma tshor te/ gzhan du na yang ba dang
59a6(mdo sde): 'jam pa dang / bde bar tshor zhing lo ma bde ba'i sdug bsngal gang yang myong bar ma gyur to// 'dod rgyags kyis yongs su gdung ba 'am/ zhe sdang gis yongs su gdung ba'am sa
59a7(mdo sde): gzungs kyang yongs su du sa mgyur/ 'dod pa'i rnam par rtog pa 'am/ gnod sems kyi rnam par rtog pa 'am/ gtse ba'i rnam par rtog pa dag la yang rnam par rtog par ma gyur te
59b1(mdo sde): byung ba 'am ma bkras pa'as/ sem pa'am/ ldan pa la/ dul dang / ngal 'tshar ba 'am/ mthong ba ma nus la gzugs dang / da /
59b2(mdo sde): dang / ga da dus 'ong bsnang ba ma nur k+Sha/ thalas ngan pa yang mdzang bar mgyur to// la zang med kyi lnga 'am g.yo'as/ ga gags/ zung med rkyen mongs pa gyu
59b3(mdo sde): thams su gnod par byed par ma gyur to// de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'i ma ni bslab pa'i gzhi lnga yang dag par blangs te/ tshul khrims dang ldan zhing dge ba bcu'i lus kyi lam gnas
59b4(mdo sde): par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa'i ma yang skyes pa gang la yang 'dod chags kyi sems rtse 'bar ma gyur la/ skyes pa gang yang byang chub sems dpa'i mal 'dod chags kyi sems mi skye'o//
59b5(mdo sde): ser pa'i grong khyer chen po de dang yul gzhan dag na skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo su gang lU dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / 'byung bas nonapa
59b6(mdo sde): ji skad cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa'i ma mthong ma dag tu sos shing dran pa thob par gyur to// mi ma yin pa de dag kyang myur du gnas gzhan du 'dong bar gyur to//
59b7(mdo sde): sems can gang la la zhig nad sna tshogs kyis thebs par gyur te/ rlung dang / mkhris pa dang / bar kan dang / 'dus pa las byung ba'i nad kyis gnod par gyur pa dang / mig gi nad dam/
60a1(mdo sde): pa'i na dam/ rna nad dam/ na dngam/ mchu na m+bu na dadam/ gags sathungs/
60a2(mdo sde): sha bkra'am/ rnam pa 'am/ mjed byed dam/ rims sam/ wa ba 'am/ po la mig gam/ me dpal lam/ rgang shul sogs pa'i nad kyis btab par gyur pa de dag la byang chub/
60a3(mdo sde): sems dpa'i mas lag pa g.yas pa spyi bor bzhag pa tsam gyis nad dang bral bar gyur cing / rang rang gi gnas su 'dong bar gyur te/ zan lha mo sgyu 'phrul gyis rba cags 'ag zhigs las
60a4(mdo sde): blangs te/ sems can nad pa dag la byin na yang de dag de blangs ma thag tun du med cing nyams pa med par gyur to// gang gi tshe lha mo sgyu 'phrul des bdag gi lho g.yas par blta ba de'i tshe byang chub
60a5(mdo sde): sems dpa' ma'i rum na 'dug pa de 'di lta ste/ dper na/ me long gi dkyil 'khor shin tu dag pa la gdong gi dkyil 'khor snang ba bzhin te/ de ltar de mthong nas tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs
60a6(mdo sde): te rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes par gyur to// dge slong dag byang chub sems dpa' ma'i rum na gnas pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis nyin mtshan rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par
60a7(mdo sde): lha'i rol mo sil snyan gyi sgra 'byung zhing / lha'i me tog gi char 'bab par gyur to// char ni dus bzhin du 'bab/ rlung ni dus bzhin du ldang dus dang skar ma dag kyang dus bzhin du 'gyur/
60b1(mdo sde): zhing 'ab bar gyur to/ rgyal mid kyang bdezhi nga la lags la/ 'jug pa med ci dam med par gyur to// ser bya'i grong khyer chen po dan/ 'i rigs dang / sems pan gzhan ga da/
60b2(mdo sde): pa thams cad dkyang gzhing 'thung / dga' zhing rtse la dga' dgur spyod do// sbyin pa dag kyang gtong / bsod nams dag kyang byed de/ zab bzhi 'das pa'i dus son bzhin du thams cad kyang dgam
60b3(mdo sde): ba'i mchog gis rtse zhing bde bar gnas pas gnas par gyur to// rgyal po zas gtsang ma yang tshangs par spong ba yang dag par blangs te/ rgyal po'i las btang nas/ dka' thub kyi nags
60b4(mdo sde): tshal yongs su dag par gnas pa bzhin du/ thams cad kyang dga' ba'i mchog gis chos kyi rjes su 'brang bar gyur to// dge slong dag byang chub sems dpa' ma'i rum na gnas pa ni rnam pa de la
60b5(mdo sde): bu'i rdzu 'phrul gyi tshe 'phrul dang ldan pas gnas par gyur to// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis byang chub sems
60b6(mdo sde): dnga'i yongs su gyu pa rin po che bkod pa sngon byang chub sems dpa' ma'i rum na gnas pa'i tshe/ gnas gnas pa mthong ngas/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so// thod par
60b7(mdo sde): gshegs pa mthong lags so// de bzhin gshegs pas tshe dang ldan pa ldan dga' ba dang / lha'i dbang bab ma byin dang / 'jig rten myong ba bani dang / de ma yin pa'i lha dang / mibasan
61a1(mdo sde): dag kyang bstan te mthong nas/ de dag tshim zhing mgul mi rangs te/ rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes so// mi mdzad kyi bdag po tshangs pas do/
61a2(mdo sde): phyir yang tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du mchod par byed pa'i phyir bteg ste/ khyer nas bzhag par gyur to// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis yang dge slong dag la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag de ltar
61a3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' ma'i ru ma na 'dug pas/ lha dang mi khrag khrig phrag sum cu rtsa drug theg pa gsum la yongs su smin par byas par gyur to// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ gang tshe rgya la sras
61a4(mdo sde): sems can dam pa ma yi ru ma gnas pa// de tshes 'di tshal dang bcas par rnam pa drug tu g.yos// gser mdog 'od bkye ngan song thams cad rnam par sbyangs par gyur/ chos kyi rgyal
61a5(mdo sde): por 'gyur zhes lha yi tshogs rnams rab tu dga'// gzhal med khang chen dbyibs legs rin chen du mas rnam par smras// der ni dpa' bo rnam par 'dren pa bzhugs par gyur nas 'dug
61a6(mdo sde): can dan dri zhim chog gis rab tu gang zhing rnam par mdzes// stong gsu ma rin chen yongs su bkang ba de yi srang phyed rin mi chog/ stong chen 'jig rten khams kyang 'og nas brtol ba byas nas ni
61a7(mdo sde): yon tan 'byung ba'i gnas kyi pad+ma'i snying khu'i thig pa zung // de mi nag bdun bsod nams gzi brjod tshangs pa'i 'jig rten 'phags// de las snying khu'i thigs blangs tshangs pa rgyal pa/
61b1(mdo sde): mas la 'dral/ byang chub sems dpa' dpa' bo tshangs pa 'drab ma gtogs par// sems can gang gis de zos 'drar 'gyur sems can ri sma na med/ babul ba du ma'i bsod
61b2(mdo sde): narnams gzi brjid snying khwa'i thigs gnas pa/ de zos lus dang sems dang shes pa rnam par dag par 'gyur// 'dren pa mchod phyir brgya byin tshangs pa 'jig rten skyong ba rnams/
