61b3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i drung du rtag par dus gsum rgyun tu 'ong // phyag byas mchod byas chos kyi dam pa de dag thos gyur nas// bskor ba byas te kun kyang gang nas 'ongs po'i gnas su
61b4(mdo sde): 'dod // 'jig rten khams rnams kun nas chos 'dod byang chub sems dpa' 'ong // 'od bkod khrir gyur rnams la de dag gnas par phan tshun sdang // mchog tu bya ba'i theg pa dam
61b5(mdo sde): pa'i chos ni thos gyur nas// kun kyang dga' ba'i sems 'gyur bstod pa'i phreng ba brjod cing 'dong // bud med byis pa gang dag sdug bsngal ldan par gyur pa dang / 'byung pos non pa
61b6(mdo sde): sems 'khrugs gos mang rdul gyis yog pa rnams// de kun lha mo sgyu 'phrul mthong nas sems ni rnyed gyur te// blo gros dran dang ldan zhing so so'i khyim khyim 'dong // rlung dang bad
61b7(mdo sde): kan mkhris pa'i nang dang 'dus pa'i nang thebs dang // mig nang na nad dag gis lus sems mi bder gyur pa dag/ rnam mang tha dad nad kyi rnam pas gang dag gnod gyur pa// de dag
62a1(mdo sde): sgyu 'phrul lag pa mgo la bzhag pas nad med gyur// yang na rtswa yi nyag ma 'ga' zhig sa las blangs byas te/ sgyu 'phrul nad pa byin na thams cad rims nad med
62a2(mdo sde): par gyur// bde ba thob cing da rod mnyams so so'i khyim du 'dong // de ni sman gyur sman pa'i rgyal po ru ma na 'dug phyir ro// gang tshe lha mo sgyu 'phrul bdag gi lus la brtag byas pa// de tshe
62a3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rum na 'dug pa mthong ba ni// ji ltar bar snang gnas kyis zla ba skar mas bskor gnas pa// de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' mtshan gyis kun nas brgyan pa snang /
62a4(mdo sde): de la 'dod chags ne sdang gti mug gnod par 'gyur ba med// 'dod la 'dod pa de med de la phrag dog 'tshe ba med// dga' ba'i sems dang mgu ba'i sems dang dga' dang yid bder gnas/
62a5(mdo sde): de la bkres dang skom dang tsha dang grang ba'i gnod pa med// lha yi rol mo sil snyan dbyangs sgra ma byas rtag tu 'byung // lha yi spos dri me tog dam pa mchog mdzes char yang 'bab//
62a6(mdo sde): dang mi rnams de la lnga zhing lha mi thams cad kyang // de dag pan tshun gnod pa med tsong 'tshe ba gang yang med// sems can dga' bder rtse zhing zas dang skom gyi sbyin pa byed// dga' ba
62a7(mdo sde): tha klogs de dag dga' ning mgutha' ying pa ldan// rgyal po'i grong bar 'jug pa med cing char pa dus bzhin 'bab// rba dang sman dang ma tog rnams kyang de yi dus su phye/
62b1(mdo sde): thal 'du na can car bang bgyur bas// sems can la pa lam can kyad sbyin byed ba bar gyud/ sam snru nga rdzun brtul nar di ma du
62b2(mdo sde): ri rab zom gyi dga' tshal sems can bzhin du dga' dang ldan// shAkya'i rgyal po de yang gso slong rab la cer gnas shing // de ni rgyal po'i bru ba mi byed chos la rtag par spyod// de
62b3(mdo sde): dka' thug nags tshal song nas lha mo sgyu 'phrul la// sems can mchog snrel khyod kyi lus la bde ba cing 'dra rmed// lhums su 'jug pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o//
62b4(mdo sde): dge slong dag de ltar zla ba bcu 'das te/ byang chub sems dpa' bca' ba'i dus la bab pa dang / rgyal po bas gtsang ma'i bskyed mos tshal du sde lces sum cu rtsa gnyis byung ngo // su
62b5(mdo sde): cu rtsa gnyis gang zhe na/ me tog thams cad kha 'bus nas rgyas par gyur pa dang / rdzing dag na me tog ut+pal dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu dang / pad+ma dkar po yod pa dag kyang kha 'brus
62b6(mdo sde): nas rgyas par gyur pa dang / me tog dang 'bras bu'i shing ljon pa gsar pa dag kyang sa las 'thon te/ kha 'bus nas rgyas par gyur pa dang / rin po che'i shing ljon pa brgyad byung ba dang /
62b7(mdo sde): gter chen po nyi khri 'bus te byung nas gnas par snang ba dang / khyim gyi nang du yang rin po che'i myu gu 'thon pa dang / spos chu'i dpa' dpal gyi wa 'bru mar dri zhim pos sbags pa rnams
63a1(mdo sde): kyang dag par gyur pa dang / grangs kyi 'angogs las sang ge'u drug gu dag 'ongs te/ dga' bar ci zhing sa skya'i grong khyer dam pa la rtso bas na
63a2(mdo sde): sgo na gnas par gyur kyang / sems can gang la yang 'tshab med par gyur pa dang / glang po'i phrug ni thal kar lnga brgya lkugs te/ rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i rkang pa la sna'i rtsims cug ci
63a3(mdo sde): gnas par gyur pa dang / lha'i byis pa rogs pa ska rags bcings pa dag kyang rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i btsun mo'i 'khor gyi bang pa nas pang ba dag tu 'gre ldog par snang bar myur pa dang /
63a4(mdo sde): klu'i bu mo mchod pa sna tshogs kyi yo byad thogs pa dag kyang lus phyed phyung zhing nam mkha' la rgyu bar snang ba dang / lha'i bu mo khri yang rma bya'i mdongs lag na thogs shing nam mkha' la 'khod par srang
63a5(mdo sde): bdang / bum pa gang ba khri yang ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po la bskor ba byed par snang ba dang / lha'i bu mo khri yang spos chu'i ril ba b+h+ring gar gyad la thogs shing 'khod par snang ba dang
63a6(mdo sde): lha'i bu mo khri yang gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan thogs shing 'khod par snang ba dang / lha'i bu mo brgya stong mang po dag kyang dung dang / rnga dang / rdza rnga dang / khar rdza mgul
63a7(mdo sde): nas dpyangs te/ sdod cing 'khod par snang ba dang / rlung thams cad kyang mi ldang bar gnas par gyur pa dang / chu rlung dang chu bran thams cad kyang mi mgul zhing mi 'bab par gyur pa dang
63b1(mdo sde): / gzhal me yang dang / rtsa ba dang / gar ma'i tshogs rnams kyang mi rgya bar gyur pa dang / gar ma rgyal dang yang ldan par gyur pa dang / rgyal po bas gtsang mal ma
63b2(mdo sde): rin po che'i dra bas yog par gyur pa dang / me yang mi 'bar bar gyur pa dang / khang pa brtsegs pa dang / khang bzangs dang / yang thog dang / rta babs dag la'ang nor bu dang / rin po
63b3(mdo sde): dag 'byung bar snang bar gyur ba dang / ras bcos bu'i mdzod dang / rin po chesatshogs kyi mdzod rnams kyang sgo byed par snang ba dang / bya rog dang / 'ug pa dang / bya rgod dang / sbyang /
63b4(mdo sde): kaM dang / wa'i sgra dag kyang med par gyur pa dang / swa gang ldan pa'i sgra dag kyang 'byung bar gyur pa dang / skye bo thams cad kyi las kyi mtha'ang rgyun chad par gyur pa dang / sa'i phyogs
63b5(mdo sde): mthon dman du 'dug pa rnams kyang mnyam par gnas par gyur pa dang / lam gyi gni mdo dang / sum mdo dang / zang dang / tshong dus kyi 'khor kyang lag mthil wa gzhi mnyam zhing
63b6(mdo sde): 'jam la/ me tog sil mas gang ste mdzes par snang ba dang / sbrum ma thams cad kyang bde ba dang / legs par btsa' bar gyur pa dang / shing sa la'i nags tshal gyi lha thams cad kyang
63b7(mdo sde): shing gi lo ma'i nang nas lus phyed phyung ste phyag 'tshal zhing / gnas par snang ba ste/ snga ltas sum cu rtsa gnyis po de dag byung bar gyur to// de nas lha mo sgyu 'phrul byang chub
64a1(mdo sde): sems dpa tsha pag 'a dang / sa byung chub sems dpa' bab 'du 'dus labab pa shes/ 'ang sa la
64a2(mdo sde): sas par de sam pa/ bga'i bsam gang lags pa sngal gyis mni gas du gsol// yan ring ba 'das nas brgyad mos tshal ma thogs yod ma phyin po na
64a3(mdo sde): dag mi mnga'an/ bdag gi ces sren mos tshal du mchi bar bgyi// chos dgongs brtson pa dka' thug khyod kyang rtso mkhyen zang // bdug kyang sems can dag pasrel nas ldan ni ring lags /
64a4(mdo sde): sa la'i shing ljon sdong po mchog kyang me tog kha 'bus te// bskyed mos tshal gyi dog sar da ni mchi ba'i rigs so lnga// sos ka'i dus mchog bud med rnams kyi rgyan du 'gyur lags te/ na
64a5(mdo sde): rgyu khu byug dang ni rma bya sgra rab snyan pa 'byin// gtsang zhing mdzes la sna tshogs me tog rdul gyi ngad kyang ldang // da ni mchin ma thogs legs par bka' lung srul du gsol// rgyal po'i dbang
64a6(mdo sde): pos lha mo las ni de skad tshig thos nas// dga' zhing rab tu mgu ba'i sems kyis 'khor la smras pa ni// bzhon pa bzhon chen 'gyogs pa'i shugs ldan dag kyang bstan par gyis// yon tan
64a7(mdo sde): phun sum tshogs ldan lum bi ni tshal brgyan par gyis// ro sde'i mdog ldan sprin gyi kha dog mthun par gyur pa yi// glang po stong zag nyi shu snyed cig myu du bskrad par gyis/ glang po'i dbang po
64b1(mdo sde): bdun ldan la ma ma tha las zlas// na sunam shing gsar sbyin pas / rgyal pa ba sa pa rlu ltar margya sa pa'i thags da na hU~M/
64b2(mdo sde): dang kha ba'i mdog 'dra rnga rdog lung lo bzang 'khril ba'i// rta mchog stong phrag nyi shu bgrangs pa myur du sdod kyis te// gser gyi dril bu ga yer ka'i dra bgro nas dpying bgyis// skyes bu rtu mdzod
64b3(mdo sde): g.yul la mos shing 'thab 'dod dpa' bo dag/ mda' gzhu ral gri mdung thung zhags pa mtshon cha non thogs pa// stong phrag nyi shu bgrangs pa myur du chos te bshams kyis la// sgyu 'phrul
64b4(mdo sde): 'khor dang bcas pa bag yod par ni bsrung bar gyis// lum bi ni der gser dang nor bu'i rgyan khrom brgyan par gyis// gos dmar rnam pa mang pos shing rnams thams cad brgyan par gyis/
64b5(mdo sde): lha yi dga' tshal bzhin du me tog sna tshogs chal par khrom// de ltar thams cad bshams zin myur dung la sbran par gyis// 'khor rnams kyis ni de skad tshig thos skad cig tu// gnon pa
64b6(mdo sde): kun pa shams de bzhin lum po ni yang brgyan byas te// rgyal b+har rgyal gyur sku tshe ring slongs rgyal po gshegs su gsol// ji smung bka' stsal de bzhin kun gyis dus pab lha gzigs shig/
64b7(mdo sde): mo yi bdag po dam pa de yang dga' ba'i sems gyur nas// khyim gyi dam par zhugs te bud med rnams la 'di skad smras// gang zhig nga la snying nye la dga' bar 'dod pa dag/ nga yi bka'
65a1(mdo sde): bzhin gyis te bdug gi lus kun brgyan par gyis// thos mchog dad kyi dro zhim khadag sa tshogs sdug pa'i gos// 'jam shing yid 'od dga' ba'i sems kyis lags
65a2(mdo sde): par bgro bgyis// brang na 'phyang ba'i mu tig se mo de yis brtsam par gyis// rgyan gyi khyad par thams cad der ring kun gyis bstan par gyis// khar du rgyud gcig zing bu pi wang rdza rnga dum du ma reg
65a3(mdo sde): sil snyan yid du 'ong ba brgya stong dag kyang bshams par gyis// sgra snyan thos nas lha rnams rab tu dga' ba skye 'gyur zhing // lha mo rnams kyang de bzhin dga' bar gyur pa khyed kyis gyis// shing
65a4(mdo sde): rta'i mchog 'dir lha mo spu 'phrul gcig pu 'dug par gyis// bud med skyes pa gzhan dag su yang shing rta der ma 'khod// na chung sna tshogs go can rnams kyis shing rta de drongs te// gang du'ang
65a5(mdo sde): yid du mi 'ong mi mthun skra rnams mi grag gyis// lha mo sgyu 'phrul khyim nas byung sde sgo drung phyin pa'i tshe// rta dang glang po shing rta rkang thang dpal ldan sna tshogs dpung // rgyal po'i sgo drung lpags/
65a6(mdo sde): tshe sgra chen mang po grag par gyur// rgya mtsho chen po 'khrugs pa'i sgra ltar de dag yongs su grags// de tshe bkra shis don tu dril bu brgya srong dkrol ba byas// shing rta de yang de ltar rgyal pos
65a7(mdo sde): tshigs brtan pa la// wa rnams thong gas lnga mo tshe yang lags par ba shams pa bya'o// ri chen zhing 'on matog se ma ldan pa ni ldan par byas// rdzab khrung zung dang pa yid du'ang ba
65b1(mdo sde): mang 'byin// gdugs dang rgyal mtshan pa dam che pra kun nas 'khor bar bsgreng // lha yi gos dang dril brag yer ka'i dra ba mchog gis bkab// lha yi bu mo nam mnga' las ni shing dade la/
65b2(mdo sde): lA l-i sna dbyangs snyan pa sgrog cing bzod pa'i tshig brjod de// gang tshe lha myo sgyu 'phrul seng ge'i khri la 'dug gyur pa// de tshe stong gsums 'di rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos
65b3(mdo sde): bya ma pags kyi g.yang ma'i byin cing mthog sa tshags mthar// darang lam than 'dir 'azla ba'i dam pa sam sa // 'das ngan kyang brnyanan shing gang na
65b4(mdo sde): khyod sum buca gsas bdas pa dbang da'ang lam rgya byang dbang // drangs pa su mas bran ma la byung ldan chu par// dz+nyArnams pargya drug grang srung bas su sbyar bas thu
65b5(mdo sde): 'jud// rdul po rab tu dga' ba'i sems kyis bkod pa dol la// de ni 'di snga ma 'di na lga yi lha zhig yin snam byed// gang la spong ba bzhi dang mangs pa'i dbang po bcas pa'i
65b6(mdo sde): pa carten byed pa 'din ma par sangs rgyas 'gyur/ nga pa ga snyam na la sgrub rgya byin dngas pa 'dus chen gyi / 'ang pa ba nga zang pa'imam btsud medang/
65b7(mdo sde): yi ji ga ga pa tshal ba / dzanas mings pa ma #mam ma nas mam la #
66a1(mdo sde): cad kyis brgyan pa brgyad khri bzhi stong gis ni kun nas bskor// glang po che'i shing rta rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa brgyad khri bzhi stong dang rkang zang dpa' zhing
66a2(mdo sde): rtul phod pa ya na lag dam pa dang ldan pa go cha legs par bgos par sra ba'i go gyon pa brgyad khri bzhi stong gis ni yongs su bsrungs// shAkya'i bu mo stong phrag drug khris ni mdun du
66a3(mdo sde): bdar rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i phu nu'i rigs su skyes pa'i shAkya'i rgan pa dang / gzhon pa dang / bar ma bzhi khri ni yongs su bsrungs// rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i sras glu dang
66a4(mdo sde): rol mo'i dbyangs sgra byed/ khar ba'i sil khrol dang pheg rdob sil snyan dang / glu dbyangs len pa drug khris ni kun nas bskor/ lha'i bu mo brgyad khri bzhi stong dang / klu'i bu ma
66a5(mdo sde): brgyad khri bzhi stong dang / dri za'i bu mo brgyad khri bzhi stong dang / mi 'am ci'i bu mo brgyad khri bzhi stong dang / lha ma yin gyi bu mo brgyad khro bon stong bkod pa'i bkod pa'i rgyan sna tshogs
66a6(mdo sde): gyis brtan pa shamag su dang rol ma'i dbus sra sna tshogs kyis pasngags pa brjod pa rjes su 'brang bas 'gro'o// lam bani nags tshal dathams cad kyang zlas chu'i cham tshag gis
66a7(mdo sde): cing / tshe'i mchog gi sa gtor bar gyur to// nags tshal dam pa de'i nang na/ shing ldan pa ji skad cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang dus la ma bab par lo ma dang / me nyag dang
66b1(mdo sde): 'bras bu skyes par gyur to// nags tshal de ni lha rnams kyis kyang legs par brtun par gyur te/ 'di lta ste dper na 'dres pa'i tshal lha rnams kyis legs pa rabargyan pa
66b2(mdo sde): bzhin no// de nas lha mo sgyu 'phrul lum bi ni nags tshal du phyin nas shing rtad dam pa de las babs te/ mi dang lha'i bu mo dag gis yongs su bskor cing shing drung nas ni
66b3(mdo sde): shing drung dag tu 'gro// nags tshal nas ni nags tshal dag tu 'chag/ ljon pa nas ni ljon pa dag la lta zhing / de rim gyis shing rin po che chen po mchog dang phul du bya ba ya
66b4(mdo sde): gshin tu rnam par 'byes pa/ lo ma dang / dog pa babang po dang ldan pa/ mi dang lha'i metog sna tshogs rab tu rgyas pa/ spos mchog dang / bul du bya ba'i dri'i ngang dang ldan pa sa
66b5(mdo sde): gos kha dog sna tshogs dbyangs pa/ nor bu dang / rin po che sna tshogs lta bu'i 'od rnam pa tha dad pa 'bar ba rba ba dang / sdong po dang / ya lpag dang / la ma rnams rin pa
66b6(mdo sde): mas cad kyis legs par brtun pa/ yal gA rlung zhing shin tu rnam par 'dres pa/ zag she zhes bya ba'i snga phyogs lag ma thil wAr mnam zhing shin tu bzang la yangs pa
66b7(mdo sde): rnon po ma bu'i mgrin pa lta bu smras pa/ katsa ma n+do gas ltar regan bde ba'i sal 'dug pa sngon gyis rgyal ba'i yum gyis brten pa/ lha'i grung dbyangs blangs pa/ gnas gtsang mam
67a1(mdo sde): lha bzung zhing dri ma med la rnam par dag pa rab tu zhi ba'i sems dang ldan pa rnams kyi thor tshugs dang / con pan mngon par gtud ba'i spyi bos mngon par/
67a2(mdo sde): phyag bya ba'i shing ljon pa blag sha de'i drung du phyin to// de nas byang chub sems dpa'i gzi brjid dang mthus shing blag sha des mngon par gtud de phyag byas so// de nas /
67a3(mdo sde): mo sgyu 'phrul nam mkha'i dkyil du snang ba'i glog gis phreng ba lta bu'i lag pa g.yas pa brkyang nas/ p+lag sha'i yul ga las bzung ste/ tshul du shis par nam mkha'i dkyil du bltas nas/
67a4(mdo sde): bya rmyangs snyed byed cing 'dug par gyur to// de nas de'i tshe 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i nang nas lha'i bu mo drug khri lhags te/ lha mo sgyu 'phrul la rim gro dang / bkur/
67a5(mdo sde): ji byed par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' ma'i rum na 'dug pa'i tshe/ rnam pa de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul dang ldan par gnas so// de zla babs tshangs nas ma'i glo g.yas pa
67a6(mdo sde): nus dran zhing shes bzhin du mngal gyi drims mgos par byung / gzhan ltar ma yin zhing gzhan dag la mngal gyi drim zhes bya ba brjod pa de lta bla med par gyur to//
67a7(mdo sde): mong dag de'i ma wa'i dbang po brgya byin dang / mi mdzad kyi bdag batshangs pa gnyis mdunan 'a'ad/ de gnyis kyis rim gro dam pa chen pos lha'i gis ga shi pa'i sleb mos lus dpa pan
67b1(mdo sde): lag thams cad kyis dran zhing shes bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' blangs so// byang chub sems dpa' khang pa brtsegs pa grang gi nang na 'dug cing / ma'i rlaman gnas gnas pa de yang
67b2(mdo sde): mdzad kyi bdag po tshungs pa dang / tshangs ris kyi lha rnams kyis/ nangs pa'i 'jos rten du chen du bteg ste/ mchod rten du bya ba dang / mchod pa bya ba'i phyir zer ro// de ltar
67b3(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' doni mor gyur pa gang gis kyang ma blangs kyi/ byang chub sems dpa' de ni lha rnams kyis blangs so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' btsas ma thag tu sa la 'bab
67b4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' des la babs par gyur ma zag tu/ pad+ma chen po zhig gis sa 'di yang brtol te 'byung ngo // klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang / nye dga' bo gnyis kyang nam mkha'i dkyil na lus
67b5(mdo sde): byed byung rtse 'khod nas/ bsil ba dang / dro ba'i chu'i rgyun gnyis mngon par sprul nas byang chub sems dpa'i lus bkrus so// brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong
67b6(mdo sde): thal logs pa gzhan yang lha'i bubacu sdong mang po dag byang chub sems dpa' bcas ma thag tu sngos chu sna tshogs dang / me tog si la mas lus la bru zhing mngon par 'thor ro// bar dang las
67b7(mdo sde): kyang rdul yab kyi rngam gnyis dang / rin po che'i gdugs byung bar gyur to// de pad+ma chen po de la 'dug nas phyogs bzhir rnam par lta ste/ seng ge'i lha stangs dang / skyes bu chen po'i sba sung
68a1(mdo sde): kyis rnam par la'o// de'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i rnam par smin pa las byung ba lnga'i mig thogs pa med pas song gsum gyi song chen po'i 'jig/
68a2(mdo sde): rten gyi khams thams cad grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / yul 'khor dang / bzang 'khor dang / ljongs su bcus/ yul du bcas/ mi dang lngar bcas pa rnams mthong bar gyur to/
68a3(mdo sde): sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa'ang rab tu shes te/ shes nas kyang sems can gang tshul khrims sam/ ting nge 'dzin tam/ shes rab bam/ dge ba'i spyod pas bdag dang 'dra
68a4(mdo sde): ba de lta bu gang la la zhig yod dam zhes rnam par lta'o// de'i tshe byang chub sems dpas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ bdag dang mtshungs pa'i sems can gang yang ma
68a5(mdo sde): mthong nas/ de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i ltar 'jigs pa med cing bag tsha ba med de/ zhum pa dang / bag 'chums pa med pas legs par bsams pa dran par byas te/ bsam/
68a6(mdo sde): brtags nas sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa shes par byas te/ sus kyang brtan pa med par byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba'i chos thams cad kyi sngon du 'gro bar bya'o zhes
68a7(mdo sde): shar phyogs logs su gom pa bdun bor ro// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' gang dang gang du gom pa bor ba de dang de dag tu pad+ma dag kyang skyes par gyur to// lha dang mi rnams kyi sbyin pa'i gnas su
68b1(mdo sde): 'byur bar dum nas phyogs lags sugs pa bdun par ra/ nubathobs mogs sugam pa bdun por nas gom pa bdun pa la gnas te/ ngan 'jig tanan bral du phyin pa'o// don na
68b2(mdo sde): sgri ba tha mtsho/ skye ba dang / rga ba dang / nab dang / 'chib mthar dbyangs ngo zhes seng ge lngar tshim par gyur pa'i sgra sngags so// sems can thams cad kyi nang na blan med par bya
68b3(mdo sde): zhes byang phyogs logs su gom pa bdun bor ro// bdud dang bdud kyi rje ni gzhom par bya'o// sems can dmyal ba pa thams cad kyi sems can dmyal ba'i me bsad pa'i phyir
68b4(mdo sde): chos kyi char sprin chen po'i char pab ste/ de dag bde bas tshim par bya'o zhes 'og gis phyogs logs su gom pa bdun por ro// sems can thams cad kyis gyen du blta bar 'gyur bar bya'o//
68b5(mdo sde): zhes seng gi phyogs logs su gom pa bdun bor nas steng du lnga'o// byang chub sems dpa' tshigs de brjod ma thag tu/ de nas de'i tshe srong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir blas
68b6(mdo sde): mngon par go bar gyur te/ de na byang chub sems dpa'i las kyi rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i mngon par shes pa'i chos nyid do// gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' srid pa zam pa bca' bar
68b7(mdo sde): gyur ba dang / gang gi tshe za na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba de'i tshe rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul gyi rnam pa de lta bu de dag 'byung ngo // dge
69a1(mdo sde): slong dag de'i tshe sems can thams cad kyang rab tu dga' zhing spu g.yos par gyur to// 'jig rten du sa g.yo ba chen po shin tu 'jigs shing spu g.yo bar 'gyur ba yang byung bar gyur
69a2(mdo sde): to// mi dang lha'i sil snyan dang / rol mo'i dbyangs sgras bya ba thams cad kyang ma blangs par sgra byin par gyur to// de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du dus
69a3(mdo sde): dang dus mtshams so so'i shing thams cad kyang me tog rgyas shing 'bras bu chags pa dang / rnam par dag par gyur to// nam mkha'i dkyil nas kyang sprin gyi sgra sbags te/ sprin med pa'i
69a4(mdo sde): nam mkha' las kyang dal bu dal bus phra ba phra ba'i char lha yul ba'i kha dog dang ldan pa'i me tog dang / rgyan dang / spos kyi phye ma dang 'dres pa bab par gyur to// rlung reg na mchog tu bde ba 'jam
69a5(mdo sde): pa dri zhim po dag kyang ldang bar gyur to// phyogs thams cad kyang mun pa dang / rdul dang / du ba dang / khrag rnamad cing rab tu drang bas rnam par mdzes par gyur to// steng gi bar snang las
69a6(mdo sde): kyang tshangs pa'i sgra chen po sman cing zab pa grags par gyur to// ci zla dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten slong ba'i 'od thams cad kyang zil gyis mnan te/ 'od la dag paH/
69a7(mdo sde): slong dang ldan pa reg na mchog tu bde ba/ sems can thams cad kyi lus dang sems la bde bskyed pa/ 'jig rten las 'das pas spong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi kham sa
69b1(mdo sde): thas par byas padagang 'gyur mo/ byang chub sems dpa' bcam ma pan tu sems san thams pad kyang dadabus can tu tshim par gyur te/ 'ad nupas dang / des dang / sun dang /
69b2(mdo sde): rigs pa dang / mi dga' ba dang / zhum pa dang / 'jigs pa dang / chags pa dang / zag dog dang / ser sna thams cad dang bral zhing mi dge ba'i bya ba thams cad spangs par gyur to//
69b3(mdo sde): sems can nad pa rnams kyi nad kyang zhi bar gyur to// bkres shing skom pa'i sems can rnams kyang bkres pa dang skom pa med par gyur to// chang gi ra ro zhing myos pa rnams kyang myos pa med par
69b4(mdo sde): gyur to// smyos pa rnams kyang dran pa thob par gyur to// mig med pa rnams kyis kyang mig thob par gyur to// rna ba 'on pa rnams kyis kyang sgra zos par gyur to// yan lag dang nying lag nyams
69b5(mdo sde): pa rnams kyang dbang po nyams pa med par gyur to// dbul po rnams kyis kyang nor thob par gyur to// btson ran 'khod pa rnams kyang btson ra nas thar bar gyur to// mnar med pa la sogs
69b6(mdo sde): pa'i sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can thams cad kyi nang du bya ba dang / sdug bsngal thams cad de'i tshe rgyun chad par gyur to// dud 'gro'i skye gnas pa rnams kyi gcig la gcig za ba la
69b7(mdo sde): sogs pa'i sdug bsngal yang zhi bar gyur to// gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i sems can rnams bkres pa dang / skom pa la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal yang zhi bar gyur to// gang gi tshe byang chub/
70a1(mdo sde): sems dpa' bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med par spyad pa shin tu spyad pa brtson 'grus chen po dang ldan pa mthu chen po dang ldan pa bcas ma thag tu gam/
70a2(mdo sde): pa bdun 'dor ba'i tshe/ chos nyid thob pas de'i tshe/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sa'i phyogs de/ de'i tshe zhig par mi 'gyur bar
70a3(mdo sde): bya ba'i phyir/ rdo rje'i rang bzhin du byin gyis rlob par mdzad do// dge slong dag de tsam du spobs kyi shugs drag po dang ldan par byang chub sems dpa' bcas ma thag tu gom pa bdun 'dor bar gyur to//
70a4(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi bar thams cad kyang de'i tshe snang ba chen pos rgyas par gang bar gyur to// de'i tshe glu'i sgra chen po yang byung bar gyur to// gar gyi sgra chen po yang byung bar gyur to// de'i tshe me tog dang / phye ma dang
70a5(mdo sde): spos dang / phreng ba dang / rin po che dang / rgyan dang / gos kyi sprin dpag tu med pa dag kyang char du mngon par bab par gyur to// sems can thams cad kyang bde ba'i mchog dang ldan par gyur te/
70a6(mdo sde): mdor na byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa 'jig rten du byung ba'i tshe/ bya ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa byung bar gyur to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dag/
70a7(mdo sde): po stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa cig tu bzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das
70b1(mdo sde): bang dang ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de ban gshegs pa ni sems can thams cad las ngomar du gyur bte/ byang chub sems dpa bad byung rang du byung ba'i sa dang 'du
70b2(mdo sde): gyur na nga bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar bdag ni lan bzhi 'am/ lan lnga
70b3(mdo sde): lan bcur yang / lan lnga bcu'i bar du yang / len brgya'i bar du yang/ lan brgya stong du ma'i bar du yang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la skyabs su mchi'o// de skad ces gsol
70b4(mdo sde): pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kun dga' bo ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ dge slong la la lus ma bsgoms pa/ sems ma
70b5(mdo sde): bsgoms pa/ tshul khrims ma bsgoms pa/ shes rab ma bsgoms pa/ byis pa mi mkhas pa lhag pa'i nga rgyal can/ rgod pa/ khengs pa/ ma bsdams pa/ sems g.yengs pa
70b6(mdo sde): nem nur gyis 'khod pa/ the tsom mang ba / dad pa med pa/ dge slong gi dri mar gyur pa/ dge slong gi tshul dang mi 'dra ba dag 'byung ste/ de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rum du 'gro ba yongs
70b7(mdo sde): su dag pa 'di lta bu thos nas/ yid mi ched shing de dag phyogs gcig tu tshogs nas/ gcig la gcig 'di skad du kye khyed cag 'dis bu'i ma rigs pa la ltos byang chub sems dpa' mam
71a1(mdo sde): rum na 'dug pa/ bzlog pa'i khu shugs dang 'dres pa la yang 'di lta bu'i longs spyod yod ces bya ba dang de 'byung ba'i tshe ma'i glo grams pa nas mngal kyi drims mgos
71a2(mdo sde): par byung zhes bya ba 'di rigs par ji ltar 'gyur zhes zer bar 'gyur te/ skyes bu glen pa de dag ni sems can legs par byas pa'i las dang ldan pa rnams kyi lus mi gtsang ba'i khu ba'i nang du
71a3(mdo sde): mi 'byung ngo // zhes bya bar mi shes so// dge slong dag sems can dam pa de lta bu dag gi mngal du 'gro ba dang / mngal na gnas pa ni shin tu yang bzang ba yin no// byang chub sems dpa'
71a4(mdo sde): rnams ni sems can rnams la snying brtse bas mi'i 'jig rten du skye ste/ lhar gyur pa nyid kyis chos kyi 'khor lo mi skor ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo sems can rnams zhum par
71a5(mdo sde): 'gyur zhing / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de ni lhar gyur pa yin gyis bdag cag ni mi tsam du nus pas na/ bdag /
71a6(mdo sde): gis gnas de lta bu yongs su rdzogs par bya bar mi nus so zhes zhum par gyur tu 'ong ba'i phyir te/ skyes bu glen pa chos kyi rkun por gyur pa de dag 'di snyam du sems can de ni sems bsam gyis mi
71a7(mdo sde): khyab pa de/ de ni bdag cag gis chod bzung bar bye ba ma yin ni sum du mi sems so// kun dga' bo de dag ni de'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi cho 'phrul la yang yid mi ches par 'gyur na/ de bzhin/
71b1(mdo sde): gshegs pa byang chub sems dpar gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' tshe 'phrul la la smos kyang ci dgos te kun dga' bor ltar skyes bu glen pa rnyed pa dang / bshAr sti dang / gas sa
71b2(mdo sde): bcad pas zil gyis non pa// mi gsang bar byung ba/ rim grol zil gyis non pa/ ma rabs kyi dang tshul can de dag sangs rgyas kyi chos stong zhing bsod nams ma yin pa'i mngon par 'du gyur
71b3(mdo sde): yang sas mngon par 'du byed pas s+ho// / 'gas paH ril pa zhes byab zeg patsun pa'i ma// bam
71b4(mdo sde): garol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mabyung ba dusan/ 'di lta bubu ma the babang po la yang thong zhi mi ldan par brjod pa de lta bu'i gamang das kyang 'byung ba lags pas/ lanam na 'das
71b5(mdo sde): kyis pa 'phrul pa/ kun dga' bo de dag ni ma rje 'di la bu grong zhing mi ldan par brjod par yang mi zad de/ rdeg pa rnam pa du ma mngon par 'du bya ba mngan par 'du byed cing / dge sbyom
71b6(mdo sde): pa gas pa da 'thung la ro// mal ba/ bas ldan 'das 'an grus zungs pa ma lags pa dra ba dan pa 'tho na 'dra bzhis tu wAr
71b7(mdo sde): na sa 'a ba sa kyis paka' phrul / rnam sa cas kyi kyang chub ma par bya ma nga/ mtshan pa dang / srung #
72a1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das rnams la mi ldan pas sur ba btab pa'i 'gro ba gang yin pa'i 'gro ba der 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ denas nga ldan pakun dga' bo dru
72a2(mdo sde): g.yos nas sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo zhes brjod de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sras bu dam pa ma lags pa de dag gi spyod pa 'di dag thos nas bdag
72a3(mdo sde): ni brgyal ba dang 'dra bar gyur to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa kun dga' bo de dag gi spyod pa ni mnyam par mi 'gyur zhing / sems can de dag ni mo mnyam pa'i spyod pa can du
72a4(mdo sde): 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo de dag tshul dang mi 'dra ba'i spyod pa des/ mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen por ltung bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo dge slong ngam
72a5(mdo sde): dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang la la zhig/ mdo sde 'di lta bu 'di dag thos nas ma mos shing / yid mi ches pa dang / spong ba de dag ni shi 'phos ma thag tu mnar
72a6(mdo sde): med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen por lhung bar 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa la ni tshad du ma byed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa ni tshad med cing
72a7(mdo sde): zab la rgya che zhing gting dpag dka' ba'o// kun dga' bo la la zhig mdo sde 'di lta bu 'di dag thos nas dga' ba dang mchog tu dga' ba dang dad pa skyes pa'i sems can de dag gis thob pa de ni/
72b1(mdo sde): / ra ma / nga mnas lta ba na / kya nga ga nga /
72b2(mdo sde): TI dmang bsam las grol ba'o// de dag ni bzhin gshegs pa'i las sa 'gyur ro// dadagagis ni dgos pathams cad 'ongs su slob ba// de dag gis ni dang pazong pa ni don mod/
72b3(mdo sde): sa ni yul 'bor gyims legs pa zos so// de dag ni sems can dam pa rnams la legs par mos pa yin no// dag ni bdud kyi thugs pa gtubs pa yin no// de dag ni 'bar ba 'a
72b4(mdo sde): dgon pa las rgal to// de dag gis ni mya ngan gyi brag rngu byung ngo // de dag gis ni mchog tu dga' ba'i dngos po rjes su 'thob bo// de dag gis ni skyabs su 'gro ba legs par blangs so// de dag ni
72b5(mdo sde): sbyin pa'i gnas yin te/ mchod par 'os pa'o// de dag ni 'jig rten du 'byung bar dkon pa'o// de dag ni 'jig rten na sbyin pa'i gnas su bzung ba'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs
72b6(mdo sde): pa'i chos 'jig rten thams cad dang mi mthun pa rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di la dad pa'i phyir ro// kun dga' bo sems can de dag ni dge ba'i cha ba don dang ldan pa yin te/ kun dga' bo sems can de dag
72b7(mdo sde): ning dang tshe rabs 'ga' zhig yid du 'grogs par gyur pa'i grogs po yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo la la ni thos pa tsam gyis dga' zhing yid du 'ong ba yod kyi mthong na ma yin no//
73a1(mdo sde): na 'phrul yu sa byas
73a2(mdo sde): mamasas ra/ dasan ban mas pa sa bag/
73a3(mdo sde): yang sems can su yang du / 'jigs pas nyam thag cing 'ongs nas/ mi 'jigs pa song na sems cacad dgul dngas mi 'jigs pa dran par gyur na/ dad+han meng pa yang dag pa'i rdzog /
73a4(mdo sde): byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par smos kyang sa dgos/ gan dga' bo dang pal btsun par gyis ni/ 'don dang gan sa shegs pas pa lta ba'o// kun dgang
73a5(mdo sde): yang pa de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas byas so// nga rgyal gyi zug dran bzhin gshegs pas bsal // kun dga' ba rdzogs pa'i gtam thas pa samagyis ca dang sa cad brgya'i lam dus
73b1(mdo sde): 'tshwa ste/ thos pas kyang dga' bar 'gyur pa yin na/ sngar mang mthong ba las mdza' bo mthong bar gyur na smos kyang ci dgos te gang nga la rten cing dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed par byed par de dag ni mthon
73b2(mdo sde): pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis mkhyen cing / sems can de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sngon gyi mdza' bo sa de dag ni bdag
73b3(mdo sde): cag gi yang mdza' bo yin no snyam du dgongs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo gang yin pa de mdza' bo la sdug cing yid du 'ong ba yin no// mdza' bo de'i gang sdug pa'i grogs po de yang de la
73b4(mdo sde): sdug cing yid du 'ong ba yin no// kun dga' bo de lta bas na khyod mos par bya zhing khong du chud par byas/ dad pa tsam yang bskyed par gyis shig/ ngas ma byon pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
73b5(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la yang gtad de/ de dag kyang 'di dag ni bdag cag gi yang mdza' bo len na zhes bya bar mkhyen cing bsam pa rdzogs par mdzad par 'gyur ro// na
73b6(mdo sde): dga' bo 'di sa ste dbar na mas bral la zhig la bu dgazhan dang / mthun par 'dzin pa gcig buzhis 'dog par gyur la/ skyes bu de yang mnga' bo mang bzhig yin na padi shir zin kyang ngom
73b7(mdo sde): mam pas yongs su bzung ba'i khri doni phongs par mi 'gyur ro// kun dga' ba bzhin dus maya rung / ngal dang na dgangs bzung ba yin te// de zhi nga'i mnga' ba'o/ de dag
74a1(mdo sde): skyabs su dong ba'o// de bzhin gshegs pa ni mtha' ba chung po mapa rab ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mnga' gro dadag cang yang dag par gsung shing brdzun du sa gsung /
74a2(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa'i mnga' bor dag kyang / yang dag par gsung ba ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgrubatsam pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la de dag rjes smug ta dkris
74a3(mdo sde): dga' bo dad pa la brtson par gyis shig/ 'di ni ngas khyod la bcol ba'o// dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' bcas pa'i tshe/ lha'i bu mo bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po
74a4(mdo sde): dag nam mkha'i dkyil na gnas shing / lha mo sgyu 'phrul la lha'i me tog dang / spos dang / zeng ba dang / byug pa dang / gos dang / rgyan gyis mngon par 'thor bar gyur to// de la 'di
74a5(mdo sde): skad ces bya ste/ dge badri med rnam dag gser gyi 'od ldan ci ma'i 'od ldan pa// lha yi bu mo sgra dablangs sman brjod stong brag drug srung yi tshe// da cig de la wam bi nair lha mo sgyu 'phrul de lam+b+ha/
74a6(mdo sde): mi dgyes ma mdzad rab tu dgyes mdzad bdag cag khyod kyi phyag rjed lags bdag cag rnams kyis bgyi ba ci mchis ci bgyi ci 'tshul bka' stsol cig/ bdag cag khyod kyi phyag rjed nus ldan ci pa
74a7(mdo sde): sems dang ldan pa lags/ khyod kyis dgyes shing bde ba'i nyams bskyed mi dgyes thams cad spang bar gsol// rga shi sel ba'i sman pa dam pa de ring lha mo myur skyed 'gyuraji ltar zhugs/
74b1(mdo sde): shing 'dirnams pa 'bras sa la ma thog rgyas gyur cing / grong phrag bgrangs pa'i lha rnams drung na gnas shing lags pa 'dud pa dang / 'ga' dogs rgya mtshor babs te rnam pa drug tugalas lags na/
74b2(mdo sde): khyod las lnga yul mi yul sgra grags 'jig rten 'das pa'i sras bltam gyur// ji ltar rnam dag 'od kyis rnam par mdzes shing gser gyi kha dog bzang nam mkha'i dkyil las yid 'ong sil sran
74b3(mdo sde): brgya dag ma dkrol rtswa 'byin dang / ji ltar dag cing gtsang la 'dod chags bral ba'i lha rnams brgya stong yang // dga' sems phyag 'tshal ba las de ring 'jig rten kun pa na bltam par 'gyur/
74b4(mdo sde): brgya byin tshangs pa 'jig rten srong dang de bzhin lha rnams gzhan dag kyang // dga' zhing brod pa'i sems kyis drung du gnas nas lag pa 'dud pa bgyid// skyes bu seng ge brtul zhugs grub pa de yang
74b5(mdo sde): babrib logs g.yas nas byung // gser gyi ri dang 'dra zhing dag pa'i 'od dang ldan pa'i 'dren pa bltams// brgya byin tshangs pa gnyis kyis lag pa dar te thub pa de yang blangs/ zhing rnams brgya stong
74b6(mdo sde): 'od bzang brtse bas thams cad rab tu g.yos par gyur// ngan song gsum gyi sems can rnams kyang bde zhing sdug bsngal med nur te/ lha rnams rgya phrag stong gis mchog gtor togs kyi g.yab
74b7(mdo sde): mabrag dachas 'a rlobs mthu ldan ning rngar 'dangs gnas pa mdzes// sna choms mnganamathon dag la 'dren pa 'khor lo'i mtshan ris nabs pacas so// rnam pa bdun du bathud nas tshangs
75a1(mdo sde): pa'i sgra dbyangs dam pa gsungs pa ni// rga shi sel ba'i sman pa dam pa sems can mchog tu bdag 'gyur ro// tshangs pa'i mchog dang brgya byin lnga mchog nam mkha'i dkyil/
75a2(mdo sde): na 'khod gyur te// gtsang zhing dang la mdzes pa'i spos chu dag gis 'dren pa'i sku yang bsil// klu yi rgyal gnyis par snang gnas nas grang dro'i chu yi rgyun kyang gtong // lha rnams brgya stong dag
75a3(mdo sde): kyang spos chu dag gis 'dren pa'i sku bsil byed// 'jig rten skyong ba rnams kyang rim gro dam par lag pa bzang pos len// stong gsum 'di yang rgyu dang mi rgyu bcas par rab tu g.yos par 'gyur//
75a4(mdo sde): mdzes pa'i 'od rnams bkye bas ngan song rnams kyang rab tu zhi bar gyur// 'jig rten rnam par 'dren pa bltams pas nyon mongs sdug bsngal de dag zhi// mi yi 'dren pa rgyal ba la//
75a5(mdo sde): rnams mchog si lams 'thor// stobs dang brtson 'grus ldan pa yi// brtan pagom pa bdun du bzung // sa rdzogs gang du zhabs bdag pa// der ni pad+ma ba bang ba'i mtsha
75a6(mdo sde): can ma brtan pa // salas mngon du mngon pa gyur// de ltar dam bdun bzu nas// gdang tsu sal ba y-i// ldan padam pa 'dir byung sa/ ma
75a7(mdo sde): pa mdza kyi larnam danam sa nas bral// ma ma tan dum phyi rnam par ma
75b1(mdo sde): mtha' 'ad yin nas// mam 'dren pas 'jam pa mdzad// la dpung bags dang 'jig tan snong dag rab tu dang sems pas// chos rgya margyag gis 'jig rten spangs na du
75b2(mdo sde): yang bsil/ u ba rnams kyang lhan cig mthun par byas nas ni// drinam spos chu dag gi spyan gyis su yang bsil ba byas// chu gzhan theg khrig dag byung bar srung la ni gan nam bu/
75b3(mdo sde): dri zhim spos chu mchog gi rgyun gyis rang byung gu yang bsil// gdugs dkar yangs dang rnga yab bzang po dam pa thogs nas ni// bar snang 'khod de lha rnams mi yi khyu mchog sku bsil byed/
75b4(mdo sde): skyes bu gcig cig rings par 'ongs nas zas gtsang de la dgar smras pa// lha gcig 'byor pa rgyus gyur khyod kyi sras ni mtshan gyis brgyan pa bltams// de ni nges par 'khor lo sgyur ba'i dbang
75b5(mdo sde): byug gdung rabs rin chen 'chog/ 'dzam bu'i gling 'di gdugs mang gcig 'gyur bas kyis dgra yang ma mchis 'gyur// de nas skyes bu gnyis 'ongs zas gtsang rtsal po'i mdun du
75b6(mdo sde): sa// lnga ngag 'byor baHsa b+ta shA'i rigs sa rgyal du mas gyur nas// gargya rnams kyi gling du mas pa 'bum zag ldan bcas pa kris par gyur/ na gzhan gyis mi
75b7(mdo sde): rmobs dang ldan dang can pa che dpa 'dra// sum bug zhan 'ongs smras pa bdag las bgyis pa'i spabasan sa// 'dun pa can la segs pa 'bangs kyi byim pa brgyad btubacas par gyur/
76a1(mdo sde): bsngags ldan gyi ni zla bo chibs rta stong phrag bcu dag 'brangs myur te// chibs mchog dam pa gser gyis 'od ldan rnga rngog lcang lor 'khril ba lags// mtha' 'khob
76a2(mdo sde): khams kyis rgyal po stong phrag nyi shu dag kyang de bzhin du// rgyal po khyod kyi zhabs kyi drung du mchis kyis legs par rgyal gyur lha// da ni bdag mchis sug las ci bgyi rgyal pos bdag la
76a3(mdo sde): bka' stsal gsol// rgyal po khyod 'dir mnga' bsnyes bdag 'bangs jo bo lha cig rgyal bar spyon// gser gyi dra bas mdzes pa'i glang po dam pa stong phrag nyi shu dag/ nam mkha' las na
76a4(mdo sde): dgra dag 'byin cing rgyal po'i khab tu mgyogs su mchis// sa srung la sogs na gu za lu dag dang be'u ni drug stong 'brangs// lha cig lha mchog bltams zhing de dag btsas pas rgyal khang
76a5(mdo sde): phun sum tshogs// rje cig rgyal po gshegs te bsod nams gzi 'od ldan pa bltams pa yi// yon tan dag ni mthong bar gyur nas lha dang mi rnams stong bgrangs pa// rab tu dga' bar
76a6(mdo sde): thar dang kun la nyid kyis legs par gzigs su gsol// mur du N+Dal gyur cig ces byang chub dam pa mya ngan med par bzhugs/ dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems
76a7(mdo sde): dpa' bcas pa dang / gang cig da la sbyin pa gtong ba yang debs rgya cher gyur to// ma rabs kyo rigs lnga brgya yang bcas par gyur to// zugs ldan la sogs pa bu mo khri dang /
76b1(mdo sde): mo brgyad brgya dang / 'dun pa la sogs pa bran lnga brgya dang / te'u mo khri dang / bsngags ldan la sogs pa rte'u po khri dang / bal glang gi zla gu mo lnga brgya dang / bal glang gi phru gu po lnga/
76b2(mdo sde): brtsa po dag kyang bcas shing 'brangs par gyur nas de dag thams cad rgyal po zas gtsang mas rtswa grangs yi ger bris te sras bu gzhon nu med pa'i phyir byin par gyur to// byang chub sems
76b3(mdo sde): dpa'i longs spyod kyi don du byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyi mthus/ gling bye ba brgya phrag bzhi'i dbus kyis phyogs nas a shod za'i sdong po skyes par gyur to// gling phra mo rnams su yang can dan
76b4(mdo sde): gyi nags tshal skyes par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa'i longs spyod kyi don du grong khyer gyi khor ra khor yug tu yang bskyed mos tshal lnga brgya dag kyang byung bar gyur to// gter lnga stong yang sa'i 'og/
76b5(mdo sde): nas gyen du 'bus te sgo ston par gyur to// de ltar rgyal po zas gtsang ma de'i don bsam pa gang yin pa de de dag thams cad phun sum tshogs par gyur nas/ rgyal po zas gtsang ma 'di snyam du
76b6(mdo sde): bdag gis bu gzhon nu de'i ming ji skad cig gdags par bya snyam pa dang / de 'di snyam du sems te/ bu 'di skyes ma thag tu bdag gi don thams cad yang dag par grub par gyur gyis/ 'di'i ma/
76b7(mdo sde): ni don thams cad grub par gdags so snyam ste/ de nas rgyal pos byang chub sems dpa' la rim gro cher byas nas/ bu 'di'i ming don thams cad grub pa zhes bya'o zhes ming du btags so//
77a1(mdo sde): dge slong dag de lta byang chub sems dpa' bcas nas ma'i glo g.yas pa yang ma ral mnyams shing skyon bzhin du nur // de thon pa lanags ma ldang pa
77a2(mdo sde): kyang byung bar gyur to// thos kyi 'bru mar gyi rdzing bu dag kyang byung bar gyur to/ de nas wa'i bu mo lnga song dag lnga'i gros kyis bskos pa'i 'bramar gyi dri zhim po khyer
77a3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i ma'i drung du lpags nas/ bltams pa legs par bltam mam/ su la mi bde ba ma mchis sam zhes 'dri bar gyur to// lha'i bu mo lnga stong dag kyang lha'i thug pa dang /
77a4(mdo sde): rnam par byug pa thogs te/ byang chub sems dpa'i ma'i drung du lpags nas bltams pa legs par bltam mam/ su la mi bde ba ma mchis sam zhes 'dri bar gyur to// phra mo lnga
77a5(mdo sde): stong dag kyang lha'i spos chus bkang ba'i bum pa thogs te/ byang chub sems dpa'i ma'i drung du lhags nas/ bltams pa legs par bltam mam/ su la mi bde ba ma mchis sam
77a6(mdo sde): zhes 'dri bar gyur to// lha mo lnga stong dag kyang lha'i byis pa'i gos thogs te/ byang chub sems dpa'i ma'i drung du lpags nas/ bltams pa legs par bltam mam/ skul mo bde ba mamaN+Da
77a7(mdo sde): sam zhes 'dri bar gyur to// lha'i bu mo lnga stong dag kyang lha'i byis pa'i rgyan thogs te/ byang chub sems dpa'i ma'i drung du lhags nas bltams pa legs par bltam mam/ sku la mi
77b1(mdo sde): bde ba ma mchis sam zhes 'dri bar gyur to// zhwa'i bum lnga slong dag kyang glu dbyungs len cing byang chub sems dpa'i ma'i drung du lags te/ bsams pa legs par bltamams/ thul
77b2(mdo sde): mi bde ba ma mchis sam zhes 'dri bar gyur to// 'dzam bu'i gling 'di na phyi rol gyi drang srong mngon par shes pa lta dang ldan pa ji snyed cig 'khod pa de dag thams cad nam mkha' las 'ongs te
77b3(mdo sde): rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i mdun du 'khod nas/ rgyal po 'phel bar gyur cig ces bya ba'i sgra sgrogs par gyur to// dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' btsas nas zhag bdun du lum bi na
77b4(mdo sde): nags tshal du lha dang mi'i sol snyan dang / pheg rdob pas rim gror byas so// bkur stir byas so// bsti stang byas so// mchod pa byas so// bza' ba dang / bca' ba dang /
77b5(mdo sde): myang ba dag kyang drangs par gyur to// shAkya'i tshogs thams cad kyang 'dus nas/ kun dga' ba'i sgra brjod par gyur to// sbyin pa dag kyang byin no// bsod nams reg kyang byed do// bram ze sa/
77b6(mdo sde): khro nyis stong yang nyin gcig bzhin du tshim par byas so// su dag ci 'dod pa de dag la yang de byin par gyur to// brgya byin dang / tshangs pa yang bram ze'i 'khor der bram ze'i khye'u yi gzugs su
77b7(mdo sde): sprul te/ gral gyi thog ma la 'khod nas bkra shis kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag brjod par gyur to// ji ltar ngan song rnams zhi zhing // ji ltar 'gro kun bde las na// 'gro la bde ba 'god pa/
78a1(mdo sde): yi bde ba mdzad cig bltams par mngon// ji ltar rab rib me 'od kyis// lba dang nyi zla'i 'od rnams kyang / mi snang zil du rlag pa las// bsod nams 'od cig
78a2(mdo sde): byung bar mngon// mig med rnams kyang mthong gyur cing // rna ba 'on pas sgra thos la// smon pa rnams kyang dran ldan las// 'jig rten mchod rten 'gyur bar mngon// ji ltar nyon mongs mi
78a3(mdo sde): gnod cing // 'gro ba byams pa'i yid gyur las// tshangs pa bye bas mchod 'os su// gdon mi za bar 'gyur bar mngon// sal me tog rgyas gyur cing // sa yang mnyam par gnas pa las/
78a4(mdo sde): 'gro ba kun gyis mchod pa yi// thams cad mkhyen du 'gyur bar mngon// ji ltar 'jig rten 'khrug med cing // pad+ma chen po mthon pa las// nges par gzi brjid chen po 'di// 'jig rte
78a5(mdo sde): mgon du byon par 'gyur// lnga yi spos kyis sngags gyur pa// 'jam pa'i rlung gis ngang sdang zhing // sems can nad rnams zhi gyur las// 'di ni sman pa'i rgyal por byon// gzugs lam
78a6(mdo sde): gnas pa'i rtsa rgyal po// 'dod chags bral ba 'di dag gyung / thal mo thu tshong 'dug pa las// 'don sbyin pa'i gnas su byin// mi rnams kyis ni lha mthong zhing / lha rnams kyis nam/
78a7(mdo sde): mthong yang // phan tshun 'tshe ba med pa las// 'don dang dpon chen por byon// me rnams zhi bar gnas gyur cing // chu klung thams cad ma g.yol// sa yang dal bus gal ba las/
78b1(mdo sde): 'di ni yang dag gzigs par 'gyur/ dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' bcas nas zhag bdun lon pa dang / lha mo sgyu 'phrul shi ba'i dus byas par gyur te/ de shi da /
78b2(mdo sde): dus byas nas sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i nang du skyes so// dge slong dag khyed 'di snyam du byang chub sems dpa'i lan bon gyis/ lha mo sgyu 'phrul 'chi ba'i dus byas so sgyu man// de ltar mi
78b3(mdo sde): blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i tshe'i tshad ni mthar thug pa'i phyir ro// dge slong dag 'das pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang bcas nas zhag bdun lon nam mchi ba'i dus byas par gyur to//
78b4(mdo sde): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' skyes te dbang po yongs su rdzogs nas mngon par byung nam snying 'gas su 'ong ba'i phyir ro// dge slong dag de ltar zhag bdun lon nas/ thogs mar mam
78b5(mdo sde): sgra'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po nas/ lha mo sgyu 'phrul bkod pa ji lta bus bskyed mos tshal gyi sar zhugs par gyur pa de dag las bye ba brgya stong gyur pas kyang lhag pa'i bkod pa chen pos/ byang
78b6(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' gro khyer chen po ser skya'i gnas su zhugs so// de zhugs pa dang / bum pa spos chus gang ba lnga stong gis mdun du drangs par gyur to// de bzhin du bu mo lnga stong ni rma ba'i mdongs
78b7(mdo sde): gan thoms te 'dud du 'dong bar gyur to// bu mo lnga spong na shing la'i yal gathogs shing mdun du 'dong bar gyur to// bu mo lnga sdong ni sbom chu'i rol bsnying ga bogs te/ lam ma chab shes
79a1(mdo sde): 'debs shing mdun du 'dong bar gyur to// bu mo lnga stong ni nags tshal gyim tog gi phreng ba 'brang ba khye'u tshang rgya tshogs thogs te mdun du 'dong bar gyur to// bu mo lha myong na/
79a2(mdo sde): bzang por gyur ba'i rin po che thogs te/ lam gyi bri dor byed cing mdun du 'dong bar gyur to// bu mo lnga stong ni ldan bzang po thogs shing mdun du 'dong bar gyur to// bram ze lnga stong ni dri bu thogs te/
79a3(mdo sde): bkra shis kyi sgra 'byin cing mdun du 'dong bar gyur to// glang po lnga stong ni rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan te/ mdun du 'dong bar gyur to// rta nyi khri ni gser gyi rgyan gyis bka' cing rgyun thams cad kyis
79a4(mdo sde): brgyan te mdun du 'dong bar gyur to// shing rta brgyad khri ni gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan bsgreng zhing dril bu g.yer ka'i dra bas legs par brgyan te/ byang chub sems dpa'i phyi bzhin
79a5(mdo sde): 'dong bar gyur to// rkang thang dpa' zhing rtul bod pa yan lag dam pa'i gzugs dang ldan pa/ go cha sra ba bgos pa bzhi khri ni/ byang chub sems dpa' 'gro ba'i phyi bzhin 'dong bar gyur to//
79a6(mdo sde): 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i grags pa grags pa che ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad med grangs med pa dag ni/ nam mkha'i dkyil nas bkod pa rnam pa sna tshogs du mas/ byang /
79a7(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' la mchod pa byed cing bye bzhin 'dong bar gyur to// shing rta gang la byang chub sems dpa' 'dug par gyur pa de yang / 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha rnams kyis bkod pa chen po du mas
79b1(mdo sde): legs par brtan par gyur to// lha'i bu mo rgyan thams cad kyis nas pas/ rin pa che'i phrang bzlogs pa 'aM bris shing b+ha drungs te/ wa'i bum gnyis kyis par dra na ma bum gsag dun
79b2(mdo sde): mi'i bu mo gnyis kyi bar du ni lha'i bu mo gcig 'dug kyang / byang chub sems dpa'i mthus lha'i bu mos kyang mi'i bu mo'i dri mi zhim pa mi nor/ me'i bu mos kyang lha'i bu mo'i gzugs mthong na
79b3(mdo sde): bag med par ma gyur to// dge slong dag ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen por shAkya lnga brgya tsam gyis byang chub sems dpa'i ched du khyim lnga brgya phub ste/ de dag byang chub sems
79b4(mdo sde): dpa' grong khyer der 'jug pa'i tshe/ rang rang gis byas pa'i khyim gyi sgor 'khod de/ thal mo sbyar nas lus gus par btud do rim gro dang bcas pas 'di skad du/ kye don thams cad grub pa 'dir
79b5(mdo sde): gshegs su gsol/ kye lha'i lha 'dir gshegs su gsol// kye sems can dag pa 'dor gshegs su gsol// kye kha lo skur ba dam pa 'dir gshegs su gsol// kyai dga' zhing ba
79b6(mdo sde): ba dang mchog tu dga' ba mdzad pa 'dir gshegs su gsol// kye smad pa med pa'i grags pa mnga' ba 'dir gshegs su gsol// kye kun nas spyan mnga' ba 'dir gshegs su gsol/
79b7(mdo sde): kye mi mnyam pa dang mnyam zhing 'dra ba med pa'i yon tan dang gzi brjid mnga' ba mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos yang dag par brgyan pa'i sku mnga' ba 'dir gshegs su gsol zhes de
80a1(mdo sde): skad 'dzer to// de nas rgyal po zas gtsang mas de dag thams cad dang mthun par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' khyim de kun tu yang zhugs/
80a2(mdo sde): par byas te zla ba bzhi lon nas byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyi khyim du zhugs te/ rin po che sna tshogs bkod pa zhes bya ba'i khang bzang chen po der byang chub sems dpa' bzhugs par gyur to//
80a3(mdo sde): de na shAkya'i rgyun rabs rgan rabs rnams 'dus te bgros pa phan pa'i sems dang byams pa'i sems kyi yon tan dang ldan pa dang / 'jam pa dang ldan par byang chub sems dpa' gtsang
80a4(mdo sde): ba dang / byi dor bya ba dang / nyams su byung bar sus nus zhes byas pa dang / de na shAkya'i bu mo lnga brgya tsam so so nas 'di skad du bdag gis gzhon nu'i rim gro bgyi'o// bdag gis gzhon nu'i
80a5(mdo sde): rim gro bgyi'o zhes zer ro// de na shAkya'i ches bgres ches bgres de dag na re/ bu mo 'di dag thams cad ni byis pa gzhon nu thor bu gzhon la/ gzugs dang dar la bab pas rgyags shing dregs pa
80a6(mdo sde): yin pas/ 'di dag gis byang chub sems dpa' la dus dusu rim gro bya bar ma nus so// sme dgu'i bdag mo chen mo go'u ti mi 'di gzhon nu'i sum mo ste/ 'dis ni gzhon nu bde ba dang legs
80a7(mdo sde): par bskyed par nus so// rgyal po zas gtsang ma yang mnyes par nus so zhes thams cad gros gcig tu 'dus te/ skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo go'u ta mis dad par byas pas/ skye dgu'i bdag mo
80b1(mdo sde): nam pa'u mas gzhon nu de legs par bskyed do// da'i nabyang chub sems dpa' rom sbyor ma ma sum su rtsa gnyis bgos par gyur te/ del brgya ni byungan 'tsho ba'i ma ma'o// bang na num
80b2(mdo sde): blun pa'i ma ma'o// brgyad ni chen grogs kyi ma ma'o// brgyad ni drim 'bri ba'i ma ma'o// de nas rgyal po bas gtsang mas shAkya'i tshogs thams cad bsogs te dpyad pa dang /
80b3(mdo sde): ji ltar gzhon nu 'di 'khor lo gyur pa'i rgyal po zhig tu gyur ram/ 'on te ma yin gyis rab tu byung ba'i phyir mngon par 'byung zhes dpyad pa dang / de'i tshe ri'i rgyal po grangs ri'i ngos la drang srong chen
80b4(mdo sde): nags pa zhes bya ba/ mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa zhig sdug gi tsha bo mis byin zhes bya ba dang lhan cig tu 'dug 'dug pa las/ des byang chub sems dpa' bcas pa'i tshe/ ngo mtshar mngad du byung
80b5(mdo sde): ba'i cho 'phrul mang du mthong ste/ nam mkha'i dkyil na yang lha'i bu mang po sangs rgyas kyi sgra sgrogs cing gos kyi g.yab mo g.yob pa dang / dga' zhing phan tshun du 'dong ba mthong nas/ des bsams pa/
80b6(mdo sde): ma la bdag gis rnam par blta bzhig tu bya'am snyam nas/ des lha'i mig gis 'dzam bu'i grong thams cad du bltas na ser skya'i grong khyer chen po de na rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i khyim du gnon nu bsod
80b7(mdo sde): rnams kyi gzi brjid kyis gzi dang ldan par byas pa 'jig rten thams cad kyis mchod pa/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis lus legs par brtan pazhig bcas par mthong nas/
81a1(mdo sde): bram ze'i khye'u mis byin la smras pa/ bram ze'i khye'u shes par gyis shig/ 'dzam bu'i gling du ni rin po che chen po byung ste/ ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po na
81a2(mdo sde): rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i khyim du gzhon nu bsod nams kyi gzi brjid kyis gzi dang ldan par byas pa 'jig rten thams cad kyis mchod pa skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa
81a3(mdo sde): btsas so// de gal te khyim na gnas ni ni mtha' bzhi la dbang ba'i 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur te/ rnam par rgyal ba dang ldan pa/ chos dang ldan pa/ chos kyi rgyal po/ srid kyi mthu stobs/
81a4(mdo sde): thob pa/ rin po che sna bdun dang ldan par 'gyur te/ de'i rin po che bdun ni 'di lta ste 'khor lo rin po che dang / glang po rin po che dang / rta rin po che dang / nor bu rin po che dang / bud med rin po che dang /
81a5(mdo sde): khyim bdag rin po che dang / blon po rin po che dang bdun 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de la bu stong yod par gyur te/ dpa' ba/ rtul bod pa/ yan lag mchog gi gzugs dang ldan pa/ pha rol gyi
81a6(mdo sde): 'joms pa sha stag 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de ni sa chen po'i dkyil 'khor 'di rgya mtsho'i mtha' skor dang bcas pa chad pa med cing mtshon gyis bda' ba med pa dang / chos dang mthun par rang gi
81a7(mdo sde): mthus zil gyis mnan cing mngon par phab ste/ dbang phyug gi rang gis rgyal po srid byed par 'gyur ro// de gal te khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung na yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
81b1(mdo sde): pa gas stsa \u0f7fsa swa b+hA / smra ba gyu ma ga pa na dum rnam par rnams par ma sa snun /
81b2(mdo sde): de nas drang srong chen po nin po// rlug gi rtsa ba mos byin dang 'grogs te/ ngang pa'i rgyal po skar nam mkha'i dkyil nas ldings te/ ser bya'i gnas kyi zong khyer nan pog la ba ma
81b3(mdo sde): nas byin pa dang / rdzu 'phrul btul nas dang gis ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen por dong ste/ rgyal po bas gtsang ma'i khyim ga la bder byin nas/ rgyal po bas bcang ma'i khyim kyi gor bad
81b4(mdo sde): do/ dge slong dag de ltar drang srong nag po des rgyal po pas gtsang ma'i khyim gyi sgo drung du srog chags brgya stong mang po 'dus pa mthong ngo // de nas drang srong nas po tho ba'i drung du song theg 'di skang
81b5(mdo sde): ches smras so/ rtsa mi khyod song la rgyal po bas gtsang ma la chab skon drang srong gcig mchis sa zhus gsol cog/ de nas sgos des de ltar bya'o zhes drang srong nag pa'i slar mnyan to// rgyal
81b6(mdo sde): zas gtsang ma ga la ba der song nas phyin pa dang / thal mo sbyar te/ rgyal po zas gtsang ma la 'di skad ces smras so// lha mkhyen par mdzad du gsol// chab skon drang srong rgan pa 'khogs pa
81b7(mdo sde): nas gzer ba zhig mchis te/ 'di skad du bdag ni rgyal po'i zhal mthong bar 'tshal lo zhes mchi'o// de nas rgyal po bas gtsang mas drang srong nag pa'i stan 'ding du bcug kyi
82a1(mdo sde): de la 'di skad ces smras so// drang srong de nang du 'ong bar gyis shig/ de nas mi de rgyal po'i pho brang nas byung nas/ drang srong nag po la 'di skad ces smras te/ nang du/
82a2(mdo sde): bzhud cig/ de nas drang srong nag po rgyal po zas gtsang ma ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang / mdun du 'dug ste rgyal po zas gtsang ma la 'di skad ces smras so// rgyal po chen po rgyal bar spyon cig/
82a3(mdo sde): rgyal bar spyon cig/ sku tshe ring bar srungs shig/ mchos bzhin du rgyal po mdzod cig/ de nas rgyal po zas gtsang mas drang srong nag po la yon chu dang / rkang pa la gtor ba'i chus mchod pa
82a4(mdo sde): byas te/ shin tu legs par yongs su bkur nas stan la bdar to// de stan la bde bar du 'dug par shes nas/ rjes dang bcas/ gus pa dang bcas par 'di skad ces smras so// drang srong
82a5(mdo sde): sngon mthong bar mi dran na/ 'dir ci la byon/ ci zhig bzhed/ de skad ces smras pa dang / drang srong nag pos rgyal po zas gtsang ma la 'di skad ces smras so// rgyal po chen po khyod kyi sras zhig
82a6(mdo sde): bltams par gyur pa de blta zhing bdag 'dir mchis so// rgyal pos smras pa/ drang srong chen po gzhon nu nyal zhing mchis kyis langs kyi bar du cung zad cig gzhes shigs drang srong gis
82a7(mdo sde): smras pa rgyal po chen po skyes bu chen po de lta bu ni ring por mi nyal te/ skyes bu dam pa de dag ni sad par gnas pa'i ngang tshul can no// dge slong dag de nas byang chub sems dpa'
82b1(mdo sde): rlung srong nag pod la snying bsre bzhi bar bzung ste sad pa'i brda byas so// de nas rgyal po bas gtsang mas gzhon nu don thams cad rtsub pa lag pa gnyis kyis shin tu legs par blangs te dang /
82b2(mdo sde): srong nag pa'i drung du khyer ro// de nas drang srong nag pos/ byang chub sems dpa' bltas na/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum ducu rtsa gnyis dang ldan zhing dpe byad bzang po brgyad chus legs par
82b3(mdo sde): rnam par sbas pa'i lus dang ldan pa/ brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba las 'phags pa'i lus can/ nyi ma brgya phrag stong las kyang lhag pa'i gzi brjid dang ldan pa yan
82b4(mdo sde): lag thams cad du mdzes pa mthong nas kye ma 'jig rten du ngo mtshar gyis gang zag 'di byung ngo // kye ma 'jig rten du ngo mtshar chen po dang ldan pa'i gang zag 'di byung ngo zhes/ ched du brjod pa rjed
82b5(mdo sde): du brjod nas stan las langs te/ thal mo sbyar nas byang chub sems dpa'i rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal te bskor ba byas nas byang chub sems dpa' bang du blangs te/ sems shing 'dug
82b6(mdo sde): par gyur to// de nas des byang chub sems dpa'i lus la skyes bu chen po'o mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis yod pa mthong ste/ de dag dang ldan pa'i skyes bu gang zag de rnam pa gnyis su 'gyur gyi gzhan du
82b7(mdo sde): ni mi 'gyur ro// gal te khyim na gnas na ni mtha' bzhi la dbang ba'i 'khor lo skur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur te zhes bya ba nas/ snga ma bzhin du dbang phyug gi dbang gis rgyal srid byed do// zhes bya ba'i
83a1(mdo sde): bar du 'gyur ba dang / gal te khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung na ni/ de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur te/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su grags pa 'dren pa/
83a2(mdo sde): gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog par 'gyur ba mthong nas/ des de lta bur mthong ba dang mchi ma blags te/ ngus nas shugs ring du byung ba dang / rgyal po zas gtsang mas drang srong de mchi ma blags te ngus nas//
83a3(mdo sde): shugs ring du 'byin par mthong nas/ rdzangs te mi dga' zhing rings pa rings par drang srong chen po de la smras pa/ drang srong de ltar bshums shing blags te bshums pa dang / shugs ring du 'byin pa ci/
83a4(mdo sde): zhig nongs gzhon nu 'di la mi dge ba'am cig mi gda' 'am/ de skad ces smras pa dang / drang srong chen po nag pos rgyal po zas gtsang ma la 'di skad ces smras so// rgyal po chen po bdag ni/
83a5(mdo sde): gzhon nu'i slad du ngu ba yang ma lags/ 'di la mi dge ba yang gang yang ma mchis te/ bdag nyid du bar bas so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ rgyal po chen po bdag ni rgas shing 'khogs te/ nas gzer
83a6(mdo sde): la gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa 'di ni gdon mi 'tshal bar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/ bla na med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo dge sbyong ngam/
83a7(mdo sde): bram ze 'am/ lha 'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am/ gzhan sus kyang rung ste/ 'jig rten du chos dang mthun par bskor bar mi nus pa skor bar 'gyur ro// lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten
83b1(mdo sde): sman pa dang / bde pa'i spang du tsham ston par 'gyur tetshangs par spyod pa/ thos ma dge ba par dge ba/ bram dge ba'i tsham ngon pabang po/ cig 'brubabyung go/ sa 'dres pa/
83b2(mdo sde): yongs su rdzogs pa/ yongs su dag pa/ yongs su byang ba'i mthar byin pa'i chos yang dag par ston par 'gyur ro// sems can skye ba'i chos can dag 'di las chos de thos nas/ rtse ba las
83b3(mdo sde): yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin du sems can rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa'i/
83b4(mdo sde): chos can rnams ni rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams las yongs su 'grol
83b5(mdo sde): bar 'gyur// sems can 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi mes gdungs pa rnams la ni dam pa'i chos kyi char pas sim par mdzad par 'gyur/ sems can lta ba ngan pa sna chog
83b6(mdo sde): 'thibs pos khebs pa la mgol bar zhugs pa rnams ni/ lam drang por mya ngan las 'das par 'dren par 'gyur/ sems can 'khor ba'i dra ba dang / btson rar 'khod cing nyon mongs pa'i
83b7(mdo sde): 'ching bas bcings pa rnams ni/ bcings pa las yongs su grol bar mdzad par 'gyur/ sems can mi shes pa'i mun pa dang / rab rib dang / ling tog gis mig ldongs pa rnams la
84a1(mdo sde): ni shes rab kyi mig skyed par 'gyur/ sems can nyon mongs pa'i zug pa rnams la ni// zug rngu 'byin par 'gyur te/ rgyal po chen po 'di lta ste/ dper na/ u dum
84a2(mdo sde): wa ra'i me tog ni brgya la brgya lam na 'jig rten du 'byung ngo // rgyal po chen po de bzhin du bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig mang por brgya la brgya lam na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
84a3(mdo sde): 'jig rten du 'byung ste/ de ltar gzhon nu 'di ni nges par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang
84a4(mdo sde): sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho'i pha rol tu sgrol bar 'gyur zhing / 'chi ba med pa la rab tu gzhog par 'gyur la/ bdag gis ni sangs rgyas dkon mchog de mi mthong ba dang /
84a5(mdo sde): bdag ni nad ma mchis pa 'di las 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur te/ rgyal po chen po bdag ni de'i slad du ngu zhing mi dga' bas shugs ring du 'byin pa lags so// rgyal po chen po bdag cag gi bstan
84a6(mdo sde): bcos las 'byung ba lta na ni/ gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa yang khab na bzhugs par mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar rgyal po chen po// gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa 'di na
84a7(mdo sde): skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa ste/ sum cu rtsa gnyis gang zhe na/ rgyal po chen po 'di lta ste/ gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa ni dbu'i gtsug tor dang ldan pa ste/ rgyal po
84b1(mdo sde): chen po gzhon nu don thams ca grub pa ni skyes bu chen po'i mtshan dang po 'di dang ldan no// rgyal po chen po gzhon nu don thams cad rtsub pa ni dbu klung bil ba cag pa'i 'gro dang / ma ba'i mgrin pa ltar
84b2(mdo sde): mthon mthong du grub cing lung lor 'khril ba g.yas su 'khyil ba dang / dpral ba'i dbyes mnyam pa lags so// rgyal po chen po gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa'i smin mtshams su mdzod spu byas pa ni/
84b3(mdo sde): kha ba dang / dngul gyi mdog ltar mchis pa lags so// rgyal po chen po gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa ni spyan gyi rdzim pa'i lta bu dang / spyan dkar gnag 'byes pa dang / tshems bzhi bsu mnyam pa/
84b4(mdo sde): dang tshems thags bzang ba dang / tshems shin tu dkar ba dang ldan pa lags so// rgyal po chen po gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa ni tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang ro bro ba'i mchog dang ldan pa dang /
84b5(mdo sde): ljags shin tu ring zhing srab pa dang / 'gram pa seng ge'i 'dra ba dang / dpung mgo shin tu sdum pa dang / mdun mtho ba dang / thal gong rgyas pa dang / pags pa srab cing mdog gser 'dra ba dang
84b6(mdo sde): bzhengs bzhin du ma btud par phyag pus mor slebs pa dang / ro stod seng ge'i lta bu dang ldan pa lags so// rgyal po chen po gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa ni/ shing n+ya gro d+ha ltar chu zheng gab pa dang /
84b7(mdo sde): sU re re nas skye ba dang / yan lag gi spu g.yas phyogs nas gyen du 'khyil ba dang / mdoms kyi sra ba sbubs su nub pa dang / b.rarla legs par zlum pa dang / byin pa ri dgas kyis rgyal po en ya'i/
85a1(mdo sde): lta bu dang / sor mo ring ba dang / zhabs kyi rting pa yangs pa dang / zhabs kyi gong mthong ba dang phyag dang zhabs kyi mthil mnyam pa dang / phyag dang zhabs kyi sor mo nga
85a2(mdo sde): bam 'brel ba dang ldan pa lags so// rgyal po chen po gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa'i zhabs kyi 'og gi mthil gnyis la 'khor lo re re skyes pa ni bzang zhing thibs stongs dang ldan pa mu khyud dang bcas
85a3(mdo sde): lte ba dang bcas pa lags so// rgyal po chen po gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa ni zhabs mnyam zhing shin tu gnas pa dang ldan pa lags so// rgyal po chen po gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa ni skyes bu chen po'i
85a4(mdo sde): mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis po 'di dag dang ldan no// rgyal po chen po// mtshan gyi rnam pa de lta bu dag ni 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po la mi 'byung ste/ mtshan de lta bu dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la
85a5(mdo sde): 'byung ngo // rgyal po chen po gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa'i sku la dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu mchis te/ de dag dang ldan pas gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa ni khab na bzhugs par mi 'gyur gyi// gdon
85a6(mdo sde): mo 'tshal bar rab tu 'byung ba'i don tu mngon par 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rgyal po chen po/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu po de dag gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rgyal po chen po gzhon nu don thams cad dru
85a7(mdo sde): pa ni sen mor mtho ba dang / sen mo zangs kyi mdog lta bu dang / sen mo mdog sdum pa dang / sor mo rnams zlum pa dang sor mo rnams rgyas pa dang sor mo byin gyis phra ba dang
85b1(mdo sde): mas pa dang / yang du ma mngon pa dang / tshigs mi mngon pa dang / gsum na man mamanyam pas sachis padang/ bas rtsong ba yangs pa dang ldan pa 'gas so// na
85b2(mdo sde): gzhon nu do thams cad chub pa ni byag ga mo mtshungs pa dang ldan zhing phyug gar mo mdangs yod pa dang / phyag ga mo rab pa dang / phyag gir mol yongs gyur ba dang zug gar ma
85b3(mdo sde): 'tshams pa dang / spos bim pa ltar dmar ba dang / grA mi drag nga'i tshog dang / ljags mchen zhing 'jam la zangs kyi mdog sngar 'dug pa dang glang po che'i nga ro dang 'brug pa ga dang ldan pa
85b4(mdo sde): dang snyan cing 'jam pa dang ldan pa lags so// rgyal po chen po// gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa ni dpe byad bzang po yongs su rdzogs pa 'o/ phyag ring ba dang / bu'i nabaza' ga tsang mthun
85b5(mdo sde): sum tshogs pa dang / su 'jam pa dang / bskyengs pa mi mnga' ba'i sku dang / zhum pa mi mnga' ba'i sku dang / rim par 'tsham pa'i sku dang / shin tu sra bar mdzes pa'i sku dang / rnam par lags
85b6(mdo sde): par grub pa'i sku dang / pus mo'i ldang yangs shing rgya che la shin tu gang ba dang ldan pa lags so// rgyal po chen po gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa ni su zlum pa dang ldan pa rtse/ su shin tu 'jam pa
85b7(mdo sde): dang sru ya lo ma mchis pa dang klu rim gyis legs par grub pa dang / lte ba zab pa dang / lte ba ma g.yo ba dang / lte ba rim gyis gzhol ba dang / drang srong ltar gtsang sbras spyod pa dang //
86a1(mdo sde): kun nas mdzes pa dang / snang ba dam pa shin tu rnam par dag cing rab rib ma mchis pa'i 'od kun nas 'byung ba dang ldan pa lags so// rgyal po chen po/ gnon nu don thams
86a2(mdo sde): cad grub pa ni/ glang po ltar dal ba'i 'gros dang / seng ge'i stabs lta bu'i 'gros dang / khyu mchog gi stabs lta bu'i 'gros dang / ngang pa'i stabs lta bu'i 'gros dang g.yas phyogs su mdzes
86a3(mdo sde): par 'khor ba'i 'gros dang / dku zlum pa dang / dku skabs phyin pa dang / dku ma rmongs pa dang / rked pa gzhu'i chang zungs ltar bra ba dang / mdog gi nyes pa sngo ba 'am/ gnag pa'i skyon dang bral/
86a4(mdo sde): ba'i bu dang ldan pa lags so// rgyal po chen po gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa ni/ mche ba zlum pa dang / mche ba rno ba dang / mche ba byin gyis phra ba dang shangs legs par mtho ba dang / spyan
86a5(mdo sde): gsal ba dang / spyan dri ma med pa dang / 'dzum pa'i spyan dang ldan pa dang / spyan ring ba dang / spyan yangs pa dang / ut+pal sngon po lta bu'i spyan dang ldan pa lags so// rgyal po chen po
86a6(mdo sde): gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa ni sprin ma'i spu mnyam pa dang / phrin ma stug pa dang / smin ma gnag pa dang / rmin ma rgyun chags pa dang / smin ma rim gyis gzhol ba dang / mgur brgyas
86a7(mdo sde): pa dang / mkhur ba mi mnyam pa med pa dang mkhur ba skyon dang bral ba dang / sdang ba dang khro ba'i mdog med pa dang shin tu rigs pa'i dbang po dang ldan pa lags so// rgyal po chen po
86b1(mdo sde): sa / nga bya da hA/ sma /
86b2(mdo sde): mnam dang / dbum tshamam pa mnas bsho pa nga / darnam ma 'dzi pa dang / dbus byon gyis pa par 'gyis pa dang na
86b3(mdo sde): na mas la rtsub pa mas dpal gyi 'ang bab gyis dang gsung da khyim pa dang / kyimam sa na dang na ga
86b4(mdo sde): 'di da na gam nu na thams cad thub pa'i babyung bzang po brgyad su de dag dang rtan pas gzhin nu na thams cad thub ba nI laban bzhugs par mi 'byung 'i/ nam 'dul ba
86b5(mdo sde): 'byung ba'i slad du mngon par 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ de nas rgyal po zas gtsang mas drang srong nag po las gzhon nu'i lung bstan pa de thos nas/ tshim ning mgul mi'angs
86b6(mdo sde): rab tu dpa' zhing dga' ba dang / yid bde bskyes nas/ rkan las langs te/ byang chub sems dpa'i rkang pa gnyis la bag 'tshal nas/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di sbas so// rtsod la /
86b7(mdo sde): kun phyag 'tshal zhing drang srong rnams kyis mchod gyur te/ 'jig rten kun gyis mchod rten pas/ bdag kyang khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// dge slong dag de ltar rgyal po bas gtsang mam
87a1(mdo sde): drang srong chen po nag po snag gi tsha bo mis byin dang bcas te/ kha zas tshul dang 'dra bas tshim par byas nas/ gos bskon te/ bskor ba byas so//
87a2(mdo sde): nas drang srong chen po nag po gnas de nyid nas rdzu 'phrul gyis nam mkha' las rang gi gnas ga la ba der song ngo // de nas drang srong chen po nag pos bram ze'i khye'u mis byin la 'di skad ces
87a3(mdo sde): smras so// mis byin khyod kyis nam sangs rgyas 'jig rten du byung ngo zhes thos pa de'i tshe khyod song ste de'i bstan pa la rab tu byung shig dang / de ni khyod kyi yun ring po'i don dang / phan pa dang
87a4(mdo sde): bde bar 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ lha yi tshogs rnams nam mkha'i ngos la gnas te sangs rgyas sgra sgrogs pa// lha yi drang srong nag po ri sul gnas pas mthong nas dga' mchog thob//
87a5(mdo sde): 'di na srog chags rnams kyi dga' skyes sangs rgyas zhes bya'i tshig 'di ci// bdag gi lus kyang rab mi gyur cing sems bde mchog tu zhi bar gyur// lha 'am 'on te lha min yang na nam mkha' lding
87a6(mdo sde): ngam mi 'am ci// sangs rgyas zhes bya dga' dang mos byed tshig 'di sngon chad ma thos ci// lha yi mig gis phyogs bcur ri dang sa dang rgya mtsho rnams la bltas// phyis yangs ri mtsho la rmad du byung ba
87a7(mdo sde): rnam pa sna tshogs mthong // 'od gsal mdzes pa lus la sim byed 'di ni rab tu bzang snang zhing / ji ltar ri yi rtse mo rnams su byi ru'i myu gu mthon gyur la/ shing ljon rnams kyang me tog bza
87b1(mdo sde): rgyas sna tshogs 'bras bum brgyan myur las/ srid pa gsum du dkon mchog dam pa myur du 'byung bar shin tu gas la// sa 'di thams cad mnyam zhing dri med lag mthil bzhin du srung bdud
87b2(mdo sde): rnams dga' zhing nam mkha'i dkyil na gos kyi g.yab mo 'byin gyur la/ klurgyal rgya mamo'i gnas kyi seng na rin rkyen rmang zung 'phro ba las/ 'jam bu'i gling du rgyal ba'i dkon mchog sa kyi
87b3(mdo sde): 'byung gnas ngas par 'byung / ngan song zhi zhing sdug bsngal bral te sems can rnams ni bder ldan la/ lha mi tshogs rnams nam mkha'i dkyil la dgra' dang ldan par tu ba dang / ji ka
87b4(mdo sde): yi glu dbyangs sgra snyan yid du 'ong ba grags pa las srid pa gsum 'dir dkon mchog 'byung 'gyur de yi bltas su gdon mi za/ 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir drang srong nag pas lha yi mig gis rnam
87b5(mdo sde): bltas na/ ser skya'i gnas na rgyal po zas gtsang grong khyer dam pa yod pa der// mthu chen mthu ldan mtshan dang bsod nams ga bi brjid rgyas pa btsas pa mthong / mthong nas dga' mgu ra
87b6(mdo sde): shing bde ba'i yid skyes mthu yang skyes par gyur// de nas ngo mtshar rnyed de rang gi slob ma lhan cig rings su dong // phyin nas ser skyar brjod pa'i rgyal po'i grong khyer mchog gi sgor 'dug ste/ rnam
87b7(mdo sde): ring srog chags bye ba khrag khrig mang po drang srong des mthong nas// sgo ba de la smras pa chab sgor drang srong phyin ces myur du gsol// de mnyan myur du pho brang nang byin rgyal po la ni de bskrad pa// lha
88a1(mdo sde): cig drang srong rgan 'khogs dka' thub chen po can cig chab skor mchis// drang srong mchog de rgyal po'i pho brang nang du mchi bar dga' zhes mchi// rgyal po chen po nang
88a2(mdo sde): du gtang ngam mi gtang ba dag la bka' stsa la gsol// de nas de yi stan bting rgyal pos khyod song nang du thong zhes bsgo/ drang srong nag pos sgo ba'i tshig thos dga' mgu bde dang ldan par gyur/
88a3(mdo sde): skom pa bsil ba'i chu 'dod bkres pas gdungs pa zas la mos par ltar// drang srong dam pa de yang sems can mchog de mthong du mngon par dga'// rgyal po rgyal gyur sku tshe ring bsrung gsol/
88a4(mdo sde): zhes dga' bas de skad smras// snyan par brjod nas yid dul dbang po zhi zhing nges pa stan la 'dug/ rgyal pos gus par smra byas drang srong thub pa de la tshig brjod pa// rgyal po'o bo brang 'dir
88a5(mdo sde): byon rgyu cig thub pas bdag la myur du gsungs// khyod kyi sras bltams gzungs mchog pha rol phyin cing gzi brjid che dang ldan// mthu chen mtshan rab sum cu gnyis kyis kun nas brgyan
88a6(mdo sde): mnga' ba// rgyal po khyod sras thams cad don grub de ni mthong bar bdag dga' ste// de smad 'dir mchis rgyal po bdag la 'tshal ba gzhan ni yong ma mchis// legs so legs par byon
88a7(mdo sde): mnyel tam ma mnyel khyod mthong ba dag dga'o// mchog sbyin gzhon nu de nyal da ltar blta ba'i skabs ni ma mchis kyis// re shig yud tsam gzhes dang 'dir ni zla ba nya ba dri med pa// skar
88b1(mdo sde): ma rnams kyi brtan pa du ma mdzum sa zugs par 'gyu// gang mas kyud+hAm gam brnas pa'i 'ad sa pa de sa dag/ mamyal ba sa 'ong ga mas 'am las
88b2(mdo sde): grangs te// 'di la drang srong l+h+wa mas mchod pa gser mchog gzums ldan gamigs shig/ drang srong nas pos de yon dpa mangs pa 'khor ma'amatshan can mthongag/ de nas 'angs kyilal mo lda/
88b3(mdo sde): nas nang bganyis la phyag 'tshal te// bdas cad chen po brgyan bcas mkhas pas par du blangs nas bsams shing bsdus/ des nimathucan mthulda namargyan gyis mchog gis brtan dumasong bu
88b4(mdo sde): nas/ mgo cogs rig byed bstan bcos mkhas pas des ni de la rnam gnyis mthong // stobs ldan 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal lam sangs rgyas 'jig rten gtso bor 'gyur/ shin tu mi dga' lus
88b5(mdo sde): dang sems kyis mchi ma blags te shugs ring byung // rgyal po mchog kyang spangs par gyur nas bram ze si rmad pa shum sa zhes smras/ drang srong nag pos bdag gi den grub bgegs shig ma gzigs
88b6(mdo sde): sam drang srong ci smad pashums mdzad dge sdig gang gzigs bdag la med par gsungs// khyod sras don kun grub la bar chad sdig tu 'gyur ba ma mchis te// bdag la bdag nyid rgas shing 'di
88b7(mdo sde): ltar 'khogs par gyur ces mya ngan bgyid// 'di ni sangs rgyas 'jig rten mchog 'gyur chos kyang yang dag ston par 'gyur// bdag gis dga' ba thob pa'i yid kyis mi mthong ngo zhes de skad du/
89a1(mdo sde): 'das sbrul mtshan rab snyam cus gnyis dri ma mnga' ba las// rnam pa gnyis su 'gyur bgasum dum mchis rgyal po mkhyen par mdza/ gyu nga rnal thar
89a2(mdo sde): yang na sangs rgyas 'jig rten gtso bor byon// 'doni 'dod pa'i yon tan bzhed par mi 'gyur nges par sangs rgyas 'gyur// drang tshong lung bsan de thos rgyal po dga' zhing bdab thub par gyur/
89a3(mdo sde): nam langs te bal mo sbyar nas rkang pa gnyis la phyag kyang byas// stobs mchog ldan pa khyod ni las mchod drang srong rnams kyis bsngags pa ste// rmad gsumakun gyi 'gro ba'i dang dpon mchos
89a4(mdo sde): khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// drang srong dga' bas tsha bo de la smras pa yi gdams ngagatsun// gang tshe 'di ni byang chub sangs rgyas 'grol 'khor lo bsor thos pa// de tshe myur du thub pa'i bstan la rab byung
89a5(mdo sde): mya ngan 'das pa thob// drang srong dam pa de yis rkang la phyag 'tshal bskor ba byas nas ni// 'di 'dra'i sras mnga' khyod kyis thob pa rgya chen legs pa thob ces smras// 'di ni 'jig rten lha dang maur
89a6(mdo sde): bcas chos kyis tshim par mdzad par 'gyur// drang srong mchog de ser skya'i gnas nas byung nas bdag gnas dgon par phyin// 'phags pa rgya cher rol ba zhes bya
89a7(mdo sde): batheg pa chen po'i mdo// bam po drug pa/ dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' btsas ma thag tu lba'i bu dbang phyug chen pos/ gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams la
89b1(mdo sde): bos te/ 'di skad ces smras so// grogs po dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang brgal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med par yongs su sbyang ba byas pa/ sbyin pa dang
89b2(mdo sde): tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab dang // thabs dang / zos pa dang / spyod pa dang / brtul zhugs dang / dka' thub can/ spyad pa
89b3(mdo sde): legs par sdud ba/ byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang ldan pa/ btang snyoms kyis yang dag par 'phags pa'i blo can/ sems can thams cad la phan par
89b4(mdo sde): brtson pa/ brtson 'grus brtan pa'i go cha legs par bgos pa sngon gyi rgyal ba la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par byung ba bsod nams brgya'i mtshan gyis yang dag par brgyan pa rtul ba nges
89b5(mdo sde): par byas pa dang ldan pa/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs rab tu 'joms pa dag pa'i bsam pa shin tu dri ma med pa phun sum tshogs pa/ ye shes chen po'i tog gi rgyal mtshan can/ bdud kyi stobs
89b6(mdo sde): mthar 'byin pa stong gsum gyi ded dpon chen po// wa dang mis mchod pa/ mchod sbyin chen po'i mchod sbyin byas pa/ bsod nams kyi tshogs shin tu phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa
89b7(mdo sde): 'byung ba'i bsam pa can bye ba dang / rga ba dang / 'chi ba mthar 'byin pa/ legs par skye ba skye pa/ 'gro ba rnam par byang chub par byed pa de/ ze ram shing ba'i rgyal po'i rigs su byes
90a1(mdo sde): nas mi'i 'jig rten du byung ste/ de m+bAr du b+hA na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgyas chur sheg/ bdag cag de la phyag 'tshal ning
90a2(mdo sde): rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / mngon par bstod par bya ba'i phyir 'deng ngo // wa'i bung rgyal gyi zil gyis non pa gzhan dag kyang bdag cag byang chub sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal ba mthong
90a3(mdo sde): bdang / de dag kyang nga rgyal dang / dregs pa dang / rgyags pa gtong bar 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal zhing rim gro dang / bkur te byed par bya ba'i phyir 'dong ngo // don
90a4(mdo sde): lha'i bu de dag la yun ring po'i don dang / phan pa dang / bde ba dang / 'chi ba med pa 'thob pa'i bar du 'gyur ro// rgyal po zas gtsang ma rgyal ba 'phel ba yang rjes su bsgrags par 'gyur ro//
90a5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' yang de kho na'i lung bstan pas lung bstan te/ bdag cag phyir 'ong bar bya'o// de skad ces bsgo nas lha'i bu dbang phyug chen po// lha'i bu stong phrag bcu gnyis kyis yongs
90a6(mdo sde): su mor cing mdun du bdar nas ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po thams cad 'od kyis rgyas par bkang ste/ rgyal po zas gtsang mo'i pho brang ga la ba der song nas phyin pa dang / tho bas rgyal
90a7(mdo sde): po la gsol te/ rgyal pos gnang nas rgyal po'i pho brang du phyin te/ byang chub sems dpa'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bzar te/ lan brgya stong phrag sa
90b1(mdo sde): mang go babyas nas/ byung nabamams dpa' bang du blangs te/ rgyal poms gcang mdaga' bar bya ba phyir 'di sang pas smras so// rgyal ba can po byes pa dam pas rjes pa yangs/
90b2(mdo sde): de ba'i mang duzhe na/ rgyal po chen po byang chub sems dpa'i sumatshan dang dpe byung bzang pos legs par rtan pa dang / gnon nus pa dang / mi dang / wa ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig tun
90b3(mdo sde): kha dog dang / gzi brjid dang / grags po dang dpal gyis zil gyis non pa lags na/ rgyal po chen po byang chub sems dpa' ni gdon mi 'tshal bar/ blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs
90b4(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// dge slong dag de ltar lha'i bu dbang phyug chen po gnas gsung ma'i ris kyi skya'i bu mang po dang ldan cig tu byang chub sems
90b5(mdo sde): dpa' la mchod pa dang / rim gro chen po byas te/ de kho na'i lung bstan pas byang chub sems dpa' lung bstan nus phyir bdag gi gnas su song ngo // de la 'di skad ces byaste/ yon tan
90b6(mdo sde): rgya mtsho'i pha rom phyin pa de bskams pa/ lha yi dbang pos shes nas dga' te lha la smras// de thos 'gyur ba'ang bskal ba byed ma shin tu dga' rgyu sheg mi yi dbang po la mchod du 'deng /
90b7(mdo sde): rin can nor bus gtsug ni legs brgyan spyod lam ldan pa/ gtsug pud mdzes pa 'byung ba rnam par dag pa'i wa// stong zag bcu gnyis chang pa gser bya'o gnas mchog tu// myur du lhags nas rgyal
91a1(mdo sde): na pa sa sun /
91a2(mdo sde): sa nas dus
91a3(mdo sde): na bya na/ na yang na / da nga ga
