91a4(mdo sde): nga rdul na yangs ma / kharnams cad dag yod na mas seM gyur/ da ba kyi 'don sbyin tu na sa/ []
91a5(mdo sde): 'jamasatshan ldan pa 'byung ba'i gnas las nas// de gas ma lags kyi la chog sa lags rnam 'gyid// tsag mchim zeng drug padu k+Sha pa// ban kyi gan thosanas tha
91a6(mdo sde): dzu/ rgyal po sa rnams dang gag pan num pas/ khas par la la nga na pa'i sang du sa sa pa/ sa ga kyi btu lku gas// da
91a7(mdo sde): nang ngag segs ni mchis// de ga yon tan tshud la ma khyod kyis sbas sa ran// rdzu 'phrul de 'dra ba nam lag yang med// sobs pas mo b+har tis la 'di sar skragal
91b1(mdo sde): gnang gis khyed cag nang du bzhung du gsol// lag na phreng thogs de dag dga' mgu yi rangs te/ lha yi gnas dang 'dra ba'i rgyal po'i khyim du zhugs// lha mchog de dag khyim du phyin par mthong nas
91b2(mdo sde): ni rgyal po ldan las langs te thal mo sbyar byas te// rin chen rtsa ba can gyi khri ga ngan bshams pa 'dir// thugs brtse mdzad pa'i thugs kyis khyed cag bzhugs su gsol/ nga rtsal
91b3(mdo sde): dregs med de dag stan la 'khod par gyur// bdag cag ci rmad 'dir mchis rgyal po gsan du gsol// khyod sras rnam dag su mnga' bsod nams chen po bltams// shin tu legs pa
91b4(mdo sde): zhabs ldan bdag cag mthong bar 'tshal/ gang gi 'gro ba gang dang sbyor ba gang cir 'gyur// mtshan bzangs mtshan gyi cho ga dag ni bdag cag 'tshal// de bas rgyal po'i dam pa mi dgyes spang
91b5(mdo sde): bar mdzod// sna tshogs mtshan gyis yan lag brtsan pa blta bar 'tshal// rgyal po bud med tshogs kyis bskor ba de rab dga'// gzhon nu me yi 'od ltar 'bar ba bang du blangs// /
91b6(mdo sde): mchog gtsug bud 'brang ba dag ni nye bar bsnyen/ thog ma sgor byung stong gsum 'di dag kun tu g.yos// lha mchog de dag 'dren pa'i zhabs dang sen mo ni/ bangs mdog dri med nam dag
91b7(mdo sde): sru yi gzi mthong nas// gtsug pud 'phyang ba de dag myur du langs par gyur// dri ma med pa'i 'od kyi zhabs la mgos phyag 'tshal// 'di 'dra'i mtshan dang 'di 'drar lta bar dpal can dang //
92a1(mdo sde): 'di 'dra'i bsod nams gzi brjid lci gtsug mi mthong dang // mdzod spunas ni rgya chen 'od 'byung 'di 'dralas/ bdud rnams pam mdzad byang chub bcas 'gyur bdon/
92a2(mdo sde): mi 'tshal// mun sel nyon mongs bral ba'i yon tan brtags nas su// yang dag yon tan ji ltar don mthong de la bstod// skye dang rga dang 'chi nga nyon mongs dgra bsal ba'i// sems can
92a3(mdo sde): rin chen 'di ni ring por mi thogs 'byung // yongs tog 'dod chags yul gyi gtsub mas bskyed pa yi// rnam gsum mes ni srid gsum kun 'bar yongs gdungs par// dpal khyod ches
92a4(mdo sde): kyi sprin gyis stong gsum bkang nas ni// 'chi med char gyis nyon mongs gdung bzhi mdzad 'gyur// byams pa'i gsung mnga' thugs rje ldan pa 'jam pa'i gsung // tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs
92a5(mdo sde): yod 'ong gsung du sgrog mdzad pa// stong gsum kun tu go zhing 'gro ba gor 'gyur ba// bcom ldan 'das khyod kyis sangs rgyas gsung chen myur du sgrogs// srid pa'i 'dod chags bcing bying srid
92a6(mdo sde): pa'i cher gnas pa/ mu stegs can gyi tshogs ngan log par lta ba bcom// khyod kyi rgyu la brten dang stong pa'i chos thos nas// seng gis wa tshegs bzhin du de dag 'byer bar 'gyur/
92a7(mdo sde): mongs chen po'i du ba ma rigs bsgribs bsal te// kun tu 'byung ba skye ba nges par snang byed pa'o// ye shes rab 'od rigs gzigs pa yis// 'gro ba kun gyi mun pa chen po bsal bar
92b1(mdo sde): gsol/ gang du sems cad dag pa rmad byung 'di 'dra byung // lga dang mi rnams kyi ni rnyed pa rgya chen thog/ rnam par rtogs par mdzad pa'i sems can rin chen 'dis// / ngan song lam bcad pa
92b2(mdo sde): mi lam ni btod par 'gyur// ser bya'i gnas su lA li me tog char 'phrab nas// bskor ba byas te gus par bstod pa byas nas ni// sangs rgyas sangs rgyas legs shes de dag tshig brjod cing /
92b3(mdo sde): zhwa tshogs de dag rdul du shes par mkha' la dong // bsnams pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// / dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' gang gi nub mo bcas pa de nyid kyi nu
92b4(mdo sde): mo/ rgyal rigs dang / bram ze dang / khyim bdag gi rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu rnams su bu mo nyi khri btsas par gyur te/ de dag thams cad kyang de dag gi pha ma rnams kyis byang chub sems
92b5(mdo sde): dpa' la rim gro ba pa dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir phul lo// rgyal po zas gtsang mas kyang bu mo nyi khri byang chub sems dpa' la rim gro bya ba dang / bstan bkur bu ba'i phyir phul lo// mjas
92b6(mdo sde): bshes dang / blon po dang / nyedu dung drug gi gnyen mtshams dag gis kyang byang chub sems dpa' la rim gro bu bdung / bsnyen bdun bya ba'i phyir bum tsa khri phul lo// blon par 'bor ma
92b7(mdo sde): kyis kyang byang chub sems dpa' la rim gro dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir/ bu mo 'o khri phul lo// dge slong dag de'i tshe shAkya'i chan rabs rgan rabs rnams 'dus nas/ rgyal po bas
93a1(mdo sde): gtsang ma la 'di skad ces sbas so// lha mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/ gzhon nu 'di ni lha khang du bkur bar bgyi'o// rgyal pos smras pa/ gzhon nu de ltar bkur ba leg/
93a2(mdo sde): kyis de bas na/ grong khyer ni brgyan par gyis shig/ srang dang / lam gyi bzhi mdo dang / tshong dus dag ni mdzes par gyis shig/ bkra mi shis pa dang / sgur po dang / zhar ba dang / 'on pa
93a3(mdo sde): dang lkugs pa dang / dbyiza mi mdzes pa dang / gzugs mi mdzes pa dang / dbang po ma tshang ba rnams ni sol cig/ bkra shis pa rnams kyang sogs shig/ bsod nams kyi rnga ni brdungs shig/
93a4(mdo sde): bkra shis kyi dril ni dkrol cig/ grong khyer dam pa'i sgo ni rgyan gyis legs par sdud cig/ rol mo sil sman dang / pheg brdob pa shin tu yid du 'ong ba dag ni long zhing rdobs shig/ khams kyi rgyal
93a5(mdo sde): po thams cad ni sogs shig/ tshong dpon dang / khyim bdag dang / blon po dang / bro ba dang / 'khor gyi mi dag ni gcig tu sdus shig/ bu mo'i shing rta ni shoms shig/ bum pa gang ba
93a6(mdo sde): rnams ni snyan cig/ bram ze kha ton pa rnams ni sdus shig/ lha khang rnams ni shin tu brgyan par gyis shig/ dge slong dag de nas rgyal pos ji skad bsgo ba de bzhin du thams cad sbyar ba dang
93a7(mdo sde): de nas rgyal po zas gtsang ma rang gi khyim du song nas/ skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo go'u ta mI la bos te 'di skad ces smras so// gzhon nu lha khang du bkur gyis rgyan gyis legs par brgyan par gyis shi
93b1(mdo sde): zags so zhes skye bu'i bdag mo chen mogo'u ta mis de ltar mnyan te// gzhon nu brgyan gyis brgyan to// de nas gnon du de rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i chu bzhin 'dzum zhing khro gnyer med pas shi tu/
93b2(mdo sde): yang du 'ong ba'i tshog gos sku mo la smras pa/ ma bdus gang du bkur/ b+hAs p+pa/ bra lba ldang du ra ro/ de nas gzhon nus bzhin 'dzum te bgadanas phra mo gcigs su/
93b3(mdo sde): 'di byas pa/ bag sadu na so gsum 'don gams par gyur byi tshangs pa smraman po'i rgya chen po dang / mu de bzhin rnam zig bung dang gzhon nuyang srib dang ba sa stsal
93b4(mdo sde): gdugs te phyag 'tshal nas// de ring ma yis gang dra bdag pakar bgyi ba yi// wa gzhan bdag gis gong na 'phags pa gang zhig mchis// lha rnams kun las padaga' phags lha yis
93b5(mdo sde): 'as te/ bdag 'dra'i lnga yang ma mchis song mig la mchis// 'on kyang 'jig rten rjes brtsags tsam du bdag ma ma// bdag gi rnam 'phrul skya bos mthong na dgar 'gyur
93b6(mdo sde): ma b+h+yo racigs bar bgyid 'gyur la// rnams 'din 'i lwa zhes rig par 'gyur/ dge slong dag de par grub cir nga gzhan na'i kying ba gams te can gyis bcan na
93b7(mdo sde): na semamams dpagasas / rgyal pa bas gtsangams zhin nu pang du blangs nas/ zam ze dang / zang la pa dang / tsho ngo dang / khyim bdam dang / na pa
94a1(mdo sde): khams kyi rgyal po dang / so ba dang / 'khor ni mi dang mnga' ba shes dang / nye dus bkor te/ zung dang / lam chi bzhi mdo dang / zlum mdo pa/
94a2(mdo sde): tshong dus rgyan tshad med pas brgyan pa dag byas nas bdug spos dri zhim pos ni gdugs me tog sil ma ni gtor/ rta dang glang po che drung shing rta dang / rkang thang gi phun long
94a3(mdo sde): ni cher gyur gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan ni bsgreng sil spyan sna tshogs kyi sgra ni phyung ste song bar gyur to// de'i tshe lha brda skyong dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i
94a4(mdo sde): shing rta drangs te/ lha'i bu mo bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas nam mkha'i dkyil nas me tog gi char bab ste/ sil snyan gyi sgra 'byin par gyur to// dge slong dag de ltar rgyal po zas gtsang
94a5(mdo sde): mas rgyal po'i bkod pa chen po dang / rgyal po'i phun sum tshogs pa chen po dang / rgyal po'i byin chen pos gzhon nu de khyer te lha khang du phyin to// de nas byang chub sems
94a6(mdo sde): dpas lha khang der rkang pa g.yas pa'i mthil bzhag pa dang / de nas lha'i gzugs sems med pa de dag 'di lta ste/ gu lang dang / skem byed dang / lus ngan dang / zla ba dang / nyi ma
94a7(mdo sde): dang rnam thos kyi bu dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba la sogs pa'i gzugs thams cad kyang rang rang gis gnas nas langs te byang chub sems
94b1(mdo sde): dpa'i dang pa la phyag 'tshal bar gyur to// de'i tshe lha dang / mi brgya song ni ma a la la zhes bya ba dang sa co dang / gzhi'i sgra brgya stong mang po 'byin par gyur to// ser ba'i
94b2(mdo sde): gnas kyi grong khyer chen po dam pa de thams cad kyang rnam pa drug tu g.yos so// lha'i me tog gi char yang mngon par bab bo// lha'i sil sman brgya song du ma dgra kyang ma dgrol bar sgra 'byin pa
94b3(mdo sde): gyur to// lha gang dag gi gzugs gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang rang rang gi gzugs bstan nas/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smra bar gyur to// r-i rgyal 'iri mdog ri rab nam yang spangs /
94b4(mdo sde): 'phrul phyag mi 'tshal/ na mdzo ga rnga ga nas ni nam yang brjes rgyal phyug mi 'jal/ mi mra 'ong byed srin bu ma khyer 'od byed de la phyag mi 'tshal/ bsod nams shes rab rigs byung lag sa
94b5(mdo sde): rngaldan phra rnams gang la'ang phyag mi bkres yangs 'grub rjes chu dang min bram khyer 'dra bar gyur ba nA~M/ thang gsum 'din lha mi gang yang ru / bsngal banas pa lags/ rab
94b6(mdo sde): blangadra ba 'i 'i rten rang byung dam pa ste/ de la 'jig rten phyag 'tshal ba ni mtho ris mya ngan 'das bathob// byang chub sems dpa' mkhang duzugs pa de bstan pa'o/ kwa'i thub tu stong
94b7(mdo sde): ma bu mra kyis kyis thun med pa yang dag pa pags pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur to// dge slong das byang rgyasems dpa' rtsa yang sa khyer ba'i bcang snyoms su bags pa
95a1(mdo sde): na/ su
95a2(mdo sde): 'char 'go ba'i pha/ bram ze lnga brgya tsam gyis bskor te/ skar ma me bzhi 'das nas nag pa la bab pa'o/ la be zas ma drung du
95a3(mdo sde): mkhyen par mdzad du gsol// da ni gzhon nu'i rgyan mdzad pa'i rigs so// rgyal pos smras pa/ legs kyis byed du nus shes de'i ba
95a4(mdo sde): tsam gyis/ rgyan gyi rnam pa lnga brgya tsam byed du bcug ste/ 'di ltar lag pa'i rgyan dag dang / rkang pa'i rgyan dag dang / ye'i rkyen ras dang du se
95a5(mdo sde): ngag dang / na rgyan dag dang / dpung can dag dang gser gyi ga rags dag dang / gser srang dag dang / dril bu g.yer ka'i rwa bdag dang / rin pa dus sa
95a6(mdo sde): byas pa ga dang / do sham rin po che sna tshogs kyi can bdag dang / gadra ba rgyan can dgu dang / mgul gdub dag dang / med pan dam kyang nga dus
95a7(mdo sde): dang ldan pa'i cha/ shAkya de dag rgyal po thas gcang ma'i drung du dong nas 'di skad ces smras so// lha gzhon nu rgyan du gsol// rgyal pas sbas pa/ khyod kyis pa me dus
95b1(mdo sde): mchod pa bras pa chog gis ngas gzhon nu'i rgyan thams cad byed du bcug go/ sbas pa bdag cag gis rgyan 'di dag gzhon nu'i gru la gdugs mtshan bdun zhig tu gdags su gsol/ des
95b2(mdo sde): gnang na bdag cag gis sug las bgyis pa yang don mchis par 'gyur ro// de'i tshe na mnangs te/ nyi ma shar ba dang byang chub sems dpa' phyed mos tshal bkod padri ma med pa zhes bya ba de
95b3(mdo sde): zhugs so// de'i tshe skye dbu'i bdag mo chen mo go'u ta mi byang chub sems dpa' bang du blangs so// bud med brgyad khris kyang byang chub sems dpa' bsu s+ye gdong du lta zhing 'khod par gyur to//
95b4(mdo sde): bu mo stong phrag bcus byang chub sems dpa' bsu ste gdong du lta zhing 'khod par gyur to// shAkya stong phrag bcus byang chub sems dpa' bsu ste gdong du la zhing 'khod par gyur to// bram ze
95b5(mdo sde): lnga stong yang lpags nas byang chub sems dpa'i gdong dug shing 'khod par gyur to// de nas shAkya'i rgyal po bzang po zhes bya bas rgyan ji skad cig byas pa de dag byang chub sems dpa'i lus
95b6(mdo sde): la btags te ka de dag lus la btags ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyi 'od kyis mog mog por gyur nas/ lha ma mer ma gur/ ldan nur mgyurawang nger ma gyur te/ 'dis
95b7(mdo sde): dper na/ 'jam bu'i chu bo'i gser mi gan du skrag tsha'i yug gzhag na lham mer mi rung / ldan ner mi rung spang nger mi rung ngo // de bzhin du can de dag thams cad byang chub sems
96a1(mdo sde): dpa'i lus kyi 'od kyis phog na lham mer ma rung / ldan ner ma rung / lgang nger ma rung ngo // de bzhin du rgyan gyis rnam pa gang dang gang byang chub sems dpa'i lus la
96a2(mdo sde): btags pa de dang de dag mog mog por gyur te/ 'di lta ste dper na 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser gyi gan du stug tsha'i yug bzhag pa bzhin no// de'i tshe skyed mos tshal gyi lha mo dri ma med pa zhes bya ba
96a3(mdo sde): 'dug pa des lus chen po bstan nas mdun du 'dug ste/ rgyal po zas gtsang ma dang / shAkya'i tshogs de dag la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ stong gsum sa 'di grong khyer grong rdal bcas
96a4(mdo sde): pa kun gal te gser gyis gang khyab dri med mdzes gyur kyang / 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser gzegs gcig gis zil rlag ste/ gser gzhan dag ni dpal dang bral zhing bsal mo gyur// sa
96a5(mdo sde): 'di mtha' dag 'dzam bu'i gling gi gser khebs kyang / 'dren pa dpal rgyas spu khung 'od phyung zil gyis non// mi snang mi gsal mi mdzes 'od kyang nyams gyur cing / bde gshegs skyob pa'i drung
96a6(mdo sde): du snag tsha bzhin du 'gyur// yon tan brgyas gang 'di ni rang gi gzi yis brgyan de ni rgyan gyis mdzes min shin tu dri med sku nyi zla'i 'od dang skar ma nor bu me dag dang brgya byin tshangs pa'i 'od
96a7(mdo sde): kyang dpal stag mdun mi bsal// gang sku sngon gyi dge ba'i 'bras bu sa mtshan spras pa/ de la gzhan gyis byas pa'i rgyan pha la ci zhig dgos// rgyan rnams grol 'or mi mkhas mkhas mdzod ma
96b1(mdo sde): gtso shig/ blo gros mchog mdzad 'di ni bcos ma'i rgyan mi bzhed// 'dun pa 'di ni rgyal khab sras dang lhan cig btsas/ dri med rab tu mdzes pa'i rgyan rnams 'brangs te rtsol// shakya'i rigs ni
96b2(mdo sde): rgya chen mchog tu 'gyur snyam nas shAkya dag ni yid dga' mgu zhing ngo mtshar gyur// lha mo des de skad smras nas/ lha'i me tog dag gis byang chub sems dpa' de la mngon par gtor te
96b3(mdo sde): nyid du mi snang bar gyur to// rgyan gyis le'u ste dgu pa'o// / dge slong dag de ltar gzhon nu de ya zad skyes pa dang / bkra shrIs brgya stong byas nas/ khye'u stong phrag bcu dang
96b4(mdo sde): bu mo stong phrag bcus yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te yi ge'i grwar 'jug par byas so// bza' ba dang / bca' ba dang / myang bas gang ba'i shing rta stong phrag bcu dang / gser dngul dang
96b5(mdo sde): dbyig gis gang ba'i shing rta stong phrag bcu drangs te/ ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po'i srang dang / grong bar dang / tshong dus kyi phyogs gang yin pa dag tu gtor to// mngon par byin no//
96b6(mdo sde): sil snyan 'bum phrag brgyad kyi sgra yang phyung zhing me tog gi char chen po yang mngon par bab po// stegs bu dang / sgo khang dang / rta babs dang / bar khung drung / bsil khang da
96b7(mdo sde): khang pa brtsegs pa dang / khang bzangs dag gi steng nas bu mo brgya stong rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa dag/ byang chub sems dpa' la lta zhing me tog dag 'thor bar gyur to// lha'i bu mo stong phrag
97a1(mdo sde): brgyad ni rgyan thams cad kyis lkug lhug por brgyan te/ rin po chen bzang byed thogs nas lam 'phyag cing / byang chub sems dpa'i mdun nas dong bar gyur to// lha dang /
97a2(mdo sde): klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyang lus phyed phyung zhing nam mkha'i dkyil nas me tog dang / dar gyi wa
97a3(mdo sde): rdzi 'bre bar gyur to// shAkya'i tshogs thams cad kyang rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i mdun du bdar nas byang chub sems dpa'i mdun nas 'dong bar gyur te/ bkod pa'i rnam pa 'di lta bu 'dis byang
97a4(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' yi ge'i grwar zhugs par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' yi ge'i grwar zhugs ma thag tu/ de nas byis pa'i slob dpon kun gyi bshes gnyen zhes bya bas/ byang chub sems dpa'i dpa'//
97a5(mdo sde): dang gzi brjid ma bzod de/ kha bub du 'gyel to// de ltar 'gyel ba dga' ldan gyi rigs kyi lha'i bu yan lag bzang po zhes bya bas mthong nas lag pa g.yas pa'i bteg ste blang ngo // blangs nas kyang
97a6(mdo sde): de nam mkha'i dkyil na 'dug ste/ rgyal po zas gtsang ma dang / skye bo phal po che de dag la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ mi yi 'jig rten 'di na bstan bcos gang yod pa/ zangs dang yi ga rtsis dang
97a7(mdo sde): khams kyi rgyud dag dang / 'jig rten pa po yi sbyor ba tshad med mang po dag dang / bskal pa bye mang sngon chad 'dis ni de dag bslabs/ 'on kyang skye bo'i rjes su mthun pa tsam mdzad de/ byis pa ma
97b1(mdo sde): bzas pa chog la smon ma dadag// sems can mas zigasanan yang 'tsha ma dngad pang 'gyur/ shin tu labs pa'ang bas kyir mig phrus rnamasas// lam tan 'das pa'aM ba galas kyi
97b2(mdo sde): mkhyen cing // rdul rten nas ji ltar 'byung ba de la'ang mkhas// ji ltar 'dus byas 'gags pad bsil 'gyur de tshul yang // mkhyen na yi ge'i bstan bcos pam lha cis mi mkhyen// 'gro
97b3(mdo sde): rten gsum na 'di mi slob dpon pong na med// lha dang mir bcas nang na 'di nyid gtso bo ste// bsal pa bye mang sngon chad gang la 'dis bsgrubs pa'i// yi ge de dag ming yang byed kyis shes mi 'gyur/
97b4(mdo sde): 'gro ba rnams kyi sems rgyud sna tshogs gang 'byung ba// sad cig gcig gis sems can dag pa 'dis mkhyen te// gzugs med ltar mi snang ba'i tshul yang rab ma bas na/ yi ge gzugs yod bsgyur/
97b5(mdo sde): rlud 'a da ces rgas nas/ sa byang chubasams dpar masramam ma mang sa pa d+hi dadu rlung gyur// de nas sum dang / thun ma'ab
97b6(mdo sde): de rgyal po zas gtsang ma la sogs pa/ shAkya gzhan ni phyir dong ngo // de nas byang chub sems dpa' tsan dan thul gyi snying po la byas pa'i yi ge'i shing // lha'i tshon gyis drugs pa/
97b7(mdo sde): gser gyis yang mig gis gtags pa/ mtha' mnor bu rin po ches kun nas brgyan pa thogs te/ slob dpon kun gyi bshes gnyen la 'di skad ces smras so// kye mkhan pas bdag la yig gang/
98a1(mdo sde): TIg pas ma la / sa/ ma2/ ma 'a/ sa / sna
98a2(mdo sde): yig 'am/ bak+ku shis pa'i yi ge 'am/ sor mo pa'i yi ge'am/ sha ka nI'i yi ge 'am/ ya bA nA'i mig 'am/ bag le ba'i yi ga 'am/ b.ru sha'i yi ge 'am/ 'gro lding ba'i mi/
98a3(mdo sde): ge 'am/ ki ra ta'i yi ge 'am/ lho phyogs pa'i yigri 'am/ drag shul can gyi yi ge 'am/ grangs kyi yi ga 'am/ sgye'u tshugs pa'i yi ge 'am rjes su mthun pa'i phyog 'amazla
98a4(mdo sde): sha'i yi ga 'am/ ka shA'i yi ga 'am/ d+ha'i yi ge 'am/ bu na'i yi ge 'am/ buna'i yi ge 'am/ yi ge 'bring ngam/ nus par bri ba'i yi ge 'am/ rgyal gyi yi ge'am
98a5(mdo sde): lha'i yi ge 'amaklu'i yi ge 'am/ gnod sbyin gyi yi ge 'am/ dri za'i yi ge 'am/ mi 'am ci'i yi ge 'am/ lto 'phye chen po'i yi ge 'am lha ma yin gyi yi ge 'am
98a6(mdo sde): nam mkha' lding gI yi ge 'am/ ri dgas kyi 'khor lolo yi ge 'am/ kha skad shes pa'i yi ge 'am/ sa bla'i lha'i yi ge 'am/ bar snang gi lha'i yi ge 'amanub kyi ba lang spyod kyi li/
98a7(mdo sde): ge 'am/ byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi yi ge 'am/ shar gyi lus 'phags po'i yi ge 'am/ gdeg pa'i yi ge 'am/ gzhag pa'i yi ge 'am/ bsnan pa'i yi ge 'am rtsa mchog
98b1(mdo sde): la 'am/ rlu lag ma/ sa/ malas rgyal ba'as med kyi lag 'amabastan pacos pasgyur du'i mi 'du sa pa/
98b2(mdo sde): mig 'am gdag pa nor ba'i lag 'am gzhag pa bsor ba'i yige 'am/ rkang pas bris pa'i yi ge'am/ tshig yan lan gnyis su gdab pa'i tshig gi mtshams kyi yig 'am/
98b3(mdo sde): gi ma rnams bcur brgyad pa'i bar gyi yi ge 'am/ zla thabs su bstan pa'i yi ge 'am/ zla thams cad kun tu sdud pa'i yi ge 'am/ rig pa dang mthun pa'i yi ge 'am/ rnam par 'dren
98b4(mdo sde): ba'i yi ge 'am/ drang srong gis dka' thub spyad pa'i yi ge 'am/ lha'i nges pa'i yi ge 'am/ sa blta ba'i yi ge 'am/ nam mkha' blta ba'i yi ge 'am/ sman thams cad kyi rgya mthun
98b5(mdo sde): ba'i yi ge 'am/ snying po thams cad kun tu sdud pa'i yi ge 'am/ 'byung po thams cad kyi sgra sdud pa'i yi ge 'am/ kye slob dpon yi ge drug cu rtsa bzhi po de dag gi rlung na bdag la gang bslag
98b6(mdo sde): de nas byas pa'i slob dpon kun gyi bshes gnyi ni ngo mtshar du gyur nas/ bzhin gyi 'dzum byung ste/ nga rgyal dang / dregs pa dang / rgyags pa med par bas nas/ tshigs su bsdud pa 'di dag
98b7(mdo sde): smras so// sems can dag pa ngo mtshar che// bstan bcos kun la bslabs gyur kyang / 'jig rten 'jig rten rjes bsngags phyir// yi ge'i grwar ni byon par gyur// yi ge gang gi ming dag kyang /
99a1(mdo sde): bdag gis shes par ma gyur pa// de la 'di ni byang gyur kyang / yi ge slob pa'i grwar byon to// 'di yi zhal ni mthong mod kyi// spyi gtsug 'phags pa bltar mi snang /
99a2(mdo sde): yi ge'i shes rab mthar phyin na// bdag gis 'di go ji ltar bslab// lha yi lha chen lha 'di ni// lha rnams kun gyi mchog mkhas pa// khyad par 'phags shing mnyam pa med// 'jig rten
99a3(mdo sde): gang zag do zla med// bdag kyang 'di nyid mthun yis na// shes rab thabs kyis khyad par gyis// 'jig rten kun gyi dpung gnyen po// lobs pa 'di ni bslab par bya// dge slong dag de
99a4(mdo sde): ltar byis pa stong phrag bcu po de dag/ byang chub sems dpa' dang lhan cig tu yi ge slob pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis/ byis pa de dag yi ge'i phye mo slob cing gang gi tshe//
99a5(mdo sde): a zhes brjod pa de'i tshe/ 'du byed thams cad mi rtag pa'i sgra byung ngo // A zhes brjod pa dang / bdag med pa'i sgra byung ngo // i zhes brjod pa dang / dbang po shin tu yangs pa'i rma byung ngo //
99a6(mdo sde): I zhes brjod pa dang / 'gro ba ni yams kyi nad mang ba zhes bya ba'i sgra byung ngo // u zhes brjod pa dang / 'gro ba ni 'chi ba mang ngo zhes bya ba'i sgra byung ngo // u zhes brjod pa dang / 'gro ba na
99a7(mdo sde): dma' ba'o zhes bya ba'i sgra byung ngo // e zhes brjod pa dang / nyes pa ni bcas pa las 'byung ngo zhes bya ba'i sgra byung ngo // e zhes brjod pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam ni dge'o zhes bya ba'i
99b1(mdo sde): rta byung ba/ o nas brjod pa dang / chu ba las rgal ba'i rtswa thung ngo // so zhes brjod pa dang / rdzu 'phrul ba'i sgra byung ngo // a zhes brjod pa dang / bdagag pa mi 'byung ba zhes byabya'i/
99b2(mdo sde): b+ha b+h+r-ing ngo // a nas brjod pa dang / nub pa zhes bya ba'i rtsa byung ngo // kanas brjod pa dang / las kyi rnam par smin pa la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i sgra byung ngo // gnas brjod pa dang / chos
99b3(mdo sde): thams cad nam mkha' dang mnyam zhes bya ba'i sgra byung ngo // gzhes brjod pa dang / chos zab ces bya ba'i mabyung ngo // d+hu zhes brjod pa dang / ma rig pa dang / gti mug gi mun pa
99b4(mdo sde): dang ling lkog stug po bsal zhes bya ba'i sku byung ngo // nga zhes brjod pa dang / yan lag rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba'i sgra byung ngo // 6 zhes brjod pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden bzhi'i sgra
99b5(mdo sde): rlung ngo // mnas brjod pa dang / 'dod pa'i 'dod chags spangs pa'i sgra byung ngo // dza zhes brjod pa dang / na shi las yang dag par 'das pa'i sgra byung ngo // t+ta zhes brjod pa dang
99b6(mdo sde): 'chi byed rgyal mtshan can gyi dpung tshar bcad pa'i sgra byung ngo // nya zhes brjod pa dang / shes par byed pa'i sgra byung ngo // Ta zhes brjod pa dang / lam shin tu chad pa'i sgra byung ngo // Thazhes
99b7(mdo sde): brjod pa dang / dri ba bzhag pa'i sgra byung ngo // Da zhes brjod pa dang / dkrugs ma dang bdud tshar bcad pa'i sgra byung ngo // r+tha zhes brjod pa dang / yul mi gtsang ba'i sgra byung ngo // Na zhes
100a1(mdo sde): brjod pa dang / nyon mongs pa ni za ba zhes bya ba'i sgra byung ngo // ta zhes brjod pa dang / de bzhin nyid ni 'dres pa med ces bya ba'i sgra byung ngo // ba zhes brjod pa dang
100a2(mdo sde): mthu stobs dang shugs dang / mi 'jigs pa'i sgra byung ngo // da zhes brjod pa dang / sbyin pa dang / dul ba dang / yang dag par sdom pa dang / nges pa'i sgra byung ngo // d+ha zhes brjod pa dang /
100a3(mdo sde): 'phags pa rnams kyi nor ni rnam pa bdun no zhes bya ba'i sgra byung ngo // na zhes brjod pa dang / ming dang gzugs yongs su shes par bya ba'i sgra byung ngo // pa zhes brjod pa dang / don dam pa'i sgra
100a4(mdo sde): byung ngo // pa zhes brjod pa dang / 'bras bu rnyed pa mngon du bya ba'i sgra byung ngo // ba zhes brjod pa dang / bcings pa las rnam par thar pa'i sgra byung ngo // b+ha zhes brjod pa dang srid pa
100a5(mdo sde): 'jig pa'i sgra byung ngo // ma zhes brjod pa dang / nga rgyal dang / rgyags pa zhi bar bya ba'i sgra byung ngo // ya zhes brjod pa dang / chos ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs par bya ba'i sgra byung ngo //
100a6(mdo sde): ra zhes brjod pa dang / dga' ba la dga' ba med par don dam par dga' ba zhes bya ba'i sgra byung ngo // la zhes brjod pa dang / 'khri shing chad pa'i sgra byung ngo // wa zhes brjod pa dang
100a7(mdo sde): theg pa mchog mchog gi sgra byung ngo // sha zhes brjod pa dang / zhi gnas dang / lha mthong gi sgra byung ngo // sha zhes brjod pa dang / skye mched drug gzhom zhing mngon par shes pa drug dang /
100b1(mdo sde): mi shes thob pa'i ma byung ngo // sa nas brjod pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par bya ba'i sgra byung ngo // bzhes brjod pa dang / nyon mongs pa bcom
100b2(mdo sde): ning 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sgra byung ngo // / zhes brjod pa dang / yi ge'i mthar phyin te chos thams cad brjod du med pa'o zhes bya ba'i sgra byung ngo // de ltar byis pa de dag yi ge'i phyi mo slob
100b3(mdo sde): ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa'i mthus de dag la sogs pa/ chos kyi sgo brgya stong grangs med pa byung bar gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' yi ge'i blan 'dug pa'i tshu/ byis pa sum gyi
100b4(mdo sde): nyis snong rim gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su smin par byas so// byang chub sems dpa' lobs par gyur kyang / yi ge'i thar 'jug pa'i rgyu ni de yin no// rkyen
100b5(mdo sde): ni de yin no// yi ge bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// / dge slong dag gnon nu de de bas kyang ya zad skyes nas/ dus gzhan zhig na gnon nu de gzhon nu gzhan dag
100b6(mdo sde): dang / zhang lon gyi bu dag dang lhan cig tu zhing pa'i grong lta zhing dong ste/ grong bltas nas zhing blas kyi mtha'i skyed mos tshal gcig tu phyin to// de na byang chub sems dpa' gcig pu gnyis
100b7(mdo sde): su med par pa zad 'khyam zhing song song ba dang / 'dzam bu'i shing ljon pa mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa zhig mthong nas/ byang chub sems dpa' de'i grib ma la skyil mo krung du bcas te 'dug
101a1(mdo sde): go// 'dug nas byang chub sems dpa' sems rtse gcig pa rnyed de/ rnyed nas kyang sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams las dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas pa/ dpyod pa
101a2(mdo sde): dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan dang po bsgrubs te gnas so// de rtog pa dang / dpyod pa dang bral zhing nang yongs su dang ste
101a3(mdo sde): sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas/ rtog pa med pa/ dpyod pa med pa/ ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can/ bsam gtan gnyis pa bsgrubs te gnas so// de dga'
101a4(mdo sde): ba'i 'dod chags dang bral bas btang snyoms la gnas shing / dran pa dang / shes bzhin can yin te/ bde ba lus kyis myong la/ 'phags pa rnams kyis gang de dran pa dang ldan pa/ bde ba
101a5(mdo sde): la gnas pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba med pa bsam gtan gsum pa bsgrubs te gnas so// de bde ba yang spangs te/ snga nas sdug bsngal yang spangs shing yid bde
101a6(mdo sde): ba dang / yid mi bde ba yang nub pas/ bde ba yang ma yin/ sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa/ btang snyoms dang dran pa yongs su dag pa/ bsam gtan bzhi pa bsgrubs te gnas so//
101a7(mdo sde): de'i tshe phyi rol gyi drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga yod pa/ rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa/ nam mkha' las 'dong ba lnga zhig/ lho phyogs nas byang phyogs logs su dong dong ba las de dag tshal
101b1(mdo sde): thug pa de'i steng du phyin pa dang / phyir bral ba ltar 'dong ma nus nas/ de dag mi dga' zhing bsdun mos te/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag sbyar lo// bdag cag 'di na nor bu martsems
101b2(mdo sde): gon tu rngams thug pa yang thal byung ste/ glang po a mra'i shing ljon yalags gzings pa mang po bcom nas 'gro ba bzhin du dong dong la/ bdag cag 'di na wa yi khyim la'ang thogs med gan/
101b3(mdo sde): sbyin dri za'i khyim snying nam mkhar gnas gnas nA/ tshal sdug 'dir phyin nas ni sgyid lug gyur pa su yi mthu zhig gos na rdzu 'phrul stobs bzlog gyur/ de nas tshal stug po de na/
101b4(mdo sde): lha mo zhig gnas pa des drang srong de dag la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ rgyal po'i gtso bo'i rigs byung shAkya'i rgyal sras nyi ma shar ba lta bur rab tu snang ba'i 'od// 'jig rten gtso bo maH
101b5(mdo sde): pa bru zhal pad+ma rgyas pa'i snying po'i kha dog lta bu rab mdzes pa/ lha dang klu dbang gnod sbyin dri bas mchod pa de ni bsam gtan dgongs shing tshal stug 'di na bzhugs// srid pa bye ba brgya dag tu
101b6(mdo sde): ni bsod nams spel ba de yi mthu yis rdzu 'phrul stobs bzlog go// de nas de dag gis 'og logs su bltas pa dang / gzhon nu zhig dpal dang gzi brjid 'bar ba mthong nas/ de dag
101b7(mdo sde): 'di snyam du su zhig 'di ltar gnas// nor gyi bdag po rnam thos kyi bu 'am cig ma yin nam/ 'on te 'dod pa'i dbang po bdud la 'am/ yang na lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po 'am/ 'on
102a1(mdo sde): te dbang po rdo rje 'chang ba 'am/ yang na gu lang ngam/ grul bum gyi bdag po 'am/ 'on te spro ba chen po dang ldan pa nag po 'am/ 'on te lha'i bu zla ba 'am/ 'on /
102a2(mdo sde): 'od zer stong dang ldan pa nyi ma 'am/ 'on te 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po zhig yin nam su zhig yin snyam mo// de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di yang smras so// gzhon nu 'di ni rnam thos bu
102a3(mdo sde): yi gzugs las 'phags par gsal bar snang bas na// 'di ni sgra gcan yin nam 'on te rdo rje 'chang gi gzugs sam nyi zla'i gzugs// 'dod mchog dbang po'i gzugs sam gu lang gzugs
102a4(mdo sde): sam 'on te nag po'i gzugs yin nam// yang na 'di ni dpal ldan yan lag mtshan sbas sdig med sangs rgyas 'gyur ba zhig de nas tshal gyi lha mo des drang srong de dag la tshis
102a5(mdo sde): su bcad de smras pa/ rnam thos bu dang mig stong bdog la dpal na gang yod gyur pa dang // 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi dang lha min dbang la dpal ni gang yod dang // mi mjed bdag po tshangs pa ga
102a6(mdo sde): rnams la yang dpal ni gang yod pa// dpal de shAkya'i sras po 'di drung byin na gang gi tshe char mi bod/ de nas drang srong de dag gis lha mo de'i tshig zos nas sa la babs pa dang
102a7(mdo sde): de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' mi g.yo ba'i lus kyis bsam gtan byed cing / me'i phung po ltar 'bar ba mthong nas/ de dag byang chub sems dpa' la sems shing // tshigs su bcad
102b1(mdo sde): pas brjod de// de la gcig gis smras pa// 'jig rten nyon mongs mes gdungs par/ mtsho 'dir rab tu byung gyur te// byang gis 'jig rten sim 'gyur ba'i/ chos de 'di yis
102b2(mdo sde): brnyes par 'gyur// yang gcig gis smras pa// mi shes rab ba 'jig rtenadu// ston ma 'di ni rab tu byung // gang mes 'gro bsdang 'gyur ba'o// chomi de 'di yis brnyas par 'gyur
102b3(mdo sde): yang gcig gis smras pa/ mya ngan rgya mtsho 'dal ba las// zla li dam pa 'di byung ste// gang gis 'gro ba sgrol 'gyur ba'i// chos de 'di yis brnyes par 'gyur// yang gajig
102b4(mdo sde): gos smras pa/ nyon mongs 'tshong bas bcings pa la// 'grol bar mdzad pa 'di byung ste// gang gis 'gro ba 'grol 'gyur ba'i// chos de 'di yis brnyes par 'gyur// yang gcig
102b5(mdo sde): gis smras pa// na dang rlud kyis gzir ba la// sman pa dam pa 'di byung rtse// gang gos rga shi thar bya ba'i// chos de 'di las brnyes par 'gyur/ de nas dang zang de dag gis
102b6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' la tshigs su bcad pa de dag gis bstod de// lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ nam mkha' las dong ngo // rgyal po byas gtsang ma yang byang chub sems dpa' mi mtho
102b7(mdo sde): zhing / byang chub sems dpa' med pas mi dga' ste/ des smras pa/ gzhon nu de mi snang na gar song // de'i tshe skye bo phal po che gzhon nu tshol du dong dong ba dang / de'i tshe blon po gcig cig gis
103a1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' 'dzam bu'i shing gi grib ma la skyil mo krung bcas te/ bsam gtan byed cing 'dug pa mthong ngo // des de'i tshe shing thams cad kyi grib ma ni
103a2(mdo sde): yol na/ 'dzam bu'i shing gi grib ma ni byang chub sems dpa'i lus mi gtong bar 'dug par mthong na/ ngo mtshar du gyur te/ tshim zhing mgu la yid rangs nas/ rab tu dga' ste/ dga'
103a3(mdo sde): ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas/ rings shing myur ba myur ba'i gzugs kyis rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i thad du phyin te/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// rgyal po gzhon nu de la gzigs/
103a4(mdo sde): 'dzam bu'i shing grib bsam gtan mdzad// brgya byin tshangs pa ji bzhin du// gzi brjid dpal gyis rab tu mdzes// zhugs shing gang gi grib ma la// mtshan rab mnga' ba de bzhugs pa'i//
103a5(mdo sde): grib ma de ni de ma gtang // skyes mchog bsam gtan mdzad la sgrib/ de nas rgyal po zas gtsang ma 'dzam bu'i shing ljon pa ga la ba der song ste phyin nas byang chub sems
103a6(mdo sde): dpa' dpal dang gzi brjid kyis 'bar ba de mthong ba dang / tshigs su bcad pa 'di smras so// ri yi spos la me lce 'bar 'dra ste/ zla ba sar ma'i tshogs nang 'dug 'dra zhing // gzi brjid
103a7(mdo sde): smon 'dra bsam gtan byed mthong na/ nga yi lus 'di shin tu 'dar bar gyur/ de skad ces smras nas/ des byang chub sems dpa'i rkang pa la phyag byas te/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di smras so//
103b1(mdo sde): thub pa gang tsho bsams pa dang / bang rje 'ad ldan bsas gtan mdza 'dren pa 'di yar lan gnyis su/ mnan pa khyod zhabs byas 'tshal lo// dang byis pa khri'u thogs pa dag sa pa'i zla 'byin/
103b2(mdo sde): bar gyur nas/ de dag la blon po dag gis bla ma che sna ma chegs byas pa dang / de dag gi zhig nongs zhes zer ro// blon po dag gis smras pa rgyal po'i sras don thams cad grub pa dge ba'i mtshan pa /
103b3(mdo sde): po mchog dam pa dang ldan zhing 'od 'dom gang ba mnga' ba 'di ri ltar mi g.yo zhing bsam gtan mdzad pa'i tshe/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor lol te song yang shing gi grib mi de ma yol zhing sgrib par
103b4(mdo sde): gnas so// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dpyid 'das dbyar gyi dus bab dbyar bla rab la/ me tog rgyas shing me tog ya la gas khebs myur te// khrung zung ma bya ne tse ri grags sad 'byin pal/
103b5(mdo sde): shAkya'i bu dag phal cher mngon du 'dong bar gyur// 'dun pa can gyi smras pa/ gzhon nu nags tshal dag ni gzigs pa mdzad rmad du// byis pa rnams kyis yongs su bsor te gshegs pa'i rig
103b6(mdo sde): bram ze lta bur khyim na bzhugs pas ci zhig bgyi// bdag cag rnams ni bu mo'i tshogs rnams sngon du mchi/ nyi ma'i gung la sems can rnam par dag pa de// byis pa lnga brgya dag gis bskor
103b7(mdo sde): nas lhan cig tu / yab la ma gsol yum la ma gsol mtshor bar// de ni byung nas zhing pa rnams kyi grong du song // rgyal po dam pa'i zhing pa dag gi grong de ni/ 'dzam bu'i thong chen ya la ga mang
104a1(mdo sde): po rgyas yod pa// gzhon nus mthong nas nyam thag sdug bsngal pog gyur te// 'dus byas ci rung sdug bsngal mang zhes snying rje byed// dul ba'i sems dang ldan pa 'dzam
104a2(mdo sde): bu'i grib mar song // rtswa dag bsdus te bdag gis gding ba bting nas ni// skyil mo krung 'dug drang por lus bsrang bsam gtan bzhi// dge ba dag la byang chub sems dpa' bsam gtan byed//
104a3(mdo sde): drang srong lnga zhig nam mkha'i dkyil nas dong dong na// 'dzam bu'i shing gi steng du phyin nas 'dong ma nus// de dag thogs nas nga rgyal dregs pa spang byas shing // de dag thams cad 'thun par
104a4(mdo sde): lhan cig lta bar byed// bdag cag ri mchog ri rab de bzhin 'khor yug dag/ thal phyung thags thogs med par shugs kyis dong dong na/ bdag cag de ring 'dzam bu'i shing ljon 'di las ni//
104a5(mdo sde): 'da' bar ma nus 'di la rgyu rkyen ci zhig yod// babs te sa steng 'dug nas 'dzam bu'i shing drung na// shAkya'i bu pho byang chub sems dpa' gzi brjid can// 'dzam gling gser gyi 'od 'bro 'dra ba
104a6(mdo sde): 'od zer ldan// skyil mo krung bcas bsam gtan byed pa de tshe mthong // de dag rma mur spyi bor sor bcu thal sbyar te// thal mo sbyar ba rkang par gtugs nas phyag 'tshal lo//
104a7(mdo sde): ba shin tu bde mdzad legs par bltams pa legs// myur du rnam sangs rgyas te bdud rtsis sems can thul// sdong po mchog ni pad+ma 'dra ba'i spyan la 'dud// gdugs yol gyur kyang grib
104b1(mdo sde): mas bde bar gshegs mi gtong // lha rnams stong zag mang po gnas pa thal gyur nas/ nges par byas pa de yi rang par phyag kyang 'tshal// bas gtsang rgyal po bdag gi khyim na yongs mol
104b2(mdo sde): zhing nga y-i bra gzhon don gang du song smras na// phra mos smras pa/ bdag gos bcas kyang ma rnyed nas// gzhon nu na gar bzhud rgyal pas smras par gsol/ bas ga sung rgyal pos
104b3(mdo sde): ru ma dag la rings par smras// nga yi gzhon nu 'di nas byung bar la las mthong ngam zhes// sgo ba rnams dang de bzhin nang mi kun la'ang smras/ lha cig khyod gson mchog de zing pa'i grong dro
104b4(mdo sde): bcud// de ni rings par shAkya rnams dang lhan cig tu// byung nas dpal zhugs gyur pa'i zhing pa'i grong du bltas// ji ltar nyim bye ba khrag khrig shar ba ltar/ de ltar dpal gyis 'bar da
104b5(mdo sde): 'jam zhing phan byed 'dug pa mthong // cod pan ral gri lha mdag pa zad pog phud de// mgo bor sor bcu thal mo sbyar nas phyag kyang 'tshal// drang srong bdag nyid chen po legs pa yang dag su/
104b6(mdo sde): gzhon nu byang chub don du mngon par 'byung du nges// rab tu dang lnga brgya phrag bcu gnyis tshang ba dang // de bzhin shAkya lnga brgya nye bar 'ongs pa dang // bde gshegs yon tan rgya mtsho ldan pa'i
104b7(mdo sde): 'phrul mthong // bsam pa brtan pas rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems kyang bskyed// de nas stong gsum ma lus sa rnams rab bgrod nas/ dran dang shes bzhin ting nge 'dzin las langs
105a1(mdo sde): gyur te// mdog bzang ldan pas yab la tshangs pa'i tshig brjod pa// yab cig zhing las zong la gzhan la chol ma mdzad// gal te gser zhig 'tshal na'ang bdag gis/
105a2(mdo sde): gser char dbab// de ste na bza' 'tshal na'ang bdag gis na bza' dbul// 'on te 'bru zhig 'tshal na'ang bdag gis 'bru char dbab// mi dbang khyod kyis 'gro ba kun la yang dag sbyor// yang
105a3(mdo sde): dang de bzhin skye bo 'khor la bstan byas nas// skad cig de la slar de skad grong khyer mchog tu zhugs// 'gro dang mthun pa tsam du grong khyer der gnas kyi// sems can rnams dag mngon par
105a4(mdo sde): 'byung ba'i yid dang ldan// zhing pa'i grong gi le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// // 'phags pa rgya cher rol pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// bam po bdun pa/
105a5(mdo sde): dge slong dag de ltar gzhon nu de de bas ya zad skyes pa dang // dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po zas gtsang ma shAkya'i tshogs dang lhan cig tu 'dun sa na 'dug 'dug pa de'i tshe/ shAkya rgan rabs rgan
105a6(mdo sde): rabs kha cig gis rgyal po zas gtsang ma la 'di skad ces smras so// lha mkhyen par mdzad du gsol// gzhon nu don thams cad grub pa 'di ni// bram ze ltas mkhan rnams dang / rmo ngas
105a7(mdo sde): pa dang ldan pa'i lha mang pos 'di skad du bstan te/ gzhon nu 'di gal te mngon par byung bar gyur na ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro// /
105b1(mdo sde): su mngan par ma byung nani 'khor lo gyur ba'i rgyal po mtha' ban las rnam par thal bcas kyi rgyal po chos dang ldan zhing / rin po ma n+t+ra bdun dang ldan par 'gyur ro// na po myu nga/
105b2(mdo sde): ni 'di dag ste/ 'di ltar 'khor lo rin po che dang / glang po rin po che dang / tA rin po che dang / nor bu rin po che dang / bud med rin po che dang / khyim bdag rin po che dang / rnon po
105b3(mdo sde): rin po che dang bdun no// de la bu dpa' ba/ rtul phod pa/ yan lag mchog gi gzugs dang ldan pa/ gzhan gyi rje rab tu 'joms pa stong chang ba 'byung ngo // de gnod par bya ba dang /
105b4(mdo sde): mtshon cha med par chos dang mthun pas/ sa'i dkyil 'khor 'di las mngon par rgyal bar byas te/ gcig pu gnas par 'gyur ro zhes mchin/ de'i slad du gzhon nu de'i btsun mo blang bar
105b5(mdo sde): bgyi'o// de ltar mdzad dang bud med kyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor te/ dgyes pa la longs spyod cing mngon par 'byung bar yang mi 'gyur te/ de ltar gyur pa dang bdag cag gi 'khor la
105b6(mdo sde): sgyur ba'i gdung yang mi 'chad/ khams kyi rgyal po thams cad kyis kyang mi snun par mi brjod cing mngon par 'byung bar yang mi 'gyur te/ de ltar gyur pa dang bdag cag 'khor lo sgyur ba'i
105b7(mdo sde): gzhon nu'i tshul dang mthun pa'i bu mo gang zhig yod khyod kyis ltos shig/ de'i tshe shAkya lnga brgya tsam so so nas/ 'di skad du bdag gi bu mo ni gzhon nu'i tshul dang mthun no// bdag gi phra
106a1(mdo sde): mo ni gzhon nu'i tshul dang mthun no zhes zer ro// rgyal po smras pa/ gzhon nu de ni shin tu phul che ba yin gyis// gzhon nu nyid la khyod bu mo gang 'dod ces dri bar
106a2(mdo sde): bya'o// zhes de dag kun kyang 'dus te gzhon nu la dngos po de brjod do// gzhon nus smras pa/ da ste dgung bdun na 'di'i lan gsan par gsol/ de nas byang chub sems
106a3(mdo sde): dpa' 'di snyam du bsams te/ 'dod pa'i skyon ni bdag gis mtha' yas rig/ 'thab mo kho na bcas mya ngan sdug bsngal rtsa// 'jigs byed dug gi lo ma 'dra ba ste// me dang 'dra zhing ral
106a4(mdo sde): gri'i so dang 'dra// 'dod pa'i yon tan bdag 'dod ma yin te// bdag ni bud med tshogs dang mdzes ma yin// bsam gtan ting 'dzin bde bas zhi sems su// bdag ni mi smra nags
106a5(mdo sde): tshal gnas par bya// yang des brtags nas thabs mkhas pa mngon du byas te/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba la bltas nas// snying rje chen po bskyed de// de'i tshe tshigs
106a6(mdo sde): su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// 'dam dang lcags khrig khrod nas pad+ma rnam par 'phel// mi rnams gang ba'i nang na rgyal po mchod pa 'thob// gang tshe byang chub sems dpa' 'khor
106a7(mdo sde): mchog thob gyur pa// de tshe sems can bye ba khrag khrig 'chi med 'dul// sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa gang byung ba// de dag kun gyis btsun mo sras dang slas kyang bstan//
106b1(mdo sde): 'on kyang 'dod pas chags med pasam gtan bde mnyams// bdag kyang de dag yon tan rjes su bslab par bya// gang la smod lam yon tan bden pa'i tshig med pa// bud med pa la ba
106b2(mdo sde): gang yang bdag gis tshul mthun min// gang zhig bdag gi sems ni mngon par dga' byed cing // bag yod gzugs dang na chod rus rigs dag pa'os// des ni yon tan tshigs su bcad
106b3(mdo sde): de yi ger bris// 'di 'dra'i bu mo mchis na bdag la bka' rtsol cig/ skye bo phal pa ma bsdams bdag la mkho ma lags// yon tan brjod pa 'di ldan mchis na bdag rtsol cis
106b4(mdo sde): dar cing gzugs bzang ldan yang gzugs kyi dregs dang bral// pu nu ma la byams ltalhur byams pa'i sems ldan zhing // gtong la dga' ste dge sbyong bram ze sbyin tshul can// de 'a
106b5(mdo sde): bu mo mchis na yab kyis bdag stsol cig/ gang lang rgyal khengs dang zhe sdang ma mchis shing // g.yo dang phrag dog sgyu spangs drang ba'i ngang tshul can// rmi lam na yang skyes pa gzhan
106b6(mdo sde): la chags dang bral/ bdag gi khros ni chog 'tshal rtag sdom bag mchis la// rgyags pa ma mchis mi g.yeng zung thub tshul 'chang zhing // nga rgyal ma mchis 'gying dang bral bas bran mo
106b7(mdo sde): bzhin// sgra dri rol ma chags chang la ma chags te// 'dod bral brnab sems ma mchis rang gi nor gyis 'tshal// bden la gnas shing mi 'phyar g.yeng ba ma lags pa// ngo tsha'i
107a1(mdo sde): gos 'tshal rgod dang khengs pa ma mchis gnas/ lha dang bkra shis ma chags rtag tu chos la brtson// lus dang ngag dang yid kyi dngos po rab dag pa/
107a2(mdo sde): gnyid dang rmugs pa mi mnga' nga rgyal gle na bral zhing // rtogs dang ldan lo legs pa'i las rnams rtag spyod do// gyos skyug gnyis la'ang ston pa bzhin gyi rim gror ldan//
107a3(mdo sde): bran dang bran mo kun la yang bdug bzhin blams srel ba// smad 'tshong bzhin du bstun bcos cho ga 'tshal cing mkhas// slad kyis nyal zhing sngon du mal nas ldang bgyid pa/
107a4(mdo sde): byams pas rjes stegs ma bzhin tshul 'chos ma mchis pa// de 'dra'i bud med mchis na yab kyis bdag stsol cig/ dge slong dag de nas rgyal po zas gtsang mas
107a5(mdo sde): tshogs su bcad pa de dag zos nus// mdun na 'don la smras pa// bram ze chen po khyod ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen por song la// khyim thams cad du'ang song ste/ @
107a6(mdo sde): mo dag ltos la gang la'ang rung ste/ yon tan de lta bu dag yod na/ rgyal rigs kyi bu mo yang rung bram ze'i bu mo yang rung / rje'u rigs kyi bu mo yang rlung / dmangs
107a7(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu mo yang rung gis bu mo de dag 'dir 'on cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzhon nu 'di ni rigs don tu gnyer ba ma yin/ rus don tu gnyer ba ma yin gyi/ gzhon nu
107b1(mdo sde): 'dun yon tan don tu gnyer ba yin no// de'i mamyigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang smras so// rgyal rigs zlum po'i bu mo dang / me'u rigs dmangs rigs de bzhin
107b2(mdo sde): la yon tan 'di yod pa'i bu mo de ni 'dir 'on cig/ nga yi bu 'di rigs dag dang / rus la ngo mtshar 'dzin ma yin/ yon tan bden pa'i chos kyi rnams// de la 'di lam
107b3(mdo sde): dgra'o// dge slong dag de nas bram ze mdun na 'don des tshigs su bcad pa yi ger bris pa de khyer te/ ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen por song nas
107b4(mdo sde): khyim nas khyim du yon tan de lta bu dang ldan pa'i bu mo lta zhing tshol du song song ba las yon tan de lta bu dang ldan pa'i bu mo ma mthong ste/ de nas rims kyis shAkya lag na be con
107b5(mdo sde): can gyi khyim du phyin nas der bltas na/ bu mo gzugs mdzes shing blta na sdug pa yid du 'ong ba/ mdog bzang po rgyus pa/ mchog dang ldan pa/ hi cang yang mi ring ba
107b6(mdo sde): hA snang ya'ami zung ba ha cang yang mi thom pa sang yang mi skem pa ha~Mha cang yang mi dkar ba ha cang yang mi gnag pa gzod med ral bab pa/ bud med rin
107b7(mdo sde): po che ltar snang ba zhig mthong ba dang bu mo des bram ze mdun na 'don de'i rkang pa gnyis nas bzung ste/ 'di skad ces smras so// bram ze chen po khyod la dgos pa ci
108a1(mdo sde): zhig mchis bram ze mdun na 'don gyis tshigs su bcad de smras pa// zas gtsang sras po gzugs ni mchog tu mdzes gyur cing // sum cu rtsa gnyis
108a2(mdo sde): mtshan ldan yon tan gzi brjid can// de yis bud med rnams kyi yon tan yi ger bris// su la yon tan 'di yod de yi chung mar 'os// zhes smras te/ des de la yi ge de byin no//
108a3(mdo sde): denas bu mo des tshigs su bcad pa'i yi ge de klags nas bzhin 'dzum pa bstan te/ bram ze mdun na 'don de la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ bram ze yon tan 'di dag
108a4(mdo sde): bdag la kun tshang gis nges pa'i gzugs can de ni bdag gi khyim 'thab po// gal te gzhon nu bzhed na phyi bshol ma mdzad gsungs// brgya la skye bo bal dang bzhugs par 'gyur
108a5(mdo sde): yang gda'/ de nas bram ze mdun na 'don de/ rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i drung du song ste/ don de brjod do// rgyal po chen po bdag gis gzhon nu'i tshul dang mthun pa'i
108a6(mdo sde): bu mo mthong ngo // rgyal pos smras pa/ su la de lta bu zhig yod/ sbas pa/ lha shakya lag nu be con can la bu mo de lta bu zhig mchis so// de nas rgyal po zas
108a7(mdo sde): ma 'di snyam du sems te/ gzhon nu de shin tu phul che zhing / bzang ba la mos pa yin la ni bud med dag ni phal cher yon tan med pa dag kyang / bdag la yon tan yod par khas len gyi//
108b1(mdo sde): mas / sa su ga la
108b2(mdo sde): gzhon nu la sbyin par bya'o snyam mo// de nas rgyal po zas gtsang mas yid du 'ong ba'i yod byung gser dang dngul dang / rin po che sna tshogs las byed du bcug nas/
108b3(mdo sde): ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen por dril gyi sgra bsgrags te/ deng nas zhag bdun na/ kun gyis kyang gzhon nu mthong bar 'gyur te/ yid du 'ong ba'i yod byad dag kyang bu mo dag la sbyin
108b4(mdo sde): pa byed kyis bu mo thams cad kyang 'dun khang du shog shig ces bsgo'o// dge slong dag de nas zhag bdun lon pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'dun khang du song
108b5(mdo sde): seng ge'i khri la 'dug go// de'i tshe rgyal po zas gtsang mas bya rab dag bkod nas gzhon nu 'di bu mo gang la mi chags pa de ngal gyis shig ces bsgo'o// dge slong dag
108b6(mdo sde): de nas ser sna'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po den bu mo gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad 'dun khang ga la ba dang byang chub sems dpa' ga la ba der byang chub sems dpa' lta ba dang /
108b7(mdo sde): yid du 'ong ba'i yo byad blang ba'i phyir dong ngo // dge slong dag de nas byang chub sems dpas bu mo ji ltar 'ongs pa de dag la yid du 'ong ba'i yo byad rnams byin no//
109a1(mdo sde): de nas bu mo de dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i dpal gzi brjid ma bzod nas/ yid du 'ong ba'i yo byad de dag blangs shing myur ba myur bar phyir dong ngo //
109a2(mdo sde): nas shAkya lag na be con can gyi bu mo sa 'tsho ma zhes bya ba bran mo'i tshogs kyang bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ 'dun du bdar te/ 'dun khang ga la ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' ga la ba der song /
109a3(mdo sde): ste phyin pa dang / mig mi 'dzums par byang chub sems dpa' la lta zhing phyogs gcig tu 'dug par gyur to// gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpas yid du 'ong ba'i yo byad de dag byin zin par gyur/
109a4(mdo sde): pa de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa'i drung du 'ongs nas 'dzum dmul te/ byang chub sems dpa' la 'di skad ces smras so// gzhon nu bdag gis khyed la nongs pa ci zhig bgyis na
109a5(mdo sde): bdag la de ltar dang na snang mdzad/ smras pa/ ngas na khyod la dang na sdang byas pa yang med na/ khyod ni shin tu 'phyis te 'ongs so zhes smras nas// des sor brngub srang bcu stong du ma rib
109a6(mdo sde): bud de de la byin no// bu mo des smras pa/ gzhon nu khyod las bdag gis 'di lta bu zhig 'tshal ba 'os sam/ smras pa/ 'o na rgyan gzhan dang gzhan dag yod pa 'di dag kyang khyod
109a7(mdo sde): khyer cig/ des smras pa/ gzhon nu bdag ni rgyan ma mchis par bgyid pa ma lags kyi/ rgyan dang ldan par bgyid pa lags so zhes smras nas bu mo de song ngo //
109b1(mdo sde): rna gyu ba bgad pa'i ma de dag rgyal po smras gcang ma'i drung du sa nas lo chus dag smos te smras pa/ lkug kya 'gan bu na can mibu mos mtsho ma klas pami 'de la gan
109b2(mdo sde): rten rnags par gyur pa sra ba tu masbyi gyis so// de nas rgyal po mam sa ca mis cig de bas nas la na can bAn myi gan
109b3(mdo sde): mdunan 'don po nyer btang ste/ khyod kyi bu mo zhig yod pa de nga'i gzhon nu la brin cig ces spring ngo // lag na be con gyis smras pa 'phags pa gzhon nu ni pho zang na srid de
109b4(mdo sde): bar 'brangs pa lags la bdag cag gi rigs kyi chos ni 'di lta bu lags te/ spu rtsal shes pa la bu mo gtong gi/ g+ha cal mi shes pa la mi gtong ba lags na/ gzhon nu
109b5(mdo sde): rgyu thal shes pa yang ma lags la/ ral gro'i thabs dang 'phong dang / stobs dang / gyad kyi 'dzin stangs kyi tshul shes pa yang ma lags na/ bdag gis sgyu cal shes pa ma
109b6(mdo sde): legs pa la bu mo ji ltar btang / tshig de rgyal po la bzlas pa dang / de nas rgyal po 'di snyam du sems te/ ngal des 'di dang ldan gnyis su bsngos te/ gang gi tshangs shAH
109b7(mdo sde): gzhon nu dag gzhon nu'i rim gro byed du ci'i phyir mi 'ong zhes byas pa de'i tshe'ang / ci nger lug gi rim gro byed du 'ong ngam zhes zer la/ da'ang 'di skad zer ro snyam du sems
110a1(mdo sde): shing 'dug par gyur to// byang chub sems dpas kyang gtam de thos nas/ rgyal po zas gtsang ma ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ 'di skad ces smras so//
110a2(mdo sde): ci nongs te de ltar zhal zung gnag par bzhugs rgyal pos smras pa gzhon nu de dri bas ci zhig bya/ gzhon nu sa smras pa lha de ni bka' mi srul du mi rung ngo zhes lan gsum
110a3(mdo sde): gyi bar du byang chub sems dpas/ rgyal po zas gtsang ma la dris pa dang de nas rgyal po zas gtsang mas byang chub sems dpa' la dngos po de dag brjod do// byang chub sems dpas
110a4(mdo sde): smras pa lha grong khyer 'di na bdag dang sgyu rtsal gyis 'gran par nus pa 'ga' mchis sam/ de nas rgyal po zas gtsang mas bdag nas/ byang chub sems dpa' la 'di skad ces
110a5(mdo sde): smras so// bu khyod kyis sgyu rtsal bstan par nus sam/ smras pa/ lha de ni bdag gis legs par rngo thog go// de bas na sgyu rtsal 'tshal ba rnams kun kyang gsol// de dag gis
110a6(mdo sde): sgyu rtsal bstan par bgyi'o// de nas rgyal po zas gtsang mas ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen por dril gyi sgra bsgrags te/ deng nas zhag bdun na gzhon nu rang gi sgyu
110a7(mdo sde): rtsal ston gyis// de sgyu rtsal shes pa thams cad shog shig ces bsgo'o// de nas zhag bdun lon pa dang / shAkya gzhon nu lnga brgya tsam tshogs par gyur to// de nas shAkya lag na
110b1(mdo sde): bcon can gyi bu mo sa 'tshom rgyal ba'i ru mtshon du bzhag ste 'dir ral gri'i thabs dang / 'bong dang / stobs dang gyad kyi 'dzin stangs kyang sU rgyal ba de ni 'di khyer cig ces dam
110b2(mdo sde): bcas nas/ de'i cha thams cad kyi thog ma la gzhon nu lhas sbyin grong khyer nas byung ngo // de'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhon par glang po dkar po bong shin tu che ba zhig grong khyer du khrid pa/
110b3(mdo sde): gzhon nu lhas sbyin gyis mthong nas brag dog dang / shAkya'i nga rgyal dang stobs kyi nga rgyal gyis dregs nas/ des glang po de lag pa g.yon pas sna nas bzung ste/ lag pa
110b4(mdo sde): g.yas pas thal mo lan cig bsnun pas bsad par gyur to// de'i 'og tu gzhon nu mdzes dga' bo byung ba dang / des glang po chen po de grong khyer gyi sgor bsad pa mthong nas/ sus
110b5(mdo sde): bsad ces dris pa dang / smras pa lha sbyin gyis bsad do// smras pa/ lha sbyin gyis de ni ma legs pa zhig byas so zhes des glang po de'i mjug ma nas bzung ste/ grong khye
110b6(mdo sde): gyi sgo nas gung du bor ro// de'i 'og tu byang chub sems dpa' shing rta la zhon te byung ba dang / byang chub sems dpas glang po de ltar bsad pa mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang sus bsad ces
110b7(mdo sde): dris pa dang / smras pa/ lha sbyin gyis bsad do// smras pa/ lha sbyin gyis de ni ma legs pa zhig byas so// grong khyer 'di'i sgo nas su sa bor zhes dris pa dang / smras pa/
111a1(mdo sde): mdzes dga' bos bor ro// smras pa mdzes dga' bos de ltar byas pa'ang legs na/ sems can 'di ni lus chen po dang ldan pa ste/ rulan grong khyer
111a2(mdo sde): thams cad dri mi zhim pas gang bar 'gyur ro zhes nas/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' shing rta la 'dug bzhin du rkang pa ya cig sa la brkyang ste/ rkang pa'i mthe bos
111a3(mdo sde): glang po de blangs te/ rab bdun rim dang / 'obs bdun rim bzlas nas/ grong khyer gyi phyi rol rgyang grangs cig tsam du 'phangs so// glang po de phyogs gang du lhung ba'i phyogs de gsho
111a4(mdo sde): chen po zhig tu gyur nas/ da ltar glang po'i gshong zhes bya ba yin no// de'i tshe lha dang mi brgya stong mang po a ma a la la zhes zer zhing / ca co dang / gzha'i sgra brgya stong 'byin la/
111a5(mdo sde): gos kyi g.yab mo 'byin par gyur to// nam mkha'i dkyil nas lha'i bu dag gis kyang tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// glang po'i dbang po bdo ba bzhin bzhud pa// zhabs
111a6(mdo sde): mthe bos glang po'i dbang po blangs// rab bdun dang 'obs bdun yongs bzlas nas// grong khyer 'di yi phyi rol rgyang ring 'phangs// mkhyen pa mchog mnga' 'das ni gdon mi zar/
111a7(mdo sde): nga rgyal stobs kyis mtho ba'i lus can rnams// 'khor ba'i grong nas phyi rol rgyang ring du// shes rab stobs kyis 'dis ni 'phen par 'gyur// dge slong dag de nas shAkya
111b1(mdo sde): gzhon nu lnga brgya tsamagrong khyer nas mthon nas/ sa'i phyogs gang du sha kya gzhon nu dag rtswa phul ston pa der dong ngo // rgyal po zas gtsang ma dang / shAshug rgan rabs san rab sa dag
111b2(mdo sde): da skye bo bal po che dab kyang byang chub sems dpa' dang shAkya gzhon nu gzhan dag gi sgyu rtsal gyi khyad par mthong bar 'dod de/ sa'i phyogs der dong ngo // de nas
111b3(mdo sde): thog mar shAkya gzhon nu yi ge mkhas shing yi ge'i cho ga shes pa de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' yi ge 'gran to// de'i tshe shas de dag gis slob dpon kun gyi gshes gnyen dbang
111b4(mdo sde): du bzhag ste/ gnon nu 'di dag gi nang nas yi ge'i 'bru 'am/ yi ge'i sna grangs kyi mthar phyin pas khyad par du 'phags pa gang yin khyod kyis bye brag bye shig
111b5(mdo sde): de nas slob dpon kun gyi bshes gnyen byang chub sems dpa' yi ge la mkhas pa mngon tu mthong bas bzhin 'dzum pa bstan te/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so//
111b6(mdo sde): yi 'jig rten lha yi 'jig rten nam// lha min 'jig rten dri za'i 'jig rten nam// 'jig rten kun gyi yi ge ji snyed gang de la sems can dag pa 'dis mthar phyin// mi'i zla ba
111b7(mdo sde): 'di yis gang mkhyen pa'i// yi ge dag dang yi ge'i sna grangs kyi// ming yang khyed dang ngas ni yong mi shes// 'di la mngon sum ngas shes 'di rgyal 'gyur// shAkya rnams
112a1(mdo sde): kyis smras pa gzhon nu 'di yi ge'i shes pa la khyad par du 'phags pa lha'ang 'phags par chug ste/ gzhon nu 'di grangs kyi shes pa la khyad par ci yod paskrun/
112a2(mdo sde): par bya'o// de nas shAkya srid sgrub ces rtsis pa chen po byed pa/ bgrang ba dang / rtsis kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhig yod pa de dbang du bzhag ste/ gzhon nu 'di dag gi
112a3(mdo sde): nang nas grangs kyi shes pa la khyad par du gang 'phags khyod kyis ltos shig ces byas te/ de nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpas ni rtsis mgo pog shAkya gzhon nu gcig gi ni rtsis
112a4(mdo sde): pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' la sleb par ma nus so// de nas shAkya gzhon nu gnyis dang / gsum dang / bzhi dang / lnga dang bcu dang / nyi shu dang /
112a5(mdo sde): sum cu dang / bzhi bcu dang / lnga bcu dang / brgya nas shAkya gzhon nu lnga brgya'i bar gyis dus gcig tu brtsis kyang / byang chub sems dpa' la ma slebs so//
112a6(mdo sde): de nas byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ khyed kyis ni rtsis migo pog shog/ kho bos ni btso'o// de'i tshe shakya gzhon nu gcig gis cis mgo phog na byang chub sems dpas
112a7(mdo sde): cis kyis chod pa la ma rmobs so// de nas shAkya gzhon nu gnyis dang / gsum dang / bzhi dang / lnga dang / bcu dang nyi shu dang / sum cu dang / bzhi bcu dang /
112b1(mdo sde): lnga bcu dang / brgya na sag kya gzhonu nu lnga brgya'i bar gyis dus gcig tu rtsis mgo bog kyang byang chub sems dpas kyis kyis chod pa la ma slebs so// byang chub sems dpas/
112b2(mdo sde): smras pa/ 'dri la bcad de yang ci rung gis/ khyed thams cad gcig tu 'dus te rtsis mgo log shig/ kho bos brtsi'o// de nas shakya gzhon nu lnga brgyas tshig cig tu
112b3(mdo sde): brjod pas snga byi med par rtsis mgo bog nas byang chub sems dpas rmongs pa med par brtsis te/ de lta shAkya gzhon nu de dag thams cad ni phug theg par gyur/ byang chub sems
112b4(mdo sde): dpa' la ni thug pa'i mtha' med par gyur to// de nas rtsis pa chen po srid sgrub ngo mtshar du gyur te / tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag sbas so// legs pa'i blo mang
112b5(mdo sde): 'di dris na/ mkhyen pa shin tu myur ba ste/ shAkya gzhon nu lnga brgya tsam// kun kyang rtsis kyi lam la thug/ de yi shes rab 'di 'dra ste// ye shes blo gros dran ldan yang /
112b6(mdo sde): rtsis kyi mkhyen pargya mchod// de drung skyong zhing slob pa mdza/ de nas shAkyu'i tshogs thams cad ngo mchur du gyur te/ shin tu rmad du byung bar sems shing /
112b7(mdo sde): thams cad mgrin gcig tu tshig 'di skad ces smras so// kye don grub gzhon nu khyod ni rgyal lo rgyal lo zhes thams cad stan las langs te thal mo sbyar nas/ byang chub
113a1(mdo sde): sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal te/ rgyal po zas gtsang ma la 'di skad ces smras so// rgyal po chen po khyod la sras de ltar dris pa la spongs pa m+bA

113b5(mdo sde): bya ste/ 'di ltar de'i mtshan nyid ces bya ba'i rtsis kyis ni/ ri'i rgyal po ri rab brtsi ba'i gzhir byas kyang chod par rung ngo // de'i yang gong na rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i nor bu zhes bya ba'i grangs

119b1(mdo sde): la bzhugs// ni gnas skam ru thogs shing spong pa bdag med mda' rnams kyis/ nyon mongs dgra rnams bcom ste lta ba'i dra badral nas su// byang chub dam pa zhi brdal med mya ngan
119b2(mdo sde): med pa 'thob/ de skad ces byas nas/ lha'i bu de dag gis/ byang chub sems dpa' la lha'i me tog dag gis mngon par gtor te dong ngo // de bzhin du mchongs padang / yig dang /
119b3(mdo sde): lag thos dang / rtsis dang / grangs dang / gyad kyi 'dzin sbyangs dang / rgyang nas phog pa dang / ba dang / char dang / cal dang / 'phong dpyad dang / zang po che'i gzhar gnon
119b4(mdo sde): dang / bral dang / shing rta'i thabs dang / mda' gzhu'i thabs dang / btan pa dang / mtha dang / dpa' ba dang / bached thobs dang / lpags byas gyur thabs da
119b5(mdo sde): grags pa'i thabs dang / mdun du brngu bdu phyir bskur ba dang / bzar ba dang / 'dzin stangs dang / rnams sa bas dang / thor rmugs dang / bcad pa dang / rnal ba dang /
119b6(mdo sde): dbugs pa dang / gzhig pa dang / gshegs pa dang / ma 'tshor bar log pa dang / gnad du mag pa dang / sgra zag par theg pa dang / tshabs dang / rnam tshad mad
119b7(mdo sde): na dpags gyung ba dang / lam dang / rimo dang / gzugs dang / gzugs kyi lam dang / zags kyi dpyad dang / me'i lam dang / rol mo'i dbyangs pa dang /
120a1(mdo sde): ga nga sa dang / / dang / dang / nga / ga ga
120a2(mdo sde): g.yob ba dang / nor bu tshon gyis bskur ba dang / gos tshon gyis bskur ba dang / mig 'phrul gyi chog dang / rmi lam gyi byud dang bya'i skad dang / bud med kyi mtshan dang / skyes pa/
120a3(mdo sde): mtshan dang / glang po'o mtshan dang / rta'i mtshan dang / ba lang gi mtshan dang / ra'i mtshan dang / lug gi margyan dang / lci'i mtshan dang / shes sa la dang // nges par sbyor ba dang /
120a4(mdo sde): ngaro sbyar ba dang / sngon gyi rabs dang / sngon byung ba dang / rig byed dang / lung bstan pa dang / nges pa'i tshig dang / yi ge wi yang dang / tshig sdeb pa dang / mchod sbyin gyi cho ga dang /
120a5(mdo sde): kar ma'i lugs dang / grangs can gyi lugs dang / rnal 'byor gyi lugs dang / las kyi tshogs dang / bye brag pa'i lugs dang / nor gyi rig pa dang / phur bu'i lugs dang / chu
120a6(mdo sde): lugs dang / lha ma yin gyi lugs dang bya dang / ri dgas kyi skad dang gtan tshigs kyi rig pa dang / skegs kyi 'khrul 'khor dang / spa ril gyi las dang / 'drung shur dang / ba
120a7(mdo sde): bzhog dang / lo ma dra ba dang / spos sbyar ba la sogs pa'i sku rtsal 'jig rten pa dang / lha'i dang / mi'i las 'das pa thams cad la'ang byang chub sems dpa' 'ba' shig khyad par
120b1(mdo sde): 'phags par gyur to// de'i tshe shAkya lag na be con can gyis rang gi bu mo sa 'tshom byang chub sems dpa' la phul lo// rgyal po zas gtsang mas kyang de'i rim gyis bag mar blangs te/ byung
120b2(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' la bul lo// de nas byang chub sems dpas 'jig rten dang mthun pa tsam du bya ba'i phyir bud med brgyad khri bzhi skyong gi nang du 'dug ste/ dga' zhing rtsel long
120b3(mdo sde): su spyod pa son to// bud med brgyad khri bzhi stong de dag thams cad kyi nang nas shAkya'i bu mos mtshom btsun mo'i mchog tu dbang bskur bar gyur to// de nas shAkya'i bu mos
120b4(mdo sde): 'tshomagyo skyug gam/ nang mi gang mthong yang rung ste/ gdong mi sred do// de dag kyang de la bag sar mo ni zhum zhum por 'dug pa'i rigs na/ 'di ni rtag tu ma g.yogs so zhes 'phya smod cing
120b5(mdo sde): mi sman par zer ro// de nas shAkya'i bu mo sa 'tshoms gtam zos nas/ nang mi rnams kyi mdun du 'dug te/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// 'dug dang
120b6(mdo sde): dang 'chag pa la// 'phags pa dag ni ma g.yogs mdzes// nor bu rin chen 'od gsal ba// rgyal mtshan rtse mo ragasal na mdzes// 'phags pa 'gro na'ang mdzes pa ste// 'od nas
120b7(mdo sde): ma ma / 'am ba'am bzhin 'dug pa dang / sems cad du gas ma/ 'dags brdzun ma / ma tham sa ca

121a2(mdo sde): yon tamaldan pa yon tan bcam// gang la sdig pa med gyur pa// 'phags pa kun tu dge ba yin// bris pa sdig pa byed pa ni/ ji snyed brgyan kyang mdzes ma yin// gang dag
121a3(mdo sde): ga pa yang ga 'angs pa/ de dag drug gi tham par bdud rtsi thugs pa panan/ thug sa gsub blta ba na nga d+hAg/ de 'ad dag sbrul mi ba la zhug pa pa sa/
121a4(mdo sde): des pade dgagan du kun kun byas/ ba zugs thams cings par 'gro ba kun gyi gsos// 'phags pa dag ni nan tu chanas bkang bram \u0f7f// bdam tshad dag par

121a6(mdo sde): sa pas nas bras / ga mas sa kyi sbyi ma rnam pa dang /

121b2(mdo sde): rtag tu dbang po bsdams gyur cing // bdag gi khyod chog sems can gzhan la mi sems pa// de 'dra bdag nyi ma bzhin du ma g.yogs snang // de 'dra ba dag gdong g.yogs don cin/
121b3(mdo sde): gzhan yang drang srong bdag nyid che dang gzhan sems blo mkhas dang // de bzhin lha tshogs dag gis kho mo'i bsam pa dang // kho mo'i tshul khrims yon tan tho ma dang pag yongs /
121b4(mdo sde): deskabs na kho mos gdong bkab ci zhig dgos// dge slong dag rgyal po zas gtsang mas shAkya'i bu mos 'tsho ma'i slob pa bstan pa'i tshigs su bcad pa'i rnam pa 'di la bu 'di thos so//

121b6(mdo sde): do shal srang bye ba brgya stong ri ba dang / mu tig dmar po bzang pos spras pa'i gser gyi phreng bas shAk+Sha'i bu mo sa 'tshom la bkab nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// khro bar
121b7(mdo sde): dran yon tan ci 'jas brgyan pa dang / mna'ams rang mi yon tan ji ltar rab smras pa/ sems can dag pa de gcis zad par gyur pa ni// ma dang mar gyi rtsi tha'i/
122a1(mdo sde): 'drab bzhin// sgyu ma la bstan pa'i le'u sa bcu gnyis pa'o// 'gagasu pan ra rol pa zlas pa bya drug pa tshan pa'/

122a3(mdo sde): gyur pa/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang

122a5(mdo sde): nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba mang po dag 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ ma la skyes bu dam pa 'di/
122a6(mdo sde): btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang du ha cang yun ring du thogs par gyur na/ sems can gang dag 'dis yun ring po nas bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi po sbyin pa dang snyan par smras pa dang / don sdud pa dang /
122a7(mdo sde): don mthun pas yongs su smin par byas pa dang / gang dag 'dis byang chub thob nas chos bstan pa shes par 'gyur ba/ chos kyi snod du gyur pa'i sems can de dag med par gyur nas
122b1(mdo sde): phyis byang chub sems dpa' mngon par byung ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgyu ba 'am/ gcig tu mazlar grangs bram mo/
122b2(mdo sde): de nas de dag gus pa dang bcas/ rjes dang bcas par thal mo sbyar d+he/ byang chub sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal nas/ nam thig na bdag rag gis byang chub sems dpa' das pa mchog
122b3(mdo sde): dag pa 'di mngon par 'byung ba dang / mngon par byung nas kyang / shing gi rgyal po chen po de'i drung du 'dug ste/ bdud dpung dang bcas pa btul nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
122b4(mdo sde): byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang ldan pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang ldan pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'as
122b5(mdo sde): babaco brgyad dang ldan pa dang / lanA gsum du ba zlas te rnam pa bcu gnyis su bser ba'i chos kyi 'khor lo bla na med pa kor zhing / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par rol pa chen pos lnga dang mi dang lham
122b6(mdo sde): yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten mos pa ji lta bzhin du legs par bshad pas tshim par byed pa mthong bar 'gyur snyam pa'i bsam pa de lta bus sdod cing 'khod par gyur to// dge slong dag de la byang
122b7(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' ni bskal pa grangs med pa'i yang grangs med pa nas bzung ste/ yun ring por rtag par rgyun du 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos thams cad la/
123a1(mdo sde): gzhan gyi drang mi 'jog par gyur cing / dge ba'i chos stod pa thams cad la bdag nyid mob dpon du gyur ba yin la/ yun ring po nas dus shes pa dang /
123a2(mdo sde): shes pa dang / ran pa shes par gyur pa dang / mngon par shes pa las mnyams pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pas rnam par skye ba dang / sems
123a3(mdo sde): na gyi bsam pa dang / dbang po la mkhas pa dang / dus dang dus ma yin pa shes pa dang / dus la lta zhing rgya mtsho chen po ltar dus ran pa las mi yol bar gyur ba'o// de mngon par shes/
123a4(mdo sde): pa'i ye shes kyi stobs dang ldan pas 'di ni rab tu bzung ba'i dus so// 'di ni tsher bcad pa'i dus so// 'di ni bsdu ba'i dus so// 'di ni phan gdags pa'i dus so// 'di ni btang
123a5(mdo sde): snyoms su bzhag pa'i dus so// 'di ni smra ba'i dus so// 'di ni mi smra bar bya ba'i dus so// 'di ni khyim nas 'byung ba'i dus so// 'di ni rab tu 'byung ba'i dus so// 'di ni kha ton//
123a6(mdo sde): bya ba'i dus so// 'di ni tshul bzhin yid la bya ba'i dus so// 'di ni rab tu dben par bya ba'i dus so// 'di ni rgyal rigs kyi 'khor gyi nang du 'gro ba'i dus so zhes bya ba nas/ 'di na bram
123a7(mdo sde): ze dang / khyim bdag gis bar gyi nang du 'gro ba'i dus so// 'di ni lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang /
123b1(mdo sde): chen po dang / barba b+hin dang / tshungs pa dang / 'jig rten myong ba dang / dge slong dang / dge sbyong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma'i 'khor gyi nang du 'gro ba'i dus so// 'dod/
123b2(mdo sde): chos bstan pa'i dus so// 'di ni nang du yang dag par gzhan pa'i dus so zhes bya ba thams cad bdag nyid kyis shes so// byang chub sems dpa' dus thams cad du rtag par dris shes pa
123b3(mdo sde): zur cing / dus la lta ba yin yang / dge slong dag 'di ni chos nyid kyis thob pa yin te/ rtsod pa za ma pa'i byang chub sems dpa' btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang na 'khod pa rnams la phyogs
123b4(mdo sde): bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams klu dbyangs dang sil snyan gyi sgra las chos kyi sgo rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di dag gis yang dag par skul ba mdzad do//

123b6(mdo sde): dam pa rnams la yang dag sul/ sdug bsngal bcas gang sems can mthong nas ni// 'gro ba'i mgon dang skapas dang gnas 'gyur byed / pan byud mchob dang pra gcen myur g+sa
123b7(mdo sde): khyod kyis sngon ni smon lam de skad bta ga/ dag pa dpa' bo sngon gyi spyod pa dang // 'gro lan bya zhes smon btab dran par byos// 'di ni khyod kyi dus na mchod yin gyis/ drang srong mchog
124a1(mdo sde): rab mngon par 'byung bar byos// sangs rgyas lha mi 'dul byed 'jig rten mchog/ yon tan brgyas grang bar ni gyur cig ces// de'i phyir khyod mngon mgo
124a2(mdo sde): dang rkang lag dang / nor gyi dam pa sna tshogs rnams kyang btang / khyod ni khrims kyis brtul zhugs dka' thub spyad// khyod ni bzod pas 'gro la phan pa byed// khyod ni brtson pas
124a3(mdo sde): yon tan brgya yis gang // bsam gtan shes rab srid gsum mnyam pa med// khro bas non cing za ba'i dri mang ba// de dag bde gshegs khyod kyi byams pas khyab// dge ba'i
124a4(mdo sde): yon tan bral ba log par nges// mi mkhas rnam mang dag la khyed snying rje// bsod nams ye shes dge ba'i lus khyab cing // rdul bral bsam gtan mngon shes lham mer
124a5(mdo sde): 'dug/ phyogs bcu 'di dag rnams su rab tu gsal// sprin med zla ba dri ma med pa 'dra// 'di dang gzhan yang snyan pa rnam mang gis// sil snyan las dag rgyal bas sgra bzla
124a6(mdo sde): te/ mngon par khrod 'byung dus ni 'di yin zhes// lha mis mchod par 'os la skul ma 'debs// dge slong dag byang chub sems dpa' khyim dam pa mchog yo byad phun sum tshogs/

125b1(mdo sde): ba'i sgra gad de dag las byang chub sems dpa' la gul ba'i chags su bcad pa 'di dag byung ngo // bud med gang dag rab tu 'ad dga' sems dang bas/ sil ldan yid du 'ong zhing ldan
125b2(mdo sde): ba'i sgra 'byin tshe// phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba dam pa dog gi mthu yis ni/ tshigs pacad rnam pa sna tshogs nam mang 'di dag byung rtag tu mgon med gyur pa'i 'gro ba 'di mdza
125b3(mdo sde): nas// go 'bang mya ngan med mchog rdul med sangs rgyas te/ skye dang rga dang sdug bsngal dag las sgrol lo zhes// dpa' bo khyod sngon smon lam de skad btab par gyur// de phyir
125b4(mdo sde): dge sgyur grong khyer mchog 'di nas/ byung ba sngon gyi drang srong zhabs bcags pa/ sa phyogs de ni rab tu mnan nas su// rgyal ba'i ye shes mtshungs me 'chang rgyar gyis/
125b5(mdo sde): khyod kyi sngon chad sna tshogs rin chen nor// rlung lag pangs pa'i lus kyang btang bar gyur// drang srong chen po de ring khyod dus 'di// chos kyi chu bo mtha' yas 'grol ste/
125b6(mdo sde): khyod kyi rdul khrims mnyams dri med dge/ rngon chad khyod ni rtag tu mchog gi rgyan// drang srong chen po khyod khrims 'dra ba med// 'gro ba nyon mongs rnam pa mang las zhol/
125b7(mdo sde): khyong kyis srid pa brgya na bzod pa spyad/ khyod ni 'grobs ngan brjod nam mang bzod/ bzod pas bzod cing dul bas des pa'i bdag/ rkang sachis dbang po mngon par 'byung brgyas
126a1(mdo sde): khyod bcon brtan zhing mi g.yo g.yo ba med// bde bar gshegs pa sngon mthar rgya chen gyur// g.yon can bdud ni me dang bcas btul d+ha
126a2(mdo sde): ngan song gsum po mtha' dag skam par gyis// gang phyir khyod kyis brtul zhugs dka' thub spyad// dus ngan nyon mongs snyigs ma bsregs kyis la/ khyod kyis bdud rtsi nu
126a3(mdo sde): bo'i char pob ste// mgon med ring nas skom pa tshim par gyis// 'chi med mya ngan med gnas sangs rgyas te// skom pas nyam thag bdud rtsis tshim bya zhes// khyod kyis//
126a4(mdo sde): sngon smras tshig mchog dran byos te// grong khyer dam pa 'di nas myur du byung // khyod ni shes rab mchog gi spyod pa mkhas// khyod kyi ye shes mtha' yas dri med che// rmongs
126a5(mdo sde): pa'i yid gnyis lam la gnas rnams la// shes rab 'od dge dam pa mdzes pa gyis// khyod kyi srid pa brgyar ni byams pa spyad// snying rje dang ni dga' mchog btang snyoms
126a6(mdo sde): dang / khyod kyis spyod pa dam pa gang smad pa// spyod pa de nyid 'gro la rnam par phye// phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba dag gi gzi brjid kyis// yon tan me tog sna tshogs tshigs bcad 'di/
126a7(mdo sde): sil sran dag las rnam mang yid 'ong grag/ mal na 'dug pa'i gnon nu de la sul// gang gi tshen dga' byed bud med rab tu dga' ba rnams// shin tu mdzes shing rab tu mun
126b1(mdo sde): pa'i sil snyan sgrog pa'i tshe// phyogs bcu dag gi rgyal ba lnga mi 'dul ba mdzad rnams kyang // sil snyan dug las gsung mchog ha cang me che rjes su sgrog 'grol par byed/
126b2(mdo sde): yon tan mang po ldan khyod 'gro rnams su// rnam par rgyu ba'i tshan+da rgyal ba'i yon tan gzhug mar byas// sngon gyi brtul zhugs dka' thub smad pa dran gyis te// shing mchog
126b3(mdo sde): drung du myur song 'chi med po 'phang thob pa gyis// lha mo dag ni shin tu go mthong rgyal ba'i yon tan bral// khyod ni shin tu stobs ldan bdud rtsi'i ro bra rtag tu sbyin// stobs bcun
126b4(mdo sde): zo dpapa mkhas pa rnams kyis mchod byas pa// bdud rtsi doni mi bdag khyod kyis myur dran ma par bya// rtul ba'i yon tan 'grol ban pa byed la dga' ba bo// khyod kyis sngon gyi
126b5(mdo sde): bar nar dang nor bug ser rnams btung // rlungs bu thug dag dang grong khyer grong rda la bcas pa dang / rang gi mgo dang mig dang lag bdag dang bang pa'ang btang // mi mchog bla na
126b6(mdo sde): gna' sngon hrul po dge bar gyur pa'i tshe// me zhig khyod la mngon du phyogs nas 'di skad tshig sbas te/ grong khyer grong rdal bcas pa'i sa 'di kho la byon nyes byas/ de yi tshan
126b7(mdo sde): rab tu dga' zhing 'khrugs par gyur pa med// gna' rngon khyod ni rgyal ba'i bram ze dge bar gyur ba'i tshe// skye bo tha ma bsnyen bkur byed cing gzhan la labu mi byed// bram ze ma pa
127a1(mdo sde): dag dang skye bo mang po dge la bkod// de nas shi 'phos srid pa'i 'gro ba lha yi gnas su gyes// sngon khyod rgyal po'i bu las drang srong dam par gyur pa'i
127a2(mdo sde): tshe/ rgyal po ngan pa khros pas khyod kyi yan lag bcad pa na// khyod ni yid 'khrugs gyur pa med par 'chi ba'i dus byas te// de yi tshe na khyod kyi rkang lag dag la 'o ma zag
127a3(mdo sde): khyod sngon drang srong rdzo bsangs zhes byar gang tshe gyur pa na// ri mchog gnas na brtul zhugs dga' zhing bla ma la yang dga'// mi yi bdag pos drug mda' dag gis khyod la bsnun pa
127a4(mdo sde): na khyod ni rgyal po de la yid 'khrugs med cing snying cher gyur// khyod sngon ri dgas bdag po yon tan can du gyur pa'i tshe// rigazar 'bab chu chen pos mi zhig khyer bar gyur pa na// ban//
127a5(mdo sde): dang ldan pa khyod kyis mi de byung rje zang la bzhag/ khyod kyis dgra bo khrid de 'ongs pa na yang yid ma 'khrugs// mi mchog khyod sngon bram ze'i bur ni gang tshe gyur pa na// khyod kyi nor bu
127a6(mdo sde): rgya mtsho chen po yangs par ldang ba'i tshe// khyod kyis rgya mtsho chen po zad par bya bar brtsams pa dang // stobs brtan khyu mchog khyod kyi nor bu de tshe phyir yang rnyed// skyes bu mchog
127a7(mdo sde): khyod gna' sngon drang srong dam par gyur pa'i tshe// bram ze zhig gis bdag gi skyabs myur shog ces khyod gan 'ongs// smras pa bram ze dam pa kho bo dgra las byung zhes byas/
127b1(mdo sde): khyod kyis dang lus btang gi bram pa de ni ma btang po/ gna' dzin shing gi gnas sa drang srong rdzobasangs drung 'ongs te/ 'dod pas smras pa shing 'di la ma du yod rmongs shes byas
127b2(mdo sde): nga 'di lo mdze skyed yod pa rab grangs rab mkhas pas// khyod kyi de bzhin nor ba med cing mthun par tshig tu brjod// khyod sngon ne sgo yon tan ldan gyur shing la gnas pa'i rtsa
127b3(mdo sde): zad par gyur kyang sngon gyi drin la bsam te de ma spangs// lha yi bdag po khyod kyi yon tan dran nas rab tu dga'// rdza mkho bzhin du shing mchog de ni dpal dang ldan par byas// khyod
127b4(mdo sde): kyi brtul zhugs dka' thub spyad pa de dag mtshungs med de// yon tan ldan pa yon tan lam la spyad pas yon tan mang // khyod kyi dus la dbab grong khyer bcas pa'i sa yang thob
127b5(mdo sde): gra bdag ni rgyal zan yon tan spyod pa myur su yod// gang gi chen bud med rin chan bzang ma'i gas kyis las brtan te/ sal san dam pa mchog rab yid du 'ong ba'i sman
127b6(mdo sde): rab sgrog pa// de tshe phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba'i gzi yis tshigs su bcad pa sna tshogs pa// sgra dbyangs snyan pa 'di dag sil snyan dag gis skra las rab tu byung // rga dang shi bas zin
127b7(mdo sde): pa'i 'jig rten dag la bdag ni skyabs gyur ces// 'jig rten sgron ma khyod kyis bskal mang snga rol smon lam de skad btab// mi yi seng ge khyod kyi sngon gyi smon lam dag ni dran gyi shig/
128a1(mdo sde): rkang gnyis dbang po khyod mngon par 'byung ba'i dus ni 'di yin no// khyod 'dir srid pa zag khrig dag tu sbyin pa mang po du ma byin/ nor dang rin po che dang gamen
128a2(mdo sde): dang gos bzangs rin chen sbas pa dang // rkang lag dag dang mig dang phangs pa'i bu dang rgyal srid 'byor pa dag/ khyod kyis btang yang khyod ni slong ba rnams la tha ba zhe sdang med// khyod
128a3(mdo sde): 'dir zla ba'i tog dang mche ba bzang dang rgyal po zhi bar gyur// snying brtse snying rje'i yid dang zla ba'i sgron dang gtsug na nor bur gyur// rgyal po dpa' bo brtan dang mig bzangs dang ni de/
128a4(mdo sde): la sogs pa byas// rgyal po khrag khrig mang po sbyin dga' rnam par 'phrul pa de nyid khyod// bde bar gshegs pa khyod kyis bskal pa mang por tshul khrims spyod pa spyad// nor bu
128a5(mdo sde): rin chen dri ma med pa lta bur tshul khrims rnam dag gyur// khyod kyis 'bri yi rnga ma ci 'dra de 'drar tshul khrims bsrungs shing spyad// tshul khrims dga' bas khyod kyis 'dir ni 'gro la
128a6(mdo sde): rgya chen don yang byas// 'dir khrod glang po mchog tu gyur te rngon pa dgra yis mangs bskrun no// gtun po dgral snying brtse snying rje bskyed nas de ni khyod kyis bslabs// bza ni
128a7(mdo sde): mdzes pa'i mcho sa yongs su btang ste tshul khrims yongs ma gtang // khyod kyis de la sogs pa tshul khrims rnam par 'phrul pa mang po zas// bzod la dga' bas khyod kyis
128b1(mdo sde): tha'am pan drug bsngal sangs dang // cig su ba dag dang bsad pa dang ni bsrung ba mang po bzad pa byas// khyod kyis bran la sngon mig gang dag la ba ba kun gyis mthor byag
128b2(mdo sde): de dag po nas khyod kyigashed ma gyur kyang khyod kyis de dag bzod// mgon po khyod ni ro mchog gnas na gang tshe ched mor myur ba'i tshe// khababab cing rta thug pa ni 'jigs shing klag pa'i ma/
128b3(mdo sde): bzang // cab 'bras zhurnam par mang dang 'dre ba kun gyis rim gro zlas// de yis sur nga med la bsod pa khrid 'angs khyod kyis de la bzod// byang chub bcul gyi btul ba
128b4(mdo sde): dka' thub yon tan rnam mang ye shes la// khyod kyis brtson 'grus shin tu brtan par gnas shing mi g.yo ba med// dbang gyur bdud kyang khyod kyi brtson 'grus stobs kyis stobs ni
128b5(mdo sde): med par byas// mi yi seng ge khyod 'dir mngon par 'byung ba'i dus la dbab po// khyod 'dir gna' sngon kha ba'i kha dog 'dra ba'i rta mchog gyur pa'i tshe// snying rje bskyed nas nam mkha'
128b6(mdo sde): las ni srin pa'i gling du myur du song // de tshe 'phongs shing 'dug pa'i mi de blangs te bde la rab tu bzhag/ khyod kyis 'di la sogs pa brtson 'grus rnam par 'phrul pa mang po byas/
128b7(mdo sde): myur du 'gyur zhing g.yo la yul la dga' zhing rgod pa'i sems btul te// bsam gtan par gyur dul des zhi gnas rnams kyis nyon mongs gtso bo bcom// khyod 'dir bsam gtan
129a1(mdo sde): dga' bas rang gi yon tan dag gis 'gro don byas// da 'dir sems can mchog khyod bsam gtan rnam 'phrul bya ba'i dus la bab// gna' sngon khyod ni drang srong /
129a2(mdo sde): bsam gtan dga' zhing rab tu gnas par gyur// rgyal po med pa'i mi dag gis ni khyod khrid rgyal srid dbang yang bskur// khyod kyis skye bo dag ni dge ba bcu dang tshangs pa'i lam la bkod/
129a3(mdo sde): yi tshon mi las shi 'phos thams cad tshangs pa'i gan su dong // phyogs dang phyogs mtshams 'gro ba rnam mang shes pa'i cho ga khyod rab mkhas// gzhan gyi spyod dang 'gro ba'i skad shes pa dang
129a4(mdo sde): dbang po shes pa dang // tshul dang dul dang blo gros rnam mang rgya ba'i pha rol khyod phyin gyur// rgyal po'o sras khyod 'dir ni mngon par 'byung ba'i dus la dbab po// khyod kyis gna' sngon/
