129a5(mdo sde): skye bo la ba log par zhugs par gyur pa dag/ rga shi sdug bsngal rnam pa mang pos nyam thag 'khod pa 'di mthong nas// srid pa rnam par bzhig pa'i drang lam nyid kyis khong du chud
129a6(mdo sde): byas te// mun pa bcom pa khyod kyis 'jig rten dag la don chen rab tu byas// tshigs bcad rnam pa mang po mdzes pa yon tan ldan pa sna tshogs 'di// sil snyan sku bsgrags de
129a7(mdo sde): las rgyal ba'i gzi yis dpa' bo bskul bar gyur// blo mchog ldan pa khyod 'dir mngon par 'byung ba'i dus ni dbab kyis// sdug bsngal gang ba'i skye lo 'di dag mthong nas pa
129b1(mdo sde): skams mabyed cig/ bud med gos dang rin po che dang do shal spos phreng sna tshogs kyis// brgyan pa dag kyang sems dang pangs pa skyes nas rab tu dga' ba rnams/ sems can mchog/
129b2(mdo sde): lasal sngan rab tu sgrog cing myong bar byed pa na// rgyal ba'i mthu yos sil snyan dag las tshigs su bcad pa 'di 'dra byung // gang gi don du khyod kyis 'grol phan phyir bskal ba du mar ni//
129b3(mdo sde): gtang bar dka' ba btang zhing tshul khrims bzod pa brtson 'grus shin tu spyad// bsam gtan shes rab shin tu bsgoms pa khyod kyi dus la dbab kyis// 'dren pa mngon par 'brung
129b4(mdo sde): ba'i blo la myur soms phyi shol ma byed cig/ sngon chad rin chen mdzod dang gser dang dngul dang rgyan rnams rab tu btang // skye ba de dang de dag tu ni mchod sbyin rnam pa mang po byas/
129b5(mdo sde): khyod kyis chung ma bu po bu mo lus dang rgyal srid srog btang ste// byang chub don tu gtang bar dka' ba dpag tu med pa khyod kyis btang // khyod ni rgyal po mi dman bsod nams dpal gyis
129b6(mdo sde): rnam par grags par gyur// mu khrud 'dzin dang mu khyud nag po tshangs pas byin dang ral pa can// mchod sbyin song ldan dang ni chos sems 'od 'gro can dang nor bstan dang /
129b7(mdo sde): shin tu don bsams gyur te sems can dman la gtang bar dka' ba btang // zla ba'i bu dang brtson 'grus 'bar dang bsod nams 'od zer can du gyur// gtong ba tshe dang ldan zhing mthu
130a1(mdo sde): ldan khyod ni byas pa bzo bar gyur/ rgyal po drang srong zla ba gzugs ldan dpa' bo bden pa 'phel ba dang // rgyal po legs par smras pa tshol dang blo gros
130a2(mdo sde): bzang dang nges par gyur// zla ba'i 'od dang khyad par 'gro dang rdul dang phyogs kyi bdag por gyur// rab sbyin dpa' bo ka shi rgyal po rin chen gtsug pud zhi ba ston// mi dbang de dag rnams
130a3(mdo sde): dang gzhan du gyur te btang bar dka' ba btang // khyod kyis ji ltar gtong ba'i char pab de bzhin chos kyi char pa po ba/ khyod kyis sngon chad sems can snying po gang+gA'i bye ma skyed cig
130a4(mdo sde): mthong // sems can thar par bya phyir byang chub dam pa'i mchog ni tshol ba na// khyod kyis mchod pa dpag med bsam mi khyab pas sangs rgyas de dag mchod// dpa' bo grong khyer
130a5(mdo sde): dam pa 'di nas 'byung ba'i dus la dbab po// thog mar khyod kyis don yod zong la sa la'i me tog gis ni mchod// rnam par snang mdzad la ni dang ba'o sems kyis skad cig par du bstar/
130a6(mdo sde): rnga dbyangs ldan pa la ni khyod kyis an+dA ra yi 'bru gcig phul// can dan mthong nas khyod kyis rtsa yi me sgron blangs te khyim du bzung // rgyal po grong khyer 'jug pa mthong nas bye ma
130a7(mdo sde): snga ra gang rab tu gtor// chos kyi dbang phyug chos 'chad pa na legs shes bya ba rab tu byin// kun tu gzigs pa mthong nas phyag 'tshal phyag 'tshal lo zhes tshig tu brjod/
130b1(mdo sde): 'od 'gro chen po'i phung po la ni khyod kyis dga' bas gser zeng gtor// 'od zer rgyal mtshan la ni kha tshar phul zhing gsal la bal sran gtor// ye shes tog la mya ngan med pa'i ma
130b2(mdo sde): tog kha lo sgyur la 'jams// rin chen gtsug tor can la mar ma pad+ma ldan la sman yang phul// thams cad bi la gnos mu tig do shal cha mtshol ni pad+ma bral// bad+ma'i rlung
130b3(mdo sde): bo la ni za r-i seng ge la ni char gding phul// sa la'i dbang po rgyal la mar phul me tog rgyas la 'o ma phul// grags sbyin kun ta'i me tog phul te bden pa gzigs la zhal
130b4(mdo sde): zas phul// ye shes lhun la lus btu dgus byin la nin baba' dbul ba byas// rab mthor gshegs dang tsan dan mchog dang 'od ldan la ni mthar re// bkod pa chel
130b5(mdo sde): pad+ma dbul byas 'od zer rgyal la rin chen phul// shAkya thub la skur gang gser phul dbang po'i tog la bstod pa byas// nyi ma'i zhal la me tog rna rgyan blo gros bzang la gser
130b6(mdo sde): cod pan// klu zil gnon la nor bu phul te rgyal la ras bcos gding ba bral// sman gyi rgyal la rin chen gdugs phul seng ge'i tog la khri gdan phul// yon tan mchog
130b7(mdo sde): ldan rin chen dra ba 'od srungs la ni glu dbyangs kun// spos mchog me tog bul zhing 'od 'phro'i tog la rtag tu me tog phul// mi 'khrugs rgyal la khang brtsegs phul zhing 'gro/
131a1(mdo sde): rten mchod la phreng ba bul// rgyal spos gtsug la rgyal srid dbul byas rgyal bar dka' la thos kun bral// sgron mchel bdag phral pad+ma'i mchog
131a2(mdo sde): rgyan rnams dbul ba byas// chos kyi tog la me tog sna tshogs sgron ma mdzad la ut+pa la// mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs tha dad gzhan dang gzhan dag byed pa na// khyod kyis sems
131a3(mdo sde): can snying po de dag rnams dang gzhan yang sngon chad mchod// 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams dang ston pa de dag khyod mchod dran par gyis// sems can mgon med mya ngan gang ba yal/
131a4(mdo sde): bar ma dor mngon par byung // mar me mdzad pa mthong ba tsam gyis khyod kyis bzod pa mchog thob ste// rjes su mthun pa'i mngon par shes pa lnga po nyams pa med pa thob// de nas
131a5(mdo sde): rab tu dga' bas bkal pa 'grangs med 'jig rten khams kun tu// sangs rgyas dag ni re re la yang mchod pa bsam gyis mi khyab byas// bskal pa dpag med de dag zad gyur sangs rgyas
131a6(mdo sde): de dag mya ngan 'das/ khyod kyis lus rnams thams cad dang ni de dag ming yang gang du song // dngos po thams cad tha mar mdzad pa'i chos te 'dus byas rtag pa med// 'dod pa rgyal
131a7(mdo sde): srid longs spyod rtag pa min gyis grong khyer mchog nas byung // bskal pa bzad par 'gyur tshe gzi brjid drag po 'jigs pa'i me 'od ltar// rga dang na dang 'chi ba mi bzad 'jigs pa
131b1(mdo sde): chen po 'ong bar 'gyur// dngos po thams cad pa mar mdzad pa'i chos te 'dus byas rtag pa med// shin tu sdug bsngal sems can ltos la yon tan ldan pa mngon par byung // rgyal po dang /
131b2(mdo sde): ba'i mal nathal gyur cing // gang tshe mo tshogs gling bu chud gcig dang // mal snyan sna tshogs bla yis slong byed pa// de tshe sil spun kA las 'di dag byung // sring gsum rga dang nad
131b3(mdo sde): sdug bsngal 'bar// 'chi med 'ab 'a bar 'di ni mgon med pa// sred las 'byung la 'gro ba rtag tu rmongs// bum par chud pa'i blang ba 'khor ba bzhin// srid gsum mi brtan sngon
131b4(mdo sde): ka'i sprin dang 'dra// 'gro ba'i skye 'tsho gar la lha dang mtshungs// 'gro ba'i tshe 'gro nam mkha'i glog 'dra ste// ri gzar 'bab chu lta bur myur 'gyogs 'gro// srid sred ma rig dbang gis
131b5(mdo sde): skye bo rnams// me dang lha gnas ngan song lam gsum po// 'gro ba lnga po dag tu mi mkhas 'khor// dper na rdza mkhan pang lo skor ba bzhin// rtag tu gzugs sdug mchog dang sgra snyan
131b6(mdo sde): dang dri zhim ro mchog reg pa bde byed pa// dus ngan sA la 'gro ba 'di dag thogs// dper na rngon pa'i snyi la spre'u logs bzhin// 'dod pa'i yon tan mya ngan gnod pa mang // 'jig
131b7(mdo sde): bcas rtag tu dgra byed nyon mongs bcas// ral gri'i so 'dra dug sdong lo ma mtshungs// ngan skyugs snod ltar 'phags pa'i skye bos spangs// 'dod pa'i yon tan 'jigs bcas nyon
132a1(mdo sde): mongs bcas// rtag tu rjed par byed pa mun pa 'dra// rtag tu 'jigs pa'i rgyu byed sdug bsngal rtsa// srid pa'i sred pa'i khri shing 'phel bar byed// ji ltar ma/
132a2(mdo sde): 'bar 'obs ni 'jigs bcas pa// de ltar 'dod 'di 'phags pa'i skye bos rig/ 'dam rdzab che 'dra ral gyi gshegs nas 'dra// ral gri so la sbrang rtsis bskus dang mtshungs// ji ltar
132a3(mdo sde): sbrul gyi mgo dang ngan skyugs snod// de ltar 'dod 'di mkhas pa rnams kyis rig/ bya sha kham bu 'dra zhing gsal shing 'dra// rol khyi ltar dgra dang bcas pa yin// 'dod pa'i yon tan
132a4(mdo sde): 'di dag rngu rdzu 'dra// gzugs brnyan mtshungs shing brag cha 'dra ba dang // mig yor 'dra zhing gar la blta 'dra dang // rmi lam mnyam par 'phags pa'i skye bos rig/ 'dod pa'i yon
132a5(mdo sde): tan skad gcig ya ma brla// sgyu ma smig sgyu 'dra zhing brdzun pa can// chu bur dbu ba lta bur yang dag min// yongs su btags las byung bar mkhas pas rtogs// na chod thog mar
132a6(mdo sde): gzugs mchog 'dzin pa'i tshe// 'phags shing sdug 'dod 'di ni byis pa'i spyod// rgan sdug bsngal gzi brjid lus bcom nas// rnam par spong ste ri dgas krung skam bzhin// nor
132a7(mdo sde): 'bru dam pa'i rdzas mang stobs ldan no// pangs shing sdug 'dod 'di ni byis pa'i spyod// nor nyams sdug bsngal bar ni gyur pa'i tshe// rnam par spong ste mi yis 'brog stong bzhin/
132b1(mdo sde): ji ltar me tog shing dang 'bras bcas shing // de ltar sbyin 'dod mi la dga' bar byed// nor nyams rgabs nyen cing spong ba na// de tshe dga' bar mi 'gyur bya ba rgod bzhin// rdzas ldan
132b2(mdo sde): gzugs mchog ldan me dpon po bzhin smad na sdug sang dbang po dga' bar byed// man sdug bsngal nyim cing nor bar na// de ma 'dod par mi 'gyur 'chi bdag bzhin// na bstan gyu
132b3(mdo sde): na chod yal gyur na// sdong po gnam sngags kyis ni bcom pa bzhin// na bas 'khogs nas 'jigs pa khang rul 'dra// rga las byung ba thub pa myur du smos// bud med skyes pa'i tshogs
132b4(mdo sde): rnams rnabs sems/ ma wa'i 'bri shing sa la'i nags sdug bzhin// nabs brtson 'grus sul dang shugs 'phrog sa// dper na gyis bu'adam du bying ba bzhin// rkab pa gzugs
132b5(mdo sde): sdug gzugs ni mi sdug byed// rma bas gzi brjid 'phrog cing mthu spobs 'phrog/ rga bas bde ba 'phrog cing brnyas par byed// rga bas 'chi byed rga bas mdangs kyang 'brog/ nad
132b6(mdo sde): brgya mang dang nad thibs sdug bsngal gyis// 'gro ba gtses te mi yis so dgas bzhin// rga dang nubs bcom pa'i 'gro ltos la// sdug bsngal las ni 'byung ba myur shod cig/ dper
132b7(mdo sde): na dgun rmad rlung dang kha ba che// rba shing gel ba nags sman mdangs kyang 'phrog/ de ltar nang 'di 'gro ba'i mdangs 'phrog cing // dbang po gzugs dang stobs ni nyams par byed//
133a1(mdo sde): nor 'bru nor ches tha mar zad par byed// nad na rtag tu 'gro ba brnyas par byed// gnod par byed cing sdug la sdang bar byed// yongs su gdung byed mkha' las/
133a2(mdo sde): ma bsan// 'a dang 'bo dang 'chi 'pho dus byed pa/ pangs shing skrag pa'i skye bo drug tu 'bral// byer mi 'ong zhing 'brang bar 'gyur ma yon// shing las lo 'bru'ang zhing klu la rgyan da
133a3(mdo sde): mtshungs// 'chi ba dbang yod padag dbang med byed// 'chi ba 'phrog byed chubs shing de dag bzhin// ma ni gnyis min grogs med gcig pu 'gro// rang las 'bras bu ldan pas dpa
133a4(mdo sde): yang med/ 'chi bas srog chags brgya zag mang 'dzin te// 'byung ba'i tshogs la rgya mtsho'i chu min bzhin// grul mthar ling glang chen seng ge 'dra// rba rtsi 'byung ba'i chogs la mad
133a5(mdo sde): mtshungs// gyon brgya mang po 'di 'dra 'di dag las// 'gro ba srol zhes khyod kyis smon la mu btag/ sngon gyi smon lam spyod pa de dran byon// khyod ni mngon par 'byung ba'i dus la bag
133a6(mdo sde): gang ci bud med tshogs ni rab dgal zhing // sil snyan dag gis thub chen slong byed pa// de tshe bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyi mthus// tshigs bcang sna tshogs sil snyan sgra las byung /
133a7(mdo sde): 'dus byas thams cad myur du 'jig pa ste// mkha' la glog rgyan ring du mi gnas bzhin// khyod kyis dus 'di nye bar gnas gyur gyis// brtul zhugs bzang po mngon 'byung dus la
133b1(mdo sde): bab 'du byed mi rtag brtan pa ma yin te// rdza so ma btang lta bur 'jig pa'i bdag/ gnan gyi rdzas ni brnyan po byas dang mtshungs// bye ma 'i grong khyer ma bur ring mi sogs// 'du byud
133b2(mdo sde): 'di dag 'jig pa'i chos can // dbyar gyig la la ji ltar 'gogs bzhin// nu ngogs b+he ma yod pa 'jab ste// can la rag las rang bzhin nam chung ba// 'du byed mar me'i 'od
133b3(mdo sde): 'dra ba ste// myur du 'byung zhing 'gags pa'i chos can yin// rlung dang mtshungs par ring du mi gnas la// dbu ba lta bur nyam chung snying po med// 'du byed g.yo ba med cing spong ba
133b4(mdo sde): se brtag na chu shing dag gis phung po 'dra// b+h+ra ma lta bur sems ni mongs par byed// lag bsangs stong pas byis pa 'brid dang mtshungs// 'dus byas gyur pa thams cad rta dag
133b5(mdo sde): dang rkyen rnams kyis ni rab tu 'byung ba ste// gcig gis gcig rgyu byas te brten nas byung // byis pa'i skye bos 'di 'dra ma rtogs// dper na gros ma sun dzab rten byas la/
133b6(mdo sde): rtsol ba'i stobs kyis zag par sbyar ba dang // zo chun chud mo 'khor lor bcas pa yang // de dag re res 'grub par 'gyur ba med// de ltar srid pa'i yan lag kun grub pa// gnan
133b7(mdo sde): dang gzhan tshigs pa la brten nas ni// de dag so so re res 'grub par 'gyur// sngon gyi mtha' dang khyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs// sa bon yod na myu gu ji bzhin te// sa bon gang yin pa
134a1(mdo sde): bu de nyid min// de las gzhan min de yang ma yin te// de ltar rtag min chad min chos nyid do// ma rig pa yi 'du byed rkyen yin te// 'du byed de yang yang dag
134a2(mdo sde): nyid du med// ma rig pa dang 'du byed de dag kyang // rang bzhin stong ste g.yo ba med pa yin// rgya las rgya yi 'bur mi snang mod kyi// rgya de 'phos par dmigs pa'ang yod ma yin// de las/
134a3(mdo sde): de med gzhan las ma yin te// de ltar 'dus byas rtag med chad pa med// mig dang gzugs la brten pa byas nas su// mig gi rnam par shes rapa 'dir 'byung yang // mig ni gzugs
134a4(mdo sde): la rten pa ma yin la// gzugs kyang mig la 'pho ba yod ma yin// 'di dag bdag med mi sdug chos can yang // de dag bdag dang sdug par btags pa ste// nor pa yang dag ma yin/
134a5(mdo sde): btags yin yang // de las mig gi rnam par shes pa 'byung // rnam par shes pa 'gags nas 'byung 'gyur te// mkhas pas skye dang 'jig pa rnam par mthong // gang du ma
134a6(mdo sde): song gang nas 'ongs pa min// rnal 'byor pas ni stong ba sgyu ltar mthong // dper na gcub shing dang ni gzub stan dang // lag pas bcol ba byas pa gsum tshogs pa// de la
134a7(mdo sde): brten nas me ni 'byung 'gyur te/ byung nas ring por mi thogs 'gags par 'gyur// de nas mkhas pa la las brtags byas te// 'di ni gang nas 'ongs la gar song zhes/
134b1(mdo sde): phyogs dang phyogs mtshams kun tu brtags byas na// de yi 'ong ba 'am 'gro ba mi dmigs so// phung po dag dang skye mched khams rnams kyi// rkyen ni ma rig pa dang sred dang las/
134b2(mdo sde): de dag tshogs pa sems can zhes brjod kyang // de na dam pa'i don tu dmigs su med// mchu dang log ma rkan la brten nas ni// lde bsgyur ba las yi ge'i sgra 'byung yang // gog
134b3(mdo sde): mar rabarten nas ma yin rkan las min// re re la ni yi ge dmigs su med// tshogs pa de la brten nas ngaka de ni// yid kyi blo yi dbang gis 'byung mod kyi// yod dang ngag ni mi snang
134b4(mdo sde): gzugs med de// nang dang phyi rol na yang dmigs su med// mkhas pas ngag skad skra dang dbyangs rnams kyi// kye dang 'jig la rnam par brtags byas na// de tshe dag kun zag chas
134b5(mdo sde): bu dang // pad gcig pa dang snying po med par mthong // dper na shing dang rgyud la brten byas la// lag pas brtsol ba byas pa gsum tshogs na// sgra snyan pi wang gling bu la sogs pa/
134b6(mdo sde): de dag lnga ni sgra yang 'byung bar 'gyur// de nas mkhas pa la las brtags byas te// 'di ni gang nas 'ongs la gar song zhes// phyogs dang phyogs mtshams kun tu brtags byas na/
134b7(mdo sde): sgra yi 'ong ba'am 'gro ba mi dmigs so// de ltar rgyu dag dang ni rkyen rnams las// 'du byed gyur pa thams cad byung ba ste// yang dag mthong ba'i rnal 'byor pa yis ni// 'du byed
135a1(mdo sde): stong pa g.yo ba med par mthong // phung po dag dang se mched khams rnams ni// nang yang stong la bya ram sbyong bste// thams cad bdag gis dben zhing gnas
135a2(mdo sde): med la// chos kyi mtshan nyid nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid// chos kyi mtshan nyid 'di 'dra 'di dag ni// mar me mdzana' mthong nus khyed kyis rtogs// ji ltar nyid kyis rjes su rdzogs pa ltar/
135a3(mdo sde): de bzhin lha mi bcas pa rtogs par gyis// gnod pa yang dag ma yin brtags pa yi// 'dod chags zhe sdang dag gis 'gro ba gdungs// snying rje'i sprin las zhi ba bsil ba'i chu// 'dren
135a4(mdo sde): pa bdud rtsi'i rgyun ni rab tu phob// byang chub dam pa yang dag thob nas ni// 'phags pa'i nor gyis srog chags bsdu'o zhes// mkhas pa khyod kyis gang gi ched kyi phyir// bskal pa bye/
135a5(mdo sde): ba mang por sbyin pa byin// sngon gyi spyod de rjes su dran gyis te// 'phags pa'i nor gyis dman dbul sdug bsngal la// sems can kha lo sgyur ba ma g.yel bar// 'phags par
135a6(mdo sde): nor gyis de dag bsdu bar gyis// ngan song sa yi lam ni bcas pa dang / mtho ros bdud rtsi'i sgo mo'i mchog don// sems can bye ba mngal bsten zhes te// khyod kyis rtag tu tshul khrim
135a7(mdo sde): shin tu bsrungs// tshul khrims ldan pa'i bsam pa 'grub 'gyur gyis// sngon gyi spyod de rjes su dran gyis la// ngan song gsum pa'i sa yi sgo tshad de// mtho ris bdud rtsi'i sgo ni \u0f7f/
135b1(mdo sde): cas// mag chags rnams thong ma thag na dung // med pa'i mtshul sa sems can pasgral byas// bder rims cad med la dag dan// khyod /
135b2(mdo sde): shin tu bsgoms// sngon gyi spyod de rjes su dran gyis te// dgra dang gnod sems 'tshe bas dkrugs pa yi// 'tshe ba spyod pa yal bar ma dor bar// 'gro ba 'di dag bzod pa'i sa
135b3(mdo sde): la khod// chos kyi gru ni legs par sbyar byas la// srid pa'i mtsho las 'gro ba rnams bsgral te// zhi bder rims nad med la dgod do zhes// gang gi don du khyod kyis brtson 'grus
135b4(mdo sde): brtan// sngon gyi spyod de rjes su dran gyis la// 'gro ba rgyu ba bzhi yis khyer gyur pa// sems can mnan med pa dag brtson stobs dang // brtul ba'i shugs kyis myur du 'di dag zan
135b5(mdo sde): dbang po 'jal dang phal ba'i dbang po dang // spre'u 'dra'i sems las ni gnas ngas dgod ces// 'dren pa khyod kyis gang gi chen kyi phyir// can mongs gzhal ba'i bsam gtan sgoms
135b6(mdo sde): thur pa// sngon gyi spyod de rjes su dran gyis te// nyon mongs drabs dkrugs par gyur pa yi// 'grol ma g.yel nyon mongs gtses pa las// bsam gtan mchod la skye dgu 'di dag
135b7(mdo sde): gti mug ma'i gsun pa bsgribs pa yi// 'gro ba chos brgya mang po mthong byed pa// yang dag mthong ba'i mig ni sbyin no zhes// khyod kyis sngon chad shes rab shin tu bsgoms// sngon gyi spyod /
136a1(mdo sde): rjes su dran mis la// gti mug ma rig mun pas bsgribs pa yi// 'grol shes rab dam pa 'od bzang ba// chos mig dri med nyon mongs med pazin// zung med/
136a2(mdo sde): nams kyi sil snyan klu dbyangs las// tshigs su bcad pa 'di 'dra 'di zung ste// de thos nas ni chags pa rnams spangs nas// byang chub dam pa mchog tu sems btung ngo // dge slong
136a3(mdo sde): dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang na 'dug pa'i tshe// chos mnyan pa dang bral bar ma gyur to// chos yid la byed pa dang bral bar ma gyur to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge slong
136a4(mdo sde): dag 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' ni yun ring po nas chos dang chos smra ba rnams la gus pa dang bcas par gyur cing // bsam pa thag pa nas chos don tu gnyer ba/ chos 'dod pa/ chos
136a5(mdo sde): kyi kun dga' la dga' zhing mos par gyur pa// chos tshol bas ngoms mi shes pa ji ltar thos pa'i chos yang dag par ston pa// bla na med pa'i chos chen po'i sbyin bdag tu gyur pa// zang /
136a6(mdo sde): zing med par chos ston pa// chos kyi sbyin pa la ser rtswa med pa/ slob dpon gyi dpe mkhyud dang bral ba/ chos kyi rjes su mthun pa'i chos sgrub pa// chos la nan tan byed pa la dpa' ba/ chos
136a7(mdo sde): la gnas su 'dzin pa/ chos la skyabs su 'dzin pa/ chos la dpung gnyen du 'dzin pa/ chos la brton pa/ chos la nges par sems pa'i bzod pas nges par byung ba/ shes rab kyi pha rol
136b1(mdo sde): tu phyin pas spyad paste/ thabs la mams pa ma rtogs par 'ong du chud pa yin no// dge mong dag de la byung chub sems dpa' babs la mkhas pa rten pas rnam par zhing btsun mam ra/
136b2(mdo sde): thams cad kyi mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du spyod lam ni bstan// sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi yul thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa rnams kyi 'jig rten dang mthun par bya
136b3(mdo sde): ba'i chos nyid dang mthun par ni byas// yun ring po nas 'dod pa'i skyon shin tu rtogs pa yin yang sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i dbang gis 'dod pa'i longs spyod ni kun tu bstan// dge ba
136b4(mdo sde): rtsa ba dpag tu med pa bsags pa'i bsod nams kyi stobs kyi tshogs kyi khyad par gyis 'jig rten gyi dbang du bya ba mtshungs pa med pa ni kun tu bstan/ lha dang mi'i las shin tu 'das pa snying po
136b5(mdo sde): dang ldan cing rgya chel/ rnam pa tha dad pa mtshogs kyi gzugs dang / swA dang dri dang / ro dang reg mchog tu dga' ba nyams dga' ba'i 'dod pa'i dga' ba bde ba ni bstan// 'dod pa'i dga'
136b6(mdo sde): ba'i yul thams cad la 'dzin pa med par rang gi sems la dbang sgyur ba ni bstan// sngon gyi smon lam gyi stobs kyis grogs su gyur pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa'i sems can rnams ni
136b7(mdo sde): mtshungs par gnas pas yongs su smin par byas nas/ 'jig rten gyi kun nas nyon mongs pa'i dri ma thams cad kyis ni sems la kun nas nyon mongs pa med par btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang na
137a1(mdo sde): gnas te/ ji ltar 'gron du gnyer ba'i sems can gyi khams yongs su smin par bya ba'i dus la lta zhing / de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' shin tu rgyu cher sngon gyi dam
137a2(mdo sde): bcas pa rjes su dran no// sangs rgyas dang chos kyang mngon du byed do// smon lam gyi stobs kyang mngon par sgrubs po// sems can rnams la yang snying rje chen po gtong ngo // sems can rab
137a3(mdo sde): tu thar par bya bar yang sems so// 'byor pa thams cad kyi mtha' ni rgud pa yin par yang so sor rtog go/ 'khor ba la gnod pa dang / 'jigs pa mang po du ma yod par yang rtog go/
137a4(mdo sde): bdud dang nyes pa'i zhags pa yang yang dag par gcod do// 'khor ba'i rgyud las kyang bdag nyid 'da' bar byed do// mya ngan las 'das pa la yang sems yang dag par gtong ngo //
137a5(mdo sde): 'phags pa rgya cher rol pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// bam po dgu pa// dge slong dag de la byang chub sems dpa' ni sngon gyi mtha' nyid nas
137a6(mdo sde): kyang 'khor ba'i skyon shin tu rig pa yin/ 'dus byas la bsam pa thag pa nas don tu mi gnyer ba yin/ nye bar len pa yongs su 'dzin pa thams cad don du mi gnyer ba yin// sangs rgyas
137a7(mdo sde): kyi chos don du gnyer ba yin/ mya ngan las 'das pa la mngon du phyogs pa yin// 'khor ba la rgyab kyis bltas pa yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul la mngon du dga' ba yin
137b1(mdo sde): gyud yul dang / 'anas pa yas// maud pa la byu bar ldan dum mang baman/ mas bsnam pa la 'byung ba'i bams pa na ma / 'byu ba da sa /
137b2(mdo sde): 'thung ba la mkhas pa yin// rab tu 'byung bar 'dod pa yin// mngon par 'byung ba'i bsam pa can yin// dben pa la gzhol ba yin// dben pa la bab pa yos/ dkon
137b3(mdo sde): mtha' la mngon par dga' ba yin// rab tu dben pa bskrun pa rab tu zhi bar 'dod pa yin/ bdag dang gzhan la phan par zhugs pa yin/ bla na med pa'i nan tan la dpa' ba yin/
137b4(mdo sde): rten gyi don tu 'dod pa yin/ phan par 'dod pa yin/ bde bar 'dod pa yin/ grub pa dang bde bar 'dod pa yin/ 'jig rten la snying brtse ba san yin/ phan par 'dod pa can min
137b5(mdo sde): byams pa la gnas pa can yin/ snying rje chen po dang ldan pa yin/ bsdu ba'i dngos po la mkhas pa yin/ rtag tu yid yongs su mi g.yo ba yin/ sems can yongs su smin par
137b6(mdo sde): ba dang / 'dul ba la mkhas pa yin/ sems can thams cad la bu ga cig pa dang 'dra bar sdug par sems pa yid la byed pa dang ldan pa yin/ dngos po thams cad la mi lwa bar
137b7(mdo sde): yongs su btang ba yin/ sbyin pa 'ged pa la dga' ba yin/ lhag par gtong ba yin/ lam brkyang ba yin/ gtong ba la dpa' ba yin/ mchod sbyin byas pa yin/ bsod nams/
138a1(mdo sde): shin tu phran sum tshogs pa yin/ bsod nams kyi yo byad shin tu bzung ba yin/ dri ma dang ser rtswa dang bral ba yin/ sems kun tu ma bzung ba yin
138a2(mdo sde): bla na med pa'i sbyin bdag chen po yin/ byin nas kyang rnam par smin pa la mi re ba yin/ sbyin pa la dpa' ba yin/ 'dod pa dang 'dod pa che ba dang / chags pa dang / zhe sdang dang
138a3(mdo sde): rgyags pa dang / nga rgyal dang / gti mug dang / ser sna la sogs pa nyon mongs pa'i dgra'i tshogs phyir rgol ba thams cad tshar bcad pa'i phyir/ mngon par byung ba yin/ thams cad
138a4(mdo sde): mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa'i rgyun las mi g.yo ba yin/ gtong ba chen po'i sems kyi go cha shin tu bgos pa yin/ 'jig rten la snying brtse ba can yin/ phan pa 'dod pa can yin
138a5(mdo sde): ya lang bgos pa yin/ go cha bgos pa yin/ sems can rab tu thar par bya ba la dmigs pa yin/ snying rje chen po'i stobs dang rnam par gnon pa dang pha rol gnon pa dang ldan pa
138a6(mdo sde): phyir mi ldog pa yin/ sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa yin/ gtong ba'i lag ma can yin/ sems can gyi bsam pa dang re ba ji lta ba bzhin du tshim par byed pa min
138a7(mdo sde): byang chub kyi sdong du gyur pa yin/ dus dang byed par chos rtogs pa yin/ smon lam byang chub tu yongs su bsngos pa yin/ rgyal mtshan ma bskal ba yin/ 'khor gsum yongs pa
138b1(mdo sde): das ca ston pa yongs su gtong ba dang ldan pa yin/ ye shes mchog ga ra d+hA'i mtshan nam pa dang ldan pa yan/ can mongs pa bya la bshin tu rabazod pa san/ dul
138b2(mdo sde): dang yon tan dang spyod pa la zhugs pa yin/ lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las kyi mtha' legs par bsrungs pa yin/ kha na ma tho bza rab tsam la yang 'jigs par lta ba yin/ rdul zim
138b3(mdo sde): yongs su dag pa yin/ dri ma med cing dri ma dang bral la dri ma spangs pa'i sems dang ldan pa yin/ ngan du smras pa dang / ngan du brjod pa'i tshig gi lam dang / brgyad pa dang / skyo ba dang /
138b4(mdo sde): smad pa dang / bshung ba dang / brdeg pa dang / bsdigs pa dang / bsad pa dang / bcing ba dang / bzung ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi sems ma rtogs pa yin/ sems sa
138b5(mdo sde): 'khrugs pa yin/ bzod pa dang nges pa phun sum tshogs pa yin/ gnod par mi sems pa yin/ gnod pa mi byed pa yin/ gnod sems med pa'i sems dang ldan pa yin/ sems
138b6(mdo sde): can thams cad la phan par bya ba'i brtson 'grus 'bar ba brtsams pa yin/ yi dam la brtan pa yin/ dge ba'i chos thams cad yang dag par bsgrub pa la phyir mi ldog pa yin/ dran pa dang /
138b7(mdo sde): ldan pa yin/ shes bzhin can yin/ shin tu mnyam par gzhag pa yin/ semasas g.yengs pa yin/ bsam gtan la rtse gcig tu med la byed pa yin/ chos ba turnam par 'bye ba
139a1(mdo sde): mkhas pa yin/ snang ba thob pa yin/ mun pa mun nag dang bral ba yin/ mi rtags pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / mi sdug pa'i rnam par sems
139a2(mdo sde): yongs su bsgoms pa yin/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam dang
139a3(mdo sde): byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad shin tu yongs su sbyang ba byas pa'i yid la byed pa dang ldan pa yin/ zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gis shin tu dkar bar byas pa'i yid dang ldan pa yin/
139a4(mdo sde): rten cing 'brel par 'byung bar lta ba yin/ bden pa rjes su rtogs pas gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa yin/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum gyis rnam par rtse ba yin/ chos thams cad kyi
139a5(mdo sde): tshul sgyu ma dang / rmig rgyu dang / chu zla dang / brag cha dang / mig yor lta bur rtogs pa yin no// dge slong dag byang chub sems dpa' do ni de ltar rang bzhin gyis chos la gnas pa yin/
139a6(mdo sde): de ltar ye shes la gnas pa yin/ de ltar yon tan gyi che ba nyid la gnas pa yin/ de ltar sems can gyi don la brtson par gnas pa yin te/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi byin byas bdasas sbyinargya
139a7(mdo sde): kyis bdas pa'i sil snyan dang / glu dbyangs las byung ba'i tshigs su bcad pa de dag gis rgya che rabaskul ba dang / de'i tshe sngon gyi don gyi byang chub sems dpa' srid pa tha ma par gyur pa rnams kyi
139b1(mdo sde): btsun mo'i 'khor yongs su smin par bya ba'i chos kyis sgo mo bzhi mngon du byed do// bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa dang / ldan par smra ba dang / don bya ba dang / don mthun pa
139b2(mdo sde): bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi la sbyor ba/ bslab pa rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi mo mngon du byed pa dang / dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs yang dag par 'dzin pa'i bsam pa chud mi za ba'i thams
139b3(mdo sde): cad mkhyen pa'i sems smon lam gyi stobs bskyed pa'i phyir mi ldog pa'i yul zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sgo mngon du byed pa dang / sems can thams cad yongs su mi btang ba'i lhag pa'i bsam pa snying
139b4(mdo sde): rje chen po'i stobs la zhugs pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sgo mngon du byed pa dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad tshig rab tu dbye ba dang / don la rnam par nges pa'i ye shes kyi tshogs kyi stob
139b5(mdo sde): kyi khyad par yang dag par bsgrub pa bkod pa chen po zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sgo mngon du byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpas chos kyi sgo bzhi po de dag mngon du byas nas/ btsun mo'i 'khor thams cad
139b6(mdo sde): yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ de'i tshe rnam pa ji lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par byas pas/ byang chub sems dpa'i mthus sil snyan dang glu dbyangs de dag las chos kyi sgo rnam
139b7(mdo sde): pa 'di lta bu brgya stong 'byung ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par byed do// mos pa rgya chen dang ni bsam pa dang // lhag pa'i bsam dang srog chags snying rje bas// byang chub dam pa'i
140a1(mdo sde): mchog tu sems rtse zhes// de 'dra'i sgra dag sil snyan rnams las byung // dang zhing dad dang mos dang gus pa dang / nga rgyal med cing bla la 'dud pa dang // dri dang dge
140a2(mdo sde): btsi zhes tshol ba dang // rjes su dran pa bsgom pa'i bla byung ngo // sbyin dang dral dang sbom dang tshul khrims swa/ bzod pa'i grwa dang de bzhin brtson 'grus sgra/ bsam gtan mngon par bslab dang
140a3(mdo sde): ting 'dzin // shes rab dang ni thabs kyi sgra yang byung // byams pa'i sna dang de bzhin snying rje'i sgra// dga' dang gtang snyoms mngon par shes pa'i sgra// bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi po nam nges
140a4(mdo sde): bas sems can yongs su srin bu'i sgra yang byu // spyan bache bar gzhag pa rab byas// yang dag song nang de bzhin du 'phrul dang // dbang po lnga dang slobs lnga rabar bye dang /
140a5(mdo sde): rgyub yan lag smrani sil snyan byung // yan lag brgyad pa'i 'phags lam mchog dbye dang / zhi gnas sgra dang de bzhin lhag mthong sa// mi rtag pa dang sdug bsngal bdag med /
140a6(mdo sde): mi thug glu yang sil snyan rnams las byung // 'dod chags bral sgra de bzhin dben pa'i bla/ zad pa shes pa'i sgra dang mi skye skra// 'gog pa'i sgra dang de bzhin gnas med zla// myu nga
140a7(mdo sde): 'das pa'o bla yang sil snyan byung // rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mthu yis ni// sil snyan dag las 'di 'dra'i sgra byung ste// sgra de thos nas bud med thams cad kyis// sems
140b1(mdo sde): can mchog rab rjes brlabs byang chub smon// dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang na 'dug pas/ bud med brgyad khri bzhi stong dang / lha'i bu brgya stong /
140b2(mdo sde): mang po gang dag der 'dus par gyur pa dag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su smin par byas par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' mngon par
140b3(mdo sde): byung ba'i dus la bab pa dang / dga' ldan gyi ris kyi lha'i bu khrel yod pa'i lha zhes bya ba/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa des mtshan mo mi nya la tsam na
140b4(mdo sde): lha'i bu 'bum phrag sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ byang chub sems dpa' la rim gro bya ba'i phyir khang bzangs ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ nam mkha'i dkyil na
140b5(mdo sde): 'dug ste/ byang chub sems dpa' la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ shi 'pho ba ni shin tu bstan// skyes bu seng ges tshe yang bsan// btsun mo'i 'khor kyang bstan pa mdzad/ khyod kyis
140b6(mdo sde): 'jig rten rjes mthun mdzad// 'jig rten chos ni rjes thob pas// lha mi mang po yongs smin mdzad// mngon par 'byung ba'i blo dgongs pa'i// de yi dus la deng bab po// ma grol
140b7(mdo sde): bas ni sgrol mi nus// long bas lam yang sngon mi nus// grol bas sgrol bar byed par nus// mig ldan long ba lam ston nus// sems can gang dag 'dod pas 'khol// khyim
141a1(mdo sde): nor bu dang chung ma chags// de dag khyod kyi rjes slob cing // mngon par 'byung ba bzhed par mdzod// dbang phyug 'dod pas rtse ba dang // gling bzhi rin chen bdun
141a2(mdo sde): spangs te// khyod ni mngon par 'byung rig nas// lha mir bcas pa'i 'jig rten mos// khyod ni 'dod la mi dgyes te// bsam gtan bde bas gnas mdzad kyang // lha mi brgya phrag
141a3(mdo sde): mang po dag/ gnyid kyis log nas sad par mdzad// daral ba ba 'di shin tu 'da'// rig zar 'bab chu mgyogs 'gro bzhin// dar la bab pa yal gyur nas// mngon par 'byung ba mdzes
141a4(mdo sde): ma lags// de rmad thog mar gzhon pa'i tshe// dar bab dam par mngon byung ste// thugs dmanyam 'og chud mdzod la// lha mi'i don ni mdzad pa'i rigs// 'dod pa'i yon tan ma ngoms te/
141a5(mdo sde): dper na lan tsha'i chu dang mtshungs// 'phags pa rdul med 'jig rten 'das// shes rab gang ldan de dag ngoms// khyod 'dir rgyal po zas gtsang dang // yul 'khor rnams kyi yid 'od
141a6(mdo sde): sdug/ 'dab ma brgya yo zhal 'dra ba// mngon par 'byung bar dgongs su gsol// nyon mongs gdung bas rab gadrungs shing // 'byung med bsang bas dam brjing rnams// dpa' bas
141a7(mdo sde): myur du mtshungs med pa// thar lam zhi la dgod du gsol// khyod ni sman pa khams la mkhas// sems can yun ring na rnams la// chos kyi sman ni sbyar mdzod de// mya ngan 'das pa
141b1(mdo sde): mig meng mur pa ga'i mug grags// sa pa'i dru bas dkris pa la// wa rnams dang ni mi yi dmig/ shes rab blon mas myur du stongs// byang chub thob par bas ba gag
141b2(mdo sde): tha mi ma chos ma sa// wa dang lnga yin klu dag dang // gnod sbyin dri za mang po rjod// klu li rgyal pos rang gi gnas// khyod kyi dpal gyis snang bar mthong // mchod ga dag ni mtha
141b3(mdo sde): yas bgyid/ de yi bahral zhugs bsam pa sangs// byang chub shing drung yid rdzogs la// lhung bzed bzhi ni dbul lo zhes// 'jig rten skyong bzhi sde rabacas pa// de dag khyod la sngod/
141b4(mdo sde): seng mchis ngas pa rab tu mi sbed pa// byams ldan snying rje thob pa yang // bla med 'khor lo rab bskor bar// mi dbang gsol snyam sdod cing mchis// byang chub bsnyen bkur byed/
141b5(mdo sde): pa / byang chub snying por gnas rnams kyang / byang chub rnam par 'tshang rgya ba// blta'o zhes te sdod cing mchis// byang chub sems dpa' btsun mo'i na// bya ba ston pa gzhan/
141b6(mdo sde): yang mchis// de ga thog mar khyod gyur mdzod// de dag 'og tu lus su re// dbyangs snyan cing ni dbyangs 'jam pa// mar me mdzad kyis lung ston dgongs// yang dag de bzhin ma
141b7(mdo sde): nor ba/ rgyal ba'i sgra dbyangs pa sgrag tu gsol/ bskul ba'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// / dge slong dag de ltar lha'i bu des byang chub sems dpa' bskul ma
142a1(mdo sde): zag tu rgyal po zas gtsang ma la rmi lam 'di bstan to// rgyal po zas gtsang ma gnyid log pa'i rmi lam du rmis pa/ byang chub sems dpa' mtshan mo mi nyal
142a2(mdo sde): tsam na// lha'i tshogs kyis bskor te/ mngon par 'byung zhing mngon par byung nas kyang rab tu byung ste/ gos ngur smrig rtson pa rmis so// de nas de sad pa dang / rings pa rings par nyung
142a3(mdo sde): rum la dris pa/ gzhon nu btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang na 'dug gam/ des spras pa lha bzhugs so// de nas rgyal po zas gtsang ma 'di snyam du gzhon nu gdon mi 'tshal
142a4(mdo sde): par mngon par 'byung bar 'gyur te// snga ltas su snang ba ni 'di dag yin snyam nas/ khongs pa'i snying la mya ngan gyi zug rngus zug par gyur to// de yang 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag
142a5(mdo sde): gi gzhon nu ni skyed mos tshal gyi sar yang nam yang 'gro bar mi 'gyur te/ bud med kyi tshogs kyi nang na mngon par dga' bas 'di nyid du chags par 'gyur te/ mngon par 'byung bar ni mi
142a6(mdo sde): 'gyur ro snyam mo/ de nas rgyal po bas gtsang mas gzhon nu'i longs spyod kyi phyir/ dpyid dang dbyar dang sngon gyi dus ji lta ba bzhin du khang bzangs gsum byed du
142a7(mdo sde): bcug go// de la dpyi sa gang yin pa de ni shin tu bsil ba'o// dbyaras gang yin pa de ni grang dror ran pa'o// dgran sa gang yin pa de ni rang bzhin gyi dro ba'o// khang bzangs re/
142b1(mdo sde): ri'i gru sas rnams kyang mi lnga brgya lnga brgya brgyas 'dzugs shing 'degs so// de dag de ltar 'dzugs shing 'degs pa na gzhon nu sus kyang ma tshor bar mngon par 'byung bar 'gyur du 'ong ngo zhes/
142b2(mdo sde): sgra dpag tshad byed du grag pa byung ngo // ltas pa dang / mtshan mkhan kun gyis kyang gzhon nu ni chub sgo bkra shis pa nas/ mngon par 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan to//
142b3(mdo sde): de nas rgyal pos bkra shis kyi sgo'i sgo 'bar chen po byed du bcug ste/ sgo 'bar re re yang mi lnga brgya lnga brgyas 'byed cing gcod do// de dag gi sgra yang dpag tshad byed du grag go/
142b4(mdo sde): de la 'dod pa'i yon tan mtshungs pa med pa yang sbyor ro// glu dang rol mo'i sgra dbyangs len pa dang / gar byed pa'i na chung dag kyang rtag tu bzhag par gyur to// dge slong dag de nas
142b5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpas kha lo sgyur ba la smras pa/ deng skyed mos tshal gyi sar 'gros shing rta myur du sbyor cig de nas kha lo sgyur rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i gan du song
142b6(mdo sde): ste 'di skad ces smras so// lha gzhon nu skyed mos tshal gyi sar 'byung ngo zhes gsung / de nas rgyal po zas gtsang ma 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis gzhon nu skyed
142b7(mdo sde): mos tshal gyi sar nam yang ma byung bas sa bzang po blta bar bya ba'i phyir bdag gis gzhon nu skyed mos tshal gyi sar phyung na/ 'on tang gzhon nu bud med kyi tshogs kyis bskor te/
143a1(mdo sde): dga' ba myong bar 'gyur bas/ mngon par mi 'byung ngo snyam mo// de nas rgyal po zas gtsang ma byang chub sems dpa' la byams pa dang
143a2(mdo sde): rim gro byed pas da ste zhag bdun na gzhon nus bzang po lta ba'i phyir skyed mos tshal gyi sar 'byung gis/ der khyod kyis gzhon nu mig tu mi 'ong ba mthong bar mi 'gyur bar yid du mi 'ong ba
143a3(mdo sde): thams cad ni sol cig/ yid du 'ong ba dang / yul nyams dga' ba thams cad ni sbyor cig ces grong khyer du dril bsgrags so// de nas zhag bdun gyi nyin par grong khyer
143a4(mdo sde): thams cad brgyan to// sred mos tshal yang mdzes par byas te/ ras bcod bu kha dog tha dad pa'i bla re ni bres/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang ba dan gyis ni legs par brgyan to//
143a5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' lam gang nas 'gro ba'i lam de yang chag chag btab ste/ phyags nas spos chu'i chag chag btab ste/ me tog sil ma ni chal bar bkram/ pog por nas ni
143a6(mdo sde): bdugs/ bum pa gang bas ni mdzes par byas/ chu shing ljon pa ni bsgreng / dar tha dad pa sna tshogs kyi bla re ni bres/ rin po che'i dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba dang / rgyan 'breng dang rkun
143a7(mdo sde): po ni sbyangs dpung bzhi'i bkod pa ni byas so// g.yog 'khor kyang gnon nu'i btsun mo'i 'khor brgyan pa'i phyir btson par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems
143b1(mdo sde): dpa' bkod pa chen pos grong khyer gyi shar phyogs kyi sgo nas sbed mos tshal gyi sar 'byung pode nas byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyi mthus gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi
143b2(mdo sde): lha'i bu rnams kyis/ mi rgan po gtugs pa/ 'khogs pa/ lus la rtsa rgyus mthon pa/ so rgal ba/ lus gnyer mas gang ba/ sra byi ba/ skur pa/ gdung rten ltar dgu pa/
143b3(mdo sde): zhom pa khar ba la rten pa/ mthu zad pa/ dar yal ba/ mid pa nas sgra ngar ngar po 'byung ba/ lus dgu pas khar ba la brten nas/ yan lag dang nying lag thams cad dang
143b4(mdo sde): bzhig/ lam kar bstan par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpe' shes bzhin du kha lo sgyur ba la 'di skad ces smras so// kha lo sgyur ba mi rin tsam
143b5(mdo sde): chung zhing // sha khrag skams la rgyas lpags nyi tses dkris// mgo dkar so rgal lus ni rab skem la// khar ba rten cing mi bder 'khor 'gro su// kha lo sgyur bas smras pa/
143b6(mdo sde): lha cig 'di rga bas zil gyis non/ dbang po nyams shing sdug bsngal brtson stobs nyams// gnyen gyi skye bos brnyas shing mgon med gyur// don bgyid mi nus nags khrod shing
143b7(mdo sde): ltar bor// byang chub sems dpas smras pa// 'di'i chos 'di rigs kyi yin nam 'on tam ni// 'gro ba 'di kun la yang 'di srid de smras shig/ chog 'di yang dag ji bzhin
144a1(mdo sde): myur du smros shig dang / zos nas de bzhin don la 'dir ni tshul bzhin bsam// kha lo sgyu rabs smras pa/ lha 'di rigs chos ma lags yul 'khor chos ma
144a2(mdo sde): lags// skye bo kun gyi dar la bab rga bas 'jom// khyod kyi yab dang yum dang nye du gnyen tshogs kyang // rga las mthar 'gro ba yi thabs na gzhan ma mchis// byang chub sems dpas
144a3(mdo sde): smras pa/ kha lo sgyur ba'i byis pa'i skye bo mi mkhas pa'i// blo ngan gzhon pas rgyags shing myos pas rga ma mthong // da ni slar 'gro nga yang shing rta myur du sgyur// nga'ang rgal gnas
144a4(mdo sde): pas rtse dgas ci zhig bya/ de nas byang chub sems dpas shing rta'i mchog de slar bsgyur te// phyir grong khyer du zhugs so// dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa'
144a5(mdo sde): dus gzhan zhig na/ bkod pa chen pos grong khyer gyi lho phyogs kyi sgo nas bskyed mos tshal gyi sar zhugs pa dang / des la ma ka na mi nad kyis nyen pa/ dmu rdzing can lus nyam chung ba/
144a6(mdo sde): rang gi gcin rgyag tu bying ba/ mgon med pa/ skyabs med pa shin tu sha zung bar dbugs dbyang zhing brngub dgos pa zhig mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang yang byang chub sems dpas shes bzhin
144a7(mdo sde): du kha lo sgyur ba la 'di skad ces smras so// kha lo sgyur ba mi rtsub lus kyi mdog ngan la// dbang po thams cad nyams shing dbugs dbyung rab tu dka'// yan lag lus skams lto bas/
144b1(mdo sde): dkrugs shing nyam thag gyur/ rang grigacin tug med pa'i gnas na 'dug 'dis// kha lo sbyar bas smras pa/ lga cig mi 'di shin tu nad kyis btab pa rtse/ nad kyi 'jigs panye bar
144b2(mdo sde): mchis pas 'bum la thug/ nad med gzi brjid ma mchis stobs kyang rnams pa nyams/ mgon dang kya nga ma dang brang gnyen ma mchis lags byang chub sems dpas sbas pa/ nad
144b3(mdo sde): med pa yang rmi lam na ni rtse dang mtshungs// nad kyi 'jigs pa 'di ltar shin tu mi bzad pa/ skyes bu mkhas pas gnas 'dri mthong nas ji lta bur// rtse la dga' dang sdug pa'i 'du shes/
144b4(mdo sde): skyed par 'gyur/ dge slong dag de nas byang chub sems dpa' shing rta'i mchog de slar bsgyur te phyir yang grong khyer du zhugs so// dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa'
144b5(mdo sde): dus gzhan zhig na bkod pa chen pos/ grong khyer gyi nub phyogs kyi sgo nas bskyed mos tshal gyi sar zhugs pa dang / des lam ka na mi shi bar gyur pa/ khyogs la bzhag pa ras kyi bla re brab
144b6(mdo sde): bta nye du'i tshogs kyis bskor te/ kun kyang ngu zhing skad phyung ste/ ngul smre sngags 'don cing / skra gshig la mgo la sas 'thor zhing brang brdung la tshe nge 'don cing phyi 'brang gyur pa mthong ngo //
144b7(mdo sde): mthong nas kyang byang chub sems dpas shes bzhin du kha lo sgyur ba la 'di skad ces smras so// kha lo sgyur ba mi 'di khyogs la bzhag nas ni// mi dag smra bshig mgo la sa yis 'thor byed
145a1(mdo sde): cing / sna tshogs dag gi tshig na brjod la brang brdung bas// bskor ba byas te khyer ba su zhig yin// kha lo sgyur bas smras pa/ lha cig mi 'di 'dzam bu gling du gum
145a2(mdo sde): pa ste/ slan chad pa ma mchis brang bu rnams mthong mi 'gyur// longs spyod khyim dang mdza' gshes gnyen tshogs spangs nas ni/ 'jig rten pha rol mchis te slan chad gnyen mi mthong //
145a3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ rga bas gnod par 'gyur ba'i gzhon pa bir mi rung // sna tshogs nad kyis gnod 'gyur nad med cir mi rung // ring du mi gnas gson pa mkhas la cir mi
145a4(mdo sde): rung / rgal chags pa skyes bu mkhas la cir mi rung // gal te rga med nad med 'chi ba med gyur kyang // 'on kyang phung po lnga 'dzin sdug bsngal che yin na// rga na 'chi ba rtag tu 'brang ba smos
145a5(mdo sde): dgos// legs par slar zlog rab tu thar par bya ba bsam/ dge slong dag de nas byang chub sems dpa' shing rta mchog de slar zlog ste/ phyir yang grong khyer du zhugs so//
145a6(mdo sde): dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' dus gzhan zhig na grong khyer gyi byang phyogs kyi sgo nas/ bskyed mos tshal gyi sar zhugs pa dang // byang chub sems dpa'i mthus lha'i bu de dag nyid
145a7(mdo sde): kyis lam ka der dge slong zhig mngon par sprul pa dang / byang chub sems dpas dge slong zhi ba dul ba yang dag par bsdams pa/ tshangs pa spyod pa mig phab pa/ gnya' shing gang tsam du
145b1(mdo sde): rdzab/ spyod lam mdzes pa/ bran sum tshogs pa/ 'gro ba dang ldal pa mdzes pa phun sum tshogs pa/ mdun dul ba dang / g.yas g.yon du bsla ba mdzes pa/ bkram pa dang bltung ba mangs
145b2(mdo sde): pa chos gos snam sbyar dang lhung bzed dang / chos gos thogs pa mdzes pa zhig lam ka na 'dug pa de mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang byang chub sems dpas shes bzhin du kha lo sgyur ba la
145b3(mdo sde): 'di skad ces smras so// kha lo sgyur ba skyes bu sems zhi rab zhi zhing // mig phab 'gro la gnya' shing gang tsam lta byed cing // ngur smrig gos gyon shin tu rab tu zhi bar spyod// lhung bzed
145b4(mdo sde): thogs nas mi rgod mkhengs su zhig yin// kha lo sgyur bas smras pa/ lha gcig mi 'di dge slong zhes ni bgyi ba lags/ 'dod pa'i dga' ba spangs shing shin tu dul bar spyod// bdag cid ni
145b5(mdo sde): ba 'tshal zhing rab tu byung bar gyur// 'dod chags zhe sdang bral ba bsod snyoms spyod cing rgya// byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ 'di ni dge bar legs sbas nga yang 'dod pa ste// rab tu byung ba
145b6(mdo sde): mkhas pa rnams kyis rtag tu bsngags// de ni bdag la phan zhing sems can gzhan la'ang pan// 'tsho ba bde zhing nyams mthun 'chi med 'bras bur 'gyur/ dge slong dag
145b7(mdo sde): nas byang chub sems dpas shing rta mchog de slar bsgyur te/ phyir yang grong khyer du zhugs so// dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' la bskul ba rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di dag rgyal po zas
146a1(mdo sde): gtsang mas mthong zhing zos nas/ byang chub sems dpa' yongs su bsrung ba'i phyir// rab rgya chen po byed du bcug ste/ 'obs kyang rkor bcug/ sgo brtan po yang 'jug
146a2(mdo sde): su bcug/ srungs ma yang bkod/ dpa' bo rnams kyang sbran/ bzhon pa yang sta gon byas go cha yang gyon du bcug go// byang chub sems dpa' bsrung ba'i phyir/ grong khyer chen po'i sgo bzhi'i lam/
146a3(mdo sde): gyi sum mdo rnams su dpung chen po'i bkod pa bzhag ste/ byang chub sems dpa' mngon par 'byung nga re zhes de dag de bsrung du bcug go// btsun mo'i 'khor la yang res 'ga' tsam yang glu
146a4(mdo sde): dbyangs kyi rgyun bcad te/ dga' ba dang rtse ba thams cad kyang sbyor cig/ ci nas kyang gzhon nu chags nas rab tu 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba dang / mgu bar 'gyur bar bud med kyi rgyu yang ston ces
146a5(mdo sde): bsgo'o// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ zab mo mos pa'i skyes bu lag na ral gri mtshon thogs sgo gar bkod// go bgos mi rta glang po shing rta mi bskyon glang po'i 'brang ba'ang bkod// 'obs dang
146a6(mdo sde): shing thags dag dang rta babs phyir mthon po'ang byed du bcug/ sgo mo rgyang grags grag pa'i sgra 'byung ba yang gtan pa dam po bcug shAkya'i tshogs rnams thams cad yid mi dga' zhing nyin mtshan
146a7(mdo sde): bsrung bar byed// dpung chen de dag rnams kyang sgra skad shin tu grags par byed/ nges pa 'di nas 'byung du 'ong zhes grong khyer 'khrugs shing yid spangs skrag/ shAkya'i rigs skyes song na rigs
146b1(mdo sde): 'di chad par mi 'gyur grang snga ma byed/ rtse bo bred dag la bsgo ba rtag tu glu dbyangs rgyan ma bcad// se bas dga' ba rnams kyis bsnyen bkur gyis shing yid kyang mgu bar gyis// bud med
146b2(mdo sde): thabs spyod pa gang yin rnam pa du ma mang po ston// nges pa 'gro mi 'gyur bar bsrung bar byos shing bgegs kyang rab tu byos// kha lo sgyur ba mchog de mngon par 'byung ba'i snga ltas 'di dag ste//
146b3(mdo sde): dang gakhrung khrung drug dang rma bA'i gegs dag dang ne co rnams// khang bzang kar khung rngubabs mchog dang yang thog khri la 'khod nas ni// dman zhing dman la mi dga' mo bde mgo slang sems shi
146b4(mdo sde): sgra mi 'byin// rdzing dang rdzing chen dag gi pad+ma dag kyang rnyis shing rnyis par 'gyur// shing ljon skams shing yal ga me tog lcags la me tog slar mi 'chags// pi wang gling bu rgyud gsum gyis
146b5(mdo sde): ni brgyan pa de tshe glo bur chad// rnga dang rdza rnga dag kyang lag pas brdungs na 'chag cing sgra mi 'byung // grong khyer de dag thams cad 'khrugs par gyur cing shin tu gnyid kyis non// gang gi yid kyang
146b6(mdo sde): gar byed pa dang glu len pa la dga' ba med// rgyal po'ang mchog tu rab tu yid dman gyur te sems khongs chud cing 'dug/ e ma ma rung shA ka rigs rdzu 'phrul rgya chen mi tshig grang skam byed/
146b7(mdo sde): sa 'tsho ma dang rgyal bu mal cig na ni nyal zhing 'khod pa'i tshe// nam phyed tsam nas mtsho ma yi rmi lam du ni 'di dag rmis// sa 'di thams cad rtse mor ldan pa'i ri dang bcas te g.yos par gyur
147a1(mdo sde): shing ljon rnams kyang rlung gis bskyod nas rtsa nas mthon te sa la skyel// nyi ma zla ba skar ma'i rgyan dang bcas te mkha' las sa la lhung // lag pa g.yon pas skra
147a2(mdo sde): yang rab tu 'bal zhing cod pan lhung ba mthong // lag pa chad la de bzhin rkang pa'ang chad cing bdag ni sgren mor mthong // bdag gi mu tig do shal nor bu gser gyi 'og pag tshad par mthong /
147a3(mdo sde): nyal khri de yi rkang pa bzhi chags sa yi steng na nyal ba mthong // rgyal po'i gdugs kyi yu ba nor bus sbas pa dpal ldan mdzes pa chag par mthong // rgyan rnams kun kyang rnam par thor
147a4(mdo sde): cing chu yis khyer bar gyur pa dang // khyim thab rgyan yang gos dang cod pan bcas te mal steng 'thor bar mthong // grong khyer dag nas me sgron phyir byung grong khyer mun pas non pa dang // rin po
147a5(mdo sde): che las byas pa'i dra ba mdzes pa'ang chad par gyur pa rmis// mu tig do shal 'byung ba lhung nas rgya mtsho chen pos dkrugs pa dang // de yi tshi ni ri yi rgyal po ri rab gnas nas g.yos
147a6(mdo sde): pa rmis// shAkya'i bu mo rmi lam du ni 'di 'dra 'di dag rmis gyur nas// de sang mig nas mchi ma zag cing rang gi khyo la 'di skad smras// lha cig rmi lam 'di'ang rmis pa cir 'gyur ba na
147a7(mdo sde): bka' grol cig/ bdag ni dran pa 'khrul cing mig kyang 'khrul la yod ni mya ngan non// de yis de thos ka la bing+ka rnga sgra tshangs dbyangs sgra snyan pas// sa mtsho ma la smras pa khyod ni rab
147b1(mdo sde): tu dag gyur sdig pa med// sems can gang dag bsod nams mngon spyad de dag rmi lam de 'ang mi// sdug bsngal du mas chen pa rmi lam 'di'ang mi bgal yod// khyod kyis sa 'di
147b2(mdo sde): rab tu g.yos pa dang // re rtser bcas te sa la lhung rmis pa// lU dang klu dang srin po 'byung po'i tshogs// kun gyis khyod mchog gtso mor byed par 'gyur// khyod kyis shing rnams ca nas
147b3(mdo sde): mthon rmis shing // lag pa g.yon pas skra 'bal rmis pa ni// sa 'tsho myur du nyon mongs dra ba bcad// 'dus byas dag las lta ba'i dra ba 'byin// khyod kyis nyi zla sa la lhung rmis shing /
147b4(mdo sde): sar ma rnams kyang ltung bar rmis pa ni// sa 'tsho myur du nyon mongs dgra bcom mo// khyod ni 'jig rten mchod pa bsngags par 'gyur// khyod kyis mu tig do shal 'thor rmis shing // lus kun
147b5(mdo sde): chad dang sgren mo rmis pa ni// sa 'tsho myur du bud med lus spangs te// ring por mi thogs skyes pa'i lus su 'gyur// khyod kyis khri dang chag par rmis pa dang // gdugs yA rin chen smras
147b6(mdo sde): pa chag rmis pa// sa 'tsho myur du chu bo bzhi rgal cig/ nga ni 'jig rten gdugs gcig 'gyur ba mthong // khyod kyis rgyan rnams chus khyer rmis pa dang // nga yi gos dang cod pan khri steng rmas// sa 'tshe
147b7(mdo sde): myur du mtshan gyis brgyan nas ni// 'jig rten kun gyis nga la bstod pa mthong // khyod kyis me sgron brgya phyag bye ba dag/ grong khyer byung nas mun nag gyur rmis pa// sa 'tsho myur du ma rig rmongs pa'i mun/
148a1(mdo sde): 'jig rten kun la shes rab snang byed 'gyur// khyod kyis mu tig do shal chad pa dang // gser gyi cong tsong sbas pa chad rmis pa// sa 'tsho myur du nyon mongs
148a2(mdo sde): bcad de// 'dus dag las 'du shes skud pa 'byin// sa 'tsho gang phyir ngal gus par ni// rtag tu rim gro mchog gis mchod byed na// khyod la ngan 'gro med cing mya ngan med//
148a3(mdo sde): myur du dga' zhing mchog tu dga' ba 'thob// ngas ni sngon chad sbyin pa gya nom byin tshul khrims bsrung dang rtag tu bzod pa bsgoms// de bas ngal dad pa gang rnyed pa// de dag thams
148a4(mdo sde): cing dga' zhing rab dgu' rnyed// 'khor bar bskal pa bye ba mtha' yas su// dus ni byang chub lam mchog rnam par sbyangs// de bsang la dad pa gang byed pa// de dag thams
148a5(mdo sde): cad ngan song gsum po ched// dga' ba thob kyis mi dga' ma skyed cig/ tshoms pa thob par gyi sa la mgu skyed cig/ dga' dang mchog tu dga' ba myur 'thob ste// khyod kyis
148a6(mdo sde): rmi ltas bzang gis sa 'tsho nyol// sngon chad dge ba'i las ni gang dag bsags gyur pa// mi mchog rnams ni mngon par 'byung ba'i dus bab tshe// mtshan ma 'di dag bsod nams gzi brjid
148a7(mdo sde): bsags pa dang // dpal gyi gzi brjid snying po can des rmi lam 'gyur// de ni rkang pa dag dang lag pa chen po yis// rgya mtsho chen po bzhi po dag gi chu dkrugs dang // sa 'di thams cad
148b1(mdo sde): sna tshogs mal char gyu ra ba dang // ri bo lhun po mchog kyang sngas su gyur par rmi// mi la man ni 'od rab bkye bas 'jig rten na// munu pa mun nag chen po rnam par bsal ba dang /
148b2(mdo sde): las gdugs shig byang 'jig rten gsum khyo ba dang // 'od kyis reg pas log lhung sdug bsngal rab zhi mi// dkar gnag thog chags bzhi zhig rkang pa ldag pa dang / kha dog bzhi pa'i byas
148b3(mdo sde): 'ongs kha dog gcig gyur dang // mchog tu ngan pa smad pa ngan srugs ri la yang // 'dzegs nas 'gro yang de nas gos pa med pa mi// rmi lam na ni chu bo'i rab gang nas// srog chags rtse
148b4(mdo sde): ba khrag khrig mang po khyer ba las// de ni grur byas bskal de gzhan dag bsgral nas ni// de yis 'jigs med mya ngan med mchog zang bkod mi// rmi lam na ni nad pa mang po nad btab pa
148b5(mdo sde): nad med gzi brjid bral zhing stobs kyang nyams rnams la// de ni sman par gyur nas ci sran mang byin pas// nad btab sems can zag khrig mang po zar byed cing // ri rab ngos la sreng
148b6(mdo sde): no'i khwa la 'drag nas ni// slob ma thal mo sbyor cing lha rnams phyag 'tshal la// bdag ni g.yul las rgyal zhing lha rnams nam mkha' las// kun tu dga' ba'i sgra skrag par ni rmi lam mo//
148b7(mdo sde): bkra shis brtul zhugs bzang po yongs su rdzogs par yang // byang chub sems dpa' rmi lam rnam pa de dag rmi// de thos nas ni 'di ni ring po mi thogs par// mi yi lha yi lhar 'gyur snyam
149a1(mdo sde): ste lha mi dga'// rmi lam gyi le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis/
149a2(mdo sde): rgyal po chen po zas gtsang ma la yang ma byas shing // pas gnang ba med par mngon par 'byung ba 'di na bdag la mi rigs te// byas pa gzo ba ma yin par 'gyur ro snyam nas/ de mtshan
149a3(mdo sde): mo mi nyal tsam na/ rang gi gnas kyi khang bzangs nas byung ste/ rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i khang bzangs su phyin nas 'dug go// byang chub sems dpa' 'dug ma thag tu khang bzang thams
149a4(mdo sde): cad kyang 'od kyis gsal bar gyur to// de nas rgyal po sad pa dang 'od de mthong ste/ mthong nas kyang mu rab myur bar nyung rAm la sbas pa/ kye nyung chum ci nyi ma shar tam/
149a5(mdo sde): gang gis na 'di 'od kyis rnam par mdzes// nyung rum gyis smras pa/ lha da dung du dgrang byed kyang ma bso// lha gzhan yang nyi ma'i 'od ni shing dang rtsig pa thal mi byin// lus la gdung
149a6(mdo sde): bar bgyid cing tsha bar rab tu bgyid// nang bar dus na ngang padag dang rma ba dang // ni sorba zlag ngur ba dag kyang rang sgra 'byin// 'od 'di lnga yi yid du mchis zhing bde ba ste// rab tu sim
149a7(mdo sde): bgyid dge bgyid gdung bar bgyid ma lags// shing dang rtsig pa thal byung sgrib pa yong ma mchis// yon tan ldan pa gcig cig deng ni 'dir byon nges// rgyal po de ni mi dga' byegs bcur
149b1(mdo sde): bsas pa dang // sems can dag pa 'ad+ma'i mig can de mthong nas// de ni mal nas spang bar 'dod nam nus te// nam dag blo can dam pa pa la zhus pa skyed// de ni rgyal po'i mdun du 'dug/
149b2(mdo sde): nas 'di skad sbas// lha cig bdag ni mngon par 'byung ba'i dus bab rigs// bgegs kyang ma mdzad mi bgyes pa yang ma mdzad cig/ rgyal po gnyen bcas yul 'khor bcas te bzod par
149b3(mdo sde): gsol// rgyal po de ni mchims mig gang 'di skad smras// khyod ni phyir ldog pa yi dgos pa ci zhig yod// bdag la dam pa ci rmong spos shig thams cad sbyin// bdag dang po zang 'khor
149b4(mdo sde): dang yul 'khor 'di pan thogs// de'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sman pa'i tshogs smras pa// wa cig dam pa bzhi 'tshal de ni bdag la stsol// gal te stsal bar spyod na mnga' ni khyod la
149b5(mdo sde): mchis// 'on tang rtag tu khyim ni gzigs shing 'byung mi 'gyur// lha cig bdag ni rgabs tshugs par mi 'gyur zhing // rtag tu mdog bzang dar la babs par gnas pa dang // nad ma
149b6(mdo sde): mchis par thob cing nad kyis mi btab dang // tshe dpag ma mchis pa dang rgud par mi 'gyur 'tshal// rgyal pos tshig thos shin tu sdug bsngal nyams thag ste// gzhon nu gnas min slong
149b7(mdo sde): bas bdag la mthu med do// bskal par gnas pa'i drang srong rnams kyang nam du yang // rga na 'chi ba'i 'jigs dang chud las mthar to// rgan 'chi ba'i 'jigs dang rgud par mi 'gyur ba/
150a1(mdo sde): wa tshig gal te mchog pazhi 'di dag mi sbal na// gnan yang mchog cig gsol gyis rgyal po gsal du gsol// 'di nas shi 'phos nying mtshams sbyor ba mi 'gyur
150a2(mdo sde): mdzod// maM yi dam pa'i tshig ni gad thos pa dang // sred pa bsrabs te bu la chags pa yongs su gcod// phan byed 'gro bzar byed rjes su yi rang ngo // khyod kyi bsam pa rnams ni yongs
150a3(mdo sde): chu rdzogs gyur cig dpe slong dag de nas byang chub sems dpa' skur song ste// rang gi khyim du zin nas// mal na 'dug pa dang / de song ba 'am/ 'ongs par sus kyang ma
150a4(mdo sde): tshor ro// dge slong dag de'i nam nangs pa dang / rgyal po zas gtsang mas shAkya'i tshogs thams cad sogs te/ de'i lo rgyus rnams smos nas/ gzhon nu ni mngon par 'byung nad ji ltar bya
150a5(mdo sde): zhes smras so// shAkya rnams kyis smras pa/ lba bsrung bar bgyi'o// de la ci'i rmad du zhe na/ shAkya'i tshogs 'don mngal/ de na gcig pur gyur pas/ mthus mngon par 'byung ba'i nus pa
150a6(mdo sde): de la ma mchis so// de nas shakya de dag dang rgyal po bas gtsang mas shakya gzhon nu 'thab chos sbyangs pa/ 'os su gyur pa/ 'phongs bslabs pa/ chen po che chen mo'i stobs
150a7(mdo sde): dang ldan pa lnga brgya byang chub sems dpa' bsrung ba'i phyir grong khyer gyi shar sgor bkod de/ byang chub sems dpa' bsrung ba'i phyir/ shAkya gzhon nu re re la yang 'khor shing rta lnga brgya lnga brgya dang
150b1(mdo sde): shing ta re re la yang 'khor dpung bu cung lnga brgya lnga brgya bkod do// byang chub sems dpa' bsrung ba'i phyir de bzhin du zong khyer gyi lho dang / nub dang / byang kyi sgor yang shakya gzhon nu 'thab chos
150b2(mdo sde): blangs pa 'os su gyur pa/ 'bong bslabs pa/ chen po che chen po'i stobs dang ldan pa lnga brgya lnga brgya dang / shAkya gzhon nu re re la yang 'khor shing rta lnga bcwa lnga brgya dang / shing te re re la yang
150b3(mdo sde): dpung bu chung lnga brgya lnga brgya bkod do// byang chub sems dpa' bsrung ba'i phyir/ shAkya rgan rabs rgan rabs rnams kyang lam gyi bzhi mdo dang / mdo sum dang / lam po che mang po thams cad
150b4(mdo sde): na'akhod do// rgyal po las gtsang ma yang shAkya gzhon nu lnga brgyas bskor cing / mdun gyis bltas te/ ta dang glang po che dag la zhon nas rang gi khyim sgon mel tshe byed do// skye dgu'i bdag mo
150b5(mdo sde): chen mo go'u ta mis kyang rang gi zan mo'i tshogs la smras pa// mar me dri ma med pa bus la nor bu thams cad rgyal mtshan rtse mor thogs// mu tig rgyan 'breng rnams kyang skyongs la khyim 'di kun
150b6(mdo sde): bu 'od kyis snang bar byos// gru dbyangs dag kyang sbyor la do mod g.yel ba med par mel tshe dam du gyis// gzhon nu ci nas ma tshor bar ni 'gro bar mi 'gyur tshul du bsrung bar gyis// go bgos lag na
150b7(mdo sde): lag char dang // mdung zung mda' dang mtshon martse gnyis thogs// sdug pa'i bu ni bsrung bar bya ba'i phyir// kun kyang rab tu bsgrim pa chen po gyis// sgo kun chod la gtan pa dam pa chug/
151a1(mdo sde): 'phar sra ba rked par gtan chug la// dus la ma bab par ni sgo ma dbye// sems can dam pa 'di ni shor ta re// nor bu do shal mu tig do shal thogs// me tog
151a2(mdo sde): zla gam seng gi shing lo ris// ska rags sor rngub rna rgyan chings shing thogs// rkang rngub dag kyang shin tu legs par thogs// lha mi phan pa mang po glang po dregs bzhin 'gro// gal te rmo
151a3(mdo sde): bur mngon par byung nga re// ci nas mi bde rnyed par ma gyur par// de ltar de ltar nan tan cher gyis shig/ bud med gang dag mdung zung thogs pa dag/ dri ma med pa lam na 'dug pa skor/
151a4(mdo sde): ci nas gnyid kyis log par ma gyur pa// phye ma leb bzhin mig gis bsrung bar gyis// rgyal bu 'di ni bsrung bar bya ba'i phyir// khyim 'dir rin po che yi dra ba bres// gling bu dag kyang rab tu
151a5(mdo sde): bud cing long // do mod rdul dang bral ba bsrung bar gyis// phan tshun gcig la gcig ni sgron byas te// do mod mnyal shin tu bsrung bar gyis// rgyal srid dang ni yul 'khor spangs nas su//
151a6(mdo sde): khyim nas mngon tu 'byung bar gyur ta re// 'di ni mngon par byung bar gyur na go/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'di kun nyams mi dga'// rgyal po'i rigs rgyud yun ring gnas pa yang // rgyal po'i rig
151a7(mdo sde): kyi rgyud ni chad par 'gyur/ dge slong dag de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon was rtsen la sogs pa// gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang / 'phro ma bu lnga brgya rnams
151b1(mdo sde): gcig tu 'dus nas// 'di skad ces smras te/ grogs po dag do nub byang chub sems dpa' mngon par 'byung gis/ khyed cag de la mchod pa byed pa'i las la spro bar gyis shig/ rgyal po chen po/
151b2(mdo sde): ban yang ljang lo can gyi pho zang du zhugs nas/ gnod sbyin gyi 'khor chen po la sbas pa/ thogs po dag ro mod byang chub sems dpa' mngon par 'byung gis/ khyed kyis bcibs pa'i
151b3(mdo sde): lag nas theg la 'byung bar gyis shig/ gnod sbyin gyi 'khor gyis smras pa/ mu ni sred med bu yi stobs ldan rdo rje lta bur me phyed bral lci/ sems can kun gyi dam pa deni brtson 'grus
151b4(mdo sde): stobs ldan g.yo ba mi mnga' ste// ri yi dam pa lhun po chen po rmang nas byung ste nam mkha' gzung nus kyi// rgyal ba'i yon tan lhung ba lhun po'i ri lI bsod nams ye shes gnas pa sus
151b5(mdo sde): kyang gang du bkur mi nus// rnam thos kyi bus smras pa// mi gang nga rgyal 'gying ba de la ston pa lnga/ gang dag dga' gus gnas pa de dag yang bar tshor// bsam pas thags pas brtson
151b6(mdo sde): bar byos la gus pa yis// bya yis sha kham bzhin du yang bar shes par gyis// kho bo mdun nas 'gro yis khyed cag rnams kyis bcibs pa theg/ byang chub sems dpa' mngon par 'byung
151b7(mdo sde): tshe bsod nams mang po sogs// dge slong dag de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams la sbas pa/ kye grogs po dag do nub byang chub sems dpa'
152a1(mdo sde): mngon par 'byung gis// de la khyed thams cad mchod pa'i las la spro bar gyis shig/ de nas lha'i bu zhi ba'i blo gros zhes bya ba des 'di skad ces
152a2(mdo sde): smras so// bdag gis ni ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po'i skyed pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo thams cad gnyid kyis log par bgyi'o// lha'i bu rtse ba bkod pa zhes bya ba
152a3(mdo sde): des 'di skad ces smras so// bdag gis ni rta dang / glang po che dang / bong bu dang / rnga mo dang / ba lang dang / ma he dang / skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo rnams kyi sgra mi grag par
152a4(mdo sde): bgyi'o// lha'i bu bkod pa'i blo gros zhes bya ba des 'di skad ces smras so// bdag gis ni nam mkha'i dkyil na shing rta chen po bdun rin po che'i stegs bus 'khor bar bskor ba/ nor
152a5(mdo sde): bu rin po che me shel gyi 'od 'bar ba/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan bsgreng ba/ me tog sna tshogs chal par bkram pa/ pog bor nas/ gdug spos sna tshogs kyis gdugs pa dag
152a6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' lam gang nas 'byung ba'i lam der dgod par bgyi'o// klu'i rgyal po sa srung gi bu zhes bya bas 'di skad ces smras so// bdag gis ni bdag nyid kyi snal bang pa
152a7(mdo sde): tshigs pa dpag tshad sum cu rtsa gnyis pa bgyis te/ der wa'i bu mo dag bkod la sol snyan dang gru dbyangs len du phu la// glu dang rol mo'i dbyangs sgra chen pos byang chub sems dpa'/
152b1(mdo sde): la'i mgro dang / bsnyen bkur bgyid cing mtsho bar bgyi'o// lha'i dbang po brgya byin nyid kyis 'di skad ces smras so// kho bos ni sgo dbye'o// lam mtshon par bya'o// wa'i bu chos spyod kyis
152b2(mdo sde): 'di skad ces smras so// bdag gis ni btsun mo'i 'khor rnams mi thug par snyan par bgyi'o// lha'i bu yang dag srul pos smras pa/ bdag gis ni byang chub sems dpa' gzims mal nas
152b3(mdo sde): bzhengs gsol bar bgyi'o// de nas klu'i rgyal po chu wa dang / klu'i rgyal po gzi can dang / klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho dang / klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa dang / klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang / nyed
152b4(mdo sde): bos 'di skad ces smras so// bdag gis ni byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir// dus kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i tsan dan gyi sprin mngon par sprul te/ tsan dan sbrul gyi snying
152b5(mdo sde): po'i phye ma'i char dbab po// dge slong dag de ltar lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri ba rnams kyis rnam pa 'di lta bu'i bsam pa nges par bsams te btsams so// byang chub sem/
152b6(mdo sde): dpa' chos sems pa la zhugs pa glu dbyangs len pa'i khang bzangs mal bde ba la 'dug pa/ btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang na 'dug pa na sngon gyi sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa rnam par sems shi
152b7(mdo sde): sems can la phan pa bya ba rjes su sems la sngon gyis tshig bzhi mngon du byed do// bzhi gang zhe na/ nga sngon rang byung gis bdag po 'dod cing thams cad mkhyen pa nyid don du gnyer ba na/ go cha
153a1(mdo sde): 'di lta bu bgos par gyur te/ sems can sdug bsngal ba dag mthong nas/ kye ma'o bdag gis 'jig rten gnas pa bcings te 'khor ba'i brtson chen por bcug
153a2(mdo sde): pa la 'khor ba'i brtson ra dral te bcibs pa bkrol ba'i sgra glog go// sred pa'i zhags pa dang / sgrog dam pos bcings pa'i sems can rnams kyang rab tu dgrol lo zhes bya ba sngon gyi smon
153a3(mdo sde): lam gyi tshig dang po 'di mngon du gyur to// kye ma'o bdag gis 'jig rten ma rig pa'i mun pa mun nag thibs po chen por zhugs pa mi shes pa'i ling tog dang / rab rib kyis mig bsgribs/
153a4(mdo sde): pa/ shes rab kyi mig dang bral ba/ ma rig pa dang / gti mug gis ldongs pa la chos kyi snang ba chen po bya zhing ye shes kyi sgron ma yang nye bar rab sbubs la rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum shes pa'i
153a5(mdo sde): mig sman ril lu dang / rman thabs dang / shes rab dang / ye shes dang ldan pa btang ste/ ma rig pa'i mun pa mun nag dang / gti mug gi mun pa dang / rab rib dang / long tog dang /
153a6(mdo sde): rnyog pa thams cad bsal nas shes rab kyi mig rnam par blang ngo zhes bya ba sngon gyis smon lam myos tshig gnyis pa 'di mngon du thar to// kye ma'o bdag gis 'jig rten du rgyal gyi rgyal mnan
153a7(mdo sde): bsgreng ba/ ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin pa la mngon par shes pa/ bdag dang bdag gir 'dzin pa dang ldan pa'i yid can 'du shes dang / sems dang lta ba phyin ci log gis byin ci log tu
153b1(mdo sde): zlar pa/ gzung bangan pas zin pa la 'bags pa'i lam bstan te/ bajoms pa'i rgyal brnal bar bya zhes bya brjon gyi smon las mi tshig gsum pa 'di mngon na gyur to// se ma'i bdags
153b2(mdo sde): 'jig rten rnam par ma zhi ba/ zags 'khrugs pa lta bur gyur pa/ dru bu 'dzings pa lta bur gyur pa/ 'ong ba dang 'gro bar gyur ba/ 'jig rten 'di nas 'jig rten pa rol dang / 'jig rten pa rol nas
153b3(mdo sde): 'jig rten 'dir kun tu rgyug cing 'khor la 'khor ba las mi ldog pa/ mgal me'i 'khor lo lta bur gyur pa la/ nye bar zhi bar byed pa'i shes rab kyis chog par byed pa'i chos kyang bstan to zhes bya ba
153b4(mdo sde): sngon gyi smon lam gyi chog bzhi po 'di mngon du gyur te/ sngon gyi smon lam gyi tshig bzhi po de dag mngon du gyur to// skad cig de la lha'i bu chos spyod pa dang / gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams
153b5(mdo sde): kyis btsun mo'i 'khor mi sdug par bsgyur te mi sdug par gnas pa dang / smad pa'i gzugs su bstan nas/ nam mkha' la 'dod de/ byang chub sems dpa' la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/
153b6(mdo sde): de nas lha bu rdzu 'phrul che rnams kyis// pad+ma rgyas pa yangs pa'i spyan la spras// dur khrod dbus 'dir zhugs par gyur lags nas// khyod ni ji ltar dgyes pa skye bar 'gyur// lha yi dbang
153b7(mdo sde): byug rnams de bskul nas// yud tsam btsun mo'i 'khor la lta zhing rtog/ bltas nas smad par gyur pa de dag mthong // dur khrod gnas par gyur pa bden snyam byed// byang chub sems dpas thams
154a1(mdo sde): car dang ldan pa'i bud med kyi tshogs la rnam par bltas pa dang / kha cig ni ga zhig/ kha cig ni rgyan bral/ kha cig ni cod pan lhung / kha cig ni drag pa mi sdug par gyur/
154a2(mdo sde): cig ni lus rnam par 'khrugs/ kha cig ni bzhin mi sdug par gnas/ kha cig ni mig gyur/ kha cig ni kha chu zag/ kha cig ni sngur/ kha cig ni lud pa lu/ kha cig ni rgod/ kha cig ni brdol/ kha cig/
154a3(mdo sde): ni so 'khrig/ kha cig ni bzhin mdog gyur/ kha cig ni gzugs mi sdug par gyur te/ lag pa ring por gyur/ kha cig ni rkyang pa bral/ kha cig ni mgo byung / kha cig ni mgo g.yogs/ kha cig ni bzhin
154a4(mdo sde): gyi dbyibs gyur/ kha cig ni lus ma rungs par gyur/ kha cig ni lus sgren mor gyur/ kha cig ni lus bskums shing sbur/ kha cig ni rdza rnga la 'khyud nas lus gan rkyal du 'gyel/ kha cig ni bi wang
154a5(mdo sde): dang rgyud gsum pa'i steng du lag pa brkyang / kha cig ni gling bu la sogs 'debs/ kha cig ni rol mo'i cha byad/ kim pa la dang / na gu la dang / khar ba'i sil khrol dang / pheg la 'dzin/ kha cig/
154a6(mdo sde): ni mig 'dzums shing 'byed la gyur/ kha cog ni kha gdangs par gyur te/ de lta ra sa la mi sdug par gnas par gyur pa'i btsun mo'i 'khor la lta zhing / byang chub sems dpa' dur khrod kyi 'du shes
154a7(mdo sde): bskyed do// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ 'jig rten mgon des de mthong yid zung ste// snying rjes shugs phyung nas ni 'di skad smras// e ma skye dgu dag ni sdug bsngal gyur// srin mo'i tshogs la dag
154b1(mdo sde): ba ji ltar rnyed// 'dod pa'i yon tan yod min yon tan 'dzin// gti mug mun pas rab bsgribapa blo gros ngan/ dper na bya ni bya rgyar chud pa bzhin// nam yang 'byung ba brnyed par 'gyur ma yin/
154b2(mdo sde): 'phags pa rgya cher rol pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// bam po bcu pa de nas byang chub sems dpas chos snang ba'i sgo 'di/ yang btsun mor
154b3(mdo sde): 'khor la rtog cing / snying rje chen po'i sbubs/ sems can gyi phyir skye ste/ 'di na byis pa de dag ni gsod pa ste/ bsad pa'i gnas su bsad par bya ba gsod pa dang mtshungs so// 'di na byis pa de dag
154b4(mdo sde): ni chags pa ste/ ngan skyugs kyis gang ba'i snod ri mo can rnams la mi mkhas pa chags pa dang mtshungs so// 'di na byis pa de dag ni 'bying ba ste/ glang po che chur 'bying ba dang mtshungs so// 'di ni byis
154b5(mdo sde): pa de dag ni btsas pa ste/ btson ra'i nang gi btson btsas pa dang mtshungs so// 'di na byis pa de dag ni mngon par dga' ba ste/ phag mi gtsang ba la dga' ba dang mtshungs so// 'di na byis pa de dag ni/
154b6(mdo sde): chags pa ste/ khyi ni keng rus la chags pa dang mtshungs so// 'di na byis pa de dag ni rab tu lhung ba ste/ phye ma leb mar me'i me lcer lhung ba dang mtshungs so// 'di na byis pa de dag ni thogs pa ste/
154b7(mdo sde): spre'u nong la thogs pa dang mtshungs so// 'di na byis pa de dag ni yongs su bzung ba ste/ rgya sa min pa dang mtshungs so// 'di na byis pa de dag ni yongs su gtugs pa ste/ sha 'tshong gi gnas kyi
155a1(mdo sde): lug dang mtshungs so// 'di na byis pa de dag ni bkrug pa ste/ sdig pa byed pa gsal shing gi rtse mo la btsugs pa dang mtshungs so// 'di na byis pa de dag ni 'gying zhing thog
155a2(mdo sde): pa ste/ glang po che rgan po 'dam du song ba dang mtshungs so// 'di na byis pa de dag ni phongs pa ste/ rgya mtsho chen por gru'i snam bu zhig pa dang mtshungs so// 'di na byis pa de dag ni lhung ba ste/ dmus/
155a3(mdo sde): long g.yang sa chen por lhung ba dang mtshungs so// 'di na byis pa de dag ni yongs su zad par 'gyur ba ste/ sa'i gting gi mtshams su song ba'i chu dang mtshungs so// 'di na byis pa de dag ni du ba'i
155a4(mdo sde): 'thul ba ste/ bskal pa zad pa'i sa chen po dang mtshungs so// 'di na byis pa de dag ni 'khor ba ste/ rdza mkhan gyi 'khor lo'i shugs dang mtshungs so// 'di na byis pa de dag ni 'brog 'tshal ba ste/
155a5(mdo sde): dmus long ri la phyin pa dang mtshungs so// 'di na byis pa de dag ni btags shing 'khor ba ste/ khyi ltong gis btags pa dang mtshungs so// 'di na byis pa de dag ni brnyes pa ste/ dpyid kyi phra dang /
155a6(mdo sde): nags tshal dang mtshungs so// 'di na byis pa de dag ni yongs su rnams pa ste/ zlab mar gyi ngo'i zlab dang mtshungs so// 'di dag ni bris pa rnams la ba ba ste/ kU la nam mkha' lding dang
155a7(mdo sde): mtshungs so// 'di dag ni byis pa rnams la 'cha' ba ste/ gru bo che la nu srin chen po dang mtshungs so// 'di dag ni byis pa rnams la 'joms pa ste/ 'dron po la chom po mang po dang mtshungs so//
155b1(mdo sde): nga na rnas pa rnams pa 'gas pa/ ngas sus rlung dam can pa dang man+ta / 'di dgan rgyas pa rnams lags / ba sa ga bdugacu ga
155b2(mdo sde): pa rnams ni ro myang ba'i 'du shes kyis chod pa ste/ ral gri'i so sbrang rtsis bslus pas chod pa bzhin no// 'di dag ni byis pa rnams khyer bste/ shing gi phung po la chu bo'i chus khyer ba dang mtshungs so//
155b3(mdo sde): 'di dag ni byis pa rnams la sred pa ste/ byis pa chung ngu rang gi gcin rtug la rtse ba dang mtshungs so// 'di dag ni byis pa rnams kun tu sgyur ba ste/ glang po che la lugs kyu dang mtshungs so//
155b4(mdo sde): 'di dag ni byis pa rnams la slu ba ste/ g.yon can gyis byis pa'i rang bzhin can dag zid pa bzhin no// 'di dag ni byis pa de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa zad par byed pa ste/ rgyan po la dga' ba'i nor dang mtshung /
155b5(mdo sde): so/ 'di dag gis byis pa rnams la 'chos pa ste/ srin mo rnams kyis tshong pa 'chos pa dang mtshungs so// byang chub sems dpas rnam pa sum cu rtsa gnyis po de dag gis btsun mo'i 'khor
155b6(mdo sde): la yongs su brtag pa byas nas/ lus la mi gtsang ba'i 'du shes rnam par sgom/ mi mthun pa'i 'du shes nye bar sgrub/ smad pa'i 'du shes skyed/ rang gi lus la yang de dang 'dra bar sgom/ lus kyi
155b7(mdo sde): ces dmigs yang dag par mthong / lus la lus su mngon par zhen pa las skyod/ sdug pa'i 'du shes rnam par 'jig/ mi sdug pa'i 'du shes 'jug par byed/ 'og gi rkang pa'i mthil nas/ steng
156a1(mdo sde): gi klad pa man chad mi gtsang ba las byung dang / mi gtsang ba las gyur pa dang / rtag tu mi gtsang ba zag par mthong ngo // de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// las/
156a2(mdo sde): kyi zhing las skyes shing sred pa'i chu las byung ba'i 'jig tshogs ming du btags// mchi ma rdul dang mchil mas brnyan la gcin gyis bsgyur cing khrag gi zig pas gang / zhag dang rnag dang lgang pa dang ni
156a3(mdo sde): klad rgyas dag dang sdig pa rnams kyis gang // rtag tu ngan skyugs zag cing kun kyang dri ma sna tshogs tha dad pa// pags pa so dang skra dang spu yis bsgyur cing bags pas g.yogs la spyad 'aldan
156a4(mdo sde): rgyu ma mchin pa mcher ba chu ser kha chu 'di dag bsags pa nyam chung ba/ rkang dang chu chus dag gis spel te 'khrul 'khor 'dra zhing sha yis mdzes par byas// sna tshogs nad kyis gang zhing mya ngan khyab/
156a5(mdo sde): las bkres dang skom pas kun tu nyen// skye ba po dag lus ni bu ga mang zhing 'tsho dang rga ba'i gnas gyul pa// mthong nas mkhas pa su zhig rang gi lus dgra dang mtshungs par sems mi 'gyur//
156a6(mdo sde): ltar byang chub sems dpa' lus la lus su song ba'i dran pas gnas par gyur to// nam mkha'i dkyil na 'khod pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyis lha'i bu chos spyod pa la 'di skad ces smras so// grogs pa
156a7(mdo sde): don grub 'do ni btsun mo'i 'khor la rnam par la zhing 'dzum yang ston// sems ni mi dga' mog ni phyir ning lhan gyi shol byed dam ci// yang na 'di ni rgya mtsho'i thabs dang mtshungs te 'di tshad la
156b1(mdo sde): bar mi nus so// yang na chags pa med pa 'di yus rnams la yid chags par ni ma 'gyur grang // lha rnams kyis bskul ba'i yi ma brjed par ma 'gyur glang // skya'i bunas spyod kyis smras
156b2(mdo sde): ba/ de skad smras ci dgos/ 'di sngon byang chub kyi phyir spyod pa na yang mngon par 'byung ba dang / gtong ba la rnam pa de lta bur chags pa med par gyur pa/ khyed la mngon sum du gyur pa yinas/
156b3(mdo sde): dasrid pa tham par gnas pa chags par mi 'gyur ba lta smos kyang ci dgos/ dge slong dag de nas byang chub sems dpa' nges par byas pa/ yid byung bar gyur pa/ blo brtu la ga/
156b4(mdo sde): tshul du shes shing / rings thabs med par rmil mo krung bshig ste/ glu dbyangs len pa'i khang bzangs na/ shar phyogs su lta zhing 'dug nas/ lag pa g.yas pas rin po che'i dra ba smad de/ khang bzang /
156b5(mdo sde): kyi steng du song nas sor mo bcu thal mo sbyar te/ sangs rgyas thams cad bsams nas/ sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal te/ nam mkha'i dkyil du bltas pa dang / des mthong ba nam
156b6(mdo sde): mkha'i dkyil na/ lha'i dbang po mig stong dang ldan pa lnga brgya stong gis bskor cing / me tog dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / bye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang /
156b7(mdo sde): bdan dang / me tog rna rgyan dang / rin po che'i do shal gyi chun po thogs te/ lus btud nas/ byang chub sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal zhing 'dug pa mthong ngo // 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi yang gnod
157a1(mdo sde): sbyin dang / srin po dang / dI ba dang / klu'i tshigs kyis bskor cing / goms pa bgos/ ya la bgos te/ ram buM dang / mdagaga'adung / dru zung dang / na
157a2(mdo sde): gnyis dang / rtse gsum pa lag na thogs shing tshul du shes par nor bu'i gyon pan dang / gzug zad 'brang bar byang chub sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal zhing 'dug pa mthong ngo // lha'i bunyi ma dang /
157a3(mdo sde): sgru ba gnyis kyang / glo g.yas g.yon na 'dug par mthong ngo // sar ma'i bdag po rgyu la yang nam myed na shar bar mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang byang chub drapas 'dun pa la smras pa/ ba
157a4(mdo sde): shis 'don don kun 'grub// do nub gdon mi la bar don grub kyis// 'dun pa phyir shol ma byed la gor dra// Na N+Dal rgyan gyis brgyan pa'ang ngal byin/ de nas 'dun pas tshig de
157a5(mdo sde): zos nas/ yid mi dga' zhing 'di skad ces smras so// smin ma ring zhing pad+ma'i 'dab ma rgyas 'da'i spyan mnga' mi yi seng ge ston ka'i zla ba nya ba lta bu dang // me tog ku mu dA dang zla ba dang ni dga' ba
157a6(mdo sde): bad+ma'i rdzing bugasar par 'jam pa'i pad+ma rgyas 'dra'i zhal// sbyangs pa'i gser nang nyim shar ma thag dang rba ba dri mdag mi dang mar thugs ma yi 'od 'phrogro ni bu lkog 'di'i bar ba'i gzi gan can//
157a7(mdo sde): glang po rgyags pa 'gying ba'i glang po'i stobs can ba lang khru mchog ri dgas rgyal dang ngang pa'i stobs can stabs mdzes shin tu zhabs legs gang du bcud// byang chub sems dpas smras pa
157b1(mdo sde): 'dun pa dang ga don du nga mas thon chad lag pa dang pa mig dang de bzhin mgo dang bras btang zhing // rlung sa dang na blangs pa'i rgyal srid no dgasar gas dang rin chen gang ba gang / glang po drung srogs
157b2(mdo sde): shugs ldan tu po rtsal mchog ldan pa btang // bskal pa bye ba khrag tshig mang nas tshul khrims ngas bsrungs bzod pa yongs bsgoms brtson 'grus stobs dang bsam gtan shes rab dag/ de su mod
157b3(mdo sde): kyi byang chub zhi ba shis pa thob nas rga shi'i rgya mor chud pa'i sems can nga yis yongs su dgrol ba'i dus la bab/ 'dun pas klas pa/ ngo bo khyod pa ltams ma thag tu blta ba'i phyir/ bram ze lngas
157b4(mdo sde): mkhan rnams la bstan na/ de dag gis khyod rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i spyan sngar/ lha khyod kyi rgyal po'i pho brang 'phel bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan ces bdag gis thos so// smras pa/ ji lta
157b5(mdo sde): zur 'gyur/ sbas pa/ gzhon nu 'di ni bsod nams brgya mtshan ldan// khyod kyi bu btsas bsod nams gzi brjid can// de ni gling bzhi dbang phyug 'khor los sgyur// nor bdun dang ni rab tu
157b6(mdo sde): ldan par 'gyur// gal te 'jig rten sdug bsngal bltas nas ni// btsun mo'i 'khor spangs mngon par byang gyur na// byang chub rga shi med pa'i gnas thob ste// chos kyi chu yis skye dgu 'di mtsham
157b7(mdo sde): byed/ jo ba lung bstan pa 'di ni mchis te/ 'di ma mchis pa ni ma lags mod kyi/ 'on gyis kyang phan par 'tshal ba bdag gi tshog gsan par gsol// smras pa ci zhig/ smras pa/ lha cig gang gi
158a1(mdo sde): don tu 'di na kha cig brtul zhugs dang / dka' thub rnam pa du ma rtsom ste/ ri dgas kyi lpags pa dang / ral pa'i thor tshugs dang / rba dang / shing shun gyon pa dang / sen
158a2(mdo sde): mo dang / skra dang / ag tsom ring por 'jig pa dang / lus la gdung ba dang / yongs su gdung ba rnam pa du ma spro bar bgyid de/ bdag cag ji ltar lha dang / mi'i phun sum tshogs pa 'thob par
158a3(mdo sde): 'gyur zhes brtul zhugs dang / dka thub drag po rtsom mo// jo bo phun sum tshogs pa de ni khyod kyis brnyes lags te/ rgyal srid 'byor cing rgyas la bde zhing lo legs te/ nyams dga' zhing mi dang kye
158a4(mdo sde): bo mang pos gang ba 'di dang bskyed mos tshal dam pa mchog ka me tog dang / 'bras bu rnam pa sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa/ bya'i tshogs sna tshogs sgra skad yid du 'ong ba 'byin pa 'di dag dang / rdzing
158a5(mdo sde): me tog ut+pal dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu dA dang / pad+ma dka ra pos mdzes par gyur pa dang pa dang / rma bya dang / khu byug dang / ngur ba dang / khrung khrung dang / dang skya sgra skad 'byin pa/ shing a mra dang
