158a6(mdo sde): mya ngan mtshang dang / tsam pa ka dang / ku rab ka dang / ge sa ra la sogs pa shing me tog chags pa sna tshogs kyis 'gram 'khor ba/ rin po che'i shing sna tshogs kyi 'brang gis legs par brgyan pa/ mig
158a7(mdo sde): mangs ris su bkod pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi stegs bus bskor ba/ rin po che'i dra ba bres pa/ dus ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su spyad pa/ dgun dang dbyar dang ston dang dpyid gnas par bde ba rnams
158b1(mdo sde): dang / khang bzangs chen po chos dang / chos babang dang / bde ba dang / mya ngan bral ba la sogs pa rnam par rgyal ba'i khang pa lta bu ston ka'i sprin 'dra ba/ gangs te ses bu stegs bu dang /
158b2(mdo sde): khang dang / rta babs dang / skar khung dang / bsil khang dang khang pa brtsegs pa dang / khyims kyis legs par brgyan pa/ rin po che'i dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba sgra 'byung ba 'di dag dang /
158b3(mdo sde): btsun mo'i 'khor dang / rol mo'i cha sma da r+g+ha dacig pa dang / bi lang dang / khar dza dang / rdzing bu dang / khar ba'i sil khrol dang / pheg dang / kim pa la dang / nagul dang / skra skan dang /
158b4(mdo sde): rnga dang / paT ha dang / gru dang / gar dang / rol mo'i dbyangs sgra dang / glu dbyangs sbyar ba legs par bslabs pa dgod pa dang / 'jo ba dang / za ba dang / dga' ba dang / tshul du shis pa dang /
158b5(mdo sde): spyod pa mdzes pa 'di dang ni ldan la/ lha khyod kyang dar ni ma yol te/ gzhon pa thor bu dar la bab pa/ lus 'jam pa/ lang 'tsho la bab pa/ dbu skra gnag pa/ 'dod pa la ma rol pa lags kyis/
158b6(mdo sde): sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i bdag po mig stong dang ldan pa/ lha'i bdag po lta bur re shig dgyes par rol la/ slad kyis bgres nas mngon par 'byung bar mdzod cig/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di
158b7(mdo sde): yang smras so// sum cu rtsa gsum 'jig rten lha dbang ltar// dgyes pa'i cho ga mkhyen pa dgyes par rol// rmad kyis bkres par gyur nas brtul zhugs dang / dka' thub dag ni yang dag brtsams
159a1(mdo sde): par mdzod// byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ 'dun pa mi dgos te/ 'dod pa 'di dag ni mi rtag pa/ mi btan pa/ ther zug ma yin pa/ 'gyur ba'i chos can myur
159a2(mdo sde): 'gro ba g.yo ba rig zar po'i chu'i shugs dang 'dra ba/ zil pa'i thigs pa ltar ring du mi gnas pa/ lag pa bcangs pa stong pas byis pa ltar snying po med pa/ chu shing gi snying po ltar mthu med pa/ snod
159a3(mdo sde): so ma btang ba ltar mthar 'jig pa/ ston ka'i sprin ltar skad cig byung nas med par 'gyur ba/ nam mkha'i glog ltar ring du mo gnas pa/ dug dang bcas pa'i snod ltar 'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal can/
159a4(mdo sde): 'khri shing ma lu ta ltar mi bde ba 'byin pa/ byis pa'i blo can rnams kyis 'dod par bya ba/ chu'i chu bur myur du 'gyur ba'i chos can/ smig rgyu ltar 'du shes phyin ci log las byung ba/ sgyu ma ltar
159a5(mdo sde): sems phyin cig log gis rnam par bsgrubs pa/ rmi lam ltar lta ba phyin ci log gis yongs su zin pa/ rgya mtsho gang dka' ba ltar ngoms ma shes par byed pa tsha chu ltar skom par byed pa/ sprul
159a6(mdo sde): gyi mgo ltar reg par bya dka' ba/ g.yang sa chen po ltar mkhas pa rnams kyis yongs su spangs pag shes rab can rnams kyis 'jigs pa dang bcas pa dang / rtsod pa dang bcas pa dang / nyes pa dang /
159a7(mdo sde): bcas pa dang / skyon dang bcas par shes nas/ rnam par spangs pa/ rig pa rnams kyis smad pa/ 'phags pa rnams kyis bshungs pa/ mkhas pa rnams kyis ma bsngags pa/ mi mkhas pa/
159b1(mdo sde): rnams kyis yongs su bzung ba/ byis pa rnams kyis bsten pa yin no// de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di yang sbas so// mkhas pa rnams kyis sbrul gyi mgo bzhin spangs// ngan phyugs snod bzhin mi
159b2(mdo sde): gtsang rnam par blangs/ 'dun pa dge ba thams cad 'jig byed par/ 'dod pa shes nas nga ni dga' mi skye/ ro'i cha 'dun pa thug rngus zug pa bzhin du gang srung steng zhing den so mi gnas mar ma sa
159b3(mdo sde): la sdug bsngal zhing tshig 'di skad ces smras so// lha cig gang gi don du 'di na kha cig brtul zhugs rnam pa mang po bcom ste ri dgas lpags pa 'chang // skra dang sen mo ag com ri' du 'jog cing
159b4(mdo sde): de bzhin shing shun gyon la yan lag skams shing brtul zhugs gnas// sred pa dang ni ldam ldum dag dang ma 'drus 'bras za kha cig spyi'u tshugs 'dug dang ba lang brtul zhugs gnas// ji ltar bdag
159b5(mdo sde): cag 'gro ba'i gtso bo khyad 'phags 'khor lo sgyur ba mchog dang de bzhin 'jig rten myong ba dang // brgya byin rdo rje 'chang dang 'thab bral lha dbang 'phrul par 'gyur sngams tshangs pa'i 'jig rten bsam
159b6(mdo sde): gtan bde ba 'dod// mi yi dam pa khyod kyi rgyal srid 'di ni shin tu 'byor cing rab tu rgyas la shin tu lo lags pa// de bzhin kun dga' ra ba dag dang bskyed mos tshal dang khang bzangs mthon po rnam par
159b7(mdo sde): rgyal ba'i khang pa mtshungs// bud med 'di dag rnams kyang pi wang dang ni gling bu da nga bu dang ro mo'i dbyangs sgra len cing mchis// dga' bar bgyid dang gar dang glu dbyangs sbyar ba shin tu bslabs pa 'di
160a1(mdo sde): dag spyod cing des pa ma bzhud cig/ byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ 'dun pa nyon cig 'dod pa'i rgyus ni sngon gyi tshe rabs dag na bcings dang btsas dang brdeg dang
160a2(mdo sde): bsdigs pa sdug bsngal brgya dag ngas ni bzod byas 'dus byas rnams la nga yis yid byung byas ma gyur// sngon chad bag med dbang du song zhing gti mug dkrugs la lta ba'i dra bas dkris shing mun
160a3(mdo sde): gyur chos 'di mi shes pa las byung ste bdag tu 'du shes 'dzin dang tshor ba po las 'das// dngos po 'di dag thams cad g.yo zhing 'gyur la mi rtag sprin dang mtshungs shing glog dang 'dra ste zil
160a4(mdo sde): pa'i thig pa 'dra zhing gsogs gsob snying po med la bag yod ma yin stong par gyur pa ste// nga yi yid ni yul la chags pa med kyis 'dun pa rta rgyal dam pa bsngags ldan 'byin nga sngon bsams/
160a5(mdo sde): pa'i bkra shis rdzogs kyis thams cad zil gnon chos kun dbang phyug chos rgyal thub par 'gyur// 'dun pas smras pa/ pad+ma 'dab ma rgyas pa 'dra ba'i mig ldan zhing // do shal nor bu rin
160a6(mdo sde): chen sna tshogs rnams kyis brgyan// mkha' la smin tshogs dag las byung ba'i glog 'dra ba// mal na rnam pa mdzes pa 'di la mi gzigs sam// pi ra lding dang ni kharda dag dang sgra sman dang //
160a7(mdo sde): dag dang gling bu glu dbyangs len pa dang // bya ba ma bya ka la birda sgra 'byin pa// mi 'am ci'i khyim 'dra 'di yang dor lags sam/ sum na dang ut+pal dang par sha ka/ tsam pa ka dang dri mchog 'phreng /
160b1(mdo sde): ba me tog bcus// dus kyi a ga ru mchog bdug pas rab bdugs dang / zug pa dam pa de dag la yang mi gzigs sam// shin tu dri bda' dri ldan ro brogya nom dang // skyu ru ma dag dang bshos gtsang
160b2(mdo sde): shin tu legs sur dang // sems kyi ro yang bar bcas par rab sbyar pa// 'di la'ang mi gzigs par ni lnga khyod gang du bzhud// grang ba'i dus na byug pa drob dam pa dang // tsA ba'i dus na can dan sprul
160b3(mdo sde): gyi lding po dang // gshi pa yi na bza' bzang po mang po dang // de dag la yang mi gzigs lnga khyod gang dra bzhud// lha yul dag na lha rnams dag ni ci 'dra bar// 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po 'did ga
160b4(mdo sde): rab 'byor pa// dga' zhing bde dang ldan la dgyes par rol mdzod de// de nas shAkya'i dam pa nags tshal bzhud par mdzod/ de nas byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ 'dun pa
160b5(mdo sde): ngas ni brgal pa mtha' yas dpag tu med par gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg dang mi dang lha yi 'dod pa rnam pa sna tshogs spyad kyang ngoms par gyur ba med// rgyal po'i sras mchog gyur te dbang
160b6(mdo sde): phyag byas shing gang tshe gling bzhi dag tu 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal por gyur nas rin chen sna bdun ldan zhing bud med dag gi nang na 'dug pa dang / sum cu rtsa gsum dbang dang 'thab bral rab kyi lha dbang
160b7(mdo sde): byas shing de dag ni shi 'phos 'dir 'ongs sprul pa'i lha yi nang na yid 'ong dpal ldan dam pa nga yis sngon chad sbyar// lha yi gnas su dbang sgyur bdud kyi dbang po byas shing 'dod pa 'byor pa

161a2(mdo sde): rnam pa rnan mangs ga sa ma sa s+ya/ na dang / sa su na du

161a4(mdo sde): # sa ba gas

161b3(mdo sde): lho'i bunam mkha' la 'khod pa dag gis rba co dang gzha'i sbu brgya stong byung ste/ me tog gi char yang phab nas/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// yul rnams la ni yid kyang ma chags
161b4(mdo sde): shing sems can dag pa snying rje snying bcer ldan// blo gros mchog ldan N+Dal myur rgyal gyur cig/ mgon po 'gro la mi 'jigs sbyin mdzad pa// mkhas la rdul gnag du ba mjug rings dag

161b6(mdo sde): lha'i bu tse ba bkod pas/ byang chub sems dpa'i nges pa rig nas/ ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po'i skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo thams cad gnyid kyis log par byas so//

162a1(mdo sde): rgyal dang ldan par rig/ de kho na mngon par 'byung ba'i dus la bab par rig nas/ 'dun pa la smras pa/ 'dun pa dang skyo bar ma byed par rta bsngags par brgyan te/ ma thogs
162a2(mdo sde): par nga la byin/ byang chub sems dpas tshig de skad smras ma thag tu/ de nas skad cig de nyid la rgyal po chen po bzhis/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs thos nas/ rang rang gi gnas nas byung ste/ byang chub

162a5(mdo sde): bskor bar byas te/ ji ltar 'ongs pa'i shar phyogs nyid du gnas nas byang chub sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal zhing 'dug go// rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po ni grul bum mu tig gi do shal sna tshogs lag

167b5(mdo sde): ces smras so// gal te grogs pa khyad kyis gos ngur smrig de rnams kho bo la byin na khe za'i gos ka she pa 'di rnams kyang khyed la sbyin no// des sbas pa/ gos 'di ga cang khyod la mdzes la 'on
167b6(mdo sde): rnams kyang kho ba la mdzes so// byang chub sems dpas sbas pa/ kho bos khyod la bzang ngo // de nas lha'i bu rngon pa'i gzugs lta bu des gos ngur smrig rnams byang chub sems
167b7(mdo sde): dpa' la byin te/ gos ka shi ba rnams kyang blangs so// de nas lha'i bu des gus pa bskyed de/ lag pa gnyis kas gos de dag blangs nas spyi bo la bzhag ste/ de dag la mchod pa dang /
168a1(mdo sde): bkur ba rtsi bya ba'i phyir/ de nyid nas lha'i 'jig rten du song ngo // de yang 'dun pas mthong bar gyur nas der mchod rten bamigs te/ deng sang du yang mchod rten drar smrig
168a2(mdo sde): blangs pa zhes ming du chags so// gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpas gtsug phud bcad nas/ gos ngur smrig rnams bgos pa de'i tshe/ lha'i bu brgya stong dag dga' zhing mgu la tshim zhing yi rangs te/
168a3(mdo sde): mchog tu rab tu dga' nas dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes te/ kye grogs po dag gzhon nu don grub rab tu byung ngo // kye grogs po dag gzhon nu don grub rab tu byung ngo // de ni sa bla na med pa yang dag
168a4(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyur te/ sems can skye ba'i chos can grangs med pa dag skye bas yongs su 'grol bar 'gyur ba nas/
168a5(mdo sde): rga ba dang / 'chi ba dang / na ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa dag las sems can rnams yongs su bkrol te/ 'khor ba'i
168a6(mdo sde): rgya mtsho'i pha rol tu bsgral nas/ bde ba 'jigs pa med pa/ mya ngan med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ zhi ba/ rdul dang bral ba 'chi ba med pa'i chos kyis dbyings la 'god par 'gyur ro// zhes pa nas/
168a7(mdo sde): a la la zhes bya ba dang / ca co dang / gzha'i sgra skad phyung bar gyur to// sgra de yang gcig nas gcig tu brgyad nas/ 'og min gyi gnas kyi bar du grag par gyur to// de nas btsun mo'i 'khor rnam
168b1(mdo sde): kyis gzhon nu ma mthong nub/ dpyid dang dmun dang dbyar gnas pa'i khang babangs rnams dang / khri rnams drung / khyim rnams bu rol zhing gdag che/ mun du pa'i tshe/ gcig tu 'dus nus/ zukur/
168b2(mdo sde): ram bzhin du drang mo mngon par gyur to// de na bud med la tshig ni shin tumya ngan gyis nyam pa gnas/ kha ma na ma cad bu zhes 'dir cing ngo'o// kha jig ni po bung ming po zhes 'dzir cing gi
168b3(mdo sde): gan kyi chung khyim zab ces 'dzin to// kha cig ni rje bo zhes 'dzer to// kha cig ni thug pa'i tshig sna tshogs lha'o// kha byig nI lus rdebasnang ngu'o// kha cig ni mgo 'bal lo// ba na
168b4(mdo sde): gcig gi gdong du gcog lta zhing du'o// kha cig ni mig bsgyur cing du'o// kha cig ni lag pa brlab la rdeb cing ngu'o// kha cig ni brang badrang zhing du'o// kha cig ni lag pa dazung bar dab tsang
168b5(mdo sde): dro'o/ kha cig ni mgo rlung zhing ngu'o// kha cig ni mgo las 'thor zhing ngu'o// khwa cig ni sgyu 'jog cing ngu'o// kha cig ni sra 'bal zhing ngu'o// kha cig ni lag pa bskyod de bsgreng nas chos
168b6(mdo sde): 'don te/ kha cig ni ri dgas mo dug mdas phog glo bur rgyug cing ngu'o// kha cig ni gdong gos kyis g.yogs shing ngu'o// kha cig ni chu shing rlung dmar gyis bskyod pa bzhin du lus 'khor zhing du/
168b7(mdo sde): kha cig ni sa la 'gyel te ma shi tsam du gyur to// kha cig ni nya chu nas bton pa bzhin du sa la 'gre ldog cing ngu'o// kha cig ni shing rtsa nas bcon pa bzhin du glo bur du sa la 'gyel nas ngu'o// skra de yang
169a1(mdo sde): rgyal pos thos nas shAkya rnams la smras pa ci'i phyir btsun mo'i 'khor na sgra chen po 'di grag/ shAkya rnams kyis shes nas smras pa/ rgyal po chen po gzhon nu btsun
169a2(mdo sde): mo'i 'khor na mi gda' zhes gda'o// rgyal pos smras pa/ myur du grong khyer gyi sgo rnams mchod la nang du gzhon nu tshol cig/ de dag gis phyi nang du btsal kyang ma rnyed nas/ skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo
169a3(mdo sde): go'u ta mi smre sngags 'don te sa la 'gre ldog cing / rgyal po zas gtsang ma la 'di skad ces smras so// rgyal po chen po bdag bu dang myur du spad du gsol/ de nas rgyal pos
169a4(mdo sde): phyogs bzhir pho nya rta pa bkye ste/ khyod deng la gzhon nu ma rnyed kyi bar du slar ma ldog shig/ mtshan mkhan dang / lhas mkhan rnams kyis kyang / byang chub sems dpa' ni bkra shis kyi cha ba sgo
169a5(mdo sde): nas mngon par 'byung ngo zhes lung bstan nas de dag bkra shis kyi sgor dong ba dang / lam gyi bar zhig na me tog gi char bab par mthong ngo // de nas de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ gzhon nu ni lam 'di dag/
169a6(mdo sde): nas byung ngo snyam nas/ de dag cung zad cig pa zad du song ba dang / lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i gos ka shi pa rnams mgo la thogs te/ 'gro ba de mthong nas/ de dag 'di snyam du sems te
169a7(mdo sde): 'di dag ni gzhon nu'i gos ka shi pa rnams yin na/ gos 'di dag gi phyir 'dis gzhon nu bsad de 'di dag khyer bar ma gyur tam snyam mo// de nas yang de dag gis de'i phyi bzhin du 'dun pa
169b1(mdo sde): bsngags ldan dang rgyan rnams thogs te 'ong ba mthong ngo // de nas de dag pan tshun du smras pa/ kye 'dun pa bsngag sa ldam khrid de 'ong gis de la ma dris kyi bar dusur 'dums mabyed ci
169b2(mdo sde): ces smras nas/ de dag gis 'dun pa la dris pa/ kye 'dun pa gos ka shi pa 'od dag gis phyir mi 'dis gzhon nu bkrongs par ma gyur grang / 'dun pas smras pa/ de la ni ma yin te/ 'dis
169b3(mdo sde): kyang gzhon nu la gos ngur sdigs rnams bral lo// gnon nus kyang na bzar ka shi ba 'di rnams la byin no// de nas lha'i bu des de dag mchod pa'i phyir/ gos de rnams lag pa gnyis kas hA/
169b4(mdo sde): bo la thogs te/ de nyid nas lha'i 'jig rten du song ngo // de dag gis 'dun pa la yang dris pa/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ kho bo cag shAkya gzhon nu zlog tu 'dong na nus sam/ des smras pa/
169b5(mdo sde): mi nus so// gzhon nus ni brtson 'grus dang brtul ba brtan pa yin te/ nga bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar dung ser skya'o gnas
169b6(mdo sde): grong khyer chen por mi 'jug go zhes de skad gsung bas phyir mi ldog ste/ gzhon nus ji skad gsungs pa de de bzhin du 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzhon nu ni brtson 'grus dang btul ba brtan
169b7(mdo sde): pas slar mi ldog go de nas 'dun pa rta bsngags ldan dang rgyan rnams khyer te btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang du phyin to// de nas ring zhig lon pa dang / rgyan de dag shAkya gzhon
170a1(mdo sde): nu bzang po dang / ming chen dang / ma 'gags pas btegs pa dang / sred med kyi bu chen po ltar mkhregs pa dang / sred med kyi bu phyed ltar mkhregs pa'i rgyan de
170a2(mdo sde): rnams de dag gis ma theg go// gang gi tshe de dag gis kyang theg par ma nus pa de'i tshe/ skye dgu'i bdag mo go'u ta mi 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis ji srid du rgyan 'di dag mthong ba de srid du bdag
170a3(mdo sde): gi snying la mya ngan du 'gyur gyis/ bdag gis rgyan 'di dag rdzing du dor ro snyam mo// de nas skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo go'u ta mas can de dag rdzing du dor te deng sang du rgyan gyi rdzing bu zhes ming du chag
170a4(mdo sde): so/ de la 'di skad ces bya steg gang tshe byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa dpa' bo byung // de yis ser skya'i grong khyer ba dag mtha' dag sad// kun gyi snying lam gzhon nu ma lan nyal snyam
170a5(mdo sde): sems// mgu zhing rab tu dga' nas phan tshun tshag kyang smra// sa 'tsho ma dang de bzhin btsun mo'i 'khor rnams sad// mal du bltas nas byang chub sems dpa' ma mthong nas// kyi hung
170a6(mdo sde): bdag bslus byang chub sems dpa' gar bzhud ces// rgyal po'i khyim du drang mo'i sgra yang byung bar gyur// rgyal pos sgra de zos nas sa la 'grel gyur te// e mang yi bu gcig pa zhes
170a7(mdo sde): drad mo byung // de nas de la bum pa'i chu blugs khrus byas nas// shakya mang po dag gis de ni dbug kyang phyung // sa 'tshom yang mal rus sa la lhung bar gyur// skra rnams 'bal zhing rgyan rnam
170b1(mdo sde): dag kyang bkrol bar gyur// drug pa kun dang bral ba ring por mo thogs shes// 'dren pas bdag la rngon gsungs kye ma legs par gsungs// gzugs ni gzugs papa shin tu dri ma lan
170b2(mdo sde): lag sdug// gsal zhing rnam dag 'gro ba rnams kyi yid 'ong sdug/ dpal yon ldan pas bsngags pa lnga mis mchod pa'i 'os// bdag ni mal du bor te khyo shing du bzhud// yon tan mang/
170b3(mdo sde): ba'i byang chub sems dpa' ma mthong bar// skoms yang mi 'tshal rgyags pa rnams kyis rgyags mi bgyid// sa la nyal zhing ral pa rnams kyang thogs par bgyi// khrus bgyi spangs te brtul zhugs
170b4(mdo sde): dka' thub spyad par bgyi// bkyed mos tshal kun lo ma me tog 'bras ma mchis// rnams dag se mo do yang mun rdul phyag dar 'dra// mi mchog dam pa khyod kyis spangs par gang gyur pa'i/ gro khyer
170b5(mdo sde): khyim rnams mdzes pa ma lags 'brog dang mtshungs// kyi hud glu dbyangs rab tu snyan pa'i sgra skad can// kyi hud lkug lhug po yi rgyan thogs btsun mo'i 'khor// kyi hud gser gyi dra bas khyab pa'i bar snang
170b6(mdo sde): yang yon tan ldan dang bral bas byin chad mi blta'o// gru mo de yang shin tu sdug bsngal thob gyur cing // shAkya'i bu mo ma du shig ces dbugs kyang 'byin// nga ni 'jig rten dag na na shi zar byed ces/
170b7(mdo sde): mi mchog dam pa des ni sngon yang smras pa yin// drang srong chen po dge ba stong dag spyad pa de// nam byed nas ni dpag tshad drug tu song gyur nas// 'dun pa de la ha mchog dang ni rgyan rnams gtad// 'dun pa
171a1(mdo sde): 'di dag khyer la ser skya'i grong so shig/ yab dang yum dag la yang nga yi tshig gis ni// gzhon nu song gis sbar zhing thugs ngan ma mdzad cig/ byang chub sangs rgyas nas ni slar
171a2(mdo sde): 'dir mchi bar bgyi// chos rnams gsan nas thugs kyang zhi bar 'gyur zhes smros// 'dun pas de bzhin 'dren pa la ni slar smras pa// 'dun pa legs ldan byang chub sems dpa' gar khrid ces// mi
171a3(mdo sde): mchog gnyen gyi tshogs rnams bdag la brdeg 'gyur gyis// bdag la nus pa ma mchis stobs dang mthu ma mchis// byang chub sems dpas rmar smras 'dun pa ma 'jigs shig/ nga yi gnyen gyi tshogs
171a4(mdo sde): rnams dga' bar gyur nas ni// khyod la ston pa'i 'du shes rtag tu sgom 'gyur te// nga la byams pa bzhin du khyod la'ang byams par 'gyur// 'dun pas rta mchog dang ni rgyan rnams khyer nas su// mi mchog
171a5(mdo sde): dam pa de yi skyed mos tshal du phyin// bskyed mos tshal gyi srungs ma dga' ba'i shugs skyes nas// kun tu dga' ba'i sgra ni shAkya rnams la smras// gzhon nu 'di yin rta mchog dang ni 'dun pa yang // bskyed/
171a6(mdo sde): mos tshal du byin gyis thugs ngan ma mdzad cig/ rgyal pos de skad thos nas shAkyas bskor nas ni// rab tu dga' ba'i shugs skyes skyed mos tshal du phyin// sa 'chos byang chub sems dpa' blo gros brtan
171a7(mdo sde): rig nas// tshig de la ni yid ma ches te dag ra ma gyur// gzhon nu byang chub ma thob par du phyir 'dir yang / byon cing ldog par 'gyur ba de ni gnas ma yin// rgyal pos rta mchog dang ni 'dun pa de mthong
171b1(mdo sde): nas drad mos btab ste sa yi steng du 'gyel bar gyur// kyi hud nga'i buk+Sha dang rol mo'i dbyangs sgra mkhas// rgyal srid thams cad bor te khyod ni gang du song // 'dun pa khyod kyis ngal 'dir ni legs par
171b2(mdo sde): zlos/ byang chub sems dpa' gar song sbyor ba ci 'dra zhig/ rmon su yis bye zhing gang gis khrid par gyur// lha tshogs rnams kyis de la mchod pa ji sar byas// 'dun pas smras baN+Dal po lo dbang po
171b3(mdo sde): bdag la gson// dgung byed grong khyer byis pa kan po gnyid log nas// byang chub sems dpa' 'jams dbyangs bdag la 'di skad du// 'dun pa rtartsalang la mya rang byin zhes gsung // bdag gi smra
171b4(mdo sde): na su ma bang bslang // de dag log cing rab tu log pas tshig ma thos// bdag ni ngu zhing bdag gis chibs kyis rgyal po phul// phan par mdzad pa gang du dgyes pa gshegs bgyis// ngan byin gyis ni
171b5(mdo sde): 'khrul 'khor ldan pa'i chab sgo bye// 'jig rten skyong ba bzhis ni chibs kyi rkang lag bteg/ dpa' bo bcibs nas stong gsum lam rnams rab tu g.yos// nam mkha' shin tu yangs pa 'di las gshegs
171b6(mdo sde): gyur te// 'di ni rab tu btang bas mun pa mun nag gsal// me tog bab cing sil spyan brgya dag skra yang byung // lha dang de bzhin lha yi bu mo rnams kyis bstod// nam mkha' las ni lha tshogs rnams kyis/
171b7(mdo sde): bkor te gshegs// 'dun pa ta mchog dang ni rgyan rnams khyer nas su// de ni ngu zhing btsun mo'i 'khor du phyin pa dang // sa 'chos 'dun pa de dang rta mchog mthong gyur nas// rab tu brgyal bar gyur tes
172a1(mdo sde): mi steng du 'phel// bud med tshogs mang thams cad rab tu brtson par ni// mu ga blangs shing gakya'i bu mo 'khru bar byed// mya ngan rnyed pas 'chi ba'idus byed byar du'og
172a2(mdo sde): bangs pa gnyis dang bral bar gyur du 'ong snyam byed// shAkya'i bu mo sdug bsngal gyur pa mthu bskyed nas// rta yi rgyal po rta mchog de yi mgul nas 'jus// sngon chad dga' bas rtse ba dag kyang dran byas/
172a3(mdo sde): nas/ mya ngan gyur cing sna tshogs tshig kyang rab tu sgra// kye hud bdag gi dga' skyed hud bdag gi mi mchog dri med zla ba'i zhal mnga' ba// kyi hud bdag gi gzugs can gyi hud bdag gi mtshan mchog dri me
172a4(mdo sde): gzi brjid ldan// kyi hud bdag gi yan lag ma smad legs par 'khrungs pa rim gyis 'phags pa mnyam med pa// kyi hud bdag gi yon tan mchog ldan lha mis mchod pa thugs rje chen por mchog/
172a5(mdo sde): ldan pa// kyi hud bdag gi stobs ldan sred med bu yi mthu dang ldan pa dgra yi tshogs bcom pa// kyi hud bdag gi shin tu 'jam dbyangs ka la bing+ka'i sgra skad tshangs dbyangs snyan ldan pa// kyi hud bdag
172a6(mdo sde): gi grags pa mtha' yas bsod nams brgyas 'phags bsod nams rgya chen mnga' ba po// kyi chung bdag gi bsngag pa mtha' yas yon tan tshogs brgyan drung srong tshogs rnams dga' mdzad pa// kyai hur
172a7(mdo sde): bdag gi nags mchog bung ba sgra 'byin lum bi ni der ba lum pa legs bltams pa// kyi chung bdag gi sgra grags wa mi rnams kyis mngon par chod pa'i ye shes sdong po che// kyi bud bdag gi ro bra ma/
172b1(mdo sde): ba'i mngam rdzas can brgya'i stan ma pa ra ga ser mchog 'dra// ci bung bdagag shin nam dag rnams ldan paskob mo lta bu'i rnams ldan pa// kyi brad bdag gi gangs legs can legs sa
172b2(mdo sde): b.ran dri med mdzod spu gnas pa bo// kyi hud bdag gi dpung mgo rab zlum gzhu 'dra'i med pa mena'i byin pa sred pa klam// kyi hud bdag gi glang po'i sna 'dra bcwa ldan phyag nabs rnams dag mdzes pa'i
172b3(mdo sde): sen mo can// de yi rkyen rnams 'di dag bsod nams dag gis byas pa rgyal po'i rab tu dga' byed pa// kyi hud bdag gis glu dang dbyangs skra dam pa me tog drug pa bzang po'i dus bzang ba// kyi hud
172b4(mdo sde): bdag gi me tog spos rnams glu len dag dang btsun mo'i 'khor ni dga' byed pa// kyi skad bsngags ldan legs skyes nga yi khyim thab grogs po yin na khyod kyis gang du khrid// kyi hud 'dun pa snying rje med
172b5(mdo sde): ba mi yi dam pa bzhud tshe sbron cing slong ma po// do nub grong khyer dam pa 'di nas mi yi kha lo sgyur ba thugs rje ldan gshegs te// phan pa mdzad pa 'di ni gshegs shes skabs der tshig cig tsam zhig
172b6(mdo sde): ci yi phyir ma spras// phan pa mdzad pa ji ltar gshesas shing rgyal po'i pho brang 'di nas su yis phyung ba byas// gang gi phyogs gshegs nags tshal gel ba'i lha mo de yi grogs su 'gyur ba dpal yon ldan/
172b7(mdo sde): 'dun pa kho mo shin tu sdug bsngal gter bstan nas ni mig phyung 'dra bas mig byin cig/ 'dun pa rgyal ba kun gyi pha dang ma dag mchod pa'i 'os shes rtag tu bsngags mdzad na// de dag rnams kyang
173a1(mdo sde): spangs te byung na bud med 'dod pa'i dga' ba 'di lta smos ci dgos// kyi hud sdug pa rnams dang bral ba gar la lta ba'i rang bzhin 'dra ste rtag ma yin// byis pa 'du
173a2(mdo sde): shes kyis bzung lta ba phyin ci log pas skye dang 'chi 'pho gnas par 'gyur// de yis sngon chad rga shi ldan pa'i 'dus byas dag la grogs po 'ga' yang med ces bsten// khyod kyi dgongs pa yod/
173a3(mdo sde): su rdzogs nas shing mchog drung du byang chub dam pa mchog thob gyur// rdul med byang chub sangs rgyas nas ni grong khyer dam pa 'dir ni slar yang gshegs su gsol// 'dun pa de yang mchog tu yid ma
173a4(mdo sde): dga' zhing sa 'tsho ma yi tshogs ni thos gyur nas// de ni nga ro mthong cing tshig tu smras pas 'tshe ma khyod bdag tshig legs par gson// nam gyi gung thun bud med tshogs rnams thams cad rab tu gnyid kyis
173a5(mdo sde): log ste dben gyur pa// de yi tshe na bsod nams brgyas 'phags de yis bdag la bsngags ldan nga la byin zhes gsung // de skad tshig thos nas ni de ma thag tu bdag gis khyod ni gzims mal gzims//
173a6(mdo sde): la bltas// de tshe khyod kyi sdug pa 'di ni gshegs kyis sa 'tsho bzhengs zhes sgra skad chen po byung // lha yis tshig de bkag par gyur par bud med rnams las 'ga' tsam zhig kyang sad ma gyur/ bdag
173a7(mdo sde): ni rab tu shing rda yi rgyal po brgyan pa bgyis nas mi mchog de la phul// bsngags ldan drag shul can mog zi ldan skra byung de yi sgra ni rgyang grags tsam du grags// 'on kyang lha yis gnyid kyis logs
173b1(mdo sde): par bgyis pas grong khyer ba las 'ga' yang sad ma gyur// bser dang dngul dang nor bu rnams kyis g.yogs pa'i sa la bsngags ldan rkang lag rab tu brdabs// de las stan dang 'jig sa dang /
173b2(mdo sde): mdzes pa'i sgra byung 'on kyang mi 'ga' tsam sad ma gyur// de yi bar skabs kar ma rgyal dang ldan gyur zla ba kar ma dag kyang mkha' la gnas// mkha' las lha rnams bye bas thal mo gyur te btu
173b3(mdo sde): nas phyag kyang rab tu 'tshal// gnod sbyin zin po'i tshogs rnams nye bar gnas shing 'jig rten kyang brdzu 'phrul che ldan bzhis// pad+ma'i ze ba la bur rnams dgu dri med lag pas bsngags ldan
173b4(mdo sde): gyi ni rkang lag bteg/ bsod nams gzi brjid brgyas 'phags de yang ku mu dra dang bar shA lA bu de la bcig// 'di rnam pa drug tusagro gang sangs rgyas zhing rnams dri med 'od kyis khyab// bde sogs
173b5(mdo sde): khyim thab brgya byin lha yig gtso bo nyid kyis de tshe 'chab sgo dbye ba bgyis// de ni bye ba khrag khrig lha yis mdun du bdar te wa dang gru yis rab mchod nas// bsngags ldan gyis ni 'du shes tsam gyis/
173b6(mdo sde): das pa 'jig rten mgon po mkha' las bkur bar shes// lha dang lha ma yin tshogs dbang por bcas pa de dag bcibs te bde bar gshegs pa gshegs// skra yi bu mo glu dbyangs mabs pa
173b7(mdo sde): rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan rab brjod cing // de dag bsngags ldan la yang stobs btud byed la snyan la yid du 'ong ba'i sgra yang 'byin// bsngags ldan 'jig rten 'dren pa myur ba
174a1(mdo sde): myur bar khyer la gro bar mi dga'as sbed cig/ 'jig rten mgon po mnyes par byas na khyod la 'jig pa dang ngan song ngan 'gro med par 'gyur/ ldarnam par yo/
174a2(mdo sde): yang bdag la 'jig rten ma gan po bcibs par mngon du dga' bar gyur// yul sa 'di na bye ba lha yi rkang pa dag gis non par ma myur cung zad med// bsngags ldan nam mkha'i babs na
174a3(mdo sde): sgra tshogs spras shing mdzes pa'i lam gnas rin chen stegs bu ni// rnam pa sna tshogs dag gis brgyan cing lha yi bdug pa snying po mchog bdugs 'di la ljobs// bsngags ldan dge bar
174a4(mdo sde): las 'dis sum cu rtsa gsum lha gnas shin tu legs par sprul pa der// lha yi bu mos bskor cing mdun gyis bltas la lha yi 'dod pa'i dga' bas dga' bar gyis// legs pa sa 'tshe/
174a5(mdo sde): mkhyod phyir nings pa shums dgyes par mdzad cing mchog tu dgyes par mdzod// mi mchog byang chub brnyes nas lha yis mdun du bdar ba ring por mi thogs gzigs par 'gyur// sa
174a6(mdo sde): mi rnams gang dag legs pa'i las bgyis de dag rtag tu bshums par bgyi ma lags// de ni bsod nams gzi brjid brgyas 'phags lags kyis dgyes par mdzod la bshums mo ma mdzad
174a7(mdo sde): cig/ rgyal po mngon par byung ba den lha dang mi yi mchod pa'i bkod pa gang lags pa// bkod pa de ni sa 'tsho bdag gis dgung bdun par du brjod kyang rdzogs par brjod mi nus// khyod kyis 'grol/
174b1(mdo sde): banamang pa la bsnyen bkur mdzad pas pa rnyes mchog bsam gyis mi khyab brnyes/ bdag gis pasams na khyod kyang ma yis dam padon ci 'drar 'gyur skams bgyid/ mngon par 'gyung /
174b2(mdo sde): ba'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o// / 'phags pa rgya tsher rol pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// bam po bcu gcig pa/ dge slong dag de ltar byang chub
174b3(mdo sde): sems dpa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis// 'dun pas rgyal po zas gtsang ma dang / shAkya'i bu mos 'tshom dang / btsun mo'i 'khor thams cad dang / shAkya'i tshogs thams cad kyis mya ngan
174b4(mdo sde): bsang ba'i gtam smras so// dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpas lha'i bu rngon pa'i gzugs lta bu la gos ka shi pa rnams byin nas// de la gos ngur smrig rnams blangs te/ 'jig
174b5(mdo sde): rten dang mthun par bya ba dang / sems can la snying brtse ba dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir bdag nyid rab tu byung ngo // de nas byang chub sems dpa'
174b6(mdo sde): bram ze'i rigs ldan gyi gnas ga la ba der song ba dang / des byang chub sems dpa' gnas par bya ba dang / zas la mgron du bos so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' bram ze pad+ma'i
174b7(mdo sde): gnas su song ba dang / des kyang byang chub sems dpa' gnas par bya ba dang / bsal mgron du bos so// de nas bram ze dang drang srong nam thu'i gnas su song ba dang /
175a1(mdo sde): des kyang de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' mgron du bos so// de bzhin du gdul ba'i be con can gyi bu 'od ldan gyis kyang byang chub sems dpa' mgron du bos te
175a2(mdo sde): dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' rim gyi grong khyer chen po yangs pa can du byin to// de'i tshe sgyu rtsal shes bu ring 'phur nyan thos kyi dge 'dun chen po dang / slob ma sum brgya dang lhan cig
175a3(mdo sde): tu grong khyer yangs pa can du gnas bcas shing gnas te/ de slob ma dag la ci yang med pa'i skye mched kyi brtul zhugs dang mthun pa'i chos ston pa des byang chub sems dpa' rgyang ring po nas 'ong
175a4(mdo sde): ba mthong nas/ ngo mtshar du gyur te slob ma rnams la smras pa/ kye 'di'i gzugs la ltos shig/ de dag gis smras pa/ de bzhin du de la blta bar bgyi ste/ 'di ni ya mtshan che'o// dge slong
175a5(mdo sde): dag de nas nga spu rtsal shes kyi bu ring 'bur ga la ba der song ste/ sku rtsal shes kyi bu ring 'phur la 'di skad ces smras so// kye sgyu tshal shes kyi bu ring 'bur khyod las bdag gis tshangs par spyad pa spyod
175a6(mdo sde): de des smras pa/ ce gzungs dad pa'i rigs kyi zugang la spyad na/ rtseg pacung ngus pa kun shes pa thob par 'gyur ba'i chos pastan pa/ des bu la spyod cig sa dge slong dag ngas 'di snyam du bsam so//
175a7(mdo sde): ngal mos pa yang yod/ ngal brtson 'grus kyang yod/ dran pa yang yod/ ting nge 'dzin kyang yod/ shes rab kyang yod kyis chos de nyid thob par bya ba dang / mngon tu bya ba'i phyir bdag gcig pa
175b1(mdo sde): gsod pa dang / bdun pa dang / dben par gnas bya'o snyam nas/ dge slong dag de nas pa gcig thub ga yod pa dang / brtun pa dang dbyen par gnas nas/ phyogs chung dus chos de khong rung
175b2(mdo sde): cing mngon du gyur to// dge slong dag de nas nga sgyu rtsal shes kyi bu ring 'bur ga la ba der song ste/ 'di skad ces smras so// kye ring 'phur khyod kyis chos 'di tsam zhig khong du chud cing mngon tu rgya
175b3(mdo sde): tam des smras pa/ kye go'u tam/ de de bzhin no// ngas smras pa/ kye kho bos kyang chos de mngon tu byas shing khong du chud do// des sbas pa/ kye go'u ta ma de bas na chos gang kho bos shes pa de
175b4(mdo sde): khyod kyis shes la/ gang khyod kyis shes pa de yang kho bos shes te/ de bas na bdag cag gnyi gas slob ma'i tshogs 'di la bstan to// dge slong dag de nas sgyu rtsal shes kyi bu ring 'phur gyis ngal
175b5(mdo sde): mchod pa dam pas mchod de/ nga slob ma rnams la yang don mthun par byed du bcug go// dge slong dag ngas 'di snyam du bsams te/ ring 'phur gyi chos 'di ni nges par 'byung ba ma yin te/ de byed
175b6(mdo sde): pa yang dag par sdug bsngal zad par nges par 'byung ba ma yin gyi// bdag gis de las lhag pa zhig cal zhing smad do snyam mo// dge slong dag de nas nga ji srid dga' ba'i bar du grong khyer yangs pa
175b7(mdo sde): can du gnas nas/ yul me ga d+har yul chu zhing / yul ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po ga la ba der song ste/ ri'i rgyal po sra bog la ba der song nas/ ri'i rgyal po skya bo de'i ngos la
176a1(mdo sde): nga gcig pu gnyis su med cing grogs med par rtswa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong zag dra mas bsrungs shing gnas so// de nas nga nang bar sham thabs dang chos gos bgos srung /
176a2(mdo sde): bzed thogs te/ chu dron can gyi sgo nas rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por 'gro ba dang / ldog pa dang mdun du blta ba dang g.yas phyogs su blta ba dang bskum pa dang / brkyang ba
176a3(mdo sde): mdzes pa dang / snam sbyar dang / zang ba dang / lhung bzed dang / chos gos 'dzin pa mdzes pa dang / dbang po ma g.yengs pa dang / sprul pa bzhin du yid phyi rol ta ma byung ba dang / 'bru
176a4(mdo sde): mar gyis gang ba'i snod thogs pa bzhin gnya' shing gang tsam du lta zhing bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs so// de na rgyal po'i khab kyi mi rnams kyi mthong nas/ ngo mtshar du gyur to/ ci 'di tshangs
176a5(mdo sde): pa yin nam/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam/ 'on te nam thos kyi bu 'am/ 'on te ri'i lha 'ga' zhig yin nam snyam mo// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ de nas gzi brjid mtha' yas dri med
176a6(mdo sde): ldan// byang chub sems dpa' bdag nyid rab byung ste/ sems ni zhi zhing spyod lam rab dul bar// ri yi rgyal po skye bo'i ngos la gnas// byang chub sems dpas nam nangs shes nas ni// /
176a7(mdo sde): mchog tu bltan mdzes par shams thabs bgos// lhung bzed thogs te dma' ba'i yid kyis su// de ni rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms zhugs// gser gyi sa le snga ma bzhin rab dul la// sum
176b1(mdo sde): rurtsa gnyis ma gcig bgos pa/ skyes pa'i tsam dang bud med kyis mthong na// suyang bska bas ngoms par mi 'gyur ro// rlung dag na chen gos dang brus kyang brtam gang gi mthu rjob car rnam
176b2(mdo sde): da'i sngon cad ma mthong sems can 'di su shes// skye bo sel zhing de yi bye bzhin 'brang // bud med skyong dag bang pa'i steng 'dug ring // de bzhin go dang de bzhin da la zang dang // mang dag dang
176b3(mdo sde): khyim ni spong bas na// de dag las gzhan med par mi mchog la// skyes bu mchog gi gzugs la lta ba'i tshe// nyo dang 'tshong ba dag kyang mi byed cing // cang dang can yang chang ni mi 'thung la// khyim dang
176b4(mdo sde): mang na 'dug par mi dga'o// rings par mi zhig rgyal po'i khab song ste// de dga' rgyal po gzugs can snying po la// grong 'dir tshangs pa bdag cid bsod snyoms spyod// lha khrod pa rnyes pa dam pa
176b5(mdo sde): brnyes shes zer// kha cig brgya byin lha yi rgyal zhes zer// gzhan dag 'thab bral lha yi bu zhes zer// de bzhin yongs su dga' ldan 'phrul pa dang // gzhan dag rab 'phrul lnga yi bu zhes par/ kha cig
176b6(mdo sde): nyim zla ba de bzhin du// sgra gcan stobs ldan thags bzangs rigs zhes zer// kha cig dag ni tshigs kyang 'di skad du// ri rgyal skya la 'dug pa 'di yin zer// rgyal pos tshig ni de dag zos byar nas
176b7(mdo sde): yid na mchog tu dga' zhing gal thang 'dug pa shin tu spangs pa'i gser war dpal 'bar ba// byang chub sems dpa' sems can mchog mthong ngo // rgyal po gzugs can snying pos me de la// bsod
177a1(mdo sde): snyoms byin la gar song ltos shes paso// ri yi mchog la de ni song mthong nas/ kha cig ri yi ngos la de mchis spras// gzugs can snying pos nam nangs shes nas ni//
177a2(mdo sde): mi dbang skye bo mang pos yongs bkor te/ ri yi rgyal po skya bo'i drung du song // ri de dpal ni rab tu 'bar bar mthong // bzhon pa las ni babs te rkang gis song // ji ltar lhun po bzhin du mi g.yo zhing //
177a3(mdo sde): ru bting steng na skyil mo krung 'dug pa'i// byang chub sems dpa' mchog tu gus pas mthong / rgyal pos rkang par mgo bos phyag byas te// rnam pa sna tshogs dag gi gtam byas nas// khyod la
177a4(mdo sde): rgyal srid kun gyi phyed sbyin gyis// 'dod pa'i yon tan 'di spyod ma 'phyan smras// byang chub sems dpas 'jam po'i chog smras pa// sa yi bdag po yun ring tshe srungs shig/ kho bos rgyal srid
177a5(mdo sde): sdug pa bor nas su// re ba med par zhi phyir rab tu byung // gzhon nu thor bu dar la bab dang ldan// lus kyi kha tog mdzes shing shugs ldan pa// nor mang dag dang bud med tshogs bzhes te// bdag
177a6(mdo sde): gi rgyal srid 'dir bzhugs 'dod pa spyod// ma ga d+ha'i rgyal pos byang chub sems dpa' la smras pa/ bdag khyod mthong bas mchog tu dga'// bdag gi rgyal srid kun gyi grogs mdzod cig/ bdag
177a7(mdo sde): ni khyod la mnga' dbul 'dod pa spyod// nags tshal stong pa dag tu ma bzhugs shig/ slan chad sa gnas rtse steng ma bzhugs shig/ khyod kyi sku ni mchog tu rab tu gzhon// bdag gi rgyal srid 'dir bzhugs
177b1(mdo sde): 'ad pa spyod/ blang nab sems dpa' 'angs shings rgya me// dka' 'gyur ba na zhing snying bca'i com smras pa/ rgyal ba khyad na tag tubag gis gyur/ kha ba 'dad pa'i yan tan myi 'dod//
177b2(mdo sde): bdug 'dri nyes pa mtha' yas ldan// sems can dmyal dang yi dgas dud 'gror ltung // mkhas pas sprad cing 'dod pa'i 'phags ma yin// khe bas ngar snabs rul ba bzhin du dor// 'dod pa
177b3(mdo sde): gi 'bras bu bzhin du ltung // ji ltar sprin dang char sprin bzhin du 'gro/ mi brtan 'gyur las ji ltar rlung bzhin 'gro/ dge ba thams cad rnam par 'thor zhing gru// de bzhin 'dod pa mi rnyed phyir
177b4(mdo sde): yang gdungs// rnyed du zin kyang chog par 'dzin mi 'gyur// gang tshe dbang po ma rung rab gyur pa// de tshe 'dod pa sdug bsngal drug chen byed// rgyal po lha yi 'dod pa gang yin dang // mi yi 'dod pa babang
177b5(mdo sde): po gang yin pa'i// 'dod pa thams cad mi gcig gos thob kyang // de la chog pa med de yang tshol lo// rgyal po gang dag zhi zhing du la myur ba// 'phags pa zag med chos kyis 'du shes kyang // shes rab
177b6(mdo sde): mkhas pas reg pa de legs chog/ 'dod pa'i yon tan rtog pa grang zad med// rgyal ba'i 'dod pa dag la bsten byas shing // sbyin chad 'dus byas pa yi mtha' ma med// jo skar mi dag lan mar
177b7(mdo sde): nu 'brang sa bzhin/ 'dod pa pasten na phyir zhing med pa 'phal/ rgyal ba'i lus la yang stobs de mi bstan// snying po med de sdug ba sngal 'khrul 'khor bzhin/ gzu ga dgu mi gnas tag tu 'a
178a1(mdo sde): rgyal po kho bo 'dod pa'i 'dod chags med// kho bos 'dod pa mang dang de bzhin du// blta na sdug pa'i bud med stong bor te// mchog ni byang chub dam pa thob 'dod nas//
178a2(mdo sde): bo srid pa mi dga' nges par 'byung // dge slong phyogs ni gang dang gang nas byon// gang du khyod skyes yab yum gang na bzhugs// rgyal rigs lags sam bram ze 'am rgyal po lags// dge slong khur
178a3(mdo sde): gyi 'du shes med na gsungs// rgyal po shAkya rnams kyi ser skya'i grong // mchog tu 'byor cing rgyas pa thos gyur tam// kho bo'i pa yi ming ni zas gtsang yin// yon tan 'dod pas kho bo der rab byung //
178a4(mdo sde): khyod mthong legs par mthong ste legs pa lags// gang las khyod skyes bdag kyang de'i slob ma'o// 'dod chags bral ba 'dod par spyan drangs pa// thugs pas bdag la bzod pa mdzad du gsol/
178a5(mdo sde): gang tshe khyod kyis byang chub rnyes gyur tshe// chos rjes bdag la chos kyi bgo bsha' mdzod// rang byung bdag gi yul nas bzhugs pa ni// bdag gis ma mchog tu rnyed pa rab rnyed do// de nas kyang ni nang /
178a6(mdo sde): par phyag byas te// rgyal pos shin du gus par bkor byas nas// mi dbang rang gi skye bos longs bskor te// slar yang rgyal po'i khab tu zhugs par gyur// 'jig rten mgon po ma ga d+hA yi grong zhugs
178a7(mdo sde): ji srid 'dod par zhi ba'i yid kyis 'jug/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ni don byas nas// mi dbang ner 'dza' na'i chu 'gram song // gzugs can snying po 'ongs pa'i le'u zhes bya ste
178b1(mdo sde): drug pa'o// dge slong dag yang de'i tshe// rangs byed kyi bu lkug spyod/ rgyal po 'i 'a ba'i grong khyer chen po gnas babs nas// slob ma 'jog sa chen po rmobam ngas
178b2(mdo sde): brgya dang ldan cig tu gnas te/ de de dag la 'du shes med min gyi brtul zhugs dang mthun pa'i chos son to// dge slong dag byang chub sems dpa' rangs byed kyi bu khrag spod rigs dang ldan pa/
178b3(mdo sde): chags can/ tshogs kyi slob dpon grags pa mngon par 'dod pa// se bo mang pos mchod pa mkhas pa/ kun gyis shes pa mthong nas kyang de 'di snyam du sems te/ 'dus byed kyi bu zag stong
178b4(mdo sde): 'di tshogs dang ldan pa/ tshogs can tshogs kyi slob dpon/ grags pa mngon par 'dod pa/ skye bo mang pos mchod pa mkhas pa kun gyis shes pa yin na/ gal te bdag de'i drung du song ste
178b5(mdo sde): brtul zhugs dang dka' thub ma brtsams na ni// 'di dag la khyad par du 'phags pa'i 'du shes kyang mi skyed la/ mngon sum gyi shes pas kyang shes par mi 'gyur ba dang / 'dus byas zag padas
178b6(mdo sde): bcas pa nye bar len pa dang bcas pa'i bsam gtan dang ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa dag kyang sun phyung bar ma 'gyur gyis// gang gis na de la bsam gtan gyi spyod yul dag dang / snyoms par/
178b7(mdo sde): 'jug pa'i dmigs pa dag mngon sum du 'gyur ba dang / 'jig rten pa'i ting nge 'dzin dag kyang 'byung ba ma yin par bstan par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i thabs shig bstan par bya'am/ bdag rangs byed
179a1(mdo sde): kyi bu lhag spyod kyi drung du song ste/ bdag gis ting nge 'dzin gyi yon tan gyi khyad par bstan pa'i phyir de'i slob mar khas blangs la/ 'dus byas kyi ting nge 'dzin snying po mad/
179a2(mdo sde): par bstan par bya 'am snyam mo// dge slong dag du nas byang chub sems dpyas don de'i dbang du byas te/ rang sa byed kyi bu lcags spyod gal ba der song nus gyon pa dang / rangs
179a3(mdo sde): byed kyi bu lhag spyod la 'di skad ces smras so// grogs po khyod kyi ston pa ni su zhig sus ston pa kun shes/ de skad ces smras pa dang / rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod kyis byang chub sems dpa'
179a4(mdo sde): la 'od skad ces smras so// grogs po kho bo la ston pa gang yang med de// 'on kyang kho bo rang gis 'di yang dag par khong du chud do// byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ khyod kyis
179a5(mdo sde): ci khong du chud/ smras pa// 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa'i lam mo// byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ bdag gis khyod las ting nge 'dzin gyi lam gyi
179a6(mdo sde): gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan pa thob par 'tshal lo// smras pa/ de ltar bya'o zhes bya ba nas/ gdams ngag byin pa'i bar du'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyogs
179a7(mdo sde): gcig tu song ste/ skyil mo krung bcas nas 'dug go// 'dug ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa'i bsod nams kyi khyad par dang / ye shes kyi khyad par dang / sngon spyod pa legs par
179b1(mdo sde): byud pa'i 'bras bu'i khyad par dang / cing nga 'dzin thams cad la 'dris pa'i khyad par dang / de sems la dbang gyur ba'i phyir bsam gtan la sogs pa 'jig rten pa'i sems par 'jug pa/

179b3(mdo sde): pas byed kyi bu lhag spyod ga la der song nas phyin pa dang / rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod la 'di skad ces smras so// grogs po 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lam las god na

179b5(mdo sde): dran pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab yod pa ma yin gyi/ bdag la yang dad pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / zan pa dang / nga nge 'dzin dang / shes 'bu med do snyam //

179b7(mdo sde): 'dong / khyod dang kho bob tshogs 'di dag la rjes su bslab po zhes byang chub sems dpa' don mthun pa dang / slob dpon gyi gnas su bzhag go// byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ grogs pa
180a1(mdo sde): lam 'don yid 'byung bar 'gyur ba ma yin/ 'dod chags dang bral bar 'gyur ba ma yin/ 'gog par 'gyur ba mA yin/ 6ba zla bar 'gyur ba ma yin/ mngon pa
180a2(mdo sde): shes par 'gyur ba ma yin/ rdzogs par byang chub par 'gyur ba ma yin/ dge sbyong nyid du 'gyur ba ma yin/ mya ngan las 'das par 'gyur ba ma yin no// dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpas
180a3(mdo sde): lhag spyod slob ma dang bcas pa 'dun par byas nas/ de tsam gyis chog go zhes bya ba nas/ chog par byas te song ba'i bar du'o// de'i tshe lnga sde bzang po rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod las
180a4(mdo sde): tshangs par spyad pa spyod pa de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag cag gis 'di'i phyir yun ring por btsal zhing brtson par byas kyang mtha' dang mu khod chud par ma nus kyi/ dge sbyong go'u ta mas tshogs
180a5(mdo sde): rlung ngus khong du chud cing mngon tu byas la de de yang mi 'dod cing de las gong du rol ba las the tsom med par de ni 'jig rten gyi ston par 'gyur ro// gang des mngon tu byed par 'gyur ba de bdag cag la ya
180a6(mdo sde): 'gyed par 'gyur ro snyam mo// de ltar dpyad nas lnga sde bzang pos rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod kyi drung nas dong ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i phyir bzhin 'brang ngo // dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems
180a7(mdo sde): dpa' ji srid dga' ba'i bar du rgyal po'i khab tu gnas nas/ lnga sde bzang po dang lhan cig tu yul ma ga d+ha ra yul rgya zhing song ngo // yang de'i tshe rgyal po'i khab dang / rig ya'i bar na tshogs gnan/
180b1(mdo sde): dag gcig dus ston byed de/ tshogs de dag gis kyang byang chub sems dpa' sartse bzang po dang lhan cig tu gnas par bya ba dang / bas la mthon du bos so/ dge slong dag de gas sum
180b2(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' yul ma ga d+har rgya zhing / yul ma ga d+ha'i rig yag la ba der song ste/ der phyin par gyur to// rig ya'i rtse mo der byang chub sems dpas spong ba'i phyir gnas te/ de der gnas
180b3(mdo sde): ba'i tshe/ sngon ma zos pa dang / sngon mo shes pa'i dpe gsum mngon du gyur to// gsum gang zhe na/ dge sbyong dang bram ze gang la la 'dod pa dag las lus dben par mi gnas/ 'dod pa dag las
180b4(mdo sde): sems dben par mi gnas shing // de dag gi 'dod pa la dga' ba dang / 'dod pa la chags pa dang / 'dod pa la 'dun pa dang / 'dod pa la brkam pa dang / 'dod pa la yongs su gdung ba dang / 'dod pa la
180b5(mdo sde): zhen pa gang yin pa de ni nye bar zhi bar ma yin la/ de dag bdag nyid kyis gnod pa byed cing / lus la gdung bar byed pas/ sdug bsngal gyis tshor ba drag po mi bzad pa tshab myong ste/ 'on kyang de dag
180b6(mdo sde): mi'i chos bla ma las mchog tu gyur pa/ 'phags pa ye shes mthong ba'i khyad par mngon du yod mi nus so// 'di lta ste/ dper na/ skyes bu zhig me 'dod la shing rlon pa'i gtsub stan
180b7(mdo sde): dang / shing rlon pa'i gtsub shong thogs la chur bcug stegatshubs na des me byin par mi nus so// de bzhin du dge sbyong dang / zam ze de dag 'dod pa rnams las lus dben par mi gnas/ 'dod pa nas/
181a1(mdo sde): las sems dben par mi gnas te/ de dag gi 'dod pa la dga' ba dang / 'dod pa la sred pa dang / 'dod pa la 'dun pa dang / 'dod pa la sgom pa dang / 'dod pa las yongs
181a2(mdo sde): mu gdungs pa dang / 'dod pa la brkam pa dang / 'dod pa la zhen pa gang yin pa de ni nye bar zhi ba ma yin gyi/ de dag bdag nyid kyi gnod par byed cing / lus la gdung bar byed pas sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba
181a3(mdo sde): drag po mi bzad pa tshab myong mod kyi/ 'on kyang de dag mi'i chos bla ma las mchog tu gyur pa/ 'phags pa ye shes mthong ba'i khyad par mngon du byed mi nus so snyam ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'
181a4(mdo sde): la dpe mngon du gyur pa dang ba'o// yang de 'di snyam du sems te/ gang dge sbyong dang bram ze 'di dag 'dod pa rnams las lus dang sems dben par gnas kyang / de dag gi 'dod pa la
181a5(mdo sde): dga' zhes bya ba nas/ me tshol ba zhes bya ba'i bar du thams cad snga ma bzhin du gyur te/ des shing rlon pa'i gtsub stan thogs la zang bzhag ste/ shing rlon pa'i gtsub shing gi gzubs na des me
181a6(mdo sde): byin par mi nus so// de bzhin du dge slong dang bram ze 'di dag ces bya ba nas thams cad snga ma bzhin du sbyar te/ mi'i chos bla ma las mchog tu gyur pa/ 'phags pa ye shes mthong ba'i khyad/
181a7(mdo sde): bar du mngon bya bar mi nus so 'am ste/ 'din sngon ma thos shing mi shes pa'i dpe mngon du gyur pa gnyis pazo/ gzhan yang gang dge sbyong dang bram ze 'di dag 'dod pa rnams las
181b1(mdo sde): lus dang sems dben par gnas shing / de dag gi 'dod pa la dga' ba zhes bya ba nas/ thams cad de bzhin du gyur te/ de dag gi de ni che bar zhi ba yin te/ de dag bdag nyid kyis gnod pa byed cing / lum
181b2(mdo sde): la gdung bar byed pas sdug bsngal gyi noru ba drag po mi bzod pa myong mod kyi/ 'on kyang de dag mi'i chos tha ma las mchog tu gyur pa/ 'phags pa ye shes mngon du mthong ba'i khyad par mngon du bya bar/
181b3(mdo sde): nus so// 'di lta ste/ dper na/ kyes bu zhig me 'dod cing 'od 'dod pa dang / 'od tshol bar myu ra la/ des shing gam pos gtsub stan dang / gtsub shing zang la bzhag ste gtsuban/
181b4(mdo sde): des me 'byung ba dang / 'od 'bar bar byed nus so// de bzhin du gang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze 'di dag ces bya ba nas/ tshor ba myong zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du/ 'on kyang de mi'i chos bla ma las
181b5(mdo sde): mchog tu gyur pa/ 'phags pa ye shes mthong ba'i khyad par mngon du bya bar nus so snyam ste/ 'di ni sngon ma thos shing sngon mi shes pa'i dpe gsum pa'o// dge slong dag de nas byang
181b6(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag kyang da ltar 'dod pa rnams las lus dben par gnas/ 'dod pa rnams las sems dben par gnas la/ bdag gi 'dod pa la dga' ba zhes/
181b7(mdo sde): bya ba nas/ thams cad snga ma bzhin du sbyar te/ bdag gi de yang nye bar zhi ba yin la/ bdag nyid kyis gnod par byas shing / lus la gdung bar byed pas/ sdug bsngal zhes bya ba nas/ tshor ba
182a1(mdo sde): myong zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar te/ 'on kyang bdag mi'i chos bla ma las mchog tu gyur pa/ 'phags pa ye shes mthong ba'i khyad par mngon du bya bar nus so//
182a2(mdo sde): snyam mo// dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' ji srid dga' ba'i bar dug ya'i ri ga ya'i rtse mo la gnas te/ rkang gis yul rgyu zhing sde dpon gyi grong khyer steng rgyas ga la bar song ste byin/
182a3(mdo sde): pa dang / de nA klung ne ran dzA na chu gsal ba 'bab stegs bde ba/ shing dang shing gel ba mdzes pa dag gis brgyan pa/ nyen 'khor na spyod yul gyi grong yod pa mthong ste/ de la byang chub sems
182a4(mdo sde): dpa' yid shin tu dga' bar gyur nas 'di snyam du sems te/ e ma ho sa phyogs 'di ni mnyam zhing nyams dga' ba/ nang du yang dag 'jog dang mthun pa ste/ rigs kyi bu spong ba den du gnyer ba
182a5(mdo sde): la ni 'dis chog go// bdag kyang spong ba don du gnyer ba yin gyis/ bdag 'di nyid du gnas par bya'o snyam mo// dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag ni 'jam pa/
182a6(mdo sde): gling 'dir snyigs ma lnga'i dus la bab cing sems can rnams dman pa la mos pa dang / mu stegs can gyi sdes gang ba dang / lta ba sna tshogs la zhugs pa dang / lus la ril por 'dzin pa la zhen
182a7(mdo sde): pa'i tshe 'ongs te/ blun po dag gdung bas yongs su gdung ba rnam pa sna tshogs kyis dag pa tshol zhing ston pa 'di lta ste/ sngags la spyod pa dang / lag pa la ldag pa dang / mi slong ba dang / mi smras pa dang /
182b1(mdo sde): rba ba dram za ba dang / sha dang tsa mi ba ba dang / dbyar mi 'byung ba dang / nang dang thub ma dang / chu yongs su grangs pa dang / khyim gcig dang gsum dang / lnga dang bdun nas/ zas len pa dang / tha ba dang /
182b2(mdo sde): 'bras bu dang / nya lcibs dang / drA ku sha dang / lo ma dang / ba lang gi lci ba dang / ba'i gshin dang / 'o grub dang / zho dang / mar dang / bu ram dang / ma btags pa bzhid 'thung ba dang / byang ba dang
182b3(mdo sde): zug rin gyis zos te bor ba bkrus te ba pa dang / grong dang dgon pas 'tsho ba dang / bgrang gi brtul zhugs dang / ri dgas dang / khyi dang / bag dang / spre'u dang / glang po che'i brtu la zhugs dang / 'greng ba
182b4(mdo sde): dang mi smra ba dang / dpa' bo'i tshul du 'dug pa dang / kham gcigs pa dang / kham bdun gyi bar du za ba dang / zas len cig za ba dang / nyin zhag gcig pa pa dang / bzhi dang / lce dang / drug gi skabs
182b5(mdo sde): skabs su za ba dang / zla ba phyed dang / zla ba gcig pa par byed pa dang / zla ba lta ba dang / bya rgod dang / 'ug pa'i gshog pa thogs pa dang / shing leb dang / rba mun dzA dang / bar ma'i shun pa dang /
182b6(mdo sde): dur b+ha dang / gres ma dang / rnga bal gyi la ba dang / ra bal gyi la ba dang / spu'i la ba dang / ko pags gyon pa dang / gos gsher ba dang / stegs bu'i steng dang / chu'i nang na nyal ba dang / thal ba dang /
182b7(mdo sde): rdo dang / gyo mo dang / shing leb dang / tsher ma dang / rtswa dang / gtun shing gi steng du nyal ba dang / mgo thur du bstan pa dang / cog tsog por 'dug pa dang / zang la nyal ba dang / gos gcig pa dang
183a1(mdo sde): gos gnyis dang / gsum dang / bzhi dang / lnga dang / drug dang / bdun dang / gos mang po sel ba dang / gcer bur 'dug pa dang / 'khru ba dang / mi 'khru ba'i cho ga dang / sgra dang /
183a2(mdo sde): sen mo dang / ag com ring por 'jog pa dang / ral pa'i thor tshugs 'chang ba dang / rgyags shugs dang / til dang / 'bras bu gcig za ba dang / thal ba dang / tsha dang / me tog spyad smad pa dang / rdul
183a3(mdo sde): 'thul ba dang / rdul nag po dang / phyag dar dang / rdzab kyis lus la skud pa dang / ba spu dang / mi'i thog pa dang / skra dang / sen mo dang / cha bu'i smad g.yogs dang / rdzab dang / keng rus thogs pa/
183a4(mdo sde): dang / chu dron po dang / 'bras kyi khu bal bar btsags pa dang / khrud ma 'thung ba dang / mdag ma dang / tshon rtsi dang / gos ngur smrig dang / khar ba gsum dang / mgo 'dreg pa dang / ril ba dang / mi'i/
183a5(mdo sde): thod pa dang / khri'i bur shing 'chang bas blun po rnams dag par khong du chud do// du brngub pa dang / ma rngub pa dang / nyi ma la lta ba dang / gdung ba lnga byed pa dang / rkang pa gcig dang / lag pa gcig bstod pa
183a6(mdo sde): dang ta rkang pa gcig gtsugs pa dang / gnas gcig na 'dug pas dka' thub sogs dang / phub ma la sogs pa dang / mdag ma bsregs pa dang / bum pa bsregs pa dang / rdo bsregs pa dang / me
183a7(mdo sde): 'bar bar 'jug pa dang / zas mi za ba dang / mya ngan dang / 'bab stegs su song se shi bas sdug pa'i 'gro bcol lo// rab bsngags shes bya ba dang / gzhi mi 'grib pa zhes bya ba dang / gni srung zhes
183b1(mdo sde): ba dang / gzhi tshugs shes bya ba dang / smon lam dang / bstod pa dang / sbyin pa sreg dang / dbab pa dang / sngags kyi bzlas brjod dang / klag pa 'dzin cing byed pas dag par khong du chud do// bdag
183b2(mdo sde): dag par sems shing de dag la rten te/ 'di wa ste/ tshangs pa dang / dbang po dang / gu lang dang / khyab 'jug dang / lha mo dang / gzhon nu dang / ma mo dang / ka t+ya'i bu dang / zla ba dang / nyi ma dang / rnam
183b3(mdo sde): thos kyi bu dang / chu lba dang / nor can gyi bu dang / tha skar gyi bu dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri ba dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / srin
183b4(mdo sde): po dang / 'byung po dang / grul bum dang / yi dgas dang / 'khor dang / tshogs dang / mtshan dang / sha dang / lha'i drang srong dang / rgyal po'i drang srong dang / tshangs pa'i drang srong dag la phyag
183b5(mdo sde): 'tshal zhing / de dag la thong por 'du shes so// sa dang / rlu dang / me dang / rlung dang / nam mkha' la yang rten/ ri dang / ri ngal dang / grang dang / chu mig dang / mcho dang / mtsha'u dang /
183b6(mdo sde): dang / rgya mtsho dang / lteng ga dang / khron pa dang / rdzing bu dang / shing dang / shing gil ba dang / 'khri shing dang / rba dang / sdom dum dang / lus dang / dur khrod dang / bzhi mdo dang / dul mdodas
183b7(mdo sde): srang dag la yang chen to// khang ba dang / ka ba dang / rdo ba dang / tho ba dang / ral gri dang / gzhu dang / dgra m+b+ha dang / mda' dang / mdung mthung dang / rtse gsum dag la yang phyag 'tshal lo/
184a1(mdo sde): zho dang / mar dang / yungs kar dang / nas dang / shing bal gyi phreng ba dang / nA dur ba dang / nor bu dang / gser dang / dngul la sogs pa la bkra shis pa la
184a2(mdo sde): to// gzhan mu stegs can 'di dag 'khor bas 'jigs skrag nas/ rnam pa de lta bu dag byed cing rten to// 'di na kha cig bdag cag gi mthor ris dang / thar pa yang 'di lta bu dag las 'grub bo
184a3(mdo sde): snyam du sems te/ de ltar log pa lam du song bas/ skyabs ma yin pa la skyabs su 'du shes shing / bkra shis ma yin pa la bkra shis par 'du shes la/ dag pa ma yin pa la dag par sems
184a4(mdo sde): kyis/ bdag gis ci nas kyang phas kyi rgol ba thams cad tshar bcad par 'gyur ba dang / sems can las dang bya ba chud zos pa rnams kyis las dang bya ba chud mi za ba bstan par bya ba dang //
184a5(mdo sde): gzugs na spyon pa'i lba bsam gtan spyod yul ba rnams la bsam gtan gyi khyad par bstan pas 'dun par byed pa de lta bu'i brtul zhugs dang dka' thub kyi khyad par brtsam mo snyam mo// de/
184a6(mdo sde): slong dag de sar byang chub sems dpas de 'di skam dro ba sams nas/ lo drug tu brtul zhugapa dang / dka' thub shin tu drug po shin tu spyad par dka' ba/ shin tu byung bar dka' ba'i dka' ba snu/
184a7(mdo sde): par brtsams so// ci'i phyir dka' ba spyad pa zhes bya zhe na/ de ni spyad par dka' ba ste/ de bas na dka' ba spyad pa zhes bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' srid pa zam pa gang bsam gtan mang
184b1(mdo sde): khyab la snyoms par zhugs pa ma gtogs par sems can gyis ris na mi 'am/ mi ma yin pa sus kyang dka' ba spyad pa des bu spyod par nus pa med do// ci'i phyir mkha' khyab ces bya na/
184b2(mdo sde): de dang po nyid du bsam gtan bzhi pa la snyoms par 'jug pa'i tshe/ dbugs byi nang du rgyu ba nye bar 'gog kun tu 'gog ste/ bsam gtan de ni rtog pa med/ rnam par rtog pa med/ g.yob
184b3(mdo sde): med/ sems pa med/ 'gyur ba med cing / thams cad rjes su song ba thams cad la mi rten pa ste/ bsam gtan de la sngon slob pa 'am/ mi slob pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas sam/
184b4(mdo sde): spyor pa la zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sus kyang snyoms par ma zhugs so// mkha' zhes bya ba ni nam mkha' ste/ khyab par byed pa/ byed pa med pa/ rnam par mi 'thor ba ste/ des
184b5(mdo sde): thams cad khyab par byed pas na/ bsam gtan de nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de bas nam mkha' khyab ces bya'o// dge slong dag de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten
184b6(mdo sde): ba rnams la ngo mtshar yang dag par bstan par bya ba dang / mu stegs can rnams kyi rgyags pa gzhi la ba dang / phas kyi rgol ba rnams tshar bcad pa dang / lha rnams 'dun par bya ba dang / sems
184b7(mdo sde): can cad pa dang / rtag par smras pa/ las dang bya ba chud zos pa rnams/ las dang bya ba la gzung ba dang / bsod nams kyi 'bras bu brjod pa dang / ye shes kyi 'bras bu yang dag par bstan pa dang /
185a1(mdo sde): khams gtan gyi lan la gnam par dbye bad / las kyi thobs dngas rgyas dgapa bcan padung / sems cad pa'abras dag ra/
185a2(mdo sde): pa'i sal rgyal mo grang bcas te 'dug go// 'dug nas rang gi lus sems kyis tshar ba rbad cing gapar / dge song de nas dgun gyi gyis bcan po'i nub mo// des lus tshus/
185a3(mdo sde): cing gzir pas chan khung nas kyang rdul byung ste zags/ dpral ba nas kyang rdul byung ste zags nas sa la lhung zil par chags nas b+h+yo zhing blangs pa byung ngo // 'di lta /
185a4(mdo sde): dper na/ stobs dang ldan pas skyes bu shin tu nyam chung ba zhig mgrin pa nas bzu ste/ btsir ba de bzhin du dge slong dag lus 'di sems kyis tshar bcad cing gzir na/ mar na khung nas kyang rdul byung
185a5(mdo sde): zhing zags/ dpral ba nas kyang rdul byung zhing zags nas sa la lhung ste/ zil par chags nas dro zhing rlangs la byung ngo // dge slong dag de nas ngas 'di snyam du bsams te/ bdag gis bsam
185a6(mdo sde): gtan du bya'o snyam nas/ dge slong dag de nas ngas bsam gtan mkha' khyab la bsam gtan du byas pa dang / kha dang rtswa nas dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba 'gags par gyur te/ na ba'i bu gnyis nas rba/
185a7(mdo sde): drag po dang sgra chen po byung ngo // 'di lta ste/ dper na/ brud pa bus pa'i tshe/ sgra drag po dang / zla chen po 'byung po 'byung ba de bzhin du/ dge slong dag kha dang sna nas dbugs kyi nang
185b1(mdo sde): rgyub 'gags par gyur pa dang / rna ba'i bug gnyis nas skra drag po dang / klu chen po byung ngo // dge slong dag de nas ngas 'di snyam nu bsams te/ yang bdag gis bsam gtan ma'a' khyab labasam/
185b2(mdo sde): gtan du bya'o snyam pa dang / de nas nga'i kha dang sna dang / rna ba 'gags par gyur to// de dag 'gags pa dang / rlung gong du mgo'i thod pa la gnod par gyur to// dge slong dag 'di lta
185b3(mdo sde): ste/ dper na/ skyes bu zhig gis mdung zung rtul pos mgo'i thod pa la btab pa de bzhin du/ dge slong dag kha dang skra dang / rna ba'i dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba 'gags pa dang / gong dra mgo'i thad
185b4(mdo sde): ba la gnod par gyur to// der lha'i bu gcig gos byang chub sems dpa' na ba de mthong nas 'di skad ces smras so// kye maho kyi hud gzhon nu don grub 'di 'chi ba'i dus byas so//
185b5(mdo sde): gzhan zhig gis 'di skad ces smras so// 'di 'chi ba'i dus byas pa ma yin gyi/ dgra bcom pa bsam gtan la gnas pa rnams kyi tshul ni de lta bu'o zhes smras nas/ de'i tshe tshigs su bca dang /
185b6(mdo sde): 'di dag smras so// mi yi bdag po shAkya'i sras po 'di// brnag pa ma rdzogs don kyang ma mdzad cing / 'jig rten gsum pa sdug bsngal mgon med par// mdzad nas mgon 'dir grongs par
185b7(mdo sde): mi 'gyur grang / kyi chung sems can snying po thugs dam brtan// mgon pos sngon chad bdag cag dga' ldan du// dam chos mchod sbyin la ni mgron du bos// sems can dag khyod dam bcas
186a1(mdo sde): gA ra lenas wA de sum buca gsum gyi lha'i nang du song ste// lha mo sgyu 'phrul la gzhon nu ni 'chi ba'i dus byas so nas don de brjod do// de nas mA so
186a2(mdo sde): 'phrul lha'i bu mo'i tshogs kyis bskor nas nam phyed tsam na/ klung ne rAn dza na'i 'gram ga la ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' ga la ba der song ba dang / des byang chub sems dpa' lus bskams cing
186a3(mdo sde): 'chi ba'i dus byas pa dang 'dra ba mthong ngo // mthong nas mchims brnangs shing dus nas/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// lum pa ni zhes bya ba'i tshal dung bu btsas pa'i tshe// seng
186a4(mdo sde): ge bzhin du 'dzin pa med par gom bdun khyod nyid song // phyogs bzhir bltas shing 'di ni nga yi skye ba tha ma zhes/ khyod kyi tshig snyan smras pa de yang khyod la yong ma rdzogs// 'jig rten sangs rgyas
186a5(mdo sde): 'gyur zhes drang srong nag pos bstan pa yin/ de yi lung bstan pa yang nyams la mi rtag des ma mthong // bus ni yid dga' 'khor lo sgyur ba'i dpal yang ma myong la// byang chub kyang ni rjes su
186a6(mdo sde): mthob tshal tu 'grongs par 'gyur// bu phyir su la sgrub cing sdug bsngal su yi gan du mdud/ bdag gi bu gcig chung zan gson pa'i srog ni su yis sbyin// byang chub sems dpas smras pa
186a7(mdo sde): shin tu sring rje bar na du byed cing / sra yang bshog la mdzes pa rnams bor ba/ shin tu bu lo sna sngags 'don byed la// sa sangs 'dug cing 'greng ba 'di su zhig/ lha mo sgyu 'phrul gyis smras pa/
186b1(mdo sde): bdagags zla ba bcu bar du/ rnardza 'dra ba mngal du bsangs// bu de'i ma ni bdag yin te// rab tu sdug bsngal rnam par smra/ de nas byang chub sems dpas ma'i dbugs 'byinas/
186b2(mdo sde): glab pa// yul byams pa khyod kyi ngal ba 'bras bu yod par bya yis ma 'jigs shig/ sangs rgyas bya phyir yongs su btang ba don yod de// drang srong nag pos bstan pa 'di mngon par gsal
186b3(mdo sde): bar bya'o// mar me mdzad kyis lung bstan pa yang mngon par gsal bar bya'o// sa ni rnam rgyar 'thor bar 'gyur yang srid/ rin chen rtse mo srun po rgyur 'phyo srid// nyi zla mar tshogs sal
186b4(mdo sde): srung 'gyur srid// so so'i skye bo yin yang nga mi 'chi// de phyir 'di la mya ngan khyod med byed// ring por mi thogs byang chub sangs rgyas mthong // lha mo sgyu 'phrul gyis thos ma zag tu rab tu sa
186b5(mdo sde): ste ta ba spu g.yos nas byang chub sems dpa' la me tog man+da ra bas gtor te/ lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ lha'i sil snyan dkrol zhing rang gi gnas ga la ba der song ngo // dge slong
186b6(mdo sde): dgangs 'di snyam du bsams te/ dge sbyong dang bram ze gang dag kha cig zas chung ngus dag par sems pa yod kyis/ ngas kyang zas chung ngu la nan tan bya'o snyam mo// dge slong dag ngas mdzan
186b7(mdo sde): par shes te/ zas su rgyag shug 'bru gcig pu kho na ste/ gnyis su med pa bos so// dge slong dag khyed kyi blo 'di snyam du de'i tshe'i rgya shug tshe ba snyam du sems par gyur na/ de ltar mi lta ste de'i tshe//
187a1(mdo sde): rgya shug kyang 'di nyid tsam mo// dge slong dag ngas zas su rgya shug 'bru gcig kho na ste/ gnyis su med med pa zos pas/ lus shin tu nyam chung zhing rid par gyur to//
187a2(mdo sde): dge slong dag 'di lta ste dper na/ ldum bu a sa ti ka'i tshogs pa dang / ka ling ka'i tshogs pa ci 'dra bar nga'i yan lag dang nying lag rnams kyang de 'dra bar gyur to// 'di lta ste dper na/
187a3(mdo sde): thog chags kar ka dka'i rtsib logs ci 'dra bar nga'i rtsib logs kyang de 'dra bar gyur to// 'di lta ste dper na/ bzhon pa'i bres khang ngam/ glang po'i bris khang rnying pa ngos gnyis zhig pa ni gdung
187a4(mdo sde): gyi bar snang zhing mngon no// de bzhin du nga'i rtsib logs gnyis ka nas lus kyi nang snang zhing mngon no// 'dis rtse dper na/ lan bur zlas pa ni mthon dman dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam par 'gyur ro//
187a5(mdo sde): de bzhin du nga'i skal tshigs mthon dman dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam par gyur to// 'di lta ste dper na/ ku ba kha bo gzhon nur bcad pa ni rnyis pa dang / kun tu rnyis pa dang / rtsub rtsub por 'gyur
187a6(mdo sde): ro de bzhin du nga'i mgo yang rnyis pa dang / kun tu rgyas pa dang / rtsub rtsub por gyur to// 'di lta ste dper na/ sos ka'i zla ba tha ma la khron pa'i gar ma dma' bar spong ste/ tshigs chen po rma
187a7(mdo sde): bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin du nga'i mig gi 'bras bu yang zung du song ste/ tshogs chen pos snang bar 'gyur ro// 'di sa ste dper na/ ra'i rkang pa dang / rnga mo'i rkang pa ci 'dra bar nga'i mtshan ma na /
187b1(mdo sde): dang / zung la gas pa sang bar / da slong nas nga mas pas stob la byug sa sum nam la tshigs nyid la / ma na rdzun snang / de
187b2(mdo sde): por gyur te 'gyel to// sha bang ste langs na rdul gyis lus log pa lag pas byis pa dang / byathu tshul pa thams cad lus las lpags so// gang ston pa kha dog mdzes shing 'jam par myur da
187b3(mdo sde): yang 'di ltar bdag nyid spong ba rtsub por btang bas med par gyur to// nga'i spyod yul gyi grong na gnas pa'i skye bo nyen 'khor pa rnams kyang ngal 'di ltar e ma po dge slong go'u ta ma ni gnag go
187b4(mdo sde): me mtsho dge sbyong go'u ta ma ni sngo bsangs so// e ma ho dge sbyong go'u ta ma ni nyi ming gu ra'i mdog 'dra'o// sngon 'di'i mdog mdzes pa gsal bar gyur pa de yang med par gyur to snyam du shes so/
187b5(mdo sde): dge slong dgangs 'di snyam du bsams te/ bdag gis de bas kyang zas chung ngu la nan tan bya'o snyam mo// dge slong dag ngas mngon pa shes te/ ngas pas su 'bras 'bru gcig pu kho na ste/ gnyis su
187b6(mdo sde): med par zos so// dge slong dag khyed 'di snyam du de'i tshe 'bras che ba snyam du sems par gyur na/ de ltar mi lta ste/ de'i tshe 'bras kyang 'di nyid tsam mo// dge slong dag ngas zas su 'bras 'bru gcig
187b7(mdo sde): zos pas lus myur du snga ma bzhin du gyur to// e ma ho dge sbyong go'u ta ma nya ming dgu ra'i mdog 'dra'o// sngon 'di'i mdog mdzes pa gsal bar gyur pa de yang med par gyur to zhes bya ba'i bar du'o//
188a1(mdo sde): dge slong dag ngas 'di snyam du bsams te/ bdag gis de bas kyang bas chung ngu nyid la nan tan bya'o snyam mo// dge slong dgangs mngon par shes te/ ngasabs su
188a2(mdo sde): 'bru gcig pu kho na ste/ gnyis su med pa zos pa nas/ de'i kha dog 'jam po med par gyur to zhes bya ba'i bar du'o// dge slong dag ngas 'di skam du bsams te/ dge slong dang bram ze gang dag kha
188a3(mdo sde): cig zas mi za bas dag par sems te/ bdag gis kyang thams cad kyi thams cad du zas mi za bar nan tan bya'o snyam nas/ dge slong dag de nas ngas zas mi za bar 'dug go// dge slong dag
188a4(mdo sde): ngas ma bos pas lus shin tu bskams shing nyam chung ba dang rid par gyur to// 'di lta ste dper na/ ldum bu a sa ta ka'i tshigs pa dang / ka ling ka'i tshigs pa bas kyang nyis gyur/
188a5(mdo sde): dang sum gyur dang / bzhi gyur dang / lnga gyur dang / bcu gyur gyis/ nga'i yan lag dang / nying lag skem par gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ rtsib logs ni srog chags kar ka ta ka'i rtsib logs dang
188a6(mdo sde): gzhon pa'i bras khang lta bur gyur to// skal tshigs ni bu blas pa lta bur gyur to// mgo'i thod pa ni kub kha bo lta bur gyur to// mig gi 'bras bu ni khron pa'i skar ma lta bur gyur to// dge slong
188a7(mdo sde): dag nga legs par snang ngo snyam nas lus bkyis bskyod nas/ sgur por gyur te 'gyel lo// sha zang ste langs nas rdul gyis lus yog pa las byis pa dang sha ba spu rul pa thams cad lus
188b1(mdo sde): las lpags so// gang ljon pa pa dog mdzes shing 'jam par gyur pa de yang 'di ltar/ bdag nyid spongs pa brtsub por btang ba'i phyir med par gyur to// nga'i spyod yul gyi grong na gnas
188b2(mdo sde): ba'i skye bo nye kor pa rnams kyang / 'di ltar e ma ho dge sbyong go'u ta ma ni gnag go/ a ma ho dge sbyong go'u ta ma ni sngo bsangs so// e ma ho dge slong go'u ta ma ni ha med gu ra'i mdog 'dra'o//
188b3(mdo sde): sngon 'di'i kha dog mdzes pa gsal bar gyur pa de yang med par gyur to snyam du shes so// de'i tshe rgyal po bas gtsang ma'i yang nyin re zhing byang chub sems dpa'i drung du po
188b4(mdo sde): btang ngo // dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' snga ma bzhin du 'jig rten du bya ba slad du byung ba bstan pa dang / bya ba nyams pa'i sems can rnams las dang bya ba la gzung ba dang
188b5(mdo sde): bsod nams kyi tshogs rnams brjod pa dang / ye shes chen mar yon tan bstan pa dang / bsam gtan gyi yan lag rnams rnam par dbye ba'i phyir/ til 'brugacig dang /
188b6(mdo sde): 'bru gcig dang / 'bras 'brugacig gi lo drug gi bar du dka' ba sdud pa bstan te/ yid dman pa med pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' lo drug gi bar du skyel mo krung bcas nas ji ltar 'dug po
188b7(mdo sde): bzhin du gnas te/ spyod la mnyam pa med do// nyams bab nas kyang grib ma la ma song ngo // grib ma las kyang nyi ma la ma song ngo // rlung dang yim dang char pa'i skyabs ma btsal to//
189a1(mdo sde): brang dang / sbrang bu dang / sdig sbrul ma bskrad do// bshang ba dang / gcib dang / mchil ma dang / skabs ma bor ro// bskum pa dang sbyang ba ma byas so// thos phab pa/
189a2(mdo sde): 'amakhas bub pa 'am/ kan kyal ma yin par gnas pas gnas so// sprin chen po dang / yul ngan chen po dang / char pa dang / ser ba dang / ston dang / dpyid dang / dgun gang yin pa de dag gis
189a3(mdo sde): kyang byang chub sems dpa'i lus la ma phog go// zan byang chub sems dpas lag pas kyang ma skyabs so// dbang po yang ma bkag go// dbang po'i yul yang ma blangs so// gang dag der 'ong bgrod
189a4(mdo sde): gi gzhon nu 'am/ grong gi gzhon nu ma 'am/ ba lang rdzi 'am/ phyugs rdzi 'am/ rtsa thun nam/ shing thun nam/ gci thun de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' la dur khrod kyi 'dre yin pa snyam du sems
189a5(mdo sde): shing de la rtsen te/ de la sas skud do// der byang chub sems dpa' drug po de dag gis lus ngan pa dang / gong ba dang / ring par gyur te/ de'i rna ba gnyis su rtsa 'am/ shing bal bcug nas/ rtswa'i
189a6(mdo sde): bug gnyis su 'byin to// sna'i bug gnyis su bcug nas/ rna ba'i bu ga gnyis su 'byin to// rna ba'i bu ga gnyis su bcug nas khar 'byin to// khar bcug nas rna ba dang sna'i bu gar 'byin to// rtswa
189a7(mdo sde): bcug nas 'byin to// wa dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lho phye chen po gang dag byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan mngon
189b1(mdo sde): na sa nang rnam nas la ba
189b2(mdo sde): dngas pa pa kyi 'angs pa dang theg pa gsum la sangam sa na par bya sa// des 'di sadu swA nA/ byung chub sems dpa' sa byu ga/ yod

190a4(mdo sde): dka' spyad gang zhig lha dang mis// spyad par nus pa ma yin pa'i// dka' spyad drag po rtsom snyam sems// bsam gtan gang zhig rang rgyal gyis// blta bas nus pa ma yin pa'i// rdo rje lta bur brtan
190a5(mdo sde): gnas pa// mkha' khyab bsam gtan bsam gtan byed// mu stegs brtul zhugs ngan pa yis// dga' ba'i lha mi 'di ni yod// de dag yongs su smin bya'i phyir// dka' spyar brtul zhugs drag po/

190a7(mdo sde): ldan pa g.yo ba med// lo drug bar du bsam gtan mchog/ nam mkha' khyab la bsam gtan byed// rtog dang rnam par rtog med pa// g.yo ba med cing sems rgyu med// nam mkha'i khams su khyab/
190b1(mdo sde): rngam mnga' khyab bsam gtan pamam gcan byed// na can mam thab mar ras// grib las nyi mar yong ma thus// mun pa lta mar migs pa'o// ma pa thas pasas ga su
190b2(mdo sde): rlung dang nar dang gzung dang // TIg sbal snang bu slob mi byed// nam par ma 'khrugs spyod pa yis// ma kha' khyab pasam gtan bsam gtan byed// bdag nyid gcig pa'i don gyi mig/ nga
190b3(mdo sde): khyab bsam gtan byed pa min// gzhan du snying rje'i sems kyis ni// 'jig rten don mang ched du sgom// grong gi byis pa ba lang dzi// shing bran dag dang tha thun dag/ de la dur khrod 'dri snyams ma//
190b4(mdo sde): de las yis srung byed cing // mi gtsang ba yang 'thor bar byed// de dag gnod pa mang byed kyang // g.yo ba med cing 'khrugs med par// mkha' khyab bsam gtan bsam gtan byed// mtho ba med cing
190b5(mdo sde): dma' ba med// lus ma bzungs par chos ma reg/ 'azang ba mo byed gcig mi byed// sgra yis mi 'jigs gzhan mi lta// sha dang khrag rnams skams gyur te// pags pa za rgyas rus pa lus/

191a1(mdo sde): don mang phyir byed ma gtogs par// bdag phyir ma yin pade blos min// bsam gtan ron myang phyir min// bas kyi rgol ba rab tu bcom// mu rmugs blo nyams zil/

191b3(mdo sde): ban b+ha dka' zhes// de tshe bdud kyis de skad tshig/ byang chub sems dpa' de la smras// de skad sbas pa'i bdud de la// byang chub sems dpas 'di skad smras// sdig can myos pa'i rtsa lag po/

194a4(mdo sde): skyong chen po zhes mdzer to// dge slong dag de nas byang chub sems dpa' dang po nyid du dka' ba spyad pa spyod pa na/ byang chub sems dpas brtul zhugs dang / dka' thugs nyams
194a5(mdo sde): 'og tu chud par bya ba dang lus rtas par bya ba'i phyir grong pa'i bu mo legs skyes mas/ nyin gcig bzhin du bram ze brgyad brgya zas byin zhing 'di skad du bdag gi zas zos pas/ byang chub sems dpa/
194a6(mdo sde): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar shog shig ces smon lam yang btab po// dge slong dag lo drug 'das nas/ ngas 'di snyam du bsams te khal
194a7(mdo sde): bdag gis mdoms g.yogs 'ga' zhig rnyed na re stes snyam mo// dge slong dag de'i tshe grong pa'i bu mo legs skyes ma'i bran mo grub ma zhes bya ba zhig shi nas/ de sha na'i ras kyis dkris te/ dur khrod du bor/
194b1(mdo sde): bar gyur pa'i phyag dar khrod pa de ngas mthong nas/ ngas phyag dar khrod pa de blang ba'i phyir/ rkang pa g.yon pas mnan te dgus nas/ lag pa g.yas pa brkyang ba dang / de nas sa zla'i lhas par snang /
194b2(mdo sde): gi lha rnams la grwa bsgrags pa/ grogs po dag 'di ltar rgyal po chen po'i rigs su skyes pa 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal sring bor te/ phyag dar khrod pa la sems btud pa ngo mtshar te/ grogs po das
194b3(mdo sde): 'di ni rmad du byung ba'o// bar snang gi lha rnams kyis/ sa tha'i lha rnams kyi grwa zos nas rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyis wa rnams la grwa bklags so// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris pas kyang sum su rtsa
194b4(mdo sde): ba la'o// sum cu rtsa gsum pas kyang 'thab bral ba la'o// 'thab bral bas kyang dga' ldan pa la'o// dga' ldan pas kyang 'phrul dga' ba la'o// 'phrul dga' bas kyang gzhan 'phrul dbang
194b5(mdo sde): byed pa lnga'o// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pas kyang tshangs ris pa'i bar du'o// skad cig de dang / zang cig de dang / yud tsam de la grogs po 'di ltar rgyal po chen po'i rigs skyes pa/ 'khor la
194b6(mdo sde): sgyur ba'i rgyal srid bor te/ phyag dar khrod pa la sems btud pa ngo mtshar te/ 'di ni rmad du byung ba'o zhes sgra gcig dang / brjod pa gcig 'og min gyi gnas kyi bar du grags par gyur to//
194b7(mdo sde): de nas byang chub sems dpas yang 'di snyam du bsams te/ bdag gis phyag dar khrod pa ni rnyed ni/ gal te chu zhig rnyed na re stes snyam mo// de nas de nyid du lhas lag pa sa la brtags
195a1(mdo sde): pa dang / der rdzing bu zhig byung bar gyur te/ deng sang du'ang lag pa brdabs pa'i rdzing zhes grags so// de nas yang byang chub sems dpas 'di snyam du bsamra/
195a2(mdo sde): tebadag gis chu ni rnyed na/ gal te phyag dar khrod 'di bkru ba'i rdo leb cig rnyed na re stes snyam pa dang / skad cig de nyid la brgya byin gyis der rdo leb bzhag nas/ de la byang chub sems dpas phyag dang /
195a3(mdo sde): khrod de bkrus so// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' la 'di skad ces smras so// skyes bu dam pa 'di kho bo la stsol cig dang / kho bos bkru'o//
195a4(mdo sde): de nas byang chub sems dpas rab tu byung ba ni bdag nyid kyis bya bar bstan pa'i phyir/ brgya byin la ma byin par bdag nyid kyis bkrus so// de lus ngal te chad nas rdzing nas rdzing nas 'byung snyam pa dang
195a5(mdo sde): bdud sdig can phrag dog gi chos dang ldan pas rdzing du gad pa mthon po zhig sprul to// rdzing de'i 'gram na shing sgrub byed ces bya ba chen po zhig yod de/ byang chub sems dpas 'jig rten dang mthun par bya/
195a6(mdo sde): lha mo la phan gdags pa'i phyir/ shing de'i lha mo la smras pa/ lha mo shing gi yol ga smod cig/ des kyang shing g.yal ga smad nas/ byang chub sems dpas de 'jus te byung ngo // byung nas kyang shing sgrub
195a7(mdo sde): byed de'i drung du phyag dar khrod chos gos skam sbyar du byas nas drubs te deng sang dra yang de phyag dar khrod drubs pa zhes ming du grags so// de nas gnas gtsang ma'o ris kyang wa'i bu 'o
195b1(mdo sde): med pa zhes bya ba des lha'i gos ngur smrig gi tshon du bcos pa rung ba/ dge slong gi tshul dang mthun pa dag byang chub sems dpa' la phul lo// byang chub sems dpas kyang de dag zang ba te/ rdza dro gas
195b2(mdo sde): thabs dang / chos gos bgos na pa spyod yul gyi zong du phyogs pa dang / den lha rnams kyis steng rgyas kyi sde dpon mi thong na dga' byed ces bya ba'i grong mi zhig yod pa'i bu mo legs skyes mal
195b3(mdo sde): nam byed tsam na smras pa/ khyod kyis gang gi phyir mchod sbyin byas pa de brtul zhugs de nyam sa 'og tu chud nas/ de la bas rags pa babang po bka' bar sems kyis/ sdon khyod kyis bdag gi phas pos sa
195b4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par tshangs rgya bar shog shig ces smon lam btab pa gang yin pa khyod kyi bya ba de gyis shig da
195b5(mdo sde): klong dag de nas grong mi dga' byed kyi bu mo legs skyes mas/ lha de dag ni tshig de thos nas myur ba myur bar/ bstong gi 'o ma lan bdun du bsnyen bkur byas pa babang po mnon tu 'gyur ba sring bzangs te
195b6(mdo sde): blangs nas kyang 'o mde 'bras gas ba pa ba dag dngapa phrub gsar par thugs nas thabs gsar par btsugs te/ kha bas de sgrub bo// de klu bden rdza ltas 'di dag snang ste/ 'o ma de'i nang na dpal be'u
195b7(mdo sde): dang / bkra shis dang / g.yung 'khrung 'khyil ba dang / pad+ma dang / sdong ris la sogs pa bkra shis rnams snang ngo // de nas des 'di snyam du bsams te/ ltas 'di lta bu 'di dag snang ba las na/ byang chub
196a1(mdo sde): sems dpas zas zos nas byang chub thob par 'gyur tu the tshom med do snyam pa dang / brgya mtsho ba shis shing chog shes pa'i mtshan mkhan phyogs der byin par gyur nas
196a2(mdo sde): des kyang bdud rtsi 'thob pa nyid du lung bstan to// de nas legs skyes mas zug pa de chos pa dang thang la bzhag ste/ me tog gis gtor/ spos chus gtor nas gus par stan bting
196a3(mdo sde): ste ta bran mo gong ma zhes bya ba la smras pa/ gong ma song la bram ze bos shig/ ngas ni 'o thub sbrang rtsi can 'di blta'o// jo mo legs so zhes de'i lhar mnyan nas/ shar phyogs su song ba dang
196a4(mdo sde): des byang chub sems dpa' mthong ngo // de bzhin du lho phyogs logs su song na yang byang chub sems dpa' mthong ngo // de bzhin du nub dang byang phyogs logs su song na yang de dang der/ des byang chub
196a5(mdo sde): sems dpa' mthong ngo // de'i tshe na gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams kyis gzhan mu stegs can thams cad tshar bcad par gyur pas 'ga' tsam yang mi gnang ngo // de nas de/
196a6(mdo sde): slar log ste jo mo la 'di skad ces smras so// gang dang gang du mchis kyang de dang de na dge sbyong mdzes pa gda' ba las/ dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze gzhan ni 'ga' yang mi gda'o// legs skyes mas
196a7(mdo sde): smras pa/ de nyid bram zes yin te de'i phyir 'di brtsams kyis/ gong ma song la de nyid bos shig/ jo mo legs so zhes smras te/ gong ma song nas byang chub sems dpa'i rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te
196b1(mdo sde): lags skyes ma zhes brtsibs spyan 'dren tonas smras so// dge slong dag de nas byang chub sems dpa' thong ba'i bu mo legs skyes ma'i khyim du song ste sun bting ba la 'dug sa
196b2(mdo sde): dge slong dag de nas grong ba'i bu mo legs kyis mas 'o thug snang rtsi can gyis gser gyi snod chen po bkang ste/ byang chub sems dpa' la phul lo// de nas byang chub sems das/
