196b3(mdo sde): 'di snyam du bsams te/ legs skyes mas kha zas 'di lta bu 'di sbyin pa 'di bdag gis deng pos te/ the tshom med par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang
196b4(mdo sde): bar bya'o snyam mo// de nas byang chub sems dpas zas de blangs nas/ grong pa'i bu mo legs kyis ma la 'di skad ces smras so// che zhe gser gyi snod chen po 'di ji ltar bya/ des
196b5(mdo sde): smras pa/ khyod snoms shig/ byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ kho bo la ni snod 'di lta bu mi dgos so// legs skyes mas smras pa/ ci dgyes su mdzod cig/ bdag ni sngon ma mchis par
196b6(mdo sde): mu le yang zas mi grol to// de nas byang chub sems dpas pas de thogs te/ lteng rgyas nas byung nas/ drol bab pa dang / klu'i klung chu bo ne ran dzu na'i ngogs su song ste/ khas
196b7(mdo sde): chos gos rnams phyogs cig tu bzhag nas/ byang chub sems dpa' lus bsil bar bya ba'i phyir/ klung ne ran dzA na'i nang du bzhugs so// dge slong dag byang chub sems dpa' khrus byed pa'i tshe/
197a1(mdo sde): lha'i bu brgya stong du ma dag 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir lha'i a ga ru dang / tsan dan gyi phye ma dang / byugs pa dag klung du lkugs shing lha'i
197a2(mdo sde): me tog kha dog sna tshogs kyang chu'i nang du 'thor ro// de'i tshe klung chen po ne ran dzA na lha'i spos rnams dang / me tog rnams kyis gang bar gyur te 'bab pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' spos chu gang gis
197a3(mdo sde): khrus byas par gyur pa de lnga'i bu bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dag gis blangs te/ mchod rten du bya ba dang / mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/ rang rang gis gnas su khyer ro// byang chub sems dpa'i grwa dang ag
197a4(mdo sde): tsom gang yin pa de dag kyang grong pa'i bu mo legs skyes mas/ bkra shis pa yin no snyam nas/ mchod rten du bya ba dang / mchod par bya ba'i phyir khyer ro// byang chub sems dpa' klung nas byung nas
197a5(mdo sde): 'dug par 'dod de gling la lta'o// de nas klung ne ran dzA na'i klu'i bu mo gang yin pa de sa'i 'og nas byung ste/ yid las byung ba'i seng ge'i khri byang chub sems dpa' la phul nas
197a6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' de la gdug ste/ grong ba'i bu mo legs skyes ma la snying brtse ba nye bar bzung nas/ ci tsam dgos par 'o thug sbrang rtsi can de 'thungs so// 'thungs nas kyang gser gyi
197a7(mdo sde): snod chen po de la ma chags par chur bor ro// bor ma thag tu klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos mchod pa'i 'os yin no zhes dad pa dang gus pa bskyed de blangs nas rang gi gnas su song ngo //
197b1(mdo sde): den ma mi ga stong bgrong khyer 'jigs pa nam mkha' lding gi gzugs su sprul nas kha rdo rje'i mthur bgyur te/ klu'i rgyal po rgya ma tsho las gser gyi snod chen po dbrog tu btul na ma nus
197b2(mdo sde): nas rang gi gzugs kyis gus par byas te/ bsangs nas mchod rten du bya bi dang / mchod par bya ba'i phyir sum bu rtsa gsum gnas su khyer ro// khyer nas kyang snod chen po'i dge 'dun gyis dus
197b3(mdo sde): ston byas te/ deng sang du yang sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams lo gcig bzhin du snod chen po'i dus ston pa'i dus ston byed do// seng ge'i khrid yang klu'i bu mo de nyid kyis mchod rten du bya ba dang /
197b4(mdo sde): mchod par bya ba'i phyir khyer ro// dge slong dag byang chub sems dpa' bas rags pa thos ma thag tu/ byang chub sems dpa'i bsod nams kyi stobs dang / shes rab kyis stobs kyis skad cig
197b5(mdo sde): nyid la lus la snga ma'i kha dog bzang po rgyas pa dang / skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu dang / 'od 'dom gang ba yang byung bar gyur to// de la 'di skad/
197b6(mdo sde): ces bya ste/ lo drug par du brtul zhugs nyams 'og chung byas bcom ldan blo gros 'di snyam sems// gal te bdag ni 'di ltar ridi bzhin bsam gtan mngon shes ye shes stobs ldan pa gshi
197b7(mdo sde): gi rgyal po'i drung du song ste thams cad mkhyen nyid 'tshang rgyar bya na ni// de lta na yang bdag gis phyi ma'i skye bo dag la snying brtse ma byas 'gyur// bsod nams ngan ngon tsam dang ldan pa'i lha'i mi 'di dag
198a1(mdo sde): ngan pas ye shes tshol// de dag lus ni nyam chung gyur na bdud rtsi 'tshang rgya byed par mi nus pas// kha zas rags pa dam pa zos te lus kyi mthu stobs skyed par byas nas ni//
198a2(mdo sde): shing gi rgyal po'i drung du song ste thams cad mkhyen nyid 'tshang rgyar bya bar bsams// grong pa'i bu mo sngon chad spyod pa spyad pa legs skyes ma zhes bya ba de// 'dren pa brtul zhugs grub par shog ces de
198a3(mdo sde): lha'i yid kyis rtag tu mchod sbyin byed// de ni lha yis bskul ba zos nas de tshe'o thug sbrang ci can zangs te// klung gi 'gram du song nas dga' ba'i yid kyis ne ran dzA na'i ngogs na 'dug/ bkal/
198a4(mdo sde): pa stong du spyod pa spyad cing dbang po zhi la rab tu zhi ba de// lha dang klu yi tshogs dang drang srong dag gis bskor te ne ran dzA nar 'ongs// pha rol rgal nas sems can sgrol ba blo gros ldan pa khrus byas
198a5(mdo sde): bsams nas ni// thub pa dag pa dri med 'jig rten snying brtse phyir ni klung du zhugs te 'khru// bye ba phrag stong lha dag dga' ba'i yid kyis spos rnams dang ni phye ma dag/ zung du 'thor zhing sems can
198a6(mdo sde): dam pa bkru ba'i don tu chu la gang bar byed// byang chub sems dpa'i dri med des pa bkrus te 'dug par shes gyur nas/ lha stong rab tu dga' ste sems can dag pa bkrus pa'i chu de mchod phyir khyer/
198a7(mdo sde): ngur smrig bzang po dri ma med pa'i gos dag lha yi bu yis de la byin// rung ba dag dang sham thabs bgos nas bcom ldan 'das ni chu klung ngogs na 'dug/ klu yi bu mo dga' zhing rab tu mgu ba'i
198b1(mdo sde): 'a kyil yang na yang ba skams// de la 'a rten dmag mag zed ma kyang ba tun pa de 'dug nas// zlazas ldan pa legs rnams sa ra na rlung du babs zhugs sa
198b2(mdo sde): 'a nagani drug pa la myur ba bdag gis gsol zhes byas// smrezlas ldan pas rje na ma dgas pa bas nang thos nas rnaM na bar te// don zab zer 'dzin pa sna ye mams das
198b3(mdo sde): chod par byan pa khyer// 'dzi rgyal bas papas rags pa dam pa thog pa de la snang cigs// de ma lus pa ma rlobs dang ma brjid dag dang dpal yang tha ma ma bzhin dgan/
198b4(mdo sde): skyes ma dang lha rnams dag la chos gtam byas nas don kyang mang du byas// seng ge ngang pa'i skabs da glang po'i dbang po 'gros kyis byang chub shing drung nas/ the ran ldana'i le'u zhes bya
198b5(mdo sde): rtsi bco brgyad pa'o// / dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' klung ni ran rganar khrus byas te zas mos nas/ lus kyi mthu stobs paskyed de/ bdud las rnam
198b6(mdo sde): rgyal bar bya ba'i phyir rnam pa bcu drug dang ldan pa'i sa phyogs shing gi rgyal po byang chub chen po'i rlung ga la ba der mes bu chen po'i sbubs gang yin pa'i skabs des song ste mi bskyod pa'i dam
198b7(mdo sde): dang dbang po'i mchod sdong lta bu'i bstabs dang / ri'i rgyal po lhun po ltar shin tu brtan pa'i stabs dang / mi dngos pa ma yin pa'i stabs dang / ya yo med pa'i skabs dang
199a1(mdo sde): 'tshe ba med pa'i stabs dang / rings pa ma yin pa'i bstabs dang / sdod pa med pa'i stabs dang / 'khrugs pa med pa'i stabs dang / 'khor ba med pa'i skab dang /
199a2(mdo sde): 'drud pa med pa'i stabs dang / zhum pa med pa'o stabs dang / ha cang mi sdod pa'i stabs dang / mi g.yo ba'i stabs dang / tab tab po med pa'i stabs dang / tshul du shis pa'i stabs dang
199a3(mdo sde): dri ma med pa'i stabs dang / dge ba'i stabs dang // zhe sdang med pa'i stabs dang / gti mug med pa'i stabs dang / chags pa med pa'i stabs dang / seng ge'i stabs dang / ngang ba'i rgyal po/
199a4(mdo sde): stabs dang / klu'i rgyal po'i stabs dang / sred med kyi bu'i stabs dang / sa la mi rigs pa'i stabs dang / rtsibs stob dang ldan pa'i 'khor lo'i ri mo sa la snang ba'i stabs dang / sor
199a5(mdo sde): dra bas 'brel cing sen mo zangs lta bu'i stabs dang / so sgra 'byin pa'i stabs dang / ri rdob pa'i stabs dang / mthon dman mnyam par byed pa'i rkang mthil gyi stabs dang / dra ba'i bar nas
199a6(mdo sde): 'od dang 'od zer byung nas/ sems can la reg na bde 'gror 'gro ba'i stabs dang / pad+ma dri ma med pa la gom pa 'dor ba'i skabs dang / sngon dge ba legs par spyad pa'i 'gros kyi stabs dang khron
199a7(mdo sde): tshe sangs rgyas seng ge'i khri la bzhugs pa'i thabapa dang / rdo rje lngar bsam pa gtan ning mi byed pa'i stabs dang / ngan song ngan 'gro thams cad gcod pa'i stabs dang / bde ba thams cad byed
199b1(mdo sde): ba'i thabs dang / bar pa'i lam ston pa'i sbubs dang / bdud kyi stobs stob pa med par byed pa'i stabs dang / ngan pa'i tshags can gyi tshogs pas kyi rgol bcos dang mthun pas tshar bcad pa'i
199b2(mdo sde): skabs dang / mun pa'i ling tog dang / nyon mongs pa sel ba'i stabs dang / 'khor ba'i phyogs phyogs med par byed pa'i stabs dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / dbang phyug chen po dang /
199b3(mdo sde): 'jig rten skyong ba rnams zil gyis gnon pa'i skabs dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po na dpa' bo gcig pu'i stabs dang / rang byung zil gyis mi non pa'i thabs dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i
199b4(mdo sde): ye shes thob par byed pa'i stabs dang / dran pa dang blo gros kyi stabs dang / bde 'gror 'gro ba'i stabs dang / rga ba dang / 'chi ba rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i stabs dang / zhi ba rdul med pa/ bdud kyi 'jig
199b5(mdo sde): pa med pa mya ngan las 'das pa'i grong khyer du 'gro ba'i sbubs te/ de 'dra ba'i stabs kyis byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying por chas so// dge slong dag de ltar krung ne ran dza na dang byang chub
199b6(mdo sde): kyi snying po'i bar der/ rlung gi sprin gyi lha'i bu rnams kyis lam phyag dar byas par gyur to// char sprin rnams kyis spos chus chag chag btab po// me tog kyang chal par bkram mo// stong bsu
199b7(mdo sde): gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na shing ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang / shing byang chub ga la ba de logs su rtse mo 'dud par gyur to// gang dag de'i nyin par btsas pa'i byis pa
200a1(mdo sde): de dag kyang / byang chub kyi snying po logs su mgo bskrun te nyal lo// stong gsum mi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na ri rab la sogs pa ri gang dag yod pa de dag/
200a2(mdo sde): thams cad kyang / byang chub kyi snying po ga la ba de logs su 'dud par gyur to// krung ne ran dz+nyA na nas bzung ste/ byang chub kyi snying por bar der 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyis btson rgyang rba/
200a3(mdo sde): tsam tshun chad kyi lam mngon par bkod par gyur to// lam de'i 'gram g.yas g.yon du yang rin po che sna bdun gyi stegs bu 'phang du shing ta la bdun tsam du mtho bo/ steng du rin po che'i dra ba bres pa/ lha'i/
200a4(mdo sde): gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan gyis legs par rgyan pa sprul to// mda' rgyang gang tsam mda' rgyang gang tsam gyi zhing / rin po che sna bdun gyi shing ta la stegs bu de bas mtho ba mngon par sprul
200a5(mdo sde): shing thal thams can rin po che brgyas pas phan tshun 'brel par 'dug go// shing ta la gnyis gnyis mi bar du rdzing thos nus yongs su gang ba gser gyi bye ma brdal ba/ me tog ut+pal
200a6(mdo sde): bad+ma dang / ku mud dang / pad+ma dkara' bo la sogs pas gang ba rin po che'i sngags bus bskor ba/ nor bu rin po che bai nAn+yAs thams kas brgyan pa/ chu rmeg dang / byagar dang / ngang pa dang / ngur ba dang
200a7(mdo sde): khru zung dang / ma bya rma 'byin pa'i rdzing dag byas so// lam den lha'i bu mo brgyad khro ni spos chus chag chag 'debs so// lha'i bu mo brgyad khri ni me tog sil ma chu'i dro bsung dang ldan pa 'thor ro/
200b1(mdo sde): shing tal thams cad kyi mdun lags su rin po che'i mkha' rten bzhag go// rin po che'i mtha' rten thams cad lha'i bu mo tsan dan dang / a ga ru'i phye ma'i phung ma thogs pa dang / dus kyi rjes su
200b2(mdo sde): 'brang ba'i bdug pa'i pog por thogs pa brgyad khri 'bod par gyur to// rin po che mkha' rten thams cad la lha'i bu mo lha'i klu dbyangs len pa lnga khri 'khod par gyur to// dge slong dag de ltar byang chub
200b3(mdo sde): sems dpa' zhing rnams ni rab tu spyod/ 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong ni 'byin/ sil snyan brgya stong ni sgrogs/ me tog mang po'i chur chen po ni 'bebs/ gos brgya stong gi g.yab mo ni 'dor/
200b4(mdo sde): bo che brgya stong ni brdung / rta dang / zang po che dang / glang khya ba rnams ni zla 'byin/ byin tso dang / ri gegs dang / khu byub dang / ka la bang+ka dang / shang shang te 'dung // ngang pa dang / drang pa dang / grub na
200b5(mdo sde): dang rma bya brgya stong ni bskor ba byed/ bkra shis pa brgya stong ni 'bul zhing lam gyi bkod pa rnam pa de lta bu des/ byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying por song ngo // gang gi nub mo byang chub sems
200b6(mdo sde): dpa' byang chub mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par 'dod par gyur pa de nyid kyi nub mo stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i bdag po tshangs pa dbang sgyur zhes bya ba des tshangs pa'i 'khor chen po de la bos te 'a
200b7(mdo sde): skad ces smras so// grogs po dag shes par gyis shig/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po banabs pa/ dam bcos pa chen po ma bor ba/ go chas pa ban brapa/
201a1(mdo sde): thugs yongs su mi skyo ba/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad tshar phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi pha rol tu byon pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa thams cad/
201a2(mdo sde): la mnga' dbang brnyes pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa thams cad kyi bya ba shin tu mkhyen pa/ sems can thams cad kyi dbang po'i rjes su zhugs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung ba thams
201a3(mdo sde): cad la shin tu zhugs pa/ bdud kyi las kyi lam thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis
201a4(mdo sde): brlabs pa/ sems can thams cad la rab tu thar pa'i lam ston pa/ ded dpon chen por gyur pa/ bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad 'joms par mdzad pa/ stong gsum na dpa' bo gcig dus
201a5(mdo sde): gyur pa/ chos kyi sman thams cad yang dag par bsgrub pa/ sman pa'i rgyal po chen por rnam par grol ba'i thabs thob pa/ chos kyi rgyal po chen po shes rab kyi 'od chen po gtong ba tog chen po
201a6(mdo sde): rgyal po// 'jig rten gyi chos brgyad kyis mgos pa/ pad+ma chen po sa bu/ chos thams cad kyi gzungs ma skyes pa/ rgya mtsho chen po dang 'dra ba/ rjes su chags pa dang / khong khro ba dang bral ba/
201a7(mdo sde): g.yonya/ mo bskyod pa/ ri rab chen po lta bu/ shin tu dri ma med pa/ shin tu yongs su dag pa/ shin tu dka' ba'i blo dang ldan pa/ nor bu rin po che dang 'dra ba/ chos thams cad la dbang sgyur ba/ sa
201b1(mdo sde): las su rung ba/ tshangs pa chen po lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' de bdud kyi sde rab tu btul ba dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par bzhed/
201b2(mdo sde): ba dang / stobs bcu dang mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo chen po bskor ba dang / seng ge'i sgra chen po
201b3(mdo sde): bsgrags pa dang / chos kyi sbyin pas sems can thams cad tshim par mdzad pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi chos kyi mig rnam par sbyang ba dang / bas kyi rgol ba thams cad chos dang mthun
201b4(mdo sde): pas tshar bcad pa dang / sngon dam bcas pa yongs su rdzogs pa ku tu bstan pa dang / chos thams cad la dbang phyug gi mnga' dbang brnyes par mdzad pa'i phyir/ byang chub kyi snying por bzhud
201b5(mdo sde): kyis de la grogs po dag khyed byang chub sems dpa' lam mchod pa dang / rim gro bya ba'i las thams cad la spro bar gyis shig/ de nas tshangs pa chen po dbang sgyur gyis/ de'i
201b6(mdo sde): tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// gang gi bsod nams dag dang gzi brjid dpal gyis byams dang snying rje dga' ba dang // btang snyoms dang ni bsam gtan dag dang de bzhin mngon shes tshang
201b7(mdo sde): pa'i lam snang ba/ bskal pa stong du spyod pa spyad pa de ni byang chub shing rung chas par gyur/ thub pa de la bsam pa'i brtul bzhugs sgrub par byed pa'i mchod pa legs par bya// de la skyabs
202a1(mdo sde): su song na ngan 'gro'i 'jigs dang mi phrad mi khom mi 'gyur te// lha yi nang du 'dod pa'i bde ba rnyed nas tshangs pa'i gnas yangs 'gro bar gyur// lo drug par du dka' ba/
202a2(mdo sde): spyad pa sprad nas 'di ni byang chub shing drung bzhud// kun kyang dga' zhing rab tu mgu ba'i yid kyis de la mchod pa legs par gyis// de ni stong gsum rgyal po dbang phyug dam pa chos kyi dbang phyug
202a3(mdo sde): rgyal po ste// brgya byin tshangs pa nyi zla grong khyer dag na de dang mnyam pa gang yang med// gang btsas tshen zhing rnams bye pa khrag khrig rnam pa drug tu g.yos gyur pa// de ni de ring bdud kyi dpung
202a4(mdo sde): las rgyal bar mdzad phyir shing chen mchog drung bzhud// gang gi spyi gtsug tshangs pa'i gnas 'dir gnas kyang blta bar nus pa ma yin zhing // gang gi sku la mtshan rab dam pa ldan zhing sum cu
202a5(mdo sde): rtsa gnyis legs brgyan la// gang gi gsung 'dir yid du 'ong zhing snyan la rnar 'thad tshangs dbyangs sgra snyan cing // gang gi zugs ni rab zhi khro dang bral ba de la mchod pa byed du 'dong // ga
202a6(mdo sde): dag blo gros brgya byin tshangs pa'i gnas su bsam gtan bde bas 'da' ba dang // nyon mongs 'ching ba'i 'khri shing kun dang dru ba de dag gcod par byed 'dod dang // gzhan las ma tha
202a7(mdo sde): bar ni rang rgyal byang chub zhi pa 'chi med thob 'dod dang / gal tes gsum dag na sangs rgyas nyid 'dod dag 'dran pa mchod par gyis// gang gis rgya mtshor bcas pa'i sa dang de bzhin rin po
202b1(mdo sde): tshe rnams mtha' yas dang // khang ba zangs thar khung bsil khang mang ldan pa dang zang du spel dang bzhon pa dang // me tog zeng ba shin tu mdzes pas brgyan pa bskyed mos rnal ni 'bru na/
202b2(mdo sde): dang rkang lag mgo dang mig rnams yongs su btang ba de ni byang chub snying por gzhugs// dge slong dag de ltar stong gsum gyi tshangs pa chen po de skad cig de la// stong gsum gyi stong
202b3(mdo sde): chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir phyin te// lag mthil ltar mnyam par gyur pa// gyo mo dang rdo med pa/ nor bu dang / mu tig dang / be DUR+Ya dang / rung dang / man shel dang / b+hi ru dang /
202b4(mdo sde): gser dang / dngul mang ba/ rtswa sngo zhing 'jam la g.yas su 'khyil cing g.yung drung 'khyil pa/ ka tsa litsI ke'i gos ltar reg na bde ba dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi
202b5(mdo sde): khams khyab par 'dir phyin te/ de'i tshe rgya mtsho chen po thams cad sa lta bur gyur kyang chun rgyu ba'i sems can rnams la gnod pa cung zad kyang med do// 'jig rten gyi khams de ltar brgyan pa
202b6(mdo sde): 'di phyogs bcu'i brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten myong ba rnams kyis mthong nas byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya skyong legs par
202b7(mdo sde): brgyan to// byang chub sems dpa' mchod pa'i las kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis kyang lha dang mi'i las shin tu 'das pa'i mchod pa bkod pa rnams kyis phyogs bcu'i
203a1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad kyang dkod pa'i rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig lta bur snang bar gyur to// 'jig rten gyi byar
203a2(mdo sde): dag dang / ri nag po dang / 'khor yug dang / 'khor yug chen po dag kyang mi snang bar gyur to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'od kyis gsal ba rnang ngo //
203a3(mdo sde): byang chub kyi snying po yongs su myong ba'i lha'i bu bcu drug yod de/ 'di lta ste/ lha'i bu ud ka li zhes bya ba dang / lha'i bu pud ka li zhes bya ba dang / skye dgu'i bdag po dang /
203a4(mdo sde): dpa' stobs dang / dpung rgyan stobs dang / rab brtan dang / sa 'dzin dang / snang byed dang / dri ma med dang / chos kyi dbang phyug dang / chos kyi rtog dang / 'gro grub dang / mig thogs pa med
203a5(mdo sde): ba dang / dkod pa chen po dang / tshul khrims rnam dag dri ldan dang / pad+ma'i 'od de wa'i bu bcu drug po de dag ni byang chub kyi snying po yongs su myong ba dag ste/ thams cad kyang phyir mi ldog pa'i
203a6(mdo sde): bzod pa thob pa sha stag go// de dag gis kyang byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa bya ba'i blo byang chub kyi snying po bcan te/ dpag tshad brgyad cu khor yug tu rin po che sna bdun gyi stegs bu rim
203a7(mdo sde): pa bdun gyis na bskor/ shing ta la'i 'greng ba rin bdun dang / rin po che'i dril bu g.yer ka'o dra ba 'om bdun dang / rin po che'i brgyas pa rim pa bdun gyis bkor/ 'dzam bu chu bo'i nas
203b1(mdo sde): klogs pa sa rin po che thams cad kyis sbas pa drug dang / gser gyi tshong dag dang / 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser gyi pad+ma dag gis khebs par byas/ snying po mchog gi thos kyis ni bdug te/
203b2(mdo sde): rin po che'i dra ba ni bres so// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tha dad pa dag na shing sna tshogs mngon par 'phags pa/ bzang ba mngon du mchod pa/ lha yul pa dang / mi yul pa ga/
203b3(mdo sde): dag na yod pa de dag thams cad kyang / byang chub kyi snying po der snang bar gyur to// phyogs bcu dag na chu nas skyes pa dang / zang las skyes pa'i me tog rnam pa sna tshogs gang dag yod pa
203b4(mdo sde): de dag thams cad kyang / byang chub kyi snying po der snang bar gyur to// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tha dad pa dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bsod nams dang ye shes kyi
203b5(mdo sde): tshogs tshad med pa'i bkod pa dag gis byang chub kyi snying po rgyan par byed pa de dag kyang / byang chub kyi snying po der snang bar gyur to// de ltar wa'i bu byang chub kyi snying po yongs su
203b6(mdo sde): skyong ba dag gis byang chub kyi snying por bkod pa de 'dra ba dag sprul par gyur te/ de dag lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dag gis mthong nas/ rang rang gis gnas la dur khrod/
203b7(mdo sde): tsam gyi 'du shes byas par gyur to// bkod pa de dag mthong nas shin tu ngo mtshar char 'dzin te/ e ma ho bsod nams kyi rnam par smin pa'i rgyu mthun pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa legs so zhes
204a1(mdo sde): ched du brjod pa'ang ched du brjod do// byang chub kyi shing gi lha mo bzhi yod de/ 'di lta ste/ 'od ma dang / spyan ldan dang / yid bzangs dang / mdangs
204a2(mdo sde): ldan ma ste/ byang chub kyi shing gi lha mo bzhi po de dag gis kyang / byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub kyi shing rtsa ba phun sum tshogs pa/ sdong po phun sum tshogs pa/ yal
204a3(mdo sde): ka dang / lo ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu sna tshogs phun sum tshogs pa/ khrun dang sboms phun sum tshogs pa/ mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa/ shin tu 'grel ba/ 'phang du shing tal
204a4(mdo sde): bdun srid du tsam du mtho ba de dang 'tsham par 'grel pa/ bkra ba/ blta na sdug pa/ yid du 'ong ba/ rin po che sna bdun gyi stegs bu rim pa bdun gyis bskor ba/ rin po che'i shing ta la'i phreng ba rim pa
204a5(mdo sde): bdun dang / rin po che'i dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba rim pa bdun dang / rin po che rgyus pa'i phreng ba rim pa bdun gyis kun nas bskor cing phyir mi bskor ba/ shing yongs su 'dus brtol dang 'dra ba
204a6(mdo sde): mig gi bsgru bas mi ngoms pa bskyed do// gang du byang chub sems dpa' 'dug nas/ byang chub mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par 'dod pa'i sa phyogs de ni/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig
204a7(mdo sde): gyi khams kyi rdo rje'i dkyil de sra ba/ snying po yod pa/ mi phyed pa/ rdo rje'i rang bzhin du gnas par gyur pa'o// dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba na/ lus las
204b1(mdo sde): rnam pa 'di lta bu'i 'od 'gyed de/ 'od des ngan song thams cad zhi bar gyur to// mi khom pa thams cad bcad par gyur to// ngan 'gro'i tshor ba thams cad bskams par gyur to// sems can
204b2(mdo sde): gang dag dbang po ma tshang ba de dag ni dbang po yongs su rdzogs par thob par gyur to// nad kyis btab pa rnams ni nad sos par gyur to// mi bde ba thams cad ni bde ba thob par gyur to// 'jigs
204b3(mdo sde): pas len pa rnams ni dbugs zin pa thob par gyur to// bcing bas bcings pa rnams ni bcings pa las grol bar gyur to// semasu can dbul po rnams ni longs spyod dang ldan par gyur te//
204b4(mdo sde): mongs pas gdungs pa ni yongs su gdungs pa med par gyur to// bkres pa rnams ni lto 'grangs par gyur to// skom pa rnams ni skom pa med par gyur to// skum ma rnams ni bde bar bcas
204b5(mdo sde): par gyur to// num pa nyam chung ba rnams ni stobs phun sum tshogs par gyur to// de'i tshe sems can gang la yang 'dod chags dang / ne sdang dang / gti mug dang / khro ba dang / 'chab pa dang / za ba dang /
204b6(mdo sde): gnod sems dang / phrag dog gi gnod pa med par gyur to// de'i tshe sems can gang yang 'chi ba med/ 'pho ba med/ skye ba med do// de'i tshe sems can thams cad byams pa'i sems dang / phan pa'i sem
204b7(mdo sde): dang ldan zhing gcig la cig pa mar 'du she skyed par gyur to// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ mnar med pa la thug pa'i bar// dmyal ba mi bzad snang ba yi// sems can rnams kyi sdug bsngal ni
205a1(mdo sde): bde ba'i tshor ba thob par gyur// dud 'gro'i skye 'gro sems can rnams// phan tshun gnod byed ji snyed pa// thub chen 'od kyis reg pas na// de dag byams pa'i sems kyang
205a2(mdo sde): skyes// yi dgas 'jig rten yi dgas rnams// bkres skom nyen pa ji snyed pa// byang chub sems dpa'i gzi brjid kyis// de dag zas skom rnyed par gyur// mi khom thams cad chad gyur cing // ngan
205a3(mdo sde): 'gro rnams kyang skams par gyur// sems can thams cad bder gyur te// lha yi bde bas rab tu tshim// mig dang rna ba med pa dang // gzhan yang gang dag dbang po nyams// de dag dbang po kun rdzo/
205a4(mdo sde): shing / yan lag thams cad mdzes par gyur// 'dod chags zhe sdang la sogs pa'i// nyon mongs rnams kyis sems can gang // gnod gyur de tshe nyon mongs kun// zhi bar gyur te bde dang ldan// myos
205a5(mdo sde): pa dag ni dran ldan zhing // dbul po dag kyang nor dang ldan// nad kyi btab pa nad sos shing // bcings pa dag ni grol bar gyur// ser sna med cing dgra med de// gnod sems dang ni rtsod pa dag/ phan tshun
205a6(mdo sde): byed pa med gyur te// de tshe byams pa'i sems su gnas// pa dang ma dag bu gcig la// ji ltar phangs par sems pa ltar// de bzhin sems can phan tshun du// de me bu pangs bzhin du sems// khyang /
205a7(mdo sde): chub sems dpa'i 'od 'dra yis// phyogs bcu'i phyogs ni kun tu yang // gang+ka'i bye ma'i grangs snyed kyi// zhing rnams bsam gyis mi khyab gsal// re bo nag po rnams dang ni// khor yug dag kyang
205b1(mdo sde): ming+ga gyur// rgya chen zhing rnams de dag can// gcig po nga bzhin de ltar snang // lag mthil la bur gyur pa te// byang chub sems dpa' mchod pa'i phyir/ sing rnams thams cad legs brtan pas/
205b2(mdo sde): thams cad ngan can nyid du snang // byang chub sring pa'i rim gro pa/ ni kar bcu drug yod// dpag tshad brgyad bu'i mkhyen nang // byang chub snying por brtan par gyur// ning rnams bye ba mtha' las na//
205b3(mdo sde): bkod pa chen po grang yod pa// byang chub sems dpa'i gzi brjid kyis// de dag thams cad der yang snang // lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang // mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye che// rang rang gnal med khang
205b4(mdo sde): rnams la// dur bakhrod tsam du shes par gyur// 'dir ni bkod pa de mthong nas// lba dang mi rnams ngo mtshar gyur// bsod nams gang gi rgyu mthun 'dir// phun sum 'di 'dra 'di legs mtshar// lus
205b5(mdo sde): dang ngag dang yid rnams kyis// brtson par byed pa med par yang // de yi yid la 'dod pa dang // bsam pa thams cad rab tu 'grub// ji ltar bsam pa gzhan dag kyang // sngon spyod chen rdzogs gyur pa/
205b6(mdo sde): las de'i rnam par smin pa yis// 'di 'dra'i phun sum tshogs 'di byung // byang chub shing gi lha mo bzhin// lha yi shing ni yongs 'dug/ de bas khyad par 'phags pa yis// byang chub snying por rnan
205b7(mdo sde): par byas// byang chub snying po'i bkod pa gang // lha yis mngon par 'dus byas pa// yon tan de dag tshig gis ni// thams cad brjod par yong mi nus// dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems
206a1(mdo sde): dpa'i lus las 'od byung ba// rnam par dag pa/ dri ma med pa/ lus dang sems tshim par byed cing dga' ba skyed pa ga nyon mongs pa thams cad sel ba/ sems can
206a2(mdo sde): la dga' ba dang / bde ba dang / dad pa dang / mchog tu dga' ba thams cad skyed pa des/ klu'i rgyal po nag po'i gnas snang bar byas par mthong nas/ de'i tshe klu'i rgyal po nag po rang gi 'khor gyi 'dun
206a3(mdo sde): du 'dug ste/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// gang phyir bdag gis gnas 'dir gser gyi 'od kyi brgyan par lhang nger gyur pa las// ji ltar 'khor ba 'jig gi 'od mdzes mthong zhing gser
206a4(mdo sde): zhes bya ba mthong ba dang / dzi/ 'od srungs chos kyi rgyal po'i skyon med pa yi dri med do mthong ltar/ mtshan mchog ldan zhing phan mdzad ye shes 'od ldan pa zhig byung du the tsom med// sngon chad nyes par
206a5(mdo sde): byas pa'i las kyi bdag gi khyim ni shin tu mun pas gang // khyim 'di na ni nyi ma zla ba dag gi/ rgya chen 'od kyang yong mi snang // me dang nor bu dag dang dri med klog dang skar ma rnams kyi 'od mi
206a6(mdo sde): snang // brgya byin 'od dang tshangs pa'i 'od dang lha min rnams kyi 'od mi snang // / de ring khyim 'di nang du nyi ma'i 'od 'dra ba yi dge bas mdzes gyur la// sems kyang dga' ba skyed cing lus kyang
206a7(mdo sde): bde bar gyur la lus ni bsil gyur te// lus kyi steng du bye tshan 'bab pa de yang bdag la bsil bar gyur pa las// bskal pa bye ba mang por spyad pa byang chub shing rlung bzhud par shin tu
206b1(mdo sde): gsal// klu'i me tog mdzes dang bzang la dri zhim gos dang mu tig do shal dang // rgyan dang gdub bu dag dang phye ma rnams dang bdug pa mchog rnams myur thogs la// glung byung ba dag dang rol/
206b2(mdo sde): ma'o dbyangs sgra sna tshogs kyis shing rnga dang dza rba dag/ brdung zhing 'gro zla kun gyi mchod 'os phan pa mdzod la mchod pa byed du 'deng // de ni langs te k+kA yi bu mo rnams dang ldan cig rdzogs bzhin
206b3(mdo sde): bltas pa dang // de nas ri bo lhun po lta bu ga zi brjid rnams kyis legs par brgyan pa zhig/ lha dang lha min bye ba dag dang tshangs pa'i dbang dang gnod sbyin rnams kyis bskor// dga' ba'i
206b4(mdo sde): yid kyis de la mchod byed shul ni 'ad zhes ston cing 'dong ba mthong / klu yi rgyal de rab tu dga' zhing mgu nas 'jig rten mchog la mchod byas te// gus dang bcas pas de yi rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'amal
206b5(mdo sde): thub pa'i mdun du 'dug/ klu yi bu mo rnams kyang dga' zhing mgu ba'i yid kyis thub la mchod pa byed// me tog rnams dang spos dang byug pa dag kyang 'thor zhing sil spun rnams kyang byed// klu mi
206b6(mdo sde): rgyal po rab tu dga' nas thal sbyar yang dag yon tan rnams kyis stobs// 'dren pa 'jig rten dam pa dgung zla nya pa'i zhal 'dra mthong bar gyur pa legs// bdag gis sngon chad drang srong rnams
206b7(mdo sde): kyi mtshan ma mthong ba khyod kyang de 'dra ste// de ring khyod kyis bdud kyi dpung rnams bcom ste bzhed pa'i go 'phangs brnyes par 'gyur// gang gi don du sngon chad dul dang sbyin dang bsdams shing
207a1(mdo sde): bdog pa kun btang la// gang gi don du dul dang tshul khrims byams dang snying rje ba dang bzod pa bsgom// gang gi don du brtson 'grus brtan dang bsam gtan dgyes dang shes
207a2(mdo sde): rab 'bar mdzad pa// khyod kyi smon lam de dag thams cad rab tu rdzogs nas de ring rgyal bar 'gyur// ji ltar ljon shing lo ma me tog 'bras bur bcas pa byang chub shing la 'dud// ji ltar bum
207a3(mdo sde): pa rab kyis gang ba stong dag khyod la skor ba rab bgyid cing // ji ltar tsam sha'i tshogs rnams rab tu dga' ste snyan pa'i sgra skad 'byin pa dang // ji ltar ngang bakhrung khrung tshogs kyang mkha' la mchi
207a4(mdo sde): zhing tshul du shis ldan pa// dang ba'i yid kyis drang srong la ni skor ba bgyid las de ring dgra bcom 'gyur// ji ltar gser gyi kha dog lta bur mdzes pa'i 'od rnams zhing ni brgyar mchi ste// ji ltar
207a5(mdo sde): ngan song mtha' dag zhi bar gyid cing skye dgu'i sdug bsngal thar bgyid dang // ji ltar nyi ma zla ba'i gnas kyis rgyun chad ser ma'ang dal bus 'dang ba las// srid pa gsum du skye dang rga ba zar mdzad
207a6(mdo sde): pa yi ded dpon de ring 'gyur// ji ltar lha rnams 'dod pa'i dga' ba spangs te khyod la mchod du lhags pa dang // tshangs dang tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don dang lha rnams bsam gtan bde ba spangs bdud /
207a7(mdo sde): gang yang srid pa gsum na dbang phyug dam pa thams cad 'dir lpags las// srid pa gsum du s+ye na thar par mdzad pa'i sman pa'i rgyal po de ring pon// ji ltar lha rnams dag gis phyag dar bgyis pan/
207b1(mdo sde): gul des nas ni khyod gshegs la// bcom ldan 'khor ba 'jig dang gser zhes bgyi dang 'od grangs dag kyang de nas gshegs// ji ltar ba d+ma bzang po zam mchis rnam dag dgas brtol byung ste/
207b2(mdo sde): de la stobs chen ldan gzhabs kyi rim pa 'dir yang dru ba bcom 'gyur// bye ba khrag zag stong phrag du ma'i gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bdud// de dag rnams kyis byang chub shing drang nas ni khyod la
207b3(mdo sde): bskyod pa 'am g.yos ma nus// mchod sbyin khrag khrig phrag stong rnam pa du ma gang+gA'i klung gis bye ma snyed// khyod kyis mdzad cing 'gro la phan phyir smad pa des na 'dir ni rnam par mdzes// rgyu skar
207b4(mdo sde): zla bar bcas shing skar ma nyi mar bcas pa mkhas las sar ltung gda'// ri mchog chen po rang gi gnas nas g.yo zhing rgya mtsho skams par 'gyur yang gda'// skyes bu mkhas pa bzhi po dag re
207b5(mdo sde): re nas ni ston nus gda'// khyod ni shing gi rgyal po'i drung du gshegs nas byang chub ma thob bzhengs mi gda'// gang gi slad du kha lo sgyur ba mthong zhing mchod bgyis yon tan brjod pa dang // byang /
207b6(mdo sde): rlab tu yang spobs bdag gis rnyed pa 'phel ba rgya chen rnyed par gyur// bur bcas bdag dang klu yi bu mo thams cad skye gnas 'di las par gyur cing // glang po drags pa'i skabs su btud
207b7(mdo sde): ba khyod kyi stabs des bdag cag mchis par bgyi// dge slong dag de ltar klu'i rgyal po nag po'i chung ma dam pa gser 'od ces bya ba// gru'i bu mo rin po che'i gdugs sna tshogs thogs pa dang /
208a1(mdo sde): sil snyan sna tshogs sogs pa dang / mu tig gi do shal sna tshogs thogs pa dang / nor bu rin po che sna tshogs thogs pa dang / lha'i dang ma'i phreng ba brgyus pa sna tshogs thogs
208a2(mdo sde): pa dang / pog por sna tshogs thogs pa dang / sil snyan dang glu dbyangs sna tshogs len pa rab tu mang pos yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ byang chub sems dpa'i gan du 'dong zhing rin po che'i me tog na/
208a3(mdo sde): tshogs mngon par gtor te/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis kyang bstod do// 'khrul pa mi mnga' ma bslangs mi mdzems bag mi tsha/ ma zhum mi dman rab tu dgyes par gdul dka' ba// ma chags mi
208a4(mdo sde): sdang ma rmongs brkam pa mi mnga' ba// chags bral rnam grol drang srong khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// sman pa zug rngu bral ba gdul ba gdul mdzad pa// 'grol ba sdug bsngal rnams las thar mdzad sman pa mchog/
208a5(mdo sde): gnas dang skyabs ma mchis shing dman pa mkhyen nas ni// 'jig rten gsum 'dir gnas dang skyabs su khyod byung ngo // ji ltar lha tshogs rab tu dad cing dgar 'gyur te// me tog char pa chen po mkha' las
208a6(mdo sde): 'bebs pa dang // 'di dag ji ltar gos chen 'thor bar bgyid pa las// de ring rgyal bar 'gyur gyis rab tu dgyes pa mdzod// shing dbang drung du gshegs la brnyengs pa mi mnga' bzhugs// bdud kyi sde las rgyal
208a7(mdo sde): mdzod nyon mongs dral ba drol// sngon gyi rgyal dbang rnams kyis ji ltar sangs rgyas ltar// byang chub zhi pa dam pa mchog tu 'chang rgyar mdzod// khyod kyis gang gi don du bskal pa bye mang du// 'gro ba sgrol ba'i
208b1(mdo sde): don du dka' ba spyad pa mdzad// khyod kyi dgongs pa rdzogs te dus la dra bab kyis// shing dbang drung du gshegs de byang chub mchog reg mdzod/ dge slong dag de nas byung chub sems dpa'
208b2(mdo sde): 'di snyam du bsams te// sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ci zhig la bzhugs nas// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas snyam mo// de nas des yang
208b3(mdo sde): 'di snyam du bsams te// rtswa bting nas bzhugs so snyam mo// de nas gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i tshogs brgya stong bar snang la 'khod pa dag gis// byang chub sems dpa'i sems kyi yongs su
208b4(mdo sde): rtog pa sems kyis shes nas tshig 'di skad ces smras so// de de bzhin no// skyes bu dam pa de de bzhin te/ sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa de dag rtsa bting ba la bzhugs nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
208b5(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// dge slong dag byang chub sems dpa' lam gyi g.yas rol na rtswa 'tshong bkra shis pa zhes bya ba rtsa rdzob 'jam pa/ shin tu gnon pa/ nyams dga' ba
208b6(mdo sde): lcang ler 'khyil bar 'dug pa g.yas su 'khyil ba/ rma bya'i mgrin pa lta bu/ katsa lin+da'i gos ltar reg na bde ba/ dra rab tu zhim pa/ kha dog dang ldan pa/ yid du 'ong ba dag rnga zhing 'dug pa mthong ngo //
208b7(mdo sde): nas byang chub sems dpas la mabor te/ rba 'tshong bkra shis pa gal ba der song nas byin pa dang / rba 'tshong bkra shis pa la sman pa'i tshig gis smras te/ tshig de ni kun shes par byed pa dang / nam/
209a1(mdo sde): par shes par byed pa dang / rnam par gsal ba dang / mi mchod pa dang / chag par byed pa dang / snyan cing 'jebs pa dang / mnyan par 'os pa dang / snum pa dang /
209a2(mdo sde): go bar byed pa dang / rtul ba dang / tshim par byed pa dang / dga' bar byed pa dang / mi rtsub pa dang / sha sha bo ma yin pa dang / mi brlang ba dang / mi brkam pa dang / 'jam pa dang / snyan pa dang /
209a3(mdo sde): bde ba dang / lus dang sems shin tu dga' bar byed pa dang / 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / 'thab pa dang / rnyog pa sel ba dang / ka la bing+ka'i sgra skad lta bu dang / bya kun la dang /
209a4(mdo sde): shang shang te'u la sogs pa sgra 'byin pa'i nga ro lta bu dang / rnga bo che dang / glu dbyangs kyi sgra skad kying ro dang / ldan pa dang / gnod pa med pa dang / bden pa dang / gsal ba dang / yang dag pa dang /
209a5(mdo sde): tshangs pa'i sgra skad bsgrags pa'i gdangs lta bu dang / rgya mtsho'i sgra'i shugs lta bu dang / ri rdob pa'i sgra lta bu dang ldan pa dang / lha'i dbang po dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang pos mngon par bstod pa
209a6(mdo sde): dang / zab pa dang gting dpag dka' ba dang / bdud kyi stobs stobs med par byed pa dang / phas kyi rgol ba'i sba ba 'joms pa dang / seng ge'i sgra'i shugs lta bu dang / rdzu dang glang po che'i sgra 'byin
209a7(mdo sde): pa'i nga ro lta bu dang / glu sgra sgrogs pa lta bu dang / 'brug zer ba'i sgra lta bu dang / phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rgyas par 'gongs pa dang / gdul ba'i sems can thams cad
209b1(mdo sde): rnam par byed pa dang / tabatab po ma yin pa dang / 'tshe ba med pa dang / mi shol ba dang / 'tsham pa dang / rigs pa dang / dus su smra ba dang / dus las mi yol ba dang / chos pacwa song legs par/
209b2(mdo sde): brnyas pa dang / gnyem pa dang / thogs pa med pa dang / rgyan chad pa med pa'i spobs pa dang ldan pa dang / skad cig gis gang thams cad sgrog pa dang / bsam pa thams cad shes par byed pa dang / da
209b3(mdo sde): ba thams cad skyed pa dang / bar pa'i lam yang dag par ston pa dang / lam gyi tshogs smra ba dang / 'khor las mi 'da' ba dang / 'khor thams cad tshim par byed pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyis
209b4(mdo sde): gsungs pa dang mthun pa ste/ byang chub sems dpas de lta bu'i tshigs gis rba 'tshong bkra shis pa la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ bkra shis rtsa dag nga la myur du byin// de ring nga la sras ni don chen 'gyur/
209b5(mdo sde): dpung dang bcas pa'i bdud ni bcom nas su// byang chub dam pa zhi pa reg par 'gyur// gang gi ched du nga yis bskal stong du// sbyin dang dul dang rngo mi dang stong byas dang / tshul khrims brtul zhugs
209b6(mdo sde): dka' thub rab spyad pa// de ni de ring nga yis thob par 'gyur// bzod pa'i stobs dang de bzhin brtson 'grus stobs// bsam gtan stobs dang de bzhin gshes rab stobs// bsod nams dang ni
209b7(mdo sde): mngon shes rnam par stobs// de ni de ribang la 'grub par 'gyur// shes rab stobs dang thabs kyi stobs dag dang // rdzu 'phrul dang ni chags med byams pa'i stobs// so so yang dag rig dang bden pa'i
210a1(mdo sde): stobs// don ring la 'grub par 'gyur// de ringang la rba sbyin byas na ni// khyed la bsod nams stobs ni mtha' yas te// de ni khyod kyi ngan pa'i rgyur mi 'gyur// khyod
210a2(mdo sde): kyang stobs pa bla na med par 'gyur// bkra shis pas ni 'dren pa'i tshig snyan rab tu mdzes thob nas// dga' zhing mgu la yi rang rab tu dga' ba'i yid kyis ni// rba 'jam gzhon zhing bzang la reg
210a3(mdo sde): par ldan pa spar gang thogs// mdun du 'dug nas rab tu dga' ba'i sems kyis 'di skad smras// gal te phra yis byang chub go 'phang dam pa 'chi med pa// mchog gyur zhi ba blta dka' sngon gyi rgyal
210a4(mdo sde): ba'i lam 'thob na// yon tan chen po rgya mtsho'i grags pa dpag med khyod bzhes shig/ bdag gise go 'phang dam pa 'chi med thog mar 'tshang brgyar bgyi// brtul zhugs dka' thub rnam mang bya dka'/
210a5(mdo sde): bskal mang ma spyad par// bkra shis rtsa mchog bting bas byang chub 'di ni thob mi 'gyur// gang tshe blo gros ldan pa shes rab bsod nams thabs kyis 'phags// de nas rgyal ba thub pas rdul med
210a6(mdo sde): 'gyur zhes lung ston to// bkra shis gal te byang chub rtse bo gzhan la sbyin nus na// srog chags brtsub byas te sbyin par yid gnyis khyod ma za// gang tshong yis byang chub thob shes bdud ci rnam par dbyes/
210a7(mdo sde): khyekhyod 'ongs chos kyi dam pa nyon dang rdul dang bral bar 'gyur// 'dren pas shin tu mchog tu 'jam pa'o rma ni sbar gang blangs// seng ge ngang pa'i stabs kyis chas nas so ni rab tu g.yos// lha gru tshogs rnam
210b1(mdo sde): thal mo sbyar te rab tu dga' yid kyis/ deng 'dis bdud dpung bcom nas bdud rtsi reg par 'gyur snyam sems/ dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi shing drung du
210b2(mdo sde): 'gro ba na// wa'i bu rnams dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' deng 'dir 'dug nas byang chub thob par 'gyur zhing mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya bar 'gyur sgyu ma ste/ byang chub
210b3(mdo sde): kyi shing brgyad khris brtson par gyur to// de nas byang chub kyi shing kha cig ni me tog gi rang bzhin can la 'phang du dpag tshad brgya pa yang yod/ byang chub kyi shing kha cig ni spos kyi rang bzhin can la/ 'a
210b4(mdo sde): du dpag tshad stong pa yang yod/ byang chub kyi shing kha cig ni tsan dan gyi rang bzhin can la 'phang du dpag tshad 'bum pa yang yod/ byang chub kyi shing kha cig ni gos kyi rang bzhin can la 'phang du dpag tshad lnga
210b5(mdo sde): 'bum pa yang yod/ byang chub kyi shing kha cig ni rin po che'i rang bzhin can la 'phang du dpag tshad 'bum phrag bcu pa yang yod/ byang chub kyi shing kha cig ni rin po che thams cad kyi rang bzhin can la 'bang /
210b6(mdo sde): du dpag tshad bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong pa yang yod do// byang chub kyi shing de dag thams cad kyi drung na yang ji ltar 'tsham pa'i seng ge'i khre/ lha'i ras bcos bu sna tshogs gting ba bshams par gyur to//
210b7(mdo sde): byang chub kyi shing kha cig gi drung du na pad+ma'i khri snyan bshams par gyur to// kha tshig gi drung du ni spos kyi khri stan to// kha cig gi drung du ni rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs kyi khri stan no// byang chub sems dpa'
211a1(mdo sde): ni rol pa bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rol pa bkod pa 'di la byang chub sems dpa' snyoms par zhugs/
211a2(mdo sde): ma thag tu de nas skad cig de nyid la byang chub sems dpa' mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos legs par brgyan pa'i lus kyi byang chub kyi shing drung gi seng ge'i khri de dag thams cad la 'dug par kun tu snang
211a3(mdo sde): ste byang chub sems dpa' dang / lha'i bu so so'i yid la yang / byang chub sems dpa' ni bdag nyid kyi seng ge'i khri la snyoms par zhugs shing 'dug gi/ gzhan gyi la ni ma yin par shes so// ji ltar de/
211a4(mdo sde): dag gis shes pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rol pa bkod pa 'di nyid kyi mthus sems can dmyal ba pa dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas pa dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa thams cad
211a5(mdo sde): dang / lha dang mi thams cad dang / 'gro ba thams cad du skyes pa'i sems can thams cad kyis kyang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi shing drung na seng ge'i khri la 'dug par mthong ngo // de lta mod kyi 'on kyang
211a6(mdo sde): dman pa la mos pa'i sems can rnams kyi blo gros yongs su tshim par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rtsa sbar gang thogs te/ byang chub kyi shing ga la ba der song nas phyin pa dang / byang chub kyi shing la la
211a7(mdo sde): bdun bskor ba byas te/ bdag nyid kyis rba'i rtse mo ni nang du bstan/ rtsa ba ni byor bstan nas/ rba'i gding ba kun nas bzang po bting rtse/ seng ge lta bu dang / dpa' bo lta bu dang / stobs lta bu dang / bstan
211b1(mdo sde): pal bu dang / brtson 'grus lta bu dang / mthu lta bu dang / glang po lta bu dang / dbang phyug lta bu dang / rang byung wa bu dang / ye shes can lta bu dang / bla na med pa la bu dang / khyad par du 'phags
211b2(mdo sde): pas bu dang / mngon par 'phags pa lu bu dang / grags pa lta bu dang / brjod la bu dang / sbyin pa lta bu dang / tshul khrims lta bu dang / bzod pa lta bu dang / brtson 'grus lA bu dang / bsam gaN
211b3(mdo sde): wA bu dang / shes rab lta bu dang / ye shes sa bu dang / bsod nams la bu dang / bdud phyir rgol pa bcom pa la bu dang / tshogs sa bur skyil mo krung bcas nas/ rba bting ba de la shar phyogs su sbas
211b4(mdo sde): te 'dug nas/ lus drang por bzang ste/ dran pa mngon du bzhag nas 'di 'dra ba'i yi dam brtan po byas so// stan 'dir bdag gi lus ni sems kyang rung / pags pa rus pa sha rnams zhig kyang rung /
211b5(mdo sde): bkal mang rlud dka' byang chub ma thob par/ stan 'di las ni lus bskyod mi bya'o// byang chub kyi snying por bzhud pa'i le'u zhes pa skye bcu bu'o// / 'phags pa rgya cher rol
211b6(mdo sde): gnas bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// bam po bcu gsum pa/ dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug pa dang / 'dod pa na spyod pa'i ris drug gi lhan ma/
211b7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' la bar chad byed pa mi 'byung grang snyam ste/ shar phyogs logs su gnas par gyur to// de bzhin du lho dang nub dang byang phyogs kyang lha rnams kyis yongs su bsrung bar gyur to//
212a1(mdo sde): dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa'/ byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug pa de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' bgul ba zhes bya ba'i 'od byung nas/ 'od des phyogs bcu
212a2(mdo sde): kun tu grangs med/ dpag tu med pa/ chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad snang bar gyur to// de nas shar phyogs na/
212a3(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med pa'i 'od kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams dri ma med par byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bde ba bkod pa zhes bya ba 'od des bskul bas// byang chub
212a4(mdo sde): sems dpa' bgrang ba las 'das pa dag gis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ byang chub kyi snying po ga la ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ byang chub sems//
212a5(mdo sde): dpa' la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir/ de'i tshe rdzu 'phrul gyi mngon par 'du bya ba de lta bu byas te/ rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba de byas pas phyogs bcur nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i sangs rgyas
212a6(mdo sde): kyi zhing thams cad 'khor gyi khyams bai DUR+Ya sngon po dag las byas pa gcig tu bstan to// 'gro ba lngar skyes pa'i sems can thams cad kyi mdun du yang / byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying
212a7(mdo sde): po la 'jug par snyan to// sems can de dag kyang phan tshun du sor mo gcig gis byang chub sems dpa' ston cing sems can tshul du shis pa'i gzugs 'di lta bu dang ldan pa 'di su zhig/ 'di ltar
212b1(mdo sde): rnam par mdzes pa'i sems can 'di su zhig zhes 'dzer to// sems can de dag gi mdun du byang chub sems dpa' des byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang sprul te/ de na byang chub sam dpas/
212b2(mdo sde): gzugs de dag gis tshigs su bcad pa 'di smras so// ci yang med pa'i 'dod chags zhe sdang rnyog pa gang yin bag chags bcas bton pa// gang gis lus las 'od byung phyogs bcu'i 'od rnams
212b3(mdo sde): thams cad 'od ni med par byas// gang gis bsod nams ting 'dzin ye shes tshogs ni bskal ba mang por kun spel pa// shAk+Shu thub pa thub pa chen po dam pa 'don phyogs rnams kun tu mdzes/
212b4(mdo sde): de nas lho phyogs na de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'od 'gro'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che bkod par/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin po che'i gdus
212b5(mdo sde): brtsegs kun tu ston pa zhes bya ba 'od des bskul bas/ byang chub sems dpa' bgrang ba las 'das pa dag gis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ byang chub kyi snying po ga la ba dang / byang chug
212b6(mdo sde): sems dpa' ga la ba der song ste phyin nus/ byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa'i lA gyi phyir/ rin po che'i gdugs gcig gis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi khyams de bkab bo// na
212b7(mdo sde): byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten myong ba dag phan tshun 'di skad 'dzer to// gang gi phyir rin po che'i gdugs bkod pa rnam pa 'di sa bu 'di snang bar gyur pa 'di su'i 'bras bu zhes 'dzer to//
213a1(mdo sde): de nas rin po che'i gdugs de las tshigs su bcad pa 'di byung ngo // gang gis rin po che dang gdugs stong phrag bye ba khrag khrig dag/ byams pa'i yid kyis do zla med par
213a2(mdo sde): bzhugs dang mya ngan 'das la phul// de yis mtshan mchog ldan pa phan mdzad sred med bu yi mthu ldan pa// yon tan mnga' ba byang chub shing drung gshegs pa de la mchod pa byas/
213a3(mdo sde): de nas nub phyogs na de bzhin gshegs pa me tog phreng ba dang nags tshal gyi phreng ba me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par mkhyen pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams me tog tsam pa ka'i kha
213a4(mdo sde): dog tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dbang po'i dra ba can zhes bya ba 'od des bskul bas/ byang chub sems dpa' bgrang ba las 'das pa dag gis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar
213a5(mdo sde): te te byang chub kyi snying po ga la ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir rin po che'i/ dra ba gcig gis thams
213a6(mdo sde): dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi khyams de bkab bo// de na phyogs bcu'i lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dag phan tshun du 'di skad 'dzer te/ 'od kyi bkod pa rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di
213a7(mdo sde): su'i yin zhes 'dzer to// de nas rin po che'i dra ba de las tshigs su bcad pa 'di byung ngo // rin chen 'byung gnas 'jig rten gsum dga' rin chen to// rin chen dam pa rin chen grags
213b1(mdo sde): paden sa ces/ dkon mchog gsum po rgyun mi 'chad pa'i brtson 'grus ba rnyes/ byung chub mchog pa rnyes 'gyur te de mi mchod pa 'di/ de nas byung phyogs na de bzhin pa shes/
213b2(mdo sde): btsam zil du drug par byed pa'i 'ad dang ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams kyi ma 'khor bar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bkod pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba 'di dus bskul
213b3(mdo sde): bas/ byang chub sems dpa' bgrang ba las 'das pa dag gis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ byang chub kyi snying po ga la ba dang byang chub sems dpa' ga la ba der dong rtse byin
213b4(mdo sde): nas/ byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ji snyed 'khor gyi khyams der kun tu bstan to//
213b5(mdo sde): de na byang chub sems dpa' kha cig 'di skad 'dzer te/ bkod pa rnam pa 'di lta bu 'dri su'i yin zhes 'dzer to// de nas bkod pa de dag thams cad las tshigs su bcad pa 'di byung
213b6(mdo sde): gang gis bsod nams ye shes shin tu mang pos lus ni rnam spangs shing / gang gis brtul zhugs dka' thub dag dang bden pa'i chos kyis ngag sbyangs la/ gang gis khrel yod mos pa
213b7(mdo sde): byams dang de bzhin snying rjes sems sbyangs pa/ de ni shing rgyal drung gshegs shAkya khyu mchog de la mchod pa byed/ de nas shar lho'i phyogs mtshams na de bzhin gshegs pa/
214a1(mdo sde): yon pan gyi rgyal po rkang pa'i sangs rgyas kyi shing 'dzim rten mi rnams yon tas byung gnas sa byung chub sem sa dpa' sem pa dpa' chen po yon tan gyinagris nas byung /
214a2(mdo sde): des btul bas/ byang chub sems dpa' bgung ba las 'das bdag gis yongs su bskor snang mdun du bdar te/ byang chub kyi snying po gal ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' gal ba der song
214a3(mdo sde): byin nas/ byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir/ 'khor gyi khyams der yon tan gyi bkod pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa mngon par sprul te khang pa brtsegs pa de las/
214a4(mdo sde): tshigs su bcad pa 'di byung ngo // gang gi yon tan dag gis lha dang lha min dang // gnod sbyin lto 'phye che dag rtag tu yon tan bgos// yon tan can de yon tan ldan pa'i rgyal rigs skyes// yon
214a5(mdo sde): tan rgya mtsho byang chub shing gi drung na bzhugs/ de nas lho dang nub kyi phyogs mtshams na de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen srong shing gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams rin po
214a6(mdo sde): che 'byung bar/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin po che 'byung ba zhes bya ba 'od des bskul bas/ byang chub sems dpa' bgrang ba las 'das pa dag gis yongs su bskor cing
214a7(mdo sde): mdun du bdar te/ byang chub kyi snying po ga la ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir/ 'khor gyi khyams der ri/
214b1(mdo sde): rten zangs med dpas tu med pa ma na pa sprul te/ na pa na ma la mar pa 'di byung gA/ ngags ma 'babs pa'i 'du
214b2(mdo sde): pharnam nga// khang sasangs sa pazung bam la'ang sa dang thang dang khyen pas ma tha 'a/ mata me ba ma ma nga dun pa byu nga bskye mas rnal nA d+hA/
214b3(mdo sde): ga pa mas dang rig btang bar byang chub sring par 'du/ dems ba dang byang phyogs marnams na de bzhin gshegs pa 'brug pa'i rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi shing 'jig
214b4(mdo sde): khams sbyin dang ldan par/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin brtsegs 'brug bsgrags dbyangs shes bya ba 'od des bskul bas/ byang chub sems dpa' bzang ba las 'das pa
214b5(mdo sde): dag gis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ byang chub kyis snying po ga la ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir/
214b6(mdo sde): dus kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i las a ga ru'i sprin mngon par sprul te/ 'khor gyi khyams der tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po'i phye ma'i char mngon par bab bo// dus kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i sprin gyi dkyil 'khor
214b7(mdo sde): de las kyang rigs su bcad pa 'di byung ngo // rigs dang rnam par grol ba'i 'od kyi sprin gyis srid gsum thams cad khyab// dam chos 'dod chags bral ba bdud rtsi mya ngan 'das par thob byed char ba 'beg/
215a1(mdo sde): 'dod chags nyon mongs 'ching ba'i khri shing thams cad bag chags bcad de gcod par 'gyur// bsam gtan rdzu 'phrul stobs dang dbang po'i me tog rgyas pa dad par/
215a2(mdo sde): byed pa 'byin// de nas byang dang shar gyi phyogs mtshams na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i gdugs mngon par 'phags pa snang ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams
215a3(mdo sde): gser gyi dra bas khebs pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gser gyi dra bas brgyan pa zhes bya ba 'od des bskul bas/ byang chub sems dpa' bgrang ba las 'das pa dag gis yo/
215a4(mdo sde): su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ byang chub kyi snying po ga la ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa'i las kyi phyim/ khang pa brtsegs pa de dag
215a5(mdo sde): thams cad dang / rin po che'i mkha' rten rnams su byang chub sems dpa' gzugs mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brdzun pa dag mngon par sprul te/ byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs de dag
215a6(mdo sde): thams cad kyang lha dang mi'i me tog gi phreng ba thogs shing / byang chub sems dpa' ga la ba der logs su lus btud nas/ me tog gi phreng ba dpyangs te/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di smras so// gangag
215a7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas khrag khrig sngon bstod cing // gus dang bcas pas dang pa che bskyed la// tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs snyan pa'i tshig smras pa// byang chub snying por byon la mgos phyag 'tshal//
215b1(mdo sde): sa zhan phyags gde bzhin gshegs pa can tu ma thags kyi yangs rgyas sad 'angan tan mkhams ldan rnam par bsdus par byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' pa na pa'i rlung na/
215b2(mdo sde): ba ba 'od das pagul bas/ byang chub sems dpa' bzang ba las 'das pa dag gis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ byang chub kyi snying po ga la ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' gal ba der song
215b3(mdo sde): sbyin nas/ byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir/ be nu mra'i 'khor gyi khyams der 'dzam bu'i gling gi gser gyi pad+ma rnams mngon du 'byung bar bstan to// pad+ma de dag gi snying po la
215b4(mdo sde): bud med lus byed snang ba/ kha dog dang gzugs phun sum tshogs pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan par bstan te/ lag pa g.yas g.yon na mgul gdub dang / gdu bu dang / dpung rgyan dang / gser
215b5(mdo sde): bud dang / mu tig gi do shal la sogs pa rgyan rnam pa mang po thogs shing / me tog dang / dar gyi lba ldi dpyangs nas/ byang chub kyi snying po ga la ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' ga la ba der logs su
215b6(mdo sde): lus btang te tshigs su bcad pa 'di smras so// gang zhig rtag tu sangs rgyas nyan thos dang // rang rgyal dag dang bla ma rnams la 'dud// khrims ldan rtag dran dga' la nga rgyal med// yon tan ldan pa/
215b7(mdo sde): dam 'dud pa byos/ de nas steng gi phyogs na de bzhin gshegs pa tshogs kyi dbang po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams tshogs kyi dam par/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
216a1(mdo sde): dpa' chen po nam mkha' mdzod ces bya ba 'od des bskul bas/ byang chub sems dpa' bgrang ba las 'das pa dag gis yongs su bsor cing mdun du bdar te/ byang chub
216a2(mdo sde): kyi snying po ga la ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' gal ba der song ste byin nas/ byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa'i las kyi yongs su bskor cing / nam mkha'i dkyil na 'dug bzhin du/ phyogs
216a3(mdo sde): bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad na thon ma mthong ma zos pa'i me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang ga bdug spos dang / gos dang / rgyan dang / gdugs
216a4(mdo sde): dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / rnam par rgyal ba'i khang pa dang / rin po che dang / nor bu dang / gser dang / dngul dang / mu tig dang / rta dang / glang po che dang / shing rta dang / dpung bu chung dang / gzhon/
216a5(mdo sde): ba dang / shing ljon pa dang / lo ma dang / me tog dang / 'azas bu dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dang / wa dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri ba dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang
216a6(mdo sde): 'a ma chen po dang / ba byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig can myong ba dang / ma dang / mi ma yin pa rdo snyed yod pa dag thams cad nam mkhakhyen gyi l+ya nas car chen pa mngon par mab ste/ ma
216a7(mdo sde): dga' ba dang / bde bsrid kyi/ sems can gang la yang 'jigs pa 'am/ gnod par mi byed do// de bzhin du thar te/ de la 'di sad ces bya'o// phyogs pasu de dag rnams nas rgyal ba'i sras pa
216b1(mdo sde): na pa da pa ma pa sdud na gyur // mas ldan pa da rnam nga // rdul dang ma pa mangs sa sa / kha k+Sha
216b2(mdo sde): mam 'du thags rnam pa// kha bas ma mas mnyam gzhal ma yang ldan nga // ldan na can ma la zug za byung sa hA/
216b3(mdo sde): mtshan med sngon med mchog brjid cing // sa las seng ges bu bzhin tu rdzogs shi ba zugs// bcig rdzun can ma ma thong ma tog mdzes 'thor zhing // zlum rtog ci 'drar shin tu sogs shing /
216b4(mdo sde): kha cig rang gi lus kyi kha dog stong ston cing / rma bya la bur mkha' las shin tu sgrogs shing lpags/ kha cig bde gshegs zas kyi yon tan phreng brjod cing // zla ba lta bur mkha' las shin tu
216b5(mdo sde): rgyas shing lpags// kha cig nyi ma lta bur 'od zer rab 'gyed de// bdud kyi gnas rnams thams cad mog mog byed cing lpags// bsod nams tshogs bsags kha cig dbang po'i mchod sngong 'adz+rag/
216b6(mdo sde): dri med tog thogs byang chub snying po der yang lhags// kha cig mkha' las nor bu rin chen 'dra ba 'thor// zla ba zla bzangs zang skyes rnams mdzes man+da ra// ba ra sha tsam pa ka dang sna ma'i me
216b7(mdo sde): tog zeng // byang chub sems dpa' shing rgyal drung na bzhugs la mthor// kha cig rkang pa gnyis kyis sa ni rab bskyod la// sa bskyod nas kyang skye bo dga' bar byed cing lhags// kha cig ra bo ldan
217a1(mdo sde): po lag na thogs byed la// bar snang gnas te me tog kon bu 'thor zhing lpags// kha cig rgya mtsho bzhi po mgo la thogs nas ni// sa la spos chu 'thor te rag chag 'debs shing /
217a2(mdo sde): lhags// kha cig rin chen mchod rdzong ma tshogs thogs nas ni// rgyang rings 'dug ste byang chub sems dpa' ston cing lpags// kha cig tshangs pa lta bu zhi ba'i gzugs bskur te// yid zhi rab zhi gnas
217a3(mdo sde): shing bsam gtan bsam gtan pa// de dag pa spu dag las byams dang snying rje dang // dga' dang btang snyoms tshad med yid 'ong sgra 'byin lhags// kha cig brgya byin lha ltar stong phrag khrag khrig gi
217a4(mdo sde): lha rnams dag gis mdun du bdar nas lhags gyur cing // de dag byang chub shing drung phyin nas thul sbyar te// brgya byin thogs pa'i nor bu rin chen sna tshogs 'thor// kha cig phyogs bzhi dag gi
217a5(mdo sde): myong ba ji lta bar// dri za srin po mi 'am ci yos yongs bskor te// glog ltar gsal ba'i me tog cha rab 'bebs shing lpags// dri za mi 'am ci yi skad kyis ston pa stod// kha cig me tog/
217a6(mdo sde): rgyas pa'i ljon shing 'bras bu rabacas/ me tog bcas shing mchog gi drin rab 'byin la// lo mar sangs rgyas zas po lus byed gnas thogs lkugs// btud nas sa yi snying por me tog
217a7(mdo sde): kyang 'thor/ kha cig badz+ra ut+pal pad+ma sar po rgyas// pad+ma'i snying po sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan ldan gnas// de 'drar me tog rgyas pa'i rdzing bu zags te lpags// chags med yid ldam
217b1(mdo sde): rgyab sams dpa'amapas laspyod/ kha cag lhun pos tham lus rkun bsgyur te zhugs// bar snang banas nas rang galus kyang rab tu 'dor// bar ma thag tu me rtog 'phreng ba rnams sar/
217b2(mdo sde): stong gsum dag gi rgyal ba'i zhing rnams khebs par byed// kha cig mig gnyis sreg pa'i brgal pa la bu dang // de bzhin chags pa dang ni 'jig par spyon cing lpags// de dag lus las
217b3(mdo sde): chos kyi sgo mo mang grag ste// de dag zos pas sems can zag khrig sred pa spong // kha cig mchu ni bim pa 'phrul bzhin mdzes shing // kha bzhin rdzogs la mi 'am ci 'dra'i sgra sgrogs lkugs// dog
217b4(mdo sde): sna tshogs legs brgyan bu mo chas pa 'dra// de la lta bas lha yi tshogs rnams ngoms mi 'gyur// kha cig rdo rje lta bur mi byed lus can te// rkang pas 'og gi chu yi phung po 'bog cing lpags/
217b5(mdo sde): nyi ma 'dra zhing zla lar bzhin rgyas snang byed la// 'od byed nyon mongs sngon rnams bcom pa kha cig lpags// kha cig rin po ches brgyan lag na rin po che mi thogs// zhing mang bye ba song dag
217b6(mdo sde): bar byed cing lpags// sems can mngal phan dang bde dang tshim bya'i phyir// rin chen me tog dam pa dri zhim char pa 'bebs// kha cig gzungs chen rin po che yi mdzod gyur cing // ba spu rnams
217b7(mdo sde): nas mad rdzi khwa khrig ba brjod la// spobs par ldan zhing blo gros ldan la blo mchog ldan// rgyags shing rab dregs rtse bo rtags par byed cing lpags// kha cig ri bo lhun po rnga ltar bogs nas ni/
218a1(mdo sde): btu brdung zhing mtha' las yid 'ong zla 'byin lags// de mi tha ni phyogs pabu bye ba'i zhing stong // 'dudu phyi ba rten pa sa du rang ca zlo/ rdzudas/
218a2(mdo sde): kyi snying por bkod pa'i le'u zhes bya ste/ ci shu'o// / dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dag gis byang chub
218a3(mdo sde): kyi snying por bkod pa rnam pa de lta bu de dag mngon par byas par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyis kyang phyogs bcu dag gi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang /
218a4(mdo sde): daltar byung ba rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad na/ byang chub kyi snying po'i rgyan bkod pa ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad byang chub kyi snying po der kun tu bstan to/
218a5(mdo sde): dge slong dag de nas byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug nas 'di snyam du sems te/ 'dod pa'i khams 'di'i bdag po dbang phyug dbang sgyur ba/ bdud sdig can de la bdag gis
218a6(mdo sde): ma sman par/ bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba de ni bdag gi mchis/ bdag gis bdud sdig can bskul bar bya'o// de las rnam par rgyal
218a7(mdo sde): na 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha la sogs pa thams cad tshar bcad par 'gyur ro// 'on kyang bdud kyi 'khor na bdud kyi ris lha'i bu sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa 'khod pa dag gis/ nga'i seng ge
218b1(mdo sde): nam par sa pas na/ blan med pa yang das pa rdzags pa'i byang chub byamams paskyed par 'gyur zhum sa/ yo na nga rgyabasas gdugs su smra
218b2(mdo sde): nas de'i tshe srin mtshams kyi bar gyi mdzod su nas bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad 'dzem par byed pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer cig byung ste/ 'od per des song gsum gyi spyong chen po'i 'gyi
218b3(mdo sde): rten gyis khams 'di thams cad kyi bdud kyi gnas thams cad blang bar byas nas/ mig mag por byas te/ rab tu ga yos par byas par yang gyur to// stong gsum mi steng chen po'i 'jig rten
218b4(mdo sde): khams 'di thams cad kyang snang ba chen pos yongs su khyab par gyur to// bdud sdig can gyis 'od de las rnam pa 'di lta bu'i sgra 'di yang thos so// sems can shin tu dag pa brgal mang
218b5(mdo sde): gyu byung ba/ bgag pang mas pas rgyal ma da rab grangs so// na byed ni bdud gyi mngon par 'dod pas pa/ byang chub shing dru ngas kyis rangs bams kyis/ na 'ad kyang chu
218b6(mdo sde): la gzhan yang sgrol bar byed// de ni bdag nyid grol bas gzhan yang grol bar byed// de ni bdag kyang dbugs phyin gzhan dag dbugs kyang 'byin// yongs su mya ngan 'das nas gzhan dag mya nganas/
218b7(mdo sde): ngan song gsum po ma lus spongs par byed par 'gyur// lha mi rnams kyi grong khyer gang bar byed par 'gyur// phan pa byed pa de ni bdud rtsi thob gyur nas// bsam gtan mngon shes bdud rtse bar
219a1(mdo sde): mchog sbyin par 'gyur// gang tshe rang byung nyid kyis chos char mngon pab che// nag po'i rtsa lag khyed kyi grong khyer songs byed 'gyur// stobs med pas kyang stobs
219a2(mdo sde): med 'gyur te dpungs nyams 'gyur// phyogs ni phyogs min ci bya gar 'gro shes mi 'gyur// dge slong dag de ltar bdud sdig can bskul ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bskul nas
219a3(mdo sde): rmi lam rnam pa sum cu rtsa gnyis rmis so// rnam pa sum cu rtsa gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bdag gi gnas mun pas khyab par rmis pa dang / rang gis gnas rdul gyis gang zhing gyo mo dang /
219a4(mdo sde): gseg mas gang bar rmos pa dang / bdag nyid spangs skrag nas phyogs phyogs su 'bros par rmis pa dang / bdag cod pan dang bral zhing rna cha lhung bar rmis pa dang / bdag mchu dang / gre ba dngag /
219a5(mdo sde): rkan skams par rmis pa dang / bdag snying kun tu gdungs par rmis pa dang / bskyed mos tshal gyi lo ma dang me tog dang 'bras bu rnams rnyis par rmis pa dang / rdzing rnams skams te chu med
219a6(mdo sde): par rmis pa dang / ngang pa dang / khrung khrung dang / rma bya dang / ka la bing+ka dang / kun la dang / shang shang ti'u la sogs/ bya'i tshogs rnams mdab gshog zegs par rmis pa dang / rnga dang / rung dang
219a7(mdo sde): rdza rnga dang / khar dza dang / rgyud cig pa dang / pi wang dang / rgyud gsum pa dang / pheg rdo ba dang / khar ba'i sil khrol la sogs pa rol mo'i cha spyad rnams chag thugs te/ sa la lhung bar rmis
219b1(mdo sde): bdang / 'khor thug pas kyang bdud spangs te ngo 'jams gnag cing phyogs cig dong nas/ sems shing 'khod par rmis pa dang / drang ma'i dam pa phreng ba can yang mal nas ga la lhung ste ka las
219b2(mdo sde): paganyis mgo la rdob par rmis pa dang / bdud kyi bu gung dag shin tu brtson 'grus dang ldan pa dang / shin tu stobs dang ldan pa dang / shin tu gzi brjid dang ldan pa dang / shin tu shes rab dang ldan/
219b3(mdo sde): pa de dag kyang / byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying po mchog dam pa la 'dug pa la phyag 'tshal bar rmis pa dang / bdag gi bu mo rnams kyang kyi hud yab kyi hud yab ces nong nge 'don par mig
219b4(mdo sde): ba dang / bdag lus la gos dri ma can gyon par rmis pa dang / bdag mgo rdul gyis gang la skya'o bseng bseng pa dang / nyam chung pa dang / mdangs nyams par rmis pa dang / bsil khang dang /
219b5(mdo sde): khang pa brtsegs pa dang / skar khung dang / rta babs rnams kyang rdul gyis gang nas rdib par rmis pa dang / de'i sde dpon gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / grul bum dang / dri za'i bdag po gang yin pa
219b6(mdo sde): de dag thams cad kyang rkom tshugs bcas te ngu zhing chos nges btab nas bye bar rmis pa dang / 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha rnams kyi lha'i bdag po 'di lta ste/ yul 'khor srungs dang / 'phags skyes po/
219b7(mdo sde): dang ta mig mi bzang dang / rnam thos bu dang / brgya byin dang / rab 'thab bral dang / yongs su dga' ldan dang / rab 'phrul dang / dbang gyur la sogs pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang bcad las
220a1(mdo sde): mi gus shing / byang chub sems dpa' la phyogs par rmis pa dang / 'thab mo'i nang na de'i ral gri shubs nas ma phyin cing / bdag mi shis pa'i sgra 'byin par rmis pa dang /
220a2(mdo sde): rang gi 'khor gyis bdag bor bar rmis pa dang / bkra shis kyi bum pa sgor lhung bar rmis pa dang / bram ze mis byin bu yang bkra mi shis pa'i sgra sgrogs par rmis pa dang / sgo ba kun tu dga' byed kyang kun
220a3(mdo sde): tu mi dga' ba'i sgra sgrogs par rmis pa dang / nam mkha'i dkyil mun pas khebs par rmis pa dang / 'dod pa'i gnas na gnas pa'i dpal yang ngu bar rmis pa dang / bdag gi dbang yang dbang med par
220a4(mdo sde): gyur par rmis pa dang / rang gi phyogs kyang phyogs ma yin par rmis pa dang / nor bu dang / mu tig gi dra ba rnams kyang rad cing rnam par chad nas 'brul bar rmis pa dang / bdud kyi gnas thams cad kyang rab
220a5(mdo sde): tu g.yos par rmis pa dang / shing rnams kyang bcad cing ba gam yang lhung bar rmis pa dang / bdud kyi sde bkod pa thams cad kyang khas bub tu skyel bar rmis pa ste/ dge slong dag de ltar bdud sdig
220a6(mdo sde): can gyi rmi lam du rnam pa sum cu rtsa gnyis po 'di lta bu rmis so// de sad pa dang / 'jigs klag spangs nas nang mi thams cad bsogs te/ dpungs dang bcas pa dang / 'khor dang sde dpon dang / sgo ba
220a7(mdo sde): dang de dag 'dus par rig nas/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// bdud des rmi lam dam de dag mthong nas nyam zag ste// sde dpon bdud po seng ge za 'gram zhes pa dang // bu rnams dag dang 'khor nam/
220b1(mdo sde): dgayon la zlas/ nag pa'i rtsa lag de dag kun la yongs su ngag/ gakya'i na 'du gyes pa mtshan mnog yan lag smras// 'a drug par du bya ka' btul zhugs drug po kyad/ byang chub kyi drung /
220b2(mdo sde): 'ongs kyis rab tu khrims shig ces// mdangs sum par snang las ni tshigs pa cad de gad grag/ byang chub sems dpa' de nyid rnam par sangs rgyas nas// sems can bre ba khrag khrig mang po num rtogs
220b3(mdo sde): byed// gang che bdud rtsi thob sa bsil ba'i dngos reg tshe// des ni nga gnas ma lus spongs par byed par 'gyur// dpung chen rnams dang lhan cig der ni rab dong la// shing dbang drung 'dug dge slong
220b4(mdo sde): de gzhom par bya// yan lag bzhi pa'i sde rnams myur du rab tu bsgrims// gal te nga la sdug sems phyi shol ma byed cig/ dgra bcom rang sangs rgyas kyis 'jig rten gang gyur kyang // mya ngan 'da'
220b5(mdo sde): bas bdag dpung cham chung yong mi 'gyur// de yang cig pu rgyal ba chos rgyal gyur nan// bgrang las 'das pa'i rgyal ba'i rig ni gzhar mi 'chad// dge slong dag de nas bdud kyi bu ded dpon zhes bya bas//
220b6(mdo sde): bdud sdig can de la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ yab cig sa nongs zhal gyur cing ni zhal mdog nyams// thugs kyang 'phar la khyod kyi yan lag nying lag 'dar// khyod kyis cig san ci gzigs myur
220b7(mdo sde): du bka' stso la cig/ yang dag bsams nas de bzhin sbyor ba 'tshal bar bgyi// nga rgyal med bdud smras pa bu gcig nga las nyon// ngas ni sdig pa'i rmi lam shin tu mi bzad rmis// de ring 'khor
221a1(mdo sde): 'dir de kun ma lus sbas na ni// khyed rnams brgyal te sa la rab tu skyel bar 'gyur// ded dpon gyis smras pa/ gal te 'thab dus bab ste brgyal na nongs ma mchis// gal te/
221a2(mdo sde): der ni bcom par gyur na nangs dang bcas// gal te khyod kyi rmi lam de 'dra'i lhas las na// gzhan na dge ste g.yul ngor yongs su gnas mi 'gyur// bdud kyis smras pa/ babral ba grub pa'i skyes
221a3(mdo sde): bu g.yul ngor grags par 'gyur// gal te brtan la rten te legs byas bdag cag rgyal// kho bo 'khor dang bcas pa mthong nas langs nas su// kho bo'i rkang par mgos phyag mi 'tshal des mi nus//
221a4(mdo sde): ded dpon gyis smras pa/ rgya chen dpung bdog kyang ni shin tu mthu chung ste// stobs ldan dpa' bo gcig pu mchis na g.yul las rgyal// gal te srin bu me khyer stong gsum gang gyur kyang // nyi ma gcig
221a5(mdo sde): bu'i zol du chug sde 'od mi bgyid// gzhan yang gang la nga rgyal gti mug mchis la dpyod ma mchis// mkhas dang mi mthun bgyid pa de ni gso mi nus// dge slong dag de ltar bdud sdig can gyis ded
221a6(mdo sde): dpon gyis tshig ma mnyan nas// yan lag bzhi pa'i dpung chen po stobs che ba/ zab mo la dpa' ba 'jigs su rung ba/ spu zing zhes byed nus pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ma mthong ma thos pa bzhin bsgyur ba/
221a7(mdo sde): nam pa mang po bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma bsgyur ba'i rnam pa dang ldan pa/ rkang lag sbrul brgya stong gis dkris pa dang ldan pa/ ral gri dang / mda' gzhu dang / mdung zung dang / mda' bo che dang / sti re dang /
221b1(mdo sde): gzugs gang 'ang/ 'ong ba dang / gtan shing dang / btson dang / nags pa dang / dbus to dang / 'bar po dang / rardza dang / rje mu gcig pa thogs pa/ lus la gas bamang po gas bya/
221b2(mdo sde): mgro dang dang lag dang mig log par bdug pa/ mgro dang mig dang gdong 'bar ba/ lho dang rkang lag dbyibs mi drug sa/ bzhin gzi brjid drag po dang ldan pa/ shin tu bzhin pasgyur ming po bcig/
221b3(mdo sde): 'jigs su rung bar mche ba gtsigs pa/ lce stug cing zhing che ba mang po 'byung ba/ lde 'bar 'brar can re lde dang 'dra ba/ mig me/ sbrul nag po dug gi rgyas pa'i mig war dmar bdag nar bcug
221b4(mdo sde): de la kha cig ni sbrul gdug pa grug/ kha cig ni nem mkha' lding gis rgya mtsho nas phyung ba bzhin du lag mthil du sbrul gdug pa bzhag ste ba/ kha cig ni mi'i sha dang khrag dang / rkang lag dang / mgo dang /
221b5(mdo sde): mkhal ma dang / nang grol dang / ngan sngags la rdzogs pa za/ kha cig ni gzugs sde ba sangs dang / kham pa po dang / sngon po dang / dmar po dang / ser por 'dug ste/ 'jigs su rung ba'i gzugs rtswa
221b6(mdo sde): tshogs can// kha cig ni mi gzhigs pa dang / mig zhon pa la bu dang / mig byung ba la bu dang / mig 'bar ba dang / mig gzur ba mi sdug pa/ kha cig ni mig log pa dang / 'bar ba dang / mi thug pa/ kha cig
221b7(mdo sde): ni ri 'bar ba thogs te/ 'gying zhing ri gzhan la zhon te 'ong / kha cig ni shing rtsa thon byas te/ byang chub sems dpa'i logs su rgyug cing 'ong / kha cig gi rna ba ni phag rna lta bu dang / zhib mu lta bu dang
222a1(mdo sde): glang po'i rna ba lta bu dang / 'brang ba dang / pag rna lta bur 'dug pa/ kha cig ni na pa med pa/ kha cig ni keng rus mang po sprul nas/ lus rid cing gsum pa che la rtswa nom pa
222a2(mdo sde): gsus pa bum pa lta bur 'dug pa/ rkang ba mgo'i thod pa ltar 'dug pa/ pags pa dang / sha dang khrag gams pa/ rna ba dang / sna dang / rkang lag dang / mig dang / mgo bcad pa/ kha cig ni khrag
222a3(mdo sde): 'thung 'dod pas gcig la gcig mgo gcod pa/ kha cig ni sma sha sha po dang / sgra ma snyan pa dang / 'jigs su rung ba dang / skra rtsub pa dang ldan pa/ hu tu zhes bya ba dang / mchi zhes bya ba dang
222a4(mdo sde): hu lu hu lu zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byin pa dang / spyugs pa len pa dang / dge sbyong go'u ta ma 'di shing dang chos te 'on cig ces zer ba dang / 'or cig ces zer ba dang / rgyog shig ces zer ba dang / rab tu
222a5(mdo sde): shig ces zer ba dang / chings shig ces zer ba dang / zug shig ces zer ba dang / chod cig ces zer ba dang / gtubs shig ces zer ba dang / gtogs shig ces zer ba dang / bab bab tu 'or
222a6(mdo sde): thig ces zer ba dag go// kha cig ni wa dang lce sbrang dang / phag dang / bong bu dang / ba lung dang / glang po che dang / rta dang / rnga mo dang / rgyang dang / ma he dang / ri bong dang / g.yag dang / bse dang / rig/
222a7(mdo sde): ljang mo ga la sogs pa'i kha gdong sna tshogs 'jigs su rung ba/ spangs par byed pa/ mi sdug pa dang ldan pa dag go// kha cig ni seng ge dang / stag dang / phag rgod dang / dred dang / spre'u dang / gzig
222b1(mdo sde): b+hal dang / dang / 'a dang / sbrul dang / nadu la dang / dang / d+hA smin dang / rdza man byas pa gsod dang / rna rdza la dang / bra ga dang / bla rgod dang / thug pa dang / rnam ma 'du// byur
222b2(mdo sde): dang ldan pa dag go// kha cig ni gzugs mi sdug pa dag go// kha cig ni mgo gcig pa dang / mgo gnyis pa nas mgo brgya stong gi bar dang ldan pa dag go// kha cig ni mgo med pa'o// kha cig ni lag pa
222b3(mdo sde): gcig pa nas lag pa brgya stong gi bar dang ldan pa dag go// kha cig ni lag pa med pa dag go// kha cig ni rkang pa gcig pa nas rkang pa brgya stong gi bar dang ldan pa dag go// kha cig ni rkang pa med
222b4(mdo sde): padag go// kha cig ni rna ba dang / kha dang / sna dang mig dang / lte ba'i khung bu nas sbrul gdug pa 'byin to// kha cig ni ral gri dang / mda' gzhu dang / mdung thung dang / rtse gsum kha gdong dang
222b5(mdo sde): dgra sta dang / 'khor lo dang / mda' bo che dang / rdo rje rtse gcig pa dang / rdo rje dang / bong ba dang / mtshon rtse gcig pa la sogs pa mtshon cha sna tshogs sor zhing gar byed la// byang chub sems dpa
222b6(mdo sde): la rdzogs mo byed do// kha cig ni mi'i sor mo bcad nas 'phreng bar brgyas te thogs so// kha cig ni keng rus dang / zod pa dang phreng ba sa bur brgyus te thogs so// kha cig ni lus sbrul gdugs
222b7(mdo sde): dkris so// kha cig ni mgo la zhugs ling me can thogs te/ glang po dang / rta dang / rnga mo dang / ba lang dang / bong bu dang / ma he la zhon no// kha cig ni spyi'u tshugs su 'dug la khab lta bu'i sku
223a1(mdo sde): can dag go// kha cig ni ba lang dang / bong bu dang / bag nod dang / ni'u le dang / ra dang / lug dang / byi la dang / spre'u dang / sbyang ki dang / lce rlung gi rdzu lta bu dang /
223a2(mdo sde): ldan la sbrul gdug pa skyugs cing / ljags kyi thu lum med pa dang / me 'byin pa dang / lcags dang / zangs 'bar ba'i char 'bebs pa dang / lde 'bebs pa dang / rdo rje'i lcags 'bebs
223a3(mdo sde): pa dang / lugs kyi bye mtshan po che'i char 'bebs pa dang / sprin nag po brdzus te rlung gi char 'bebs pa dang / mda'i sprin bsdus te char du 'bebs pa dang / mun nag ston pa dang / sgra 'byin cing /
223a4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i logs su rgyug pa dag go// kha cig ni zhags pa skor ba dang / ri chen po rnyil bar byed pa dang / rgya mtsho chen po 'khrugs par byed pa dang / ri chen po las mchong pa dang / ri'i
223a5(mdo sde): rgyal po lhun po grul ba dang / rgyug pa dang / 'bros pa dang / yan lag dang / nying lag 'thor ba dang / lus skor ba dang / gad mo cher rgod pa dang / zang brdung ba dang ga brang la rdob pa dang /
223a6(mdo sde): mgo gsig pa dang / mgo 'bar zhing grwa gyen du 'greng ba dang / phan tshun shugs phyung zhing rgyug cing / wa'i mig lta bus byang chub sems dpa' la 'jigs par byed do// bud med rgan mo dag/
223a7(mdo sde): kyang ngu zhing byang chub sems dpa'i gan du lhags te/ 'di skad du/ kyi hud bu kyi hu nga'i bu/ longs shig longs la myur du bros shig ces 'dzer ro// srin mo'i gzugs dang / sha za mo'i gzugs
223b1(mdo sde): dang yi dag sa long bzeng po rkang ba bsres pas rid pa lag pa sgreng ba/ kha bcus pa dag cang ngu zhing 'jigs pa ston te/ spangs par byed cing byang chub sems dpa'i mdun na chug go// bdud kyi dpung /
223b2(mdo sde): 'das pa rnam pa de sa bu des dpag tshad brgyad cu kho ra khor yug tu gang bar gyur to// bdud gcig gi ji lta ba de bzhin du stong gsum gyi stong chen po bye ba phrag brgyar gtogs pa'i bdud sdig can
223b3(mdo sde): rnams kyi dpung dag gis/ zad ka dang steng gang bar gyur to// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ gnod sbyin grul bum lto 'phye chen po'i gzugs// srin po yi dgas sha za'i gzugs dang bcas//
223b4(mdo sde): 'jig rten mi sdug drag gzugs ji snyed pa/ thams cad sgra yis de ni sprul pa byas/ mgo gcig mgo gnyis mgo gsum ldan pa nas/ mgo slong bar du ldan zhing gnod sbyin mang / lag cig
223b5(mdo sde): lag gnyis lag gsum ldan pa nas/ lag stong bar du ldan pa rab tu mang / rkang gcig rkang gnyis rkang gsum ldan pa nas// rkang stong bar du ldan pa gzhan yang mang // kha bzhin sngol
223b6(mdo sde): lus ni ser ba dang / kha bzhin ser la lus ni sto ba dang / kha bzhin dkar la lus ni gnag pa dang // kha bzhin gnag la lus ni dkar ba dang / kha bzhin gzhan la lus kyang gzhan pa dang /
223b7(mdo sde): de 'dra'i gzugs brnyan dag gi dpung rnams lpags// stag dang sbrul dang phag gi gdong can dang // glang po rta dang bong bu rnga mo'i gdong // spre'u dang seng ge dred kyi gdong can dang // de 'drag
224a1(mdo sde): kha gdong ldan pa'i dpung rnams lpags// ral brjem la 'jigs pa'i gnod sbyin mang // lus mgo rus sa 'bar 'bur sra ba can// lus ni mi yis khrag gi/
224a2(mdo sde): rab tu grags// gnod sbyin de 'dra ba dag der yang lhags// rkang pa dag ni dge ba'i rkang pa 'dra// mig gi 'bras bu spre'u yi mig dang mtshungs// mche ba dag ni glang po'i mche ba 'dra//
224a3(mdo sde): gdog de 'dra'i dpung rnams der yang lpags// lus kyi dbyibs ni chu srin 'dra ba ste// mig go 'bras bu gnyis ni rab tu 'bar// rna bdag ni ra yi rna ba 'dra// kha gdong de 'dra'i dpung rnam
224a4(mdo sde): der yang lpags// kha cig dag ni lag na dbyig pa thogs// zo ba mdung thung che gsum lag na thogs// kha cig ri bo lhun po lag na thogs// 'jigs su rung ba'i gzugs can gnod sbyin
