224a5(mdo sde): lhags// gshol thogs 'khor lo thogs shing mig bsgyur dang // ri rtse chen po lag na thogs pa dang // rlung dang rdo dang gnam lkugs rab 'bebs shing // gnod sbyin 'jigs su rung ba
224a6(mdo sde): yang lpags// rlung ni rab tu gtol zhing char yang 'bebs// brgya phrag stong gi glog kyang rab tu 'byin// 'brug gi sgra yang sgrog cing shing ljon skyel/ byang chub shing gi lo ma tsam mig yo//
224a7(mdo sde): charab rab tu 'babs shing rlung yang gtong // chu bo 'bebs shing chu yis sa ya gang // de ltar 'jigs su rung ba mtshan mo byung // de yi nub mo sems med shing yang skyel// thams cad dbyiH
224b1(mdo sde): ma drug cing gzugs mi sdug/ 'jigs pa'i gzugs ldan de dag mthong nas kyang // yon tan mtshan dang gzi brjid ldan pa'o// lhun po lta bur sems ni g.yo ba med// bla ma 'dra zhing /
224b2(mdo sde): lam mtshung ba dang // sprin dang 'dra bar chos rnams kun la rtog/ de ltar chos kyi tshul la rtog pas na// legs gnas bsam gtan byed cing chos la gnas// gang zhigang dang nga yi snyam pam
224b3(mdo sde): shing dngos dang lus la yang dag mngon zhen pa// mi mkhas 'dzin par gnas des mthong nas ni// 'jigs par gyur cing bdag kyang rab tu myos// shAkya'i sras pos chos rnams rten byung ba
224b4(mdo sde): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du rtogs// nam mkha' lta bu'i sems dang rab tu ldan// dpung bcas g.yo sgyu mthong yang myos pa med// dge slong dag de ltar bdud sdig can gyi bu stong po de dag gi
224b5(mdo sde): nang nas ded dpon la sogs pa bdud kyi bu gang dag byang chub sems dpa' la mngon par dad pa de dag ni bdud kyi g.yas rol du 'khod par gyur to// gang dag bdud kyi phyogs byed pa de dag ni bdud
224b6(mdo sde): sdig can gyi g.yon rol du 'khod par gyur to// de nas bdud sdig can gyis rang gi bu de dag la smras pa/ yu bu cag ci 'dra ba'i dpung gis/ byang chub sems dpa' gdul bar bya/ de na g.yas rol
224b7(mdo sde): nas bdud kyi bu ded dpon zhes bya bas// pa la tshigs su bcad de smras pa// klu yi dbang po gnyid log slong 'dod dang // glang po'i dbang gnyid log slong 'dod dang / ri dgas rgyal po gnyid log
225a1(mdo sde): song 'dod dang / de ni mi dbang legs gnas song bar 'dod// g.yon rol nas bdud kyi bu blo gros ngan pa zhes bya ba des// 'di skad ces smras so// bzlas patsam gyis kyi/
225a2(mdo sde): yang rab tu 'gas 'gyur la// 'jig rten dag na snying po ldan pa'i shing chen 'gas// bdag gi lta bas pog na 'gro ba 'chis pog ltar// 'tshor bar 'gyur ba'i mthu ni de lag la mchis// g.yas
225a3(mdo sde): rol nas dbyangs snyan ces bya bas smras pa// bltas pa tsam gyis shing yang 'gas na mi rnams la// bdag bsgrim ci dgos shes smras snying po ga la yod// gal te bltas pas ri bo lhun po
225a4(mdo sde): 'jigs 'gyur yang // de yi mdun du khyod ni mag 'byed yong mi nus// gzhan yang / migang rgya mtsho lag pa gnyis kyis rgal 'dod cing // de yi chu ni brngubs te 'thung bar nus 'gyur gyis/
225a5(mdo sde): de yi kha bzhin dri ma med la mngon sum du// blta ba de ni de bas sdug bsngal che zhes smras// g.yon rol nas lag pa brgya pa zhes bya bas smras pa// bdag gis lus ni lag pa brgya mchis pa/
225a6(mdo sde): gcig gis kyang ni mda' brgya 'phang bgyi ste// dge slong de yi lus ni dbug par bgyi// yab cig bder 'gyur ma shol khyod gshegs shing // g.yas rol nas blo bzang po zhes bya bas smras pa//
225a7(mdo sde): baspu rnams kyang ci phyir lag pa min// lag pa brgya dang khyad par ci zhig yod// lag pa re rer de ltar mdung yod kyi// de dag gis kyang de la ci mi nus// ci'i phyir zhe na/ des ni 'jig rten 'das pa'i byams
225b1(mdo sde): bab sgoms/ byam pa ldan thub pa mgu la ni// drag dang mngon dang mams mi tshugs te// mtshon cha spangs pa thams cad me tog 'gyur/ gzhan yang mkha' dang sa dang rgyal thobs lan dang /
225b2(mdo sde): ma'am gnod sbyin ral gri dgra wa thogs// mi dbang bzod pa'i stobs ldan de drung byin// stobs chen stobs ldan de kun stobs chung 'gyur// g.yon rol nas gzi brjid drag shul can zhes bya
225b3(mdo sde): bas spras pa/ bdag ni de yi lus bzang gis// khong du zhugs te bsreg par bgyid// 'brog gi me ltar chung ngu yis// rlung dang bcas pa'i shing yang gam// g.yas rol nas mig bzang gis
225b4(mdo sde): brus pa/ khyod ni rab sa yi nang zhugs te// thams cad ma lus bsreg par nus gyur kyang // khyod dang 'dra ba kang+gA'i byi skyed kyis// rdo rje'i thugs ldan de ni bzeg mi nus// gzhan yang
225b5(mdo sde): ri bo thams cad 'gul yang srid// rgya mtsho chen po zad kyang srid// nyi zla sa la ltung yang srid// sa ni nu bar 'gyur yang srid// 'jig rten don du rtsom mdzad pa// thugs dam nges par mdzad pa
225b6(mdo sde): bo byang chub dam pa ma thob par// shing chen drung nas bzhengs mi srid// g.yon rol nas lag rings kyis bsgyings te smras pa// khyod kyi gnas 'dir mchis bzhin du// bdag gi sreg pas ci
225b7(mdo sde): ma dang // zla ba kar ma rnams kyi gnas// thams cad rab tu mnye bar bgyi// rgya mtsho chen po bzhi po las// tshul du shis par chab kyang blang // yab cig dge sbyong de bzung ste// rgya mtsho'i pa
226a1(mdo sde): rol dor bar bgyi// yab gcig dpung 'di bzhugs tu gsol// khyod ni thugs ngan chem mdzad// byang chub shing de drangs phyung ste// sug pas phyogs phyogs gtong /
226a2(mdo sde): bar bgyi// g.yas rol nas dang ba thob pas sbas pa// gal te khyod ni dregs bsgyings te// lha dang lha min dri zar bcas// sa dang ri rgya mtshor bcas// de dag lag pas phyir glog kyang /
226a3(mdo sde): khyod dang 'dra ba stong phrag ni// gang+gA'i bye ma snyed rnams kyis// byang chub sems dpa' shes rab can// de yi ba spu g.yos mi nus// g.yon rol nas 'jigs byed kyis smras pa// dpung gi nang na
226a4(mdo sde): bzhugs bzhin du// yab khyod ci slang rab tu bsnyengs// de la dpung grogs ga la mchis// ci slang khyod 'dir de la bsgrengs// g.yas rol nas blo gros rtse gcig gis smras pa// 'jig rten/
226a5(mdo sde): dag na nyi zla dpung ma mchis// 'khor lo sgyur dang seng ge dpung ma mchis// byang chub sems dpa' 'di ni dpung ma mchis// 'on kyang gcig pus bdud ni gzhom par spyod// g.yon rol nas//
226a6(mdo sde): glags ltas smras pa// mdung zung rtse gsum dbyug tho ral gri rta// glang po shing rta rkang thang ma mchis pa// dge sbyong gcig pu mchis pa de dag gis do mod dgum gyis cung zad ma bsnyengs ya ye//
226a7(mdo sde): g.yas rol nas bsod nams brgyan gyis smras pa// sred med bu ltar mi phyed mi shes sku dang ldan// bzod stobs go ban pas brtson 'grus brtan pa'i ral gri mnga'// rnam par thar gsum gzhom pa
226b1(mdo sde): shes rabag zhu lags yag// bsod nams sobs kyis do ni bdud kyi dbung mas cal// g.yon rol nas phyir ma ldog pas smras pa// 'phrog me rdul tshig pa phyir mi ldog/ mabs pas
226b2(mdo sde): 'phangs pa'i mnga' yang phyir mi ldog/ mkha' las rdo rje 'bab pa phyir mi ldog/ shAkya'i bu las ma rgyal bdug gnas med// g.yas rol nas chos 'dod kyis sbas pa// gsher ba'i rba dang
226b3(mdo sde): blad na me yang ldog/ zag gi rtse mo bab na mda' yang ldog/ rdo rje sa rab bde nas gang du 'gro// zhi ba bdud rtsi mtho ba de mi ldog/ ci'i phyir she na/ yab gcig par rkang la ni ro mo bris pa nus
226b4(mdo sde): kyang gda'// sems can ji snyed kun gyi sems ni gcig bskur nus kyang gda'// yab cig nyi rtsa rlung ni zhags pas bcings du nus kyang gda'// byang chub sems dpa' byang chub snying po las ni
226b5(mdo sde): bskyod mi nus// g.yon rol nas nye bar ma zhi bas smras pa// lta ba'i gdug pa chen pos lhun po bsreg par gyi// rgya mtsho chen po rnams kyi chab kyang skam par bgyi// bdag gis do mod de
226b6(mdo sde): gnyis thal bar rlag par bgyi// yab gcig byang chub dang ni dge sbyong gzigs su gsol// g.yas rol nas don grub kyis smras pa/ gal te dug gis 'di kun gang gyur la// stong gsum dam pa
226b7(mdo sde): rab tu 'bar gyur kyang // yon tan 'byung gnas kyis ni gamigs tsam gyis// dus ni drug ma yin par rab tu 'gyur// srid pa gsum na gdug pa drag po ni// 'dod chags zhe sdang de bzhin gti mug
227a1(mdo sde): rtse/ de dag de yi klad 'thugs la med// mkha' la rdza ba dang rdul ni med pa bzhin// mu dang gsung dang thugs kyang rab tu dag/ sems can kun la byams pa'i draH/
227a2(mdo sde): dang ldan// de la mtshon dang dug gis yongs mi tshugs// de bas yab gcig thams cad bzlog tu gsol// g.yon rol nas dga' ba chags pas smras pa/ bdag gis sil snyan
227a3(mdo sde): stong dag rab bgyi ste// wa yi bu mo brgyan pa bye stong gis// chags par bgyis te grong khyer mchog tu bkri// 'dod la dga' bar khyod kyi dbang du bgyi// g.yas rol nas chos dgas smras
227a4(mdo sde): pa de 'dir rtag tu chos la dgyes pas dgyes// bsam gtan dgyes shing bdud rtsi don la dgyes// sems can thar par mdzad dang byams la dgyes// 'dod chags dga' la de ni dgyes mi

227a6(mdo sde): bzung nas ni// rlung gis phub ma bzhin dragator bar bgyi// g.yas rol nas bdud kyi bu blo gros mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba des 'di skad ces smras so// ji ltar khyod kyi shugs mgyogs drag pa/
227a7(mdo sde): ltar// gal te lha dang mi rnams de 'drar 'gyur// de dag thams cad gcig tu 'dus pas kyang // bla med gang zag de la gnod mi nus// g.yon rol nas tshangs pa'i blo gros kyis smras pa//

233a5(mdo sde): bzhin dang ldan// pad+ma rgyas pa lta bur mig yangs legs// kha bzhin zla ba nya ba lta bu ste/ shing tog bim pa smin 'dra'i mchu dang ldan// dung dang kun da kha ba dkar dang ldan//
233a6(mdo sde): sdug pa dag la chags pa rnams la gzigs// nu ma shin tu mazung zhing rgyas la 'bur// lto ba'i rked na gnyer gsum shin tu mdzes// rked pa 'khor sa lta bu yangs shing mdzes/
233a7(mdo sde): nachu 'azhin tu mdzes la mgon po gzigs// glang po'i sna 'dra ba yi barma ldan zhing // lag pa gdu bus chal par gang ba can// rked pa gser gyi pa kar ba mdzes brgyan// khyod
233b1(mdo sde): bla ma di la mgon pos gzigs// dang ba'i skabs ldan dal gyis mchi bgyid pa// 'dam zhidu yi 'ong 'dong ldan mdzes grub/ rnam pa 'di sa shin tu logs brnyan pa
233b2(mdo sde): l+h+wa ma dga' ba rnams la byin tum pas/ klu dang rol mo'o dbyungs bar rab bathabs/ dga' ba'i ched du mdzes pa'i gzugs can sdug/ 'dod la bar dga' gal temo bskyed sa
233b3(mdo sde): 'jog rten dag na khyod ni shin tu bslus// mo len nor gyis bde ba mi shes 'ga'// gter mthong nas ni 'bros par bgyid pa ltar/ khyod kyang 'dod chags mi mkhyen rang lpags pa/
233b4(mdo sde): na rlung rnams la mi spyod de dang 'dra// dge slong dag de nas byang chub sems dpa' mig mi 'dzum dmyal te// bzhin gyi 'dzum byung shing // dbang po rnam par ma 'khrugs pa dang lus ma
233b5(mdo sde): bcos pa dang / brjod pa dang / ma chags pa dang / mi sdang ba dang / ma mongs pa dang / ri'i dbang po ltar mi g.yo ba dang / ma zhum pa dang / ma gyur pa dang / 'dzem pa med
233b6(mdo sde): pa dang / blo shin tu legs par gnas pa dang / nyon mongs pa rnams shin tu spang ba'i phyir/ rang gi kha na las pa'i ye shes kyi sgo dang / 'jam zhing snyan pa'i tshig dang / tshangs
233b7(mdo sde): pa las lhag pa'i nga ro dang bya ka la bi da'i sgra dbyangs dang / snyan pa dang yid du 'ongs pas bdud kyi bu mo de dag la tshigs su bcad pas slar smras pa/ 'dod pa sdug bsngal mang
234a1(mdo sde): po sogs shing sdug bsngal rtsa ba ste/ mi mkhas rnams la bsam gtan rdzu 'phrul dka' thub nyams par byed// bud med 'dod pa'i yon tan chog pa med ces mkhas/
234a2(mdo sde): pas sbas// nga ni mi mkhas rnams la shin rab chog par byed par 'gyur// 'dod pa bsten na sred pa byir zhing rnam par 'phel 'gyur// dper na mi 'ga' la la tshwa chu 'thungs par gyur pa bzhin/
234a3(mdo sde): de la zhugs pa bdag gi don min gzhan gyis don kyang min// nga ni bdag gi don dang gzhan gdon la spro ba yin// khyod kyis gzugs ni chu bur dag dang dbu ba mtshungs shing 'dra// sgyu ma'i tsho na ltar rang
234a4(mdo sde): gi blo yis rnam par bsgrubs pa ste// rmi lam dag na rtse ba lta bur mi brtan mi rtag kyang // byis pa mi mkhas rnams kyi sems ni rtag tu rmongs par byed// mig ni chu yi chu bur mtshung so shing 'dra ste pags
234a5(mdo sde): pas g.yogs// zag brlung mthung zhing 'bur ba dper na nad kyi 'bras dang mtshungs// ljo na gcin dang byis sogs te shin tu mi gtsang ba dang ldan// zug bsngal za bar gyur pa'i 'khor bar tshanam
234a6(mdo sde): ba las yang dag byung // byis pa'i tho can dag ni rmongs myur byin ci log pa yis// lus gang la ni sdug par rtog pa mkhas padi sa min// sdug bsngal rje bar gyur par 'khor yun ring 'khor byed/
234a7(mdo sde): sems can dmyal ba rnams su thug bsngal mi padamang po srong // rked pa nas ni sdug bsngal rab tu meng mo 'ong ba'i dri can 'dzag/ brda dang byin pa rkang pa dag ni 'khrul 'khor la bur gnas// nga yos
234b1(mdo sde): khyed lam dan pa gas na m+b+ha mdzu ba zhaH// na ma lags rlu dang can las byung bar gyur ba las 'dags pa'i ma shes lam lal tshul brnyanas ga rlu ga dung drugagul ba 'du du/
234b2(mdo sde): chen thos 'drab// 'dod pa'i yon tan min zhing min tan nyams mthong na// de'i byin pa bde ba'i 'du shes bskyed cing rgyal bar gyur// mo bang 'ded pas bud med rnams kyi khal byor gyur ba dang /
234b3(mdo sde): gang zhig chos kyi dga' ba bor te 'dod pas dga' byed cing // dga' la brkam pa do na tshul khrims lam las gol gyur cing // bsam gtan lamagol blo nyams ye shes las ni rab ring gnas
234b4(mdo sde): nga ni 'dod chags zhe sdang lhan cig gnas pa ma yin te// rtag dang sdug dang bdag dang lhan cig gnas par byed ma yin// mi dga' ba dang dga' dang lhan cig gnas pa ma yin la// nga yi sems ni rab
234b5(mdo sde): tu grol te mkha' la rlung dang 'dra// gal te khyod 'dra'i 'gro ba kun gyis 'dir ni gang gyur la// bskal par de dag rnams dang lhan cig 'dre zhing gnas kyang ni/ nga la za ba med cing chags med gti mu/
234b6(mdo sde): min 'gyur te// rgal ba rnams kyis thugs ni nam mkha' mtshungs zhing 'dra phyir ro// lU dang lha mo shin tu dri med la// khrag dang rus pa med cing rab bzang ba// de dag kun kyang 'jigs pa che gnas
234b7(mdo sde): rtag dngas bral zhing ther zug med phyir ro// de nas bdud kyi bu mo bud med kyi rgya rnams shin tu bslabs pa de dag de bas kyang / cher 'dod chags dang / rgyags pa dang / dregs pa bskyed do//
235a1(mdo sde): sgeg pa bstan nas/ lus rnams brgyan te/ bud med kyi g.yo nye bar bstan nas// byang chub sems dpa' la rjod do// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ bu mo'i nang na ga ces mchog/
235a2(mdo sde): sred dang dga' dang dga' can lhan cig tu// bdud kyi btang ba shin tu tshul du shes par rings par lhags gyur te// shing gi ldu ma gzhon nu lo mar bcas pa rlung gis bskyod pa bzhin// gang byed cing ni
235a3(mdo sde): rgyal po'i sras po shing drung 'dug la rjod par byed// dus kyi nang na dam pa mchog tu bgyi ba sos ka'i dus 'di ste// skyes pa bdag dang bud med dga' bar bgyid cing mun pa rdul yang bcom// khu byug dang
235a4(mdo sde): ni ngang pa rma bya sgra 'byin bya tshogs rnams kyi gang // 'dod pa'i yon tan dga' ba myong bar bgyi ba'i dus la dbab po// bskal pa stong du tshul khrims dga' zhing brtul zhugs dka' thub spyad gyur pa/
235a5(mdo sde): ri yi rgyal po lta bur mi g.yo nyim shar ma thag pa'i gzugs// 'brug bsgrags la bur swA s+thAn ri dgas dbang pos sgra bsgrags 'dra ba po// 'gro la phan pa byed pa de yis don dang ldan pa'i tshogs smras /
235a6(mdo sde): 'dod pa zod dang ngag dang 'thab dang nyon mongs bcas dang 'jigs byed pa// byis pa'i skye bos nye bar brtson gyi mkhas pa'i skye bos rtag spangs// gang du bde gshegs rnams kyis bdud rtsi brnyes pa'i
235a7(mdo sde): dus la bab gyur gyis// do mod bdud las rgyal te stobs bcu rnams dang ldan pa dgra bcom 'gyur// rgyu rnams bstan nas smras pa zhal ras pad+ma 'dra ba bstan du gsol// khyod ni rgyal po dbang phyug
235b1(mdo sde): dalabs bdag stobs dang ldan par 'gyur// bud med dam pa'i rigs kyis sil ldan skyong dag rab tu ba gyid 'gyur na// thub pa'i na byad kyis ni ci ba kyis thong sbal dga' ba bsnyen du gsol/ byung /
235b2(mdo sde): chub sems dpas sbas pa/ nga ni srid pa gsum na dbang phyug lnga dang mi rnams kyis mchod la// chos kyi 'khor los 'gro zhing stobs bcu stobs dang ldan pa'i rgyal por 'gyur// slob bu rnams
235b3(mdo sde): khrag khrig rtag tu bdud pa mngon du byed// chos kyi dga' bas dga' ba'i yul la nga yi yid ni dga' ma yin// de dag gis sbas pa/ ri shig dar la bab pa ma yol dang po zor bur gyur pa dang
235b4(mdo sde): khyod ni re shig spun gyis ma btang mi shis bgres par ma gyur dang / ji srid dar la bab bcing bdag cag grogs kyang dar la bab gyur pa// de srid bar du 'dzum pa'i zhal gyis 'dod pa dga' ba spyad du
235b5(mdo sde): gsol// byang chub sems dpa' smras pa/ ji srid do mod dal ba dam pa 'chi med dkon pa rnyed pa dang // ji srid lha dang lha mini grong khyer mi khom sdug bsngal spangs pa dang // ji srid rga dang na dang /
235b6(mdo sde): 'chi ba'i dgra yis dkrugs par ma gyur pa// de srid nga ni 'jigs med grong khyer 'gro ba'i lam mchog bsgom par bya// de dag gis smras pa/ lha yi gnas na sum cu rtsa gsum bdag po lha mos bskor
235b7(mdo sde): ba dang // 'thab bral 'thab bral rab dang dga' ldan 'ab dang bdud kyi grong khyer na// lha mchog bstod pa bzhin du bud med dbang du gyur nas 'dod dga' la// rol cing spyod la bdag cag rnams dang ldan
236a1(mdo sde): cig dgyes pa rgya chen mdzod// byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ 'dod pa phra tse'i zil thigs bzhin du myur la ston ka'i sprin dang mtshungs// klu yi bu mo khro ba lta bur shin tu 'dzin/
236a2(mdo sde): par byed pa yin// brgya byin 'thab bral rab la dga' ldan dag bdud kyi dbang du song // 'phags min rnams kyis 'dod pa sdug bsngal ldan pa 'di la su zhig dga'// de dag gis smras pa/ shing mchog
236a3(mdo sde): 'di dang lo ma gzhon dang ldan zhing me tog rgyas gyur na// shang shang te'u dang khu byug sgra 'byin bung bsgra 'byin ldan pa gzigs// sa las rba 'khrungs rab sngo 'jam zhing ma la wang lo can mchis pa// gnas
236a4(mdo sde): mchog mi ci tshogs kyis brten par na chung rnams dang dgyes par mdzod// byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ lo mar bcas pa'i shing rnams 'di dag dus kyi dbang gis me tog rgyas// bung ba dag kyang
236a5(mdo sde): bkres dang sgom pas nyen nas me tog rnams su lpags// gang zhig dus na sa las skyes pa rnams kyang nyi mas skams par gyur// nga 'dir sngon gyi rgyal ba rnams kyis spyad pa bdud rtsi nges par spyad//
236a6(mdo sde): bdud kyi bu mo rnams kyis smras pa// zla 'dra'i zhal mnga' gzigs shig pad+ma gsar pa 'dra ba'i kha bzhin can// spyan can yid du 'ong ba'i tshogs ldan moso ni dngul dang khab 'dra// 'di 'dra lha yis
236a7(mdo sde): gnas na dkon na mi'i gnas nag la mchis// gang dag lha mchog rnams kyis rab tu 'dod par bgyi ba khyod kyis brnyes// byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ lus ni ngan sngags mi gtsang srin bu'i
236b1(mdo sde): rigs kyis gang bshig shig go// slar du 'gyes shing 'jigs pa bdeb ma yin rnams dang ldan par mthong // nu bar bcas dang mi rtsub mi 'grol bde ba mchog byed pa// go 'phang 'tsha 'gro mad/
236b2(mdo sde): partse bo mkhas pas mchod pa de thob bya// de dag 'dod pa'i sgyu rtsal drug cu rtsa bzhi myong bar gyur pa ste// rkang gdub gser gyi phag sa 'khrol zhing gos kyang shag shig byas nas ni// 'dod pa'i mang
236b3(mdo sde): mos phog pa rgyags pa 'dzum zhing 'di skad smras// jo bo khyod la nongs pa ci zhig bgyis na 'di dag bsnyen ma ban+d+ha// srid pa kun gyi nyes pa rig nas rdul dang bral bas 'di skad sras// 'dod pa
236b4(mdo sde): ral gri mdung thung rtse gsum spang rtsi can gyi sgra gri 'dra// sbrul gyi mgo dang me mur 'dra bar bar ngas 'dir rab tu rig pas na// bud med yon tan 'phrogs pas de phyir nga yis bud med tshogs rnam
236b5(mdo sde): spangs// bud med yon tan rnam pa mang po khrag khrig bye ba de dag gis// gang gi tshe na glang po phrag gu'i stabs can de brjod ma nus tshe// ngo tsha bskyengs nas thub pa'i rkang pa gnyis la rab tu byag
236b6(mdo sde): 'tshal te// dga' zhing mgu ba bskyed nas phan pa byed pa de la bstod pa byas// pad+ma dri ma med pa'i snying po 'dra zhing ston bla lta bu'o zhal// mar gyis sbyin bsreg bgyis pa'i 'od 'phro me 'dra gser
236b7(mdo sde): mo'i 'dra ba// srid pa brgya nas spyad cing dgongs dang smon lam btab pa grub rgyar cig/ bdag nyid rgal nas sdug bsngal dag dang ldan pa'i 'gro ba bsgral du gsol// de dag rnams kyis dong ka'i shis
237a1(mdo sde): dang tsam pa ka 'dra rnams mang bstod// mchog tu gyur pa ri lhar mi g.yo ba la bskor ba byas nas ni// song ste pa yi rkang la mgo bos phyag 'tshal 'di skad tshig kyang smras//
237a2(mdo sde): yab cig lha dang mi yi bla ma de la khong khro spangs na legs// bzhin ni 'dzum par gyur nas pad+ma'i 'dab ma 'dra ba'i mog gis lha// de ni chags pas skye bo mi lha de la khro gnyer mchis ma lags// lhun po//
237a3(mdo sde): g.yo zhing rgya mcho gams la nyi zla ltung bar 'gyur yang gda'// srid pa gsum gyi nyes mthong de ni bud med rnams kyi dbang mi 'gyur/ de nas bdud sdig can gyis tshig de skad zos nas//
237a4(mdo sde): de bas kyang cher sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde la// yid ma rangs shing tshig pa za ba'i yid kyis rang gi bu mo de dag la smras pa// kye mi shis shing glen te/ khyod kyi gzugs dang da rod ma mthong ngam// ji ltar/
237a5(mdo sde): gyur na/ de byang chub kyi snying po las brlangs par ma nus// de nas bdud kyi bu mo de dag gis/ rang gi ba la tshigs su bcad pas slar smras pa/ snyan cing 'jam por spras yang chags pa ma mchis te/
237a6(mdo sde): gsang ba chen po ltar yang ldang ba mchis ma lags// spyod lam dag dang spyod pa lta yang rmongs ma mchis// lus rnams thams cad rtogs kyang bsam pa shin tu zab// bud med nongs pa rgya chen rtse
237a7(mdo sde): tsam ma mchis rtogs// 'dod las dben pa'i yid ldan 'dod chags chags ma mchis// gang zhig de mi sems dang spyod pa yongs 'tshal ba// lha yul mi yul 'di na lha mi de ma mchis/
237b1(mdo sde): rnaMs drung med rnams gang lags pastan na mab// chags bcas gang lags de ma thing tha 'gyur rigs na// de dag mthong yang de yi sems ni gcig ma galas/ rid bang rgyal po bzhin du denas
237b2(mdo sde): g.yo mchis// bsod nams gzi brjid brgyas bskams yon tan gzi brjid rdzogs// bskal pabye ba mang mor tshul khrims brtul zhugs spyad// lha dang tshangs pa sems can gzi brjid rnam dag sa
237b3(mdo sde): de dag de yi nang par mgos gtugs phyag kyang 'tshal// sde dang bcas pa'i bdud rnams bcom nas sngon chad kyi// rgyal bas bzhed pa byang chub dam pa 'thob 'gyur nges// yab cig bdag cag
237b4(mdo sde): ngor 'thab pa mi 'tshal te// stobs ldan padag dang 'thab par blor 'di tshigs rab che// yab cig mkha' la nor bu rin chen gzug phud can// rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' khrag zig gus
237b5(mdo sde): bar gnas// rin chen 'byung gnas yan lag me tog phreng bas brgyan// stobs bcu mnga' bas mchod phyir 'dir btang rnams la gzigs// gang dag sems pa mchis dang gang skems ma mchis//
237b6(mdo sde): shing ri lha dbang gnod sbyin mkha' lding dbang po dag/ yon tan ri bor mngon par 'dud cing phyogs pa las// yab cig do mod slar log na ni lags pa 'dra// gzhan yang gang gi ba mthar mi byin der ni
237b7(mdo sde): rgyal mi bgyi// gang zhig ca nas mi byin de ni brko mi bgyi// gang la bzod pa yang gsol de ni dkrug mi bgyi// gang gis yid mi bde bar 'gyur ba de mi bgyi/ dge slong dag de nas
238a1(mdo sde): de'i tshe shing gi lha mo brgyad la 'di la skye/ dpal ldan dang / 'phel mo dang / dka' thub dang / dge ma dang / mkhas ma dang / mdangs stobs dang / bden sras dang /
238a2(mdo sde): ldan ma ste/ de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' la yang dag par mchod nas/ dpal rnam pa bcu drug gis byang chub sems dpa' 'phel bar byed/ mngon tu spyod par byed de/ sems can dag pa khyod ni//
238a3(mdo sde): dgun zla yar gyi ngo lur mdzes pa'o// blo rnam par dag pa khyod ni gdugs dang po shar ba ltar lhang nge ba'o// sems can dag pa khyod ni chab kyi nang na pad+ma ltar rab tu rgyas pa'o// sems can/
238a4(mdo sde): dag pa khyod ni nags dang nags 'dab na rgyu ba'i seng ge ltar sgrogs pa'o// sems can dag pa khyod ni rgya mtsho'i dbus na ri'i rgyal po ltar mdzes pa'o// sems can dag pa khyod ni khor yug gi/
238a5(mdo sde): ri ltar mngon par 'phags pa'o// sems can dag pa khyod ni rgya mtsho ltar rin po ches bltams zhing gting dpag par dka' ba'o// 'jig rten gyi mgon po khyod ni nam mkha' ltar thug pa ma mchis
238a6(mdo sde): shis thugs kyi rgyu che ba'o// sems can rnam par dag pa khyod ni dogs ltar sems can thams cad kyi 'tsho bar gyur cing thugs shin tu brtan pa'o// sems can dam pa khyod ni mchom dros pa
238a7(mdo sde): ltar rtag tu dang zhing thugs rnyog pa mi mnga' ba'o// sems can dam pa khyod ni rlung mar ltar 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad la rtag tu mi chags shing thugs gnas pa ma mchis pa'o// sems
238b1(mdo sde): can dam pa khyod ni gzi brjid kyi rgyal po ltar rlom sems can thams cad spangs shing bsnyen par dka' ba'o// sems can dam pa khyod ni sred med kyi bu ltar thul bar dka' zhing spobs dang ldan
238b2(mdo sde): pa'o// 'jig rten gyi mgon po khyod ni byang chub kyi snying po las mi bzhengs pa dam bcas pa bstan pa'o// sems can dam pa khyod ni dbang po'i lag gis 'phangs pa'i rdo rje ltar mar mi ldog pa'o//
238b3(mdo sde): sems can dam pa khyod ni ring po mi thogs par stobs bcu dang ldan par byon pas brnyes pa legs par brnyes pa'o// dge slong dag de ltar byang chub kyi shing gi lha mo rnams kyis// dpal rnam pa
238b4(mdo sde): bcu drug gis byang chub sems dpa' 'phel bar byed do// dge slong dag de na gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams kyi rnams pa bcu drug gis bdud nyams dmas par byed do//
238b5(mdo sde): rnam pa bcu drug gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sdig can khyod ni khrung khrung rgan po ltar sems khong du chud cing dmas pa'o// sdig can khyod ni glang po rgan po 'dam du bying ba ltar nyams chung ba'o//
238b6(mdo sde): sdig can khyod ni dpa' bor khas 'ches pa pham pa ltar gcig pur gyur pa'o// sdig can khyod ni nad kyis nyen pa 'brog tu bor bar war gnyis su med pa'o// sdig can khyod ni glang bu khal gyis
238b7(mdo sde): nyon mongs pa ltar stobs med pa'o// sdig can khyod ni shing rlung gis btab pa ltar skyel ba'o// sdig can khyod ni 'dron pa lam stor ba ltar lam ngan par gnas pa'o// sdig can khyod ni mi dbul
239a1(mdo sde): po bu lon can ltar dman pa bas kyang dman pa'o// sdig can khyod ni bya rog byung rgyal ba ltar mu cor smras pa'o// sdig can khyod ni ma dul ba byas pa mi gzo ba
239a2(mdo sde): ltar nga rgyal gyis zil gyis non pa'o// sdig can khyod ni seng ge'i sgras wa 'bros pa ltar deng 'bros par 'gyur ba'o// sdig can khyod ni rnam par 'thor rlung gis gtor ba'i bya bzhin du deng 'dar bar
239a3(mdo sde): 'gyur ba'o// sdig can khyod ni sprang po bsod nams zad pa ltar dus mi shes pa'o// sdig can khyod ni snod chag pa rdul gyis gang ba ltar deng rnam par spang bar 'gyur ba'o// TIg can khyod ni
239a4(mdo sde): sngags la dpal ba sprul la bab pa ltar deng tshar chod par 'gyur ba'o// sdig can khyod ni mi rkang lag bcad pa ltar stobs thams cad dang bral ba'o zhes bya ba'o// dge slong dag de ltar gnas
239a5(mdo sde): gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis rnam pa bcu drug gis bdud sdig can nyams smad par byas so// dge slong dag de la byang chub kyi bsnyen bkur ba'i lha rnams kyis rnam pa bcu drug gis bdud sdig
239a6(mdo sde): can zlog par byed do// bcu drug gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste sdig can khyod ni dpa' bo pha rol gyi sde bcom pa ltarabyang chub sems dpas de mod pham par byas par 'gyur ro// sdig can khyod ni gyad
239a7(mdo sde): stobs chung ngu la gyad stobs chen po bab pa ltar do mod byang chub sems dpas tshar bcad par 'gyur ro// sdig can khyod ni srin bu me khyer la nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bab pa ltar/ do mod byang chub sems
239b1(mdo sde): dbam zil gyis non par 'gyur ro// thig can khrod ni prabu ma thar pa gang la rlung mar bab pa sar do mod byang chub sems dpas gtor bar 'gyur ro// sdig san khyod ni wA la seng ge bab pa ltar do mad
239b2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' ldangs par byas par 'gyur// sdig can khyod ni shing sA la chen po rtsa ba nas bcad pa wAr do mod byang chub sems dpas bsgyel bar 'gyur ro// thig can khyod ni mi mdza' ba'i tshig
239b3(mdo sde): khyer la rgyal po chen thub pa ltar do mod byang chub sems dpas brlag par 'gyur ro// sdig can khyod ni ba rjes kyi tshul 'i tshan chen po bab pa ltar do mod byang chub sems dpas yongs su zad par 'gyur ro//
239b4(mdo sde): sdig can khyod ni mi g.yon can bsad par bya ba shor ba lngar do mod byang chub sems dpas 'bros par byed par 'gyur ro// sdig can khyod ni me'i tsha bas bung ba'i khyu ltar do mod byang chub sems dpas mgo
239b5(mdo sde): 'khor bar byed par 'gyur ro// sdig can khyod ni chos kyi rgyal srid nyams pa ltar de mor byang chub sems dpas mya ngan byed du bcug par 'gyur ro// sdig can khyod ni khrung zung rgan po 'dab ma bregs pa
239b6(mdo sde): ltar do mod byang chub sems dpas sems khong du bcug par 'gyur ro// sdig can khyod ni 'brog dgon par lam brgyags chad pa ltar// do mod byang chub sems dpas phongs par byas par 'gyur ro//
239b7(mdo sde): rdeg can khyod ni rgya mtsho chen por gru zhig pa ltar do mod byang chub sems dpas smre sngags 'don tu bcug par 'gyur ro// sdig can khyod ni sreg pa'i bskal pas rtsa dang nags tshal ltar do mod byang chub
240a1(mdo sde): sems dpas rnyis par 'gyur ro// sdig can khyod ni ri'i rtse mo la rdo rje bab pa ltar/ do mod byang chub sems dpas brnyil bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'o// dge slong dag de
240a2(mdo sde): ltar byang chub kyi bsnyen bkur ba'i lha'i bu rnams kyis rnam pa bcu drug gis bdud sdig can zlog par byed kyang / bdud sdig can phyi ma log go// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ lha yi tshogs kyis yang
240a3(mdo sde): dag bskul pa thos kyang bdud ni phyir log ma gyur te/ slongs shig rgyob shig 'di ni brlag par gyis shig srog kyang sbyin par ma byed cig/ 'di ni rang nyid rgal nas nga yi yul nas gnan yang sgrol bar
240a4(mdo sde): byed par 'gyur// langs te zos pa ma gtogs dge sbyong 'di la thar gzhan cung zad med ces smra/ byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ ri'i rgyal po lhun po gnas nas g.yo srod 'gro ba thams cad
240a5(mdo sde): med 'gyur so// kar ma'i tshogs rnams thams cad zla ba bcas par mkha' las la ltung yang sred// sems can kun gyi bsam pa gcig byed 'gyur srid rgya mtsho chen po skam srid kyi/ nga 'di shing
240a6(mdo sde): gi rgyal po'i drung na 'dug pa la ni g.yo ba yong mi srid// bdud kyis smras pa/ kho bo 'dod pa'i dbang phyug 'jig rten 'di kun dbang // lha dang lha min tshogs bcas mi dang dud 'gro rnams/ kho bos
240a7(mdo sde): khyab ste thams cad kho bo'i dbang du gyur/ kho bo'i yul na gdugs pa 'ongs la tshig bzhin gyis/ byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ gal te 'dod dbang khyod yin gsal bar khyod dbang min// yang dag
240b1(mdo sde): bas pas rgyas kyi bang phyug yon// gal sde na 'graras 'gra khyud na 'dod dbang byar/ dbang med khyang ni rtsa bzhin byang chub ngamatho ba 'gyur/ bdud kyis smras pa/ dge song bdag srid bcom na
240b2(mdo sde): dartson par gzhig byed// khyod kyis gang bas la de dang phrad par srab ma yin// rab 'gro shes ldan la sogs dka' brab rab sems kyang // go 'phang mchos de mtho ba mi grur khyod sa smos// byung
240b3(mdo sde): rlab sems dpas smras pa/ kha tha'o zil nan po dang lda yul 'dod pa dang / bdag la rtag tu man du gnas pa dang / yul du 'gro bas gnas pa par spyam gnas pa yi// chang srong mi shes sngo//
240b4(mdo sde): du 'gro bas dka' thub spyan// de dag yang dag don dang bral zhing skyes pa sgra// khyab dang phyogs gcig ches dang kha cig rtag ces bya// lus can lus min yon tan min dang yon tan can// khyed
240b5(mdo sde): papo dang byed po min nas gzhan dag 'dzer// stan 'dir 'dug ste nga rgyal bcom pa sde dpung bcas// khyod pam byas te byang chub rdul med deng thob nas// 'gro ba 'di la 'byung dang byung dang mya ngan
240b6(mdo sde): 'das// sdug bsngal zhi ba bsil ba'i dngos bu sman par bya// bdud ni khros shing 'khrugs te tshig pa zos nas mdun du rtsub pa'i tshig tu smras pa dge sbyong 'di bzung shig/ gcig pu dgon par bor bar
240b7(mdo sde): gyur pa 'di ni nga yi mdun nas zung la song ste mur du dab du gyis/ nga yi khyim du myur du song la shing sgrog dang ni lpags smig phrugs su drug ste sgo ba byed du drug/ sdug bsngal chen nas ku so rnam pa pa yang /
241a1(mdo sde): po 'don cing lha yi khol po yin par bdag gis bdag mthong byos// byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ nam mkha' la ni ri mo rnam pa sna tshogs ca cha ris ris phye rtse mo sor bri/
241a2(mdo sde): bar nus kyang srid// phyogs dang phyogs mtshams 'gro ba'i shugs can rlung ni mi yis rab tu bsgrims te zhags pas bcing du nus kyang srid// nyi ma zla ba mun pa rab rib med byed mkha' las sa la
241a3(mdo sde): ltung bar byed par nus srid kyi// khyod dang 'dra ba rab tu mang po bgrang las 'das pa dag gis shing drung nas ni nga bskyod nus mi 'gyur// bdud dpung stobs dang ldan pa langs te ha zhes zer// dung
241a4(mdo sde): dang rnga dang rdza rnga mchog gi sgra 'byin langs// bdud dpung shin tu 'jigs pa 'di dag mthong nas ni/ kyi phung bu sdug khyod cis ma rung gyur ces zer// 'dzam gling gser dang tsam pa'i snying po 'dra
241a5(mdo sde): bar ser// shin tu gzhon nu lha mis bstod cing mchod pa'i 'os// khyod deng g.yul ngo chen po rab tu brlag 'gyur te// dbang pos lha min lta bur bdud kyi dbang du 'gyur// tshangs pa'i dbyangs
241a6(mdo sde): dang ka la bing+ka'i sgra skad kyi// bde bar gshegs pas gnod sbyin srin tshogs de la smras// mi mkhas gang zhig nam mkha' skrag par byed 'dod pa// de ni shing mchog drung nas nga 'dra rmong bar 'dod/
241a7(mdo sde): gang zhig stong gsum chen po bshig nas rdul 'grang dang // gang zhig pa sru yis ni rgya mtsho chu 'byin dang // skad cig gis ni rdo rje'i rang bzhin ri 'thor ba// des kyang shing drung 'dug pa nga la 'tshe mi nus//
241b1(mdo sde): bdud zong sems kyis gnya' shing gang gi bar tsam 'dug/ shubs nas phyung ba ral gri rnon po lag na thogs// dge slong myur du longs lang yi bsam pa bzhin du song // 'od ma'i mu mu stos na
241b2(mdo sde): mad bcad du re// byang chub sems dpas gras pa/ gal te stong gsums rnams 'di dag thams cad 'dud kyis rab tu gang gu'i la// kun gyi lag na ri bo lhun po mchog 'dra ba yi ral gri logs gyur
241b3(mdo sde): kyang // de dgang yo ba sra bskyod par mi nus nga la gnod byed smos ci dgos// mun 'byin ma rings zhig dang de'u re brtags te nga yis brtan por dran par bya// rnga mo ba lang glang chen mgo dang 'jigs
241b4(mdo sde): mig dang // mur gdug sbrul dang mig gi dug mi zad 'dra ba dag/ me 'bar ba dog rtse mor bcas pa'i ri 'phen cing // rtsa bar bcas pa'i shing dang zangs dang lpags rnams 'phen// sprin ltar
241b5(mdo sde): langs te phyogs bzhi dag tu sgra sgrog cing // rdo rje'i lde dang lcags kyi bu lum char pa 'bebs// ral gri mdung zung na dang dgra sta dug can 'bebs// sa ni brtol bar byed cing shing dag rab tu
241b6(mdo sde): 'joms// kha cig lag pa brgya dag gis ni mda' brgya 'phen// kha nas myur du gdug pa'i sbrul dang me yang 'thor// chu skyes chu srin la sogs pa dag mtshonas len// khwa cig nam mkha' jing
241b7(mdo sde): bskur nas gru yang 'phen// kha cig khros nas lpags kyi bu lam 'i rab tsam/ me 'bab pa dog rtse mor bcas pa rnams kyang 'phen// sa la lpags nas sa ni rab tu 'khrugs par byed// 'og gi nu yi zang
242a1(mdo sde): po'i chu yang rnam par 'khrug/ kha cig de yi mdun dang de bzhin rgyab du mchong // kye ma bu zhes g.yas dang de bzhin g.yon du mchod // rkang pa lag pa log par 'dug cing mgo
242a2(mdo sde): 'bar la// glog ltar rab tu 'bar ba mig nas mngon du 'byin// bdud kyis dpung ni bsgyur ba mi sdug byas mthong nas// sems can dag pa sgyu ma byas pa ji bzhin tog/ 'di la bdud med stobs med 'gro
242a3(mdo sde): med bdag kyang med// chu zla'i tshul 'dra ba yi 'jig rten gsum po 'khor// mig dang skyes pa bud med cing bdag gi med// rna ba sna dang de bzhin lce dang de bzhin lus// chos 'di byed pa po dang tshor ba po dang /
242a4(mdo sde): bral/ brten nas skyes te nang yang stong zhing phyi yang stong // bden tshig gang gis 'dir chos shin tu stong zhe na// 'dul mthun gnod sbyin nges pa gang yin de dag gis// lag pa'i mtshon cha me tog
242a5(mdo sde): phreng bar mthong gyur ces// rtag tu bden smras de yis bden pa'i tshig byas te// de yis lag mthil g.yon pa dra ba mchog sbas pa// sen mo zangs mdog rab mdzes rtsibs stong 'khor lo can// 'dzam/
242a6(mdo sde): gling gser 'bar 'dra ba bsod nams dgyes bsten pas// tshul du shis par mgo nas rkang pa'i bar du byugs// mkha' las glog 'dra bar ni lag pa brkyang byas nas// tshig tu smras pas 'di nga yis
242a7(mdo sde): dbang yin te// ngas ni sngon chad mchod sbyin khrag zig sna tshogs byas// mong la mi sbyin sman ste don med gzhan ma byin// chu dang me dang rlung ni nga yi dbang yin te// tshangs pa skyes dgu bdag dang skar bcas
242b1(mdo sde): m+bu dang / gang dag thogs bdud gan bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang // bdag khrims brtul zhums byang chub yan lag 'phags pa dbang // sbyin dang rgyal khrims de bzhin bzod par yi nga
242b2(mdo sde): brtson 'grus de bzhin bsam gtan de ltar shes rab dang // cad med bzhi dang de bzhin mngon shes nga yi dbang // rim gyis byang chub spyod pa thams cad nga yi dbang // phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten sems
242b3(mdo sde): can mtha' dag ji snyed pa// de dag rnams kyi bsod nams tshul khrims ye shes dang // gtan pa med pa'i mchod sbyin byas pa bu rnams kyang ni// de dag nga yi ba spu'i brgya yis nar mi pod// de yis rdzam
242b4(mdo sde): du shis par lag pa sa la brdabs// khar ba'i snod ltar sa 'di sgra yang byung bar gyur// bdud kyi sgra zos nas ni sa la skyel gyur te// nag po'i rtsa lag rgyob shig zung shig sgra yang zos// lus las rdul
242b5(mdo sde): byung gzi brjid nyams shing bzhin mdog gyur// rgabs bcom par bdud de nyid kyis mthong bar gyur// brang brdung tsho nge 'don cing 'jigs nyen mgon yang med// bdud kyi yid 'khrul gyur cing sems
242b6(mdo sde): nomyos par gyur// glang po rta dang gzhon pa shing rta sa la lhung // srin po grul bum dag dang sha za sngags shing rgyug/ mgo mongs lam mi rnyed cing gnas med skyabs kyang med// rlung btab nags mes
242b7(mdo sde): bras ltar bltas nas song bar gyur// pa ma bu dang sring mo de bzhin pu nu dag gang na mthong zhing ga 'dra do shes 'dri bar byed// de yi rkyen gyis de dag phan tshun 'thab cing rtsod// bdag ni sdug bsngal
243a1(mdo sde): gyur te 'tsho ba'i bskabs kyang med// bdud dpung rgya che mang ba mi 'khrugs skyed po de// thams cad rnam par 'thor zhing tha dgur gyes 'gyur te// zhag bdun 'das kyi bar/
243a2(mdo sde): du phan tshun phrad ma gyur// mthong nas smras pa gal te gson na dga' zhes 'dzer// shing gi lha mos de tshe de la snying rje byas// chu yi bum pa thogs te nag po'i rtse lag gtor// myur du longs la
243a3(mdo sde): shol ma byed sbyin du song // bla ma'i chog ma mnyan pas de ltar gyur pa yin// bdud kyis smras pa/ bdag gis bu yi snyan tshig phan pa ma mnyan te/ sems can shin tu dag la nyes pa byas pas na/
243a4(mdo sde): sdug bsngal 'jigs 'bongs mya ngan brlag dang brnyas pa dang / cir mi rung ba'i sgra dang dman nyid bdag gis thob// lha mos smras pa/ mi mkhas gang zhig nyes pa med la nyes byed pa/ de ni nyes
243a5(mdo sde): dang sdug bsngal ba dang 'phongs pa dang / cir mi rung zhes bya ba'i sgra dang dman nyid dang / bsad dang bcing dang nyes pa du ma rnyed par 'gyur// lha dang lha min mkha' lding mi ci srin po'i dbang //
243a6(mdo sde): tshangs pa brgya byin gzhan 'phrul 'og min bcas pa dag/ 'di ltar khyod kyis 'di 'dra'i bdud kyi dpung bcom pas// 'jig rten dpa' bo rgyal ba brjod// rgyan phreng chun po zla ba gdugs dang
243a7(mdo sde): rgyal mtshan ba dan 'bul// me tog a ga ru dang rgya spos tsan dan phye char 'bebs// sil snyan dag kyang rab tu dkrol ba byed cing tshig brjod pa// dpa' bo dgra tshogs rgyal rnams khyod la dgab pa
243b1(mdo sde): man par jug/ san sus 'di na byams pasagasanas bdud kyi kyil ga/ can pas mngad dpa' ba dmang byang chub ba rjes// thobs ba cu ma 'drems pa yang dag ga pa dang/ yangs
243b2(mdo sde): sa yul rnams gams pad med pa rnyes par 'gyur// bdu 'dus ched du 'dir na gsul ngo rab 'thams// rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spobs thal sras mthong ba// khyabasam
243b3(mdo sde): drug dang khrag khrig ci shA ba ni// de dag sangs rgyas byang chub mchog tu yid kyis klan// bdud brtul ba'i le'u zhes bya ste gyi shu gcig to// / dge slong dag gi sar byang chus
243b4(mdo sde): sems dpa' bdud por rgol ba bcom pa// dgra btul ba/ g.yul ngor g.yul las rnam par rgyal ba// gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan bsgreng bas 'dod pa rnams las dben pa
243b5(mdo sde): sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams las dben pa rtog pa dang bcas pa/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can/ bsam gtan dang po rdzogs par byas te gnas
243b6(mdo sde): so// de rtog pa dang dpyod pa dang bral zhing nang yongs su dang rtse/ sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas/ rtog pa med pa/ ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can/ bsam gtan
243b7(mdo sde): gnyis pa rdzogs par byas te gnas so// de dga' ba'i 'dod chags dang bral bas/ gtang snyoms la gnas shing dran pa dang shes bzhin can yin te/ bde ba lus kyis myong la/
244a1(mdo sde): 'phags pa rnams kyis gang de dran pa dang ldan pa bde ba la gnas pa gtang snyoms pa'i zhes brjod pa ste// dga' ba med pa bsam gtan gsum pa rdzogs par
244a2(mdo sde): byas te gnas so// de bde ba yang spangs te/ snga nas sdug bsngal ba yang spangs shing yid bde ba dang / yid mi bde ba yang nub pas/ bde ba yang ma yin/ sdug bsngal yang ma yin pa/
244a3(mdo sde): gtang snyoms dang dran pa yongs su dag pa/ bsam gtan bzhi pa yongs su rdzogs par byas te gnas so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de lta bur snyoms par zhugs pa'i
244a4(mdo sde): sems yongs su dag pa/ yongs su byang ba/ 'od gsal ba/ nyon mongs med pa/ nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang bral ba/ mnyen pa las su rung bar gnas pa mi g.yo bar gyur pas nam gyi cha
244a5(mdo sde): stod la lha'i mig las ye shes mthong ba'i rig pa mngon du bya ba'i phyir// sems mngon par sgrub cing / mngon par gtod do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' lha'i mig long
244a6(mdo sde): su dag pa/ mi'i las shin tu 'das pas sems can shi 'pho ba dang / skye ba dang kha dog bzang po dang / kha dog ngan pa dang / bzang po dang / ngan pa rnams mthong ngo // las ji lta ba bzhin du
244a7(mdo sde): 'gro ba'i sems can rnams kyang rab tu shes te/ kye ma sems can 'di dag ni lus kyis nyes par spyad dang ldan pa// ngag dang yid kyis nyes par spyad pa dang ldan pa/ 'phags pa rnams la
244b1(mdo sde): gyur ba 'debs pa/ log par lta bdag ste// de dag log par zla ba'i las yang dag par blangs pa'i rgyus lus zhig ste/ shi ba'i 'og tu ngan 'gro log par ltung ba/ sems can dmyal ba rnams
244b2(mdo sde): su skye bar 'gyur ba dag go// sems can 'di dag ni lus kyis lags par spyod pa dang ldan pa/ ngag dang yid kyis lags par spyod pa dang ldan pa/ 'phags pa rnams la thur rab mi 'debs pa/
244b3(mdo sde): yang dag par lta ba dag ste/ de dag yang dag par lta ba'i las yang dag par blangs pa'i rgyus lus zhig nas/ bde 'gro mtho ros kyi 'jig rten du lha'i nang du skye bar 'gyur ba dag ces par
244b4(mdo sde): rab tu shes so// de ltar lha'i mig rnam par dag pa mo'i las shin tu 'das pas sems can 'chi 'pho ba dang / rtse ba dang / kha dog bzang po dang / kha dog ngan pa dang / bde 'gror song ba da
244b5(mdo sde): ngan 'gror song ba dang / ngan pa dang / bzang po dag dang / las ji lta ba bzhin du 'gro ba rnams mthong ngo // dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' nam gyi cha stod la rig pa mngon sum du byed do//
244b6(mdo sde): mun pa sel te/ snang bskyed do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de lta bur snyoms par zhugs pa'i sems yongs su dag pa/ yongs su byung ba/ 'od gsal ba/ nyon mongs pa med pa/ 1
244b7(mdo sde): nyon mongs pa dang bral ba/ mkhyen pa/ las su rung bar gnas pa/ mi g.yo bar gyur pas nam mi gung thun la sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa'i ye shes mthong ba'i rig pa mngon tu bya ba'i phyir/ lem/
245a1(mdo sde): mngon par sgrub cing mngon par gtod do// de dag dang / sems can gzhan dag gi sngon gyi gnas rnams rjes su dran te/ 'di lta ste/ skye ba gcig dang / gnyis dang
245a2(mdo sde): gsum dang / bzhi dang / lnga dang / bcu dang / nyi shu dang / sum cu dang / bzhi bcu dang / skye ba lnga bcu dang / bye ba brgya dang / skye ba stong dang / skye ba brgya stong dang / skye ba brgya stong phrag du ma dang
245a3(mdo sde): skyeb bye ba dang / skye ba bye ba phrag brgya dang / skye ba bye ba phrag stong dang / skye ba bye ba brgya stong dang / skye ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dang / skye ba bye ba brgya phrag du ma dang / skye ba bye ba stong phrag du ma dang /
245a4(mdo sde): skye ba bye ba brgya stong phrag du ma dang / skye ba bye ba zag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma nas/ 'jigs pa'i bskal ba dang / chags pa'i bskal pa dang / 'jigs pa dang / chags pa'i bskul ba dang / 'jigs pa/
245a5(mdo sde): dang chags pa'i bskal pa du ma dag kyang rjes su dran no// bdag che ge mo zhes bya ba zhig tu gyur/ ming ni 'di zhes bya bar gyur to// rus ni 'di zhes bya'o// kha dog ni 'di lta bu'o// kha zas ni 'di lta bu/
245a6(mdo sde): zhig za za'o// tshe'i tshad ni 'di tsam zhig thub bo// yun ni 'di srid cig tu gnas gnas so// bde ba dang sdug bsngal ni 'di lta bu zhig myong ngo // bdag de nas shi 'phos nas che ge mo zhes bya ba zhig
245a7(mdo sde): skyes so// de nas shi 'phos nas kyang che ge mo zhes bya ba zhig tu skyes so// de nas shi 'phos nas 'dir skyes so zhes rnam pa dang bcas// yul phyogs dang bcas par bdag dang sems can thams cad
245b1(mdo sde): kyi sngon gyi gnas nam pa du ma rjes su dran no// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de lta bur snyoms par zhugs pa'i sems yongs su dag pa/ yongs su byang ba/ 'od gsal ba/ nyon mongs pa med pa//
245b2(mdo sde): nye ba'i nyon mong ba dang bral ba/ mtshan pa/ las su rung bar gnas pa mi g.yo bar gyur pas/ nam gyi cha spyad kyu reng 'char ba'i dus kyi che/ rnga brdung ba'i namachod tsam na/ sdug bsngal dang / kun
245b3(mdo sde): 'byung ba nub par bya ba dang / zag pa bad pa shes pa mthong ba'i rig pa mngon du bya ba'i phyir/ sems mngon par sgrub cing mngon par btod de/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ma 'jig rten 'di ni 'o/
245b4(mdo sde): wA we/ rtse ba dang / rga ba dang na ba dang / 'chi 'pho ba dang / lte bas sdug bsngal bar gyur pa yin na/ 'on kyang rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba'
245b5(mdo sde): zhig 'di las 'byung bar bya ba mi shes te/ e ma horga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba la sogs pa sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' shig 'di thams cad zad par bya bar shes na ci ma rung snyam nas
245b6(mdo sde): de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ gang yod pas rga ba dang / 'chi ba 'byung / rga ba dang / 'chi ba'i rkyen ni gang yin sgyum nas des 'di snyam du sems te/ skye ba yod pas rba shi byung
245b7(mdo sde): sterga shi'i rkyen ni skye ba yin no snyam mo// de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ gang yod pas rtse ba byung / skye ba'i rkyen ni gang yin snyam nas/ des 'di snyam du bsams te/ sri
246a1(mdo sde): pa yod pas skye ba byung ste/ skye ba'i rkyen ni srid pa yin no snyam mo// de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ gang yod pas srid pa byung / srid pa'i rkyen
246a2(mdo sde): ni gang yin snyam nas/ des 'di snyam du bsamA te/ len pa yod pas srid pa byung ste/ srid pa'i rkyen ni len pa yin no snyam mo// de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ gang
246a3(mdo sde): yod pas len pa byung / len pa'i rkyen ni gang yin snyam nas/ des 'di snyam du bsams te/ sred pa yod pas len pa byung ste/ len pa'i rkyen ni srid pa yin no snyam mo// de nas yang byang chub
246a4(mdo sde): sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ gang yod pas sred pa byung / sred pa'i rkyen ni gang yin snyam nas/ des 'di snyam du bsams te/ tshor ba yod pas sred pa byung ste/ sred pa'i rkyen ni tshor ba
246a5(mdo sde): yin no snyam mo// de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ gang yod pas tshor ba byung / tshor ba'i rkyen ni gang yin snyam nas/ des 'di snyam du bsams te/ reg pa yod pas tshor
246a6(mdo sde): babyung ste/ tshor ba'i rkyen ni rig pa yin no snyam mo// de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ gang yod pas reg pa byung / reg pa'i rkyen ni gang yin snyam nas// des 'di snyam na
246a7(mdo sde): bsams te/ skye mched drug yod pas reg pa byung ste/ reg pa'i rkyen ni skye mched drug yin no snyam mo// de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ gang yod pas skye mched drug byung /
246b1(mdo sde): rgyam che drug gi rkyen ni gang yin mam nas/ des 'di sa ma du bsams te/ ming dang gzags yod pas rnam ched drug byung ste/ kye mched drug gi cin ni mong dang gzugs yin nomam mo// danapa
246b2(mdo sde): yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ gang yod pas ming dang gzugs byung / ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen noni gang yin nam nas/ des 'di snyam du bsams te/ rnam par shes pa yod
246b3(mdo sde): pas ming dang gzugs byung ste/ ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen ni rnam par shes pa yin no snyam mo// de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ gang yod pas rnam par shes pa byung
246b4(mdo sde): rnam par shes pa'i rkyen ni gang yin snyam nas/ des 'di snyam du bsams te/ 'du byed yod pas rnam par shes pa byung ste/ rnam par shes pa'i rkyen ni 'du byed yin no snyam mo// de nas yang byang chub
246b5(mdo sde): sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ gang yod pas 'du byed byung / 'du byed kyi rkyen ni gang yin snyam nas/ des 'di snyam du bsams te/ ma rig pa yod pas 'du byed byung ste/ 'du byed kyi rkyen ni ma
246b6(mdo sde): pa yin no snyam mo// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams/ 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes/ rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzug
246b7(mdo sde): ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skye mched drug/ skye mched drug gi rkyen gyis reg pa/ reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba/ tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa/ sred pa'i rkyen gyis len pa/ len pa'i rkyen gyis srid gi/
247a1(mdo sde): srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba/ skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams 'byung bar
247a2(mdo sde): 'gyur te/ de ltar sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' shig 'dri 'byung bar 'gyur ro snyam mo// dge slong dag sngon ma thos pa'i chos rnams la kun 'byung kun 'byung zhes tshul bzhin yid la byed ci
247a3(mdo sde): mang du byed pas/ byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes skyes/ rig pa skyes/ mang po shes pa skyes/ yid gzhungs pa skyes/ shes rab skyes so// snang ba byung ngo // de nas yang byang chub sems dpa
247a4(mdo sde): 'di snyam du sems te/ gang med pas rga shi med par 'gyur/ gang 'gags pas rga shi 'gag snyam nas/ des 'di snyam du bsams te/ skye ba med na rga shi med par 'gyur te/ skye ba 'gags
247a5(mdo sde): pas rga shi 'gag go snyam mo// de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ gang med pas skye ba med par 'gyur// gang 'gags pas skye ba 'gag snyam nas/ des 'di snyam du
247a6(mdo sde): bsams te/ srid pa med na skye ba med par 'gyur te/ srid pa 'gags pas skye ba 'gags go snyam mo// de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ gang med pas shes bya ba nas
247a7(mdo sde): rgyas par sbyar te/ 'du bye med par 'gyur/ gang 'gags pas 'du byed 'gag snyam pa'i bar du'o// des 'di snyam du bsams te/ ma rig pa med pas 'du byed med par 'gyur te/ ma rig pa
247b1(mdo sde): 'gags pas 'du byed 'gag go// 'du byed 'gags pas rnam par shes pa 'gag go zhes bya ba nas/ skye ba 'gags pas rmA shi dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'dod pa dang / rdzun
247b2(mdo sde): bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams 'gag par 'gyur te/ de ltar sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'bra' zhig 'gag par 'gyur ro// snyam pa'i bar du'o// dge slo
247b3(mdo sde): dag de ltar sngon ma zos pa'i chos rnams la tshul bzhin yid la byed cing mang du byed pas/ byang chub sems dpa' ye shes skyes/ mig skyes/ rig pa skyes/ mang po shes pa skyes yid
247b4(mdo sde): gzungs pa skyes/ shes rab skyes so// snang ba byung ngo // dge slong dag ngas de'i tshe 'di ni sdug bsngal lo zhes yang dag pa ji lbu ba bzhin du shes so// 'di ni zag pa'i kun 'byung ba'o/
247b5(mdo sde): 'di ni zag pa 'gog pa'o// 'di ni zag pa 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam mo zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes so// 'di ni 'dod pa'i zag pa'o// 'di ni srid pa'i zag pa'o// 'di ni
247b6(mdo sde): ma rig pa'i zag pa'o// 'di ni lta ba'i zug pa'o// 'dir zag pa ma lus par 'gag go/ 'dir zag pa ma lus par mi snang bar 'gyur zhing / nub par 'gyur ro// 'di ni ma rig pa'o//
247b7(mdo sde): 'di ni ma rig pa'i kun 'byung ba'o// 'di ni ma rig pa 'gag pa'o// 'di ni ma rig pa 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam mo zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes so// 'dir ma rig pa ma lus pa mi
248a1(mdo sde): snang bar 'gyur ro// nub par 'gyur ro zhes bya bar de bzhin du sbyar ro// 'di dag ni 'du byed rnams so// 'di ni 'du byed kyi kun 'byung ba'o// 'di ni 'du byed 'gog pa'o//
248a2(mdo sde): 'di ni 'du byed 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam mo zhes yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du shes so// 'di ni rnam par shes pa'o// 'di ni rnam par shes pa'i kun 'byung ba'o// 'di ni rnam par shes pa 'gog/
248a3(mdo sde): ba'o// 'di ni rnam par shes pa 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam mo zhes yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du shes so// 'di ni ming dang gzugs so// 'di ni ming dang gzugs kyi kun 'byung ba'o// 'di ni ming
248a4(mdo sde): dang gzugs 'gog pa'o// 'di ni ming dang gzugs 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam mo// zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes so// 'di ni skye mched drug go// 'di ni skye mched drug gi kun 'byung
248a5(mdo sde): ba'o// 'di ni skye mched drug 'gog pa'o// 'di ni skye mched drug 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam mo zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes so// 'di ni reg pa'o// 'di ni reg pa'i kun 'byung ba'o//
248a6(mdo sde): 'di ni reg pa 'gog pa'o// 'di ni reg pa 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam mo zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes so// 'di ni tshor ba'o// 'di ni tshor ba'i kun 'byung ba'o// 'di ni tshor ba 'gog
248a7(mdo sde): pa'o// 'don tshor ba 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam mo// 'di ni med pa'o// 'din med pa'i kun 'byung ba'o// 'di ni sreg pa 'bog pa'o// 'di ni sred pa 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam mo//
248b1(mdo sde): na lda na byung bab// 'du/ ldan pa ga ga/ zhug par chu lam/ 'di gyun pa// 'don sa byung g+sa/ d+hA/
248b2(mdo sde): med pa 'gog pa'o// 'di ni srid pa 'gag par 'gro ba'i lam mo// 'di ni skye ba'o// 'di ni rtse ba'i kun 'byung ba'o// 'din skye ba 'gog pa'o// 'di ni skye ba 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam mo//
248b3(mdo sde): 'don rgaba'o// 'di ni rga ba'i kun 'byung ba'o// 'di ni rmab 'gog pa'o// 'di ni zla ba 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam mo// 'di ni 'chi ba'o// 'di ni 'chi ba'i kun 'byung ba'o// 'don 'chib
248b4(mdo sde): 'gog pa'o// 'di ni 'chi ba 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam mo zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes so// 'di dag ni mya ngan dang smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde bad
248b5(mdo sde): 'khrug pa rnams te/ de ltar sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' shig 'di 'byung bar 'gyur ba nas/ 'gog par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar du yang dag pa dzaM lta ba bzhin du shes so// 'di ni drug
248b6(mdo sde): bsngal gyi kun 'byung ba'o// 'di ni sdug bsngal 'gog pa'o// 'di ni sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam mo zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes so// dge slong dag de ltar byang chub
248b7(mdo sde): sems dpa' nam micha slad skya reng 'tsher ba'i dus kyi tshe/ rnga brdung ba'i namachod tsam na/ skye ba bu dang / skyes bu mchog dang / skyes bu chen po dang / sle bu khyu mchog dang / skyes bu glang po dang /
249a1(mdo sde): skyes bu seng ge dang / skyes bu skyes mchog dang / skyes bu dpa' bo dang / skyes bu brtul pod dang / skyes bu cang shes dang / skyes bu pad+ma dang / skyes bu
249a2(mdo sde): pad+ma dkar po dang / skyes bu ljing khyer ba dang / skyes bu kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pas/ 'phags pa'i ye shes kyis shes par bya ba dang / khong du chud par bya ba dang / thob par bya ba dang / blta
249a3(mdo sde): bar bya ba dang / mngon tu bya ba gang ci yang rung ste/ de thams cad sems kyi skad cig cig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs
249a4(mdo sde): par sangs rgyas nas/ rig pa gsum thob po// dge slong dag de nas lha'i bu rnams kyis smras pa/ grogs po dag bcom ldan 'das mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyis me tog gtor
249a5(mdo sde): ces byas so// de nas wa'i bugang dag sngon mi sangs rgyas mthong ba de dgra 'dus nas// de dag gis de dag la smras pa/ grogs pod sngon gyi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rnam
249a6(mdo sde): rnamam cang ba mdzan cing ba mngon par sprul pa mdzad cem/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bajam ma dkyi bar dus rtag sa kyi 'ju/ dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pas/ lha
249a7(mdo sde): dag sa gnyis mthar rab mkhyenan pa/ shing thal bdun tsam dran ma mtha' ma mngon par 'phagasaH/ der bzug sa nas lam mi rkun ni med do// tshul na ci par na'o// bag pa ni bams
249b1(mdo sde): yang mi zag go// lam ni nad de yang mi 'jug go// 'di ni sdug bsngal gyi mtha' zhes bya'o zhes ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do// de nas lha'i bu de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la lha'i me
249b2(mdo sde): tog gis gtor te/ de nas lha'i me tog pus mo nub tsam du bkram par gyur to// dge slong dag de ltar de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ mun pa mun nag dang ni bral/
249b3(mdo sde): rmed pa ni rnam par snang / lta ba ni zlog nyon mongs pa rnams ni rnam par dkrugs/ zag rngu ni byung / mdud pa ni bkrol/ nga rgyal gyi rgyal mtshan ni bskal/ chos kyi rgyal mtshan ni bsgreng
249b4(mdo sde): bag la nyal rnams ni bton/ chos kyi de bzhin nyid ni mkhyen/ yang dag pa'i mtha' ni thugs su chud/ chos kyi dbyings ni yongs su mkhyen/ sems can gyi khams ni rnam par bkod/ yang dag
249b5(mdo sde): pa nyid du nges pa'i phung po ni sngags/ log pa nyid du nges pa'i phung po ni smad/ ma nges pa'i phung po ni yongs su bzung / sems can gyi dbang po rnams la ni rnam par gzigs/ sems can
249b6(mdo sde): kyispyod pa ni yongs su mkhyen/ sems can gyi nad gso ba ni thugs su chud/ bdud rtsi'i sman sbyang ba ni grub/ sman pa'i rgyal por ni byung / sdug bsngal thams cad las rab tu thar bar ma/
249b7(mdo sde): pa por ni gyur/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i bde ba la 'jog pa por ni gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi rgyal po'i khri chen po la bzhugs/ rnam par grol ba'i
250a1(mdo sde): thabs ni brnyes/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi grong khyer du ni zhugs/ sangs rgyas thams cad dang yang dag par ni 'dres/ chos kyi dbyings thugs su chud pa las/
250a2(mdo sde): dbyer med par ni gyur to// dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa ngas 'dir thog ma med pa'i skye ba dang / rga ba dang / 'chi ba'i sdug bsngal mthar dbyung ngo zhes bdun pa dang po la byang chub kyi snying po
250a3(mdo sde): de nyid na bzhugs so// / 'phags pa rgya cher rol pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// bam po bco lnga pa/ dge slong dag byang chub sems dpas
250a4(mdo sde): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob mthag tA/ de nas skang cig do nyid la phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi sems can thams cad gang cig de dang / zang cig de dang / sud tsam de la mchog /
250a5(mdo sde): bde ba dang ldan par gyur to// 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyang snang ba chen pos snang bar byas nas/ 'jig rten gyi bar sdig pa/ sdig pas khyab pa/ mun nag ces bya ba snga ma bzhin no// skyogs
250a6(mdo sde): bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rnam pa drug tu g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos so// ldeg rab tu ldeg/ kun tu rab tu ldeg go// 'gul rab tu 'gul/ kun tu rab tu 'gul te/
250a7(mdo sde): 'khrugs/ rab tu 'khrugs/ kun tu rab tu 'khrugs so// re mtsham/ rab tu rim tsham/ kun tu rab tu chem chem mo// 'ur 'ur/ rab tu'ur 'ur/ kun tu rab tu'ur 'ur ro// sangs rgyas tham
250b1(mdo sde): sa kyis kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa re legs so// zhes bya ba byin te/ chos kyi dgab pa dag kyang gyur ro// chos kyi dag pa pa drug gis song gsum sa/
250b2(mdo sde): ze'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na rin po che'i gdugs gcig gis khebs par gyur te/ rin po che'i gdugs de las kyang rnam pa 'di lta bu'i 'od zer gyi rba bzung rtse/ de dag gis phyogs bcu'i chi
250b3(mdo sde): na gyi khams grangs med dpag tu med pa dag snang bar byas nas/ phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / lha'i bu rnams kyang kun dga' ba'i sgra brjod par gyur to// sems can mkhas
250b4(mdo sde): pa'i pad+ma ye shes kyi mtsho las byung ba/ 'jig rten gyi chos rnams kyis mgos pa byung ngo // thugs rje chen po'i spring yang dag par 'phags te/ chos kyi dbyings kyi gnas khyab par mdzad nas 'dul ba'i skye
250b5(mdo sde): bo'i sman gyi chos kyi char/ dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sa bon thams cad kyi myu gu skyed pa/ dad pa'i myu gu rnams rnam par 'phel bar byed pa rnam par grol ba'i 'bras bu rnams 'byin par byed pa'i char 'bebs par 'gyur/
250b6(mdo sde): ro zhes 'dzer to// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ skyes bu seng ge de yis dpung bcas bdud brtul te// ston pa bsam gtan bde ba mngon tu mdzad nas ni// gang tshe stobs bcus rig pa gsum po brnyes gyur
250b7(mdo sde): tshe phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas zhing mang bye ba g.yos par gyur// chos 'dod byang chub sems dpa' gang dag yongs lhags pa// zhabs la gtugs te 'di skad tshig smras ma mnyal tam// bdag ca
251a1(mdo sde): mngon sum ci 'dra shin tu 'jigs dpung de// shes rab bsod nams stobs dang brtson 'grus stobs kyis bcom// khrag khrig zhing nas sangs rgyas rnams kyis gdugs/
251a2(mdo sde): rnams bskur// des pa skyes bu chen po bdud kyi sde rnams btul// khyod kyis gnas mchog 'chi med mya ngan med pa brnyes// srid pa gsum du dam chos char pa myur du pog/ phyogs bcu'i sems
251a3(mdo sde): can gli ngo rnams kyis phyag kyang rtse// ka la bida'i sgra yi gsung du brjod na ni// bdag cag ji ltar byang chub thob ltar khyod sangs rgyas// dper na mar dang mar gyi spring khu mtshungs 'dra bzhin// dge slong
251a4(mdo sde): dag de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu mo dag de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub kyi snying po la bzhugs pa/ mngon par shes pa brnyes pa dang / bdag pa yongs su rdzogs pa dang / g.yul las rnam par
251a5(mdo sde): rgyal ba dang / bdud phyir rgol ba pham par mdzad pa dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan bsgrengs pa dang / dpa' dang / rgyal ba 'phags pa dang / skyes bu dang / skyes bu chen po dang /
251a6(mdo sde): sman pa'i mchog dang / zug rngu 'byin pa chen po dang / seng ge'i ltar mi bsrings shing mu zing zhes byed pa mi mnga' ba dang / glang po ltar thugs shin tu dul ba dang / dri ma gsum spangs pas drim mi
251a7(mdo sde): mnga' ba dang / rig pa gsum brnyes pas mkhyen pa po dang / chu bo bzhi las brgal bas pha rol tu byon pa dang / rin po che'i gdugs gcig 'dzin pas rgyal rigs su gyur pa dang / sdig pa'i chos
251b1(mdo sde): spangs pas 'jig rten gsum gyi bram zer gyur pa dang / ma rig pa'i sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pas dge slong du myur pa dang / chags pa thams cad las yang dag par 'das pas/ dge sbyong du gyur pa/
251b2(mdo sde): dang / na mongs pa bsal bas gtsang rdza sa du m+bA ba dang / rgyal mtshan ma bskul bas dpa' ba dang / stobs bsu mnga' bas shin tu spobs dang ldan pa dang / rin po che'i 'byung gnas
251b3(mdo sde): rnom rin po cha thams cad yongs su rdzogs par rigs nas/ byang chub kyi snying lags su phyogs te/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do// 'don shing gi rgyal rjong du/
251b4(mdo sde): me mngon tung ma mdzad nas// ri rabs bur migayo bzhugs// bsengs pa mi mnga' 'bros mi mdzad// 'dis ni bskal pa bye mang du// sbyin dang dul dang rnam pa yis// byang chub ma
251b5(mdo sde): pa yang dag bsgrubs// des na 'dir na da mod mdzes// byang chub dam pa rgol ba na// 'di yis brgal ba bye mang du// tshul khrims brtul zhugs dka' thub kyis// brgya byin tshangs pa tshil
251b6(mdo sde): rlag 'di yos bzhal pa blamang du// bzod pa'i spobs kyi ga mnabs te/ sdug bsngal rnams ni dang du blangs/ des na gser mdag 'od dang 'ag/ 'dilas bkal ba bye mang du
251b7(mdo sde): batshan 'grus thobs dang tshul gyis ni// gzhan dag phyir bstil spobs mdzad de// des na bdud kyi khri las rgyal// 'di yis bsal pa bye mang du// bsam gtan mngon shes ma
252a1(mdo sde): thub pa'i dbang po yang dag mchod// des na do mod 'di la mchod// 'di yis bskal pa byed mang du// shes rab dang ni gsan pa bsags// sems can bye ba pan yang /
252a2(mdo sde): btags// des na byang chub myur du brnyes// 'di ni phung po'i bdud las rgyal// 'chi bdag nyon mongs bdud las rgyal// 'di ni lha yi bdud las rgyal// des 'di mya ngan mi mnga'o//
252a3(mdo sde): 'di ni shin tu lha yi lha// lha rnams kyis kyang mchod pa'i cha// 'jig rten gsum na mchod pa'i 'os// bsod nams don du gnyer ba'i zhing // 'chi med 'bras bu sbyin mdzad pa// 'di
252a4(mdo sde): ni sbyin gnas dam pa ste// 'di la sbyin pa btang na de// byang chub dum pa thob par du// bar mdor ni chud mi za// 'di yi mdzod spu mdzes pa yis// zhing mang byed pa gsal bar bgyid/
252a5(mdo sde): zla dag kyang zil du rlag/ sems can rnams la snang bar gyur// 'di yi gzugs ni gzugs mdzes te// gzugs kyi dam pa legs pa'i gzugs// mtshan mchog mnga' zhing phan bzhed pa
252a6(mdo sde): 'jig rten gsum na mchod pa'i 'os// 'di spyan shin tu rnam dag ste// zhing rnams dang ni sems can tshogs// sems dang ldan dang sems med pa// mang po dag la rang byung gzigs//
252a7(mdo sde): 'di sman shin tu rnam dag ste// lha yi dag dang mi yi dang // rgyal ba rnams kyi chos sgra dang // mtha' yas pa yi sgra rnams gsan// 'di yi ljags ni yangs paste/ ka la bidi 'jam pa
252b1(mdo sde): dbyangs// 'chi med rab tu zhing 'gro ba'i// chos ni 'di las bdag cag mnyan// bdud kyi sde rnams gzigs gyur kyang // de yi thugs ni 'khrug mi mnga'// lha yi tshogs rnams
252b2(mdo sde): gzigs gyur kyang // shin tu thugs gzungs dgyes mi mnga'// 'di yis mtshon dang mda' rnams kyis// bdud kyi b+h+rUM las rgyal ma lags// bden pa brtul thugs dka' thub kyi
252b3(mdo sde): blang ba'i rmad las 'di rgyal lo// gdan las ma bskyod bzhin du ni// de yi sku la gnod ma byung // de yi skabs su byams mi mnga'// zhe sdang gyur pa'ang ma lags so// gang dag khyod las
252b4(mdo sde): chos thos nas// sgrub pa bgyid par 'tshal ba yi// lha dang mi rnams de dag ni// rnyed pa legs par rnyed pa lags// rgyal ba bsod nams gzi mnga' ba// khyod la bstod pa'i bsod
252b5(mdo sde): nams kyis// mi yi zla ba khyod 'dra bar// kun kyang myur du 'gyur bar shog/ skyes bu khyu mchog 'dre bas byang chub sangs rgyas nas// khrag khrig zhing rnams spyod cing bdud kyang pham
252b6(mdo sde): mdzad de// tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang ka la bing+ka'i sgra skad kyis// 'dren pas thog mar tshigs su bcad pa 'di gsungs so// bsod nams rnam smin bde ste sdug bsngal thams cad sel//
252b7(mdo sde): bsod nams ldan pa'i mi yi bsam pa rnams kyang 'grub// bdud bcom nas ni byang chub myur du reg par 'gyur// mya ngan 'das pa zhi ba bsil ba'i dngos po 'thob// de las bsod nams
253a1(mdo sde): bya bas chog par su zhig 'dzin// bdud rtsi chos mnyan pas kyang chog par su zhig 'dzin// skye bo med pa'i nag gnas chog par su zhig 'dzin// sems canadan
253a2(mdo sde): bya bas kyang chog par su zhig 'dzin// byang chub sems dpas lag pa brkyang rtse tshig brjod pa// mchod pa byas kyis rang rang dag gi zhing du deng // kun gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs
253a3(mdo sde): la phyag 'tshal nas// sna tshogs bkod pas rang rang dag gi shing du dong // dpung rnams lan phun chen po byung ba de gzigs nas// bde bar gshegs pa tshul du shis par rnam par rol
253a4(mdo sde): dpung bcas bdud las rgyal de bdud rtsi reg shog ces// sems can rnams kyis mtshungs med sems kyis byang chub smon// dge slong dag de bzhin gshegag pa byang chub kyi shing drung na seng ge'i
253a5(mdo sde): gdan la bzhugs te// mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas// skad cig de la sangs rgyas kyi rnam par rol pa dpag tu med pa mdzad de// de dag ni bskal par yang bstan par rma/
253a6(mdo sde): ba ma yin no// de la 'dri gad ces bya ste// sa ni lcag mthil sa bur mnyam par gnas par gyur// 'dab ma brgya brgyas pa khyod dang ldan pa byung // sgyu rnams brgya song byang chub
253a7(mdo sde): bo rab tu 'dun// seng ge'i sgra yi mtshan ma dang po 'di 'dir 'ong // song gsum shing brgya dag dang ri rnams du ma dang // ri yi rgyal po lhun pa byang chub snying por 'dud// stobs
253b1(mdo sde): gan du song ste brgya byin tshangs pa 'dud// 'di yang mi yi seng ge byang chub snying por rol// sku las 'od zer brgya stong dag ni rab bkye ste// rgyal ba'i zhing mchog khyab nas ngan song
253b2(mdo sde): gsum po ni// de nas skad cig yud tsam mo khom bskams par gyur// sems can gang la'ang zab rgyags sdang gnod pa med// 'di yang mi yi seng ge gdun la bzhugs pa'i
253b3(mdo sde): blanor bu me dang klog dang lnga yi 'od// 'od ldang ba'i rlabs kyis zil mnan lam me min// 'gro ba gang gis kyang ni rngon pa'i gtsug mi mthong // 'di yang mi li seng ge
253b4(mdo sde): gdan la bzhugs pa'i rol// phyag gi mthil gyis reg nas sa yang rnam drug g.yos// de yis bdud kyi sde rnams shing bal bzhin du dkrugs// bdud ni mda' thogs sa la ri mo
253b5(mdo sde): gang 'dra ba// 'di yang mi yi seng ge gdan la rol pa lags// mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i le'u zhes bya ba ste/ nyi shu rtsa gnyis so// de nas ga
253b6(mdo sde): gtsang ma'i rigs kyi lnga'i bu rnams kyis// byang chub kyi zhing pa la bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa la bskor ba byas// lho'i tsan dan gyi rtse ma'i char mngon par ba ba nas/ rdul
253b7(mdo sde): dang mthun pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bstod do// 'jig rten gsal bar mdzad pa byung // 'jig rten mgon po 'od mdzad pa// 'jig rten ldongs par gyur pa la// nyon mongs
254a1(mdo sde): spangs pa mig sbyin pa// khyod ni g.yul las rnam par rgyal// bsod nams dag gis dgongs pa rdzogs// dkar po'i chos rnams kun tu rdzogs// khyod ni 'gro/
254a2(mdo sde): ba tshim mdzad 'gyur// sdig pa mi mnga' 'dam las rgal// go'u ta ma thang la bzhugs// sems can gzhan dag klung chen gyis// khyer ba rnams kyang sgrol bar 'gyur// shes rab chen po/
254a3(mdo sde): khyod 'phags te// 'jig rten dag na bla ma mchis// 'jig rten chos kyis khyod mi gos// chab na mchis pa'i pad+ma bzhin// 'jig rten ring nas gnyid log 'di// mun pa'i phung pos gtibs
254a4(mdo sde): pa la khyod ni shes rab sgron ma yis// rab tu sad par mdzad spyod// 'tsho ba'i 'jig rten ring nas ni// nyon mongs nad kyis gzir ba la// nad rnams kun las thar mdzad pa// sman
254a5(mdo sde): pa'i rgyal po yang dag byung // 'jig rten mgon po khyod byung bas// mi khom rnams ni stongs par 'gyur// wa rnams dang ni mi dag kyang // bde ba rnams dang ldan par 'gyur// skyes su
254a6(mdo sde): mchog des pa khyod// 'a bar gang dag 'dong brtsid pa// de dag brgal pa song rnams su// nam yang ngan 'gro mchi mi 'gyur// gang dag chos can 'gyur ba rnams// de dag mkhas
254a7(mdo sde): nad med dang // bab dang zang po zad pa dang // 'jigs pa med pa rnams su 'gyur// nyon mongs bcings pa bcad nas ni// kun kyang len pa ma mchis par// myur du rab tu grol 'gyur te/
254b1(mdo sde): dge ba mchog gi 'bras bu 'thob// de dag 'jig rten sbyin gnas te// sbyin pa rnams ni blang ba'i 'os// de dag yon phul mi chung ste// kun kyang mya ngan 'das rgyu lags// dge slong dab /
254b2(mdo sde): lhaltar gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams kyis// de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par bstod nas thal mo sbyar te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal zhing // phyogs cig tu 'bod do//
254b3(mdo sde): de nas gsal gyi lha'i bu rnams kyis// de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub kyi snying po la bzhugs pa la me tog dang / gdug pa dang / spros dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / gdugs dang
254b4(mdo sde): rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan rnam pa sna tshogs rnams kyis cho ga bzhin du mchon nas lan gsum bskor ba byas te// rigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do// thub pa zugs zab gzung
254b5(mdo sde): ni shin tu ldan// thub mchod tshang sa dbyangs kyu ltar gsung sran mchog/ byang rlab rab mchog shin tu dam pa brnyes// dbyangs kun mthar phyin khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// khyod sgrubs khyod ci
254b6(mdo sde): khyod dpung gnyen te// khyod ni 'jig rten mchen po byams zlas mdzad// khyod ni sman pa'i dam pa phrag rngu 'byin// gam pa pan mdzad khyod ni dam pa mchog/ mar me mdzad pa gzigs ma thag
254b7(mdo sde): khyod/ byams dang thugs rje'i sprin gyi dra ba bsgrubs// mgon po bdud rtsi'i rgyan gyi char po ba la// lha mi rnams kyi gdung ba zhi bar mdzod// khyod ni srid gsum mi gos pad+ma 'dra// khyod
255a1(mdo sde): ni mi g.yo mi bskyod lhun po 'dra// khyod ni thugs dam mig yo rdo rje bzhin// yon tan mchog kun mnga' ste zla ba 'dra// dge slong dag de ltar 'od gsal gyi lha rnams
255a2(mdo sde): kyis// de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par bskyod nas/ thal mo sbyar te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal zhing phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de nas lha'i bu rab tshangs pa
255a3(mdo sde): la sogs pa tshangs rigs kyis lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub kyi snying po la bzhugs pa la nor bu rin po chu bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas sbas pa'i rin po che'i dra bas bkab ste/
255a4(mdo sde): lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ tshul dang mthun pa'i tshogs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do// dge ba dri med shes rab 'od dang gzi brjid ldan// mtshan gyi dam pa sum cu rtsa
255a5(mdo sde): gnyis mchog mnga' ba// dran dang ldan zhing blo gros ldan pa ye shes mnga'// mnyal ba mi mnga' khyod la mgo bos phyag 'tshal lo// drig sum dri mi mnga' ba dri med dri ma thul// 'jig rten gsum
255a6(mdo sde): du grags shing rig pa gsum brnyes pa// rnam par thar pa dam pa gsum gyi mi smin pa// spyan gsum dri ma mi mnga' khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// dus ngan rlog pa bsal zhing rab tu ni thugs ldan/
255a7(mdo sde): thug ce thugs rjes 'phags pa 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa// thub pa dgyes pas 'phags pa thugs ni rab ni ba// khyod ni yid gnyis grol bar mdzad pa btang snyoms dgyes// brtul zhugs da
255b1(mdo sde): grab 'du pa/ smyornam pa das su chud pa rnam sa smra// zha paban pa can pa sa pa da gas ba ras gas
255b2(mdo sde): pa dang bcan nas 'as pa'i bdud pa dir lams pa// shes na bcan 'phrus bzhin byams pas pam mdzad nas/ cad kyi ga 'ab rnam pa 'du ba rang pa ces
255b3(mdo sde): dbyung rnams brtsas pa khyad la byas 'tshal la// dge slong dag de sngar wa'i burab chungs pa la sakris pacangs ris kyi lha rnams kyis// de bzhin gshegs pa la tshigs srab badra pa 'di dag
255b4(mdo sde): mngon par bskyod nas thal mo sbar te// de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal zhing phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de nas padudu ni bdakar ba'i phyogs pa de dag de bzhin gags
255b5(mdo sde): bag la ba der song ste phyin pa dang // rin po che'i gdugs dang zla re chen po rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par bkab nas thal mo sbyar te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la tshul dang mthun pa'i
255b6(mdo sde): tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do// khyod stobs shin tu rgya che ba dang bdud dpung drag po bdag cag mngon sum ste// bdud dpung rab 'jigs chen po de yang khyod kyis skad cig cig
255b7(mdo sde): la pham par mdzad// khyod ni bzhengs par ma gyur sku yang mi g.yo gsung yang brjod pa ma mdzad de// thub pa don kun grub pa 'jig rten gsum gyis mchod pa khyod la bdag phyag 'tshal// bdud kyi bu
256a1(mdo sde): mo bye ba khrag khrig stong phrag du ma gang+gA'i bye ma snyed// de dag rnams kyis byang chub shing mchog drung nas khyod ni bskyod cing g.yos ma nus// mchod sbyin bye ba zag khrig stong
256a2(mdo sde): phrag du ma gang+ga'i bye ma snyed mdzad de// byang chub shing drung bzhugs pa des na de ring khyod ni rnam par mdzes pa lags// byang chub spyad pa dam pa spyod mdzod chen shin tu sdug pa'i btsun mo dang /
256a3(mdo sde): pangs pa'i sras dang bran mo de bzhin bskyed mos tshal dang grong khyer dang // yul 'khor grong rdal dag dang rgyal srid rnams dang btsun mo'i 'khor dang glang po dang // dbu dang spyan dang ljags dang de
256a4(mdo sde): bzhin zhabs btang des na de ring rnam par mdzes// nga ni sangs rgyas 'gyur te bsam gtan rdzu 'phrul blo yi go bgos nas// sems can bye ba khrag khrig mang po sdug bsngal rgya mtshos khyer bar
256a5(mdo sde): gyur pa rnams// dam chos gru yis nyid kyis bsgral par bya zhes khyod kyis lan mang gsung brjod pa// khyod kyi smon lam de ni grub lags srog chags rnams kyang sgrol bar mdzad par 'gyur/
256a6(mdo sde): snga ba'i khyu mchog 'jig rten mig sbyin mdzad pa khyod la bstod pa'i bsod nams des// bdag cag thams cad dga' mgur yod gyur thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du smon lam 'debs// sangs rgya
256a7(mdo sde): rnams kyis rab bsngags byang chub dam pa mtshungs med yang dag bsgrubs nas ni// de ltar bdud sde 'khor de bcom nas thams cad mkhyen nyid 'tshang rgyar 'gyur bar shog/ dge slong dag de ltar
256b1(mdo sde): da rgyas thanams cas// banan pa sems pa la mngon par brjod nas pam mo lta ste/ de baban ga shegs pas cwal shing phyog ku' bad/ stsa/
256b2(mdo sde): ma 'dul dbang byang lha bul stong dums yongs su bapar te mdun byung bas/ de bzhin pa shags pa la 'jam bu nang gig se myo n+d+ha drug gis mngon par gar// na rnanas kyis
256b3(mdo sde): dasang pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod de// gsung ni dpyas ma mchis shing ma lathug rnam par ma 'khrugs pa// mun dul bral zhing 'chi med rtogs par thugasas chud par gyur// mra su me
256b4(mdo sde): mi yul ba yi dpal dang bgyi ba gzhal med 'os// rab tu 'bar ba'i blo gros ldan la mgo bos phyag 'tshal lo// dka' ba mdzad pa nyon mongs spong ba rdul dang dri ma sel// shin tu dga'
256b5(mdo sde): ba'i gsung gis lha dang mi rnams dga' bar mdzod// sku mchog 'od zer rgyas pa'i dri ma shin tu mi mnga' bas// lha dang mi yi bdag po bzhin du 'gro ba 'di las rgyal// pha rol tshogs rnams
256b6(mdo sde): rab tu 'jom pa gzhan gyi spyod mkhas pa// lha dang mi yi srid par dga' ba gzhan gyi blo sel ba// shin tu mkhas pa blo ldan gzhan gyi spyod pa rnam par phye// stobs bcu mnga' bshegs
256b7(mdo sde): ba'i lam 'dir rnam par chu ba mdzad// srid pa 'dzin dang sdug bsngal log 'dzin 'dor sel te// lha mi blo gros 'dul ba ji lta bzhin du 'dul ba mdzod// zla ba bzhin du mkhas las

257b1(mdo sde): sa rnams can kun snron ma chal ba'i lam gyis sel bste/ de bas ldan pa dam pa 'dren pa ldang nas la rnam par rgya// mtha' 'od dang gar ma nam sa dang mdung de bzhi nor dru dag/

258a2(mdo sde): par bstod do// khyod ni dga' ldan gnas na bzhugs te der ni khyod kyis rgya chen chos kyang bshad// khyod kyis bstan pa de ni de dung lha yi bu rnams chos spyod rgyun mo 'chad// khyod la blta ba
258a3(mdo sde): ngoms par mi 'gyur chos mnyan pas kyang ngoms pa rnyed mi 'gyur// yon tan rgya mtsho 'jig rten sgron ma khyod la mgo dang yid kyis phyag 'tshal lo// khyod ni dga' ldan gnas nas 'phos

259a1(mdo sde): bu de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par bstod nas thal mo sbyar te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal zhing phyogs gcig tu khod do//

259a6(mdo sde): sbyin pa// thub pa dri ma gsum dang za ba spangs shing dbang po zhi la thugs zhi ba// shAkya khyu mchog 'gro ba dag gis chos kyi rgyal po khyod la skyabs su mchi// khyod kyis brtson 'grus mthu yis 2#
259a7(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub spyod pa mtha' yas myur lags te// shes rab stobs dang thabs dang byams pa'i stobs dang bsod nams stobs rnams dang // stobs rnams de dag bcom ldan 'das khyod byang chub
259b1(mdo sde): bathags pa'i tshe namatha' yas te/ khrobs dang ldan pa de rang byang chub snying por bzhugs nas spobs bcu sanga' bar gyur// dpung tshags mtha' yas mthong nas dge slong rgyal po drang chub snying bar/
259b2(mdo sde): bzhugs pa de// nyams par mi 'gyur grang zhes ldarnams thams cad rab tu spangs shing grag par zur// khyod ni 'byung po rnams kyis brnyings par ma myur klu yang g.yo ba me mapar ste// khur l+r-i bya ba
259b3(mdo sde): gis brdabs nas kun tu g.yos te bdud kyi sde las rgyal bar gyur// ji ltar snga ma rnams kyi seng ge'i khri la byang chub dam pa brnyes gyur pa// de ltar khyod kyis rjes su sangs rgyas mtshungs shing
259b4(mdo sde): stegazhan du 'gyur ma lags// yid kyang mnyam zhing sems kyang mnyam ste khyod bdag nyid kyis thams cad mkhyen nyid brnyes// des na khyod ni 'jig rten dam pa rang byung 'gro ba rnams kyi bsod
259b5(mdo sde): nams zhing // dge slong dag de ltar lha'i dbang po brgya byin sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dang lhan cig tu/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par bstod nas thal mo sbyar te/ de bzhin gshegasapa
259b6(mdo sde): la phyag 'tshal zhing phyogs cig tu 'dug go/ de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnam dang lhan cig tu/ de bzhin gshegs pa ga la ba der song ste phyin
259b7(mdo sde): nas me tog a ti mug ta ka dang / tsam pa ka dang / sna ma'i me tog dang / bar sha ka dang / d+ha nu ka ri'i 'greng ba dang / rkun po thogs te/ lha'i bu mo brgya stong gis bskor nas lha'i glu dbyangs
260a1(mdo sde): len pa des// de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa byas te/ tshul dang mthun pa'i rigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do// shin tu gsung sman dbyangs ni yid du mchi//
260a2(mdo sde): zla ltar rab tu zhi mdzad thugs dang ba// 'dzum pa'i zhal ldan ljags ni rab yangs pa// thub mchog dga' mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// lha mi rnams kyi snyan cing dgar 'gyur ba// sgra skad gang dag
260a3(mdo sde): 'jig rten mchis pa kun// khyod kyi 'jam pa'i gsung ni phyung bas na// mi yi sgra skad thams cad zil gyis non// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug nyon mongs zhi// mi min dga' ba rnam par dag pa skyed/
260a4(mdo sde): rnyog pa ma mchis snying gis chos thos nas// de kun 'phags pa'i rnam par grol ba thob// khyod ni mi mkhas rnams la brnyas mi mdzad// mkhas pa'i rgyags pas nam yang rgyags ma gyur// khyod ni 'gying ba
260a5(mdo sde): mi mnga' zhum mi mnga'// rgya mtsho'i dbus nas ri mchog 'phags pa bzhin// de 'dra'i sems can 'jig rten byung bas na// mi rnams 'dir ni rnyed pa legs par rnyed// pad+ma dpal ltar nor rnams sbyin
260a6(mdo sde): papo// de ltar 'jig rten kun la chos sbyin mdzad// de ltar rgyal po chen po bzhi la sogs pa rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis// byang chub kyi snying po la bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa la mngo
260a7(mdo sde): par bstod nas thal mo sbyar te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal zhing phyogs cig tu 'khod do// de nas par snang gi lha rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i drung du lpags te/ mngon par rdzogs
